<h3 style=""text-align: center
<h3 style=""text-align: center

Trying to get your child into STEM? Looking for a more hands-on approach to education? STEMtrunk is a subscription lending library for the best K-8th grade STEM (Science / Technology / Engineering / Math) toys in the world. So what does that mean? Simple - instead of paying hundreds of dollars to try out a new educational product - you get access to DOZENS of products delivered right to your door for one low monthly fee.
<div>

STEMtrunk works by giving you new toy credits to your account each month. These credits never expire as long as you have an account! Each educational product has a credit cost based on how expensive the item would be to purchase directly. Save up credits for larger items!
<h3 style=""text-align: center

column2: >check out more products on our website

column1: How Expensive are STEM products?
Here is an example of just a fraction of the 40+ products available to STEMtrunk subscribers, and how expensive they would be if you purchased them at the retail price vs using STEMtrunk credits:
<h3 style=""text-align: center
<h3 style=""text-align: center

We are looking for backing so that we can purchase more inventory and build out some automation tools on our website which will help us to ship faster. By buying a STEMtrunk subscription on Indiegogo you will:
<ul>
• Lock in your discount price for 3 / 6 / 12 months. Regularly $39/mo
• During your subscription, you will get 2 credits per month
• Sign up for 6 or 12 month packages and get a free bonus credit added to your account each month!
• Free shipping on your first delivery. (Future deliveries are $10/shipment - covers shipping in both directions)
<h3 style=""text-align: center
<h3 style=""text-align: center
A note from our CEO - Aaron Watkins
Hi Potential Backers!

As a parent of two smart and talented children (Ethan - 15 and Kelsey -9), I have spent years facing the same struggles other parents in our tech savvy world today face. I knew that STEM skills were important for my children, and I wanted to prepare them for a world that was rapidly changing.  Their version of ""technology"" though often meant sitting in front of a screen checking out the latest app or zoning out to a YouTube video. While I believe there is a place for the screen - I wanted my children's play to be both hands-on and educational.

Looking around - I found SO MUCH cool stuff that satisfied this desire. Robotics kits! Build-your-own-computer! Drones that would teach you how to program! Everywhere I looked, something new was popping up. The speed of innovation in children's educational products matches the rapid speed of technology changes in other areas of our life. But how was I to know which were high quality? Without trying it out, could I be sure that my child would enjoy any particular item? And the COST! I started sweating every time I went looking for a price tag.

Why do we at STEMtrunk promote STEM education? Because we believe that STEM now = Jobs tomorrow. We face a changing world, one in which STEM skills are going to be fundamental for the majority of tomorrows workforce. Even now, we face a shortage of workers qualified to fill the demand for high paying jobs in Science, Technology, Engineering and Math. It is our goal to help prepare more of our children to succeed in these areas in the future.

STEMtrunk is our solution to exposing more children to a wide variety of STEM educational options while not breaking the bank for parents. We hope you join us on our journey. I'll leave you with one of my favorite quotes from the amazing Bill Nye:
Keep Learning,
Aaron Watkins
<h3 style=""text-align: center

STEMtrunk's are great for classrooms as well as families! Back one of our ""Classroom Pack"" levels and we will send a school of your choice a classroom sized subscription which includes not only enough kits to run a 30 student classroom, but lesson plans as well to guide teachers in how to work with them. STEMtrunk helps a school's technology grant stretch 10x further than it would if a school had to purchase, store and upkeep their own equipment!
<h3 style=""text-align: center

If you do not have children that are the right age group for STEMtrunk, you can still help promote STEM education across the country by sharing our campaign or backing our $25 STEM Love donation level or our $50 low income school fund. (This fund helps provide a STEMtrunk school program to a Title 1 school). Every penny helps! We will put the names of all of our backers on our website for eternity - including a link to your Twitter profile if you wish!

What happens if something breaks or is lost? This is our most common question, and at STEMtrunk we feel that parents shouldn't have to worry about something breaking. If small parts end up getting lost, you will not be charged for those, we keep plenty of spare parts lying around. If a product breaks, simple send it back and we will send you a new version of the product. If a product is lost completely and you are unable to return it, we have to charge you the MSRP of the product.

Do I pay for shipping? Your first shipment from STEMtrunk is free, and future shipments cost $10 per shipment. This is less than we pay to ship your product since we have to cover shipping it to you, and shipping it back to us, but it also keeps us from having to raise the monthly fee. Your $10 covers both the cost of shipping your item to you, and returning the item to us. (A return label is included in your trunk).

What if I want to keep the item? We are working on a system that will allow you to purchase the item if you wish to keep it and automatically be moved onto your next item. This will not be ready at launch however.
Is this available outside the United States? Not at the time, but it's in the plans!

What are credits? When you sign up for STEMtrunk you will get credits added to your account each month. If you do not use them right away, they accrue in your account. When you want to choose a new toy, you must have enough credits in your account to cover that product. Most products are 2-3 credits.
What is the age range of products? Every parent knows their child best and what will work for them. We list on the website the manufacture recommended age ranges from kindergarten to 8th grade.
Can I send this as a gift to someone else? Absolutely! Just designate their address as the shipping location. Please note that your card will be on file for shipping.
Are the toys clean? Absolutely! Every product is sanitized prior to shipment.

Are you homeschool approved? Unlike other toy rental companies, STEMtrunk is 100% educational, making it easy to get funding approval for homeschoolers. In fact, we are already approved with a number of homeschool programs. If you would like us to get approval at your homeschool program, please contact us.

What happens to my credits if I cancel? If you cancel your subscription, and credits you have in your account will be put on hold. If you ever come back and sign up again, your credits will be made available to you again!

When will my STEMtrunk ship? Supporters who back STEMtrunk first will also get their shipments first, with an expected delivery date of May 2018. We will roll out additional shipments soon after.  If you have a specific date which you want to have shipping start, we are  offering a ""delay my shipment"" for families who may not want to start their shipments until later. School shipments are expected to begin in August / September for the 2018-2019 school year.
<h3 style=""text-align: center
<h3 style=""text-align: center

How Expensive are STEM products?
Here is an example of just a fraction of the 40+ products available to STEMtrunk subscribers, and how expensive they would be if you purchased them at the retail price vs using STEMtrunk credits:
LEGO Boost - $160... OR 2 Credits
BOSEbuild Speaker Cube - $150... OR 2 Credits
Cubetto - $225... OR 3 Credits
Sphero SPRK+ - $130... OR 2 Credits
Stemosaur - $140... OR 2 Credits
Osmo & Coding Awbie - $80... OR 1 Credit
Piper Computer - $300... OR 4 Credits

Halos AI Inc. is an innovative technology company provides state-of-the-art intelligent storage products and services for individuals, families and small businesses. With the applications of the internet, hardware and AI technology, Halos enables users to store and share their own photos, videos, music and documents freely and safely so they could be masters of their personal data. “To be the most trustworthy company provides data storage products and services”. Halos redefines the way people store and share digital content and increases emotional and economic value of personal data.

column19:
>About

What is it?
CatDrive is a shared smart hard drive to store and share your favorite memories and files. All your personal data stored easily and securely in one location. 

Why should we use it?
1. Fast store and access all your files anywhere
column20: 2. Easily share photos and videos with family and friends
column21: 3. Store all your personal data safely in local
column22:
4. No monthly fees.

How much does it cost?
CatDrive will sell at a MSRP of $99.

What do we get when we order?
One CatDrive unit and the attached Ethernet cable, power cable and wall charger. 

Why are you crowdfunding?
We believe everyone should have the right to store and share their personal data easily and freely. Crowdfunding let's build a community of users to ensure we've built the best product possible.

column1:
Product Features

What features are available?
Centralized storage, automatically backup photos, access anywhere with Internect connection, multi-user with independent accounts, private sharing circle, photo roll.

What colors do you offer?
Cool Black/Elegant White.

Which option is best for me?
Super early bird price is only $109.
column2:
>Tech Specs

What is the uniqueness of the technology?
1. Data security protection mechanism.
2. Innovative photo display.
3. Share Circle.

What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge?
No battery needed. Plug CatDrive into a power outlet.   

What are the dimensions?
φ130mm×52mm

How does it work?
1. Connect CatDrive to a router with an Ethernet cable and plug CatDrive into a power outlet.
2. Search ""CatDrive"" and download App in your app store.               
3. Bind CatDrive unit with the app in the same WLAN.

What kind of sensors are you using?
Marvell, Dual-core chip. A professional chipset for storage.

How does it integrate with other connected devices?
WiFi &
column3:
mobile network.

Where is it manufactured?
China.

column1: Setup &
column2:
Maintenance 

How do I set it up?
1. Connect CatDrive to a router with an Ethernet cable and plug CatDrive into a power outlet.
2. Search ""CatDrive"" and download App. 
3. SyncCatDrive with ""CatDrive"" App in the same WLAN.

How do I control it?
Use the ""CatDrive"" app with an Internet Connection.

What is the care and cleaning of it?
Wipe the dust off the CatDrive with a soft dry cloth.

column1: Safety &
column2:
Regulation

What are the recommended ages?
14+

Where can I use it?
You can use the ""CatDrive"" app to access CatDrive anywhere with an internet connection.

What certifications do you have? 
CE,FCC, RoHS

How is my privacy protected? 
The data stored in CatDrive is only visible to you. 

How secure is it?
1. Your personal Data stored safely in one location.
2. Verification code for each profile.
3. Automatic Backup.
4. Anti-Shock HDD.
5. Independent accounts and family sharing
column7:
'>Shipping

When does shipping begin?
When the funding succeeded.

When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
In January 2018 as expected.

Where does it ship?
Global shipping.

How much is shipping?  
Shipping cost to U.S. market is $15. Other countries' shipping fees are $20.  

I'm interested in a distribution partnership.  
Please feel free to contact global@halos.co  

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?    
Yes, customers are responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country. The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped outside of the China and US may be subject to import taxes, customs duties, and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties, and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient
column8: Halos AI. has no control over these charges.

How do I upgrade my pre-order to a better one?
Your order can be edited before funding ended.

How can I check the status of my pre-order?
Only Backers are eligible to become Beta Testers. Pre-order your unit first, and then send us an email with your order confirmation number to receive more info.

column23: >The Rail-EZ is so lightweight and portable,

Folks ask us all the time...How can that work? Only half the umbrella is on the deck.

FACT: The sun is only ever overhead part of the day, it changes position depending on the time of day. Your umbrella may only be over 1/2 the deck in the straight position but using an umbrella that tilts and being able to move the Rail-EZ as the sun moves makes it extremely effective in targeting exactly where you want shade!

column2: >But how do I get shade on my table?

column1: This is another question we get asked a lot!  Fact: Since the sun moves, so does the shade, being able to move Rail-EZ gives you a big advantage! Sometimes 10 feet behind you is the best place to put your umbrella to get maximum shade, as you see in the video above. BONUS is you don't have a big pole between you and your dinner companion :)

column4:
>Not sure if it will fit your railing size or type?

Send us a photo with clear measurements and we can let you know for sure!  Just email to andrew@rail-ez.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
column7: >
column8: >Here we are testing the Rail-EZ with a 45-pound kettlebell!
column9:
>We've tested the Rail-EZ to the breaking point...

At which time the Rail-EZ releases before it can damage your railing. In addition, most umbrellas will collapse before it's able to put the kind of momentum or torque it would take to break your railing!

That being said, you should not leave your patio umbrella up in high winds with traditional patio umbrella stands, and we suggest the same with the Rail-EZ.

Bit of a nerdy fact: OSHA Safety requirements state that a railing must be able to withstand at least 200 pounds of force applied in a downward or outward direction within 2 inches of the top edge at any point along the top railing, the moral of the story is a standard railing built to spec can take a LOT of pressure!  

We know some backyard railings may not meet OSHA standards, that is why we suggest the option of using it in the ""extended"" configuration, however, any DIY railing products that you buy from mass hardware stores would meet OSHA standards.
column10:
>

We have lined the Rail-EZ with UHMW Pads (a soft and slippery kind of plastic) this protects your railing and prevents it from denting or scratching.
column14:
>

We did tests on the amount of force and a traditional umbrella stand can take vs. the Rail-EZ. It took about 7.5 pounds of pressure before a 50-pound stand tipped over. 

The same umbrella in the Rail-EZ took about 23 pounds of pressure before it caused the Rail-EZ to break loose from the railing.

The Rail-EZ can withstand about 3x as much wind force of a traditional umbrella stand.

Keep in mind, whether you put your umbrella in a traditional heavy weighted umbrella stand, or in the Rail-EZ, the amount of wind the actual umbrella itself can take will not change.
column17:
>Our homes are the center of our world.

Now More than ever we need to make the most out of our personal outdoor spaces, and that’s what Rail-EZ was designed to do!

Times may be unsure ...but one thing we ARE sure of... summer is coming! ? And our goal is to help you create an outdoor haven on your patio, deck or balcony. 

We know it's important to have a place where you can go to get fresh air, be comfortable and be protected from the sun.

That's why we felt compelled to launch our Kickstarter project, because we know people are going to need Rail-EZ in the coming months.

column1: No surprise... we get asked that all the time!
We have tested the Rail-EZ to the breaking point at which time the Rail-EZ's Patent-pending design is made to release before it will damage your railing.
That being said, you should not leave your patio umbrella up in high winds with traditional patio umbrella stands and we suggest the same with the Rail-EZ.

In cases of a less sturdy railing, or if a sudden gust of wind is a concern, or if you just need extra strength for a heavier umbrella or other items like a clothes hanger, we suggest that you USE THE FULL LENGTH OF THE UMBRELLA POLE (both sections).This way you extend the pole through the Rail-EZ holder straight down to the patio floor at the base of the railing. By doing this you transfer all the weight and wind forces from the umbrella to the patio floor and there will be little to no twist or torsion on the railing itself.BONUS the fixed parallelogram that the umbrella post and your railing create when held together by the Rail-EZ will actually strengthen a wobbly railing! Folks ask us all the time...How can that work? Only half the umbrella is on the deck.FACT: The sun is only ever overhead part of the day, it changes position depending on the time of day. Your umbrella may only be over 1/2 the deck in the straight position but using an umbrella that tilts and being able to move the Rail-EZ as the sun moves makes it extremely effective in targeting exactly where you want shade! Works great on most picnic tables too!Works great on fences, TOO!!
But how do I get shade on my table?

This is another question we get asked a lot!  Fact: Since the sun moves, so does the shade, being able to move Rail-EZ gives you a big advantage! Sometimes 10 feet behind you is the best place to put your umbrella to get maximum shade, as you see in the video above. BONUS is you don't have a big pole between you and your dinner companion :)
We live in Vancouver Canada, we can't let the rain stop our barbeque time!

In nearly 1/2 of home-fire-deaths,  a Smoke Alarm was present in the home. Smoke detectors warn you of a fire, and if you can get out— GET OUT! Smoke Shield is for cases when escape is NOT possible. Smoke detectors do not protect your lungs from toxic smoke if escape becomes impossible. Smoke Shield provides up to an hour of breathable air. It saves minutes to save lives and saves lungs. 

 

 

 

The Smoke Shield System combines 2 capabilities — first it is a powerful filter that scrubs dangerous smoke and turns it into breathable air for at least one hour, while family is stowed in the safe space. Secondly, A powerful strobe light outside the closet alerts fire fighters to look in the closet. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Smoke Shield System provides up to an hour of breathable air by turning any small space or closet into a safe space. 

 This breathable air is essential if escape becomes impossible. It is battery operated, easily installed, detects smoke, and automatically turns on.  

 Bring a family to safety quicker.

Two specialized filter compartments are built into the system to remove the toxic gases in smoke. It also alerts emergency responders where you are in the home with a blinking LED light, so they can bring a family to safety.

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

There is a significant up-front cost and lead time on the tooling we need for scalable mass production. Fortunately, we have a large panel of well qualified advisors and plenty of interest in long term and large scale funding that will assist us in getting over that hurdle.

Short Summary
It's pink like a pink flamingo...but it's a Pink Buffalo. Since it's pink, a donation will be made to the Susan G. Komen Upstate NY when we successfully hit our goal.
<h3>What We Need &amp
<ul>
• We need 3,600 backers at $26 each to be able to make this happen.

• The $26 fee includes the Original Pink Buffalo Lawn Ornament, taxes and shipping in the Continental United States.  *NOTE* If you buy more than 1, you can ship them all to different locations, we'll get that info from you after the campaign.
• A portion of the proceeds will go to Susan G. Komen Upstate NY.
The Impact
There's a lot of Buffalo in this buffalo.
<ul>
• The Original Pink Buffalo Lawn Ornament was thought up in Buffalo (over 10 years ago!), designed in Buffalo and will be produced just outside of Buffalo. Even the box it comes in is from Buffalo.
• It's absolutely a ""Buffalo thing!""
• By reaching our goal of 3,600, we can raise money for a very worthy cause - Breast Cancer awareness, prevention and treatment.
• We will donate 8% of the cost ($19.99) for the first 3,600 units, then 20% for every unit over 3,600. We do need to hit 3,600 units to make this happen
<h3>Risks &amp
Making plastic lawn ornaments is very expensive, especially making them in the US. So, we need to sell 3,600 to make the math work. The mold alone costs over $30,000.
Other Ways You Can Help
If now isn't a good time for you to part with $26 don't worry - you can still help! Just tell EVERYONE you know about it, help us spread the word,
FAQ
Q: Can I buy more than 1?
A: Yes - We created perks for 2, 3, 4, 5, and 10 Pink Buffalo. If you buy more than 1, you can ship them all to different locations, we'll get that info from you after the campaign.
Q: What are the dimensions of the Pink Buffalo?
A: 16""x9""x3"" - This is about the size of a pink flamingo lawn ornament.

column2: >Geek.print() is a startup reprap kit producer and research company. Our goal is to provide affordable 3d printers to the reprap community as well as researching new methods of using 3d printers. Backers will have the chance to get printed parts and/or fully built Prusa Mendel printers at or below market price, as well as helping Geek.print() take off.

column1: <div>

Who we are:

Geek.print() is a company spawned from a blogger who writes Do while(Geek). Geek.print() is dedicated to providing 3d printers with realistic price tags to people all over the world. Being a group of Computer science students we are eager to be a part of the cutting edge in this awesome technology, working hard to bring a top-notch quality product to the customer.
<div>

Why we need your help:

As you can well imagine, a college students budget is tight. And while we've secured a workshop and most of the tools required, we still have a few key instruments missing. That's where you come in--by donating to our project we are able to fill the perk orders in batches, allowing time to acquire the aforementioned tools.

The Promise:

Even if our funding goals cannot be reached, we guarantee perk rewards to each and every one of our backers.
<div>

Included with printed parts kits:

All kits will come with required printed parts for a Huxley or Prusa 3d printer. Kits will also include all required printed parts for a Wade's extruder.

Included with Unassembled Prusa kits:

This DIY kit includes everything you need to build your own Prusa Mendel printer. This is the best option for someone just getting into the reprap project and going the classic, self-builder route.
<div>

Included with Prebuilt Prusa kits:

This kit includes a pre-built Prusa Mendel printer. The item will be built and tested before it is snuggly packed into a nice box for shipping. The electronics portion of the machine will be Sanguinololu v1.3a and it will also have a headed pcb bed, making ABS printing possible.

The kit will also include a pound of filament in the color that your printed parts are printed in.
<h3>Orders &amp

We will be operating on a ""first in, first out"" basis. Shipping costs for orders placed outside of the continental U.S. will be based on location, but should be less than $50. Shipping on all contributions are now on the house!(Excluding any import fees outside of the US)Effective Feb 26, 2012.

Have questions?

email us with any questions you may have about our project at

Why do you need a smart garage door opener(GDO)?
You've probably been through one of these situations:
1. Forgot your remote key or put them in your bag in the car trunk?
2. Left home or fell asleep with the garage door opened?
3. When a delivery person arrives, nobody is at home?
4. Go out for a run or a walk but forget to bring your keys?

You may have already tried other smart garage door openers but faced below issues:

1. Sensor detection is not stable. You will sometimes find garage door open, but App tells you the door is closed.
2. Setup is a big hassle or even seems mission impossible.
3. Provided wireless sensor needs battery replacement frequently. Or provided wire is not long enough.
4. User guide is too complicated.
About Meross MSG100

Meross smart garage door opener MSG100 is a simple Wi-Fi based device that attaches and connects to your existing garage door opener. It detects the door ""open"" and ""close"" status with provided high sensitive sensors.
With Meross MSG100, YOU CAN:

Simply control your garage door via Meross App, Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. It works perfectly with Amazon Echo and Google Home. Speak to control your garage door is never as convenient as now you can.
Get alerted by its open/close, overtime and overnight notification modes and stay safe all the time.
With slight and sleek design, you can sort out the installation without screws and simply use the provided strong adhesive tapes.
Secure matters a lot. The high sensitive sensors will tell you exactly the truth of whether your garage door is open or not. Advanced encryption for data transition will protect your privacy.
a. MSG100 device        b. Door sensor and cable
c. Power cord                 d. Signal control cable
e. Test wire                      f. Double-sided adhesive tapes
g. 4 self-tapping screws
How it works
Normally your garage door includes a door, a wired and a remote control, tracks on each side and a center track.
The Meross MSG100 needs to be attached on the opener with power cords, signal control cables and sensor cables.
Signal control cable connects to your GDO terminals, which is the same as your wall button does. So you can control the door as you did with original wall button.

The sensor has two parts, one magnetic with wire and the other magnet without wire (the wired part connects to the MSG100. Stick the non-wired part to the garage door and then the wired sensor on the wall within 1 inch of the other sensor.
MSG100 reports the door status through your home router to the cloud so that you can control it via App or voice control.

Meross is a global provider of smart home devices and services, with more than 20 smart devices developed and over 500,000 pcs shipped.  Meross provides smart plug, smart surge protector, smart bulb, smart light switch, smart sensors and etc which are mainly designed for North America, Europe, Japan and some other markets.

We all envy voluminous curls but dread the work it takes to maintain them. For many women with naturally curly hair, it has taken years to find a perfectly concocted mixture of shampoos, conditioners and styling creams to achieve their signature style. They spend on average $32 every 30 days on hair accessories, products and tools. In fact, our curly consumer powers a ~$700M hair industry that’s on track to surpass $1B by 2020. Why do their curls require so much time, attention and money?

Check out this visual illustration of her problem:

 

 

As demonstrated in the visual, the body’s natural oil stays trapped at the root - taking longer to navigate the coily shaft. That oil is crucial in locking in moisture and promoting growth - no oil = excessive breakage. Slower travel times mean thirsty strands are begging for lasting hydration. As a result, their curls require intensive (and expensive) treatments, products and tools.

 

We launched our brand, Ruby Sampson, in 2016, in honor of our late family Matriarch and town seamstress. After struggling for years to strike the right balance of product, frequency and routine, our founder, Ashley, began to line all her clothing and accessories with silk. Silk is the optimal fabric for curly hair textures due to its poorly-absorbent (remember, our curls are thirsty as it is) and smooth properties. In short, silk treats our strands with gentleness that they need - careful not to snag and rip out the ends of our hair.

 

Once Ashley fully embraced using silk in her hair maintenance regiment, she not only experienced a breakthrough in her hair health, but it also sparked the inspiration for the brand. Ruby Sampson exists to bridge the gap between retail and hair care for the curly consumer. Our aspiration is to create products that are inspired by the unmet needs of our customer, ultimately bringing us closer to this powerful demographic.

 

Since the launch of our MVP - the silk-lined headwrap - we have been featured in Essence and Spike Lee’s “She’s Gotta Have It”
column2:
and participated in national festivals Afropunk, New Orleans Natural Hair Expo. and Broccoli City. Our customers loved our wraps, but we became fixated on a recurring complaint - the silk lining of our products were impossible to clean.

 

Eighteen (18) months later, we formulated the first Black Girl Magic Stain Remover for silk and satin materials! In our first beta study, we were thrilled to learn our powerful formula also works on wool, polyblends and cotton as well. Ashley explains, “we constantly received care questions for our silk-lined products. Most people don’t know how to clean silk. We wanted to make it easier so we pulled out our chemistry textbooks and created the formula from scratch in our mom’s kitchen. Our original intent was to treat stains found on delicate fabrics, but we’re delighted by the range of its efficacy on most fabrics.”

 

The formula is gentle, yet tough on silk and satin as well as chiffon, lace, wool, cotton and more.

 

Key Benefits of the Stain Remover

 

Key benefits of the stain remover include:

 

Clear Skin: Tackles the silent culprit of skin breakouts, hair oil by removing residue from satin or silk pillowcases

 

Allergy Relief: Lifts pollen that has been trapped in hair and bedding

 

Spotless Garments: Effectively removes unsightly oil stains from tough-to-clean household items such as throw pillows and arm chairs

 

Ashley expresses, “we’re ultimately guided by our customer’s lifestyle needs and silk is a staple in her wardrobe.”

 

The brand is headquartered in Washington, DC. Visit rubysampson.com for more information.

Effective in Real Life Scenarios:

column1:
Our Customers Say...

 ""The stain remover performed extremely well on this acrylic and wool shirt. My stain was heavy with Coconut oil and conditioner. The stain had set in my shirt. After completing my hair I then applied the stain remover (2hrs later), rinsed as directed, and let the shirt sit over night. As you can see the remaining Coconut oil/Conditioner  stains are GONE! :-)"" 

""It performed well and worked as expected. I’d sat on my couch to oil my strains and naturally wasted some of the oil combination on my pillow. I used the stain removed as instructed and hour later there wasn’t any trace of the oil stain!"" 

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

We filed a provisional patent on our formula in 2017 to uphold legal protection while we tested the market’s appetite for the product, price point and other variables. We launched the first iteration of the stain remover in October - still in our beta phase we have sold over 250 units! Our invention has been featured in Ujamaa Box and Naturally Curly. We've made a unique formula that addresses the unmet need of textured hair women in the market. With your help, we're ready to upgrade to a full patent. Here's what we need:

 

Reformulation Fees - $1,000: We've come far from our mother's kitchen. With your help, a tweak to a few ingredients and percentages will help us finalize a powerful formula

 

Legal and Filing Fees - $7,500: Your contributions are mainly allocated to covering legal fees.

 

Appraisal - $650: With a 3rd party seal of approval, you can trust our formula does what we claim. We strive to conduct health conscious products.

 

See what you get under Perks!

The Impact

 

Dry Clean Alternative: Our formula has the strength of a professional cleaner for those stubborn protein stains at a fraction of the time and cost.

Safeguard Generational Wealth: We’re passionate entrepreneurs at heart with a curiosity about our customer and we think that is worth protecting. As we continue to create reimagined products, our intent is to safeguard our earning potential and generational wealth. Just as Ruby taught her children to sew, we hope to leave a legacy for our children and larger community to inherit. Your contributions help equip our brand with intellectual property protection, thus increasing our overall valuation.

 

Everyone Gets to Play: Our formula fits perfectly into the product suite of some of the largest beauty brands on the market. With a patent under our belt, we can license our formula so that the larger home and beauty community benefits.

 

Join the Movement: When we approached the challenge, we asked ourselves, “who in our network is creating compelling ideas, solutions and conversations”? The key is to build up, right where you are in this moment. Black women in the US start businesses at 6X the national rate yet receive less than 1% of available funding. It’s important to us to support other female and marginalized entrepreneurs in the building of our brand. We’re pumped to partner with black-owned chemist Sister Scientist in finalizing a formula that’s intuitive to the needs and pain points of our customer.

 

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone is in the position to contribute. You can help in other ways!

 

Please share this campaign with your coworkers, family, friends and community. Use the hashtags #rubysampsonfund and #rubyraises

 

Use the Indiegogo share tools to instantly share!

 

 

 

","We all envy voluminous curls but dread the work it takes to maintain them. For many women with naturally curly hair, it has taken years to find a perfectly concocted mixture of shampoos, conditioners and styling creams to achieve their signature style. They spend on average $32 every 30 days on hair accessories, products and tools. In fact, our curly consumer powers a ~$700M hair industry that’s on track to surpass $1B by 2020. Why do their curls require so much time, attention and money?Check out this visual illustration of her problem:  As demonstrated in the visual, the body’s natural oil stays trapped at the root - taking longer to navigate the coily shaft. That oil is crucial in locking in moisture and promoting growth - no oil = excessive breakage. Slower travel times mean thirsty strands are begging for lasting hydration. As a result, their curls require intensive (and expensive) treatments, products and tools. We launched our brand, Ruby Sampson, in 2016, in honor of our late family Matriarch and town seamstress. After struggling for years to strike the right balance of product, frequency and routine, our founder, Ashley, began to line all her clothing and accessories with silk. Silk is the optimal fabric for curly hair textures due to its poorly-absorbent (remember, our curls are thirsty as it is) and smooth properties. In short, silk treats our strands with gentleness that they need - careful not to snag and rip out the ends of our hair. Once Ashley fully embraced using silk in her hair maintenance regiment, she not only experienced a breakthrough in her hair health, but it also sparked the inspiration for the brand. Ruby Sampson exists to bridge the gap between retail and hair care for the curly consumer. Our aspiration is to create products that are inspired by the unmet needs of our customer, ultimately bringing us closer to this powerful demographic. Since the launch of our MVP - the silk-lined headwrap - we have been featured in Essence and Spike Lee’s “She’s Gotta Have It”

With our 3D laser cut wooden map you will create a lasting memory. It's unique and highly detailed city map. Flawlessly and intricately cut, it captures every road, street, river, lake, and highway traveling into the main core of the city.  

Only with your support, we can succeed in our vision to let everyone create a lasting memory and cherish that special moment.

#woodencitymap #citymap #cityplan #enjoythewood
column2: >Take only Memories, Leave only Footprints

column1: • Handmade of 17 mm (.67”) thick birch plywood.
• Natural finish compliments any decor style.
• Comes already framed, ready to hang.
• Comes already gift wrapped, ready for gift giving.

column9: s=98f18801541dbcdb002c8037fa52a661"" src=""""/> Where was your most memorable moment?

column1: • where your dream came true
• where your parents/friends/children live
• where you got married
• where you got proposed
• your honeymoon took place
• you first kissed
• where was your favorite holiday
• the city you grew up in
• any other perfect moment for you
With our city map, you can create your own custom map from anywhere in the world!
column9: s=dd3b61f9030c2e65445e1b03257dc08f"" src=""""/>
column11: >You will never know the true value of a moment until it becomes a memory.
column19: s=80ae05b0d82426c085d91997f7ad5987f"" src=""""/>
column20: >You can see all the cities and more photos to choose !
column27:
s=fef3589c6e868aada9a020b5fa72077f"" src=""""/> ​

Each city is unique and beautiful, the same as city map. Cities with water will have blue layer (water). If the city doesn't have prominent water features, we can offer to make it with some parks (the biggest ones). Each city map will be discussed individually, so the production can take a little bit more time. Some cities have no water and parks, but still look gorgeous. 

Note: Maps can have either water or parks, not both. 

Some of the cities have horizontal orientation and some vertical. It depends on the city.
column34: s=2aa2c33087878cd541dfd3a5681a4f7d"" src=""""/>
column41:
s=37deba5012706dcdabb71f89af13c187"" src=""""/>

 

The Wooden City Map is created from city data that is transferred into the computer. All details such as roads, rivers, lakes, buildings and even parks are converted into layers to create 3D design. 

We use 3mm sheets of high-quality plywood, all of which are hand finished. Each layer is laser cut with a one-hundredth of a millimeter precision and polished to provide a smooth clean surface. 

Some layers are colored to make the map look great. Each map is unique due to the individual grain of the wood. All maps are assembled by hand with great attention to all the details.
column62:
s=b0850c7fd54c4baa4ee10e94b734decf"" src=""""/>

To find out the shipping fee, please sum up the weight of the plans in your pledge, and find the corresponding value in the table below.  Also, there is information in each pledge according to the shipping cost.

Wooden City Map:

Small – 0.8-1  kg ( 2-2.2 lb)  

Mid – 1.5-1.9 kg ( 3.3-4.1 lb)  

Big – 2.5-3kg ( 5.5-6.6 lb)

For example, if you would like 2 Big plans + 1 Small, you just have to add the weight:  3x2+1= 7 kg altogether. And just find the right price in the table below. 

• If you have selected a few plans, the shipping cost will be less than if we send them one by one.   

We use the most convenient and reliable delivery method. 

All perks will be sent from Ukraine with our post service.

We will provide domestic and international tracking. 

We do not want to loose any order. And we will assist you with the information all the way until you receive the package.

Once your order enters your country it will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery.

Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes.     

For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from GFS Gateway, First Mile, or your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way to avoid customs. Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.

Every Enjoy The Wood Plan is manufactured at our own production facilities. We guarantee high quality of our products, great customer service.

We are confident in our ability to create each plan and bring joy to all those who supported us. The same as we did with our previous project with Wood World Maps. Have you seen it? you can check it here.

 We have experience in delivery and international transportation.

We have a well thought out plan how to proceed after the end of the project.

Our team is constantly engaged in developing of some new ideas for plans. 

This project is an extension of what we have achieved till now.  

With the support of Kickstarter – your support – Enjoy The Wood team can cross the borders and create much more pleasure for the World

As we've been working and testing our first plans, we've already received some reviews. Reviewing those answers we've been able to improve our plan. Thank you very much for that.
column69:
s=c24b817aad314e5eea7fe9f36ae088dc"" src=""""/>

 

We want to share with you things that are important for us. So, first of all this is a family business that started 4 years ago. Wow, four years? Time flows fast. This 4 year tought us a lot! 

We have great experience in production of quality products, more than 20 thousands happy customers all over the world and 4 years experience in international delivery - 100% guarantee that we won't let you down!

Our family — is Igor, Maryna, our 3 daughters (Agneshka, Ameli and Ivory) and parents Tanya and Tolya. We are happy that we can make things that make others feel good!  

And we definitely couldn't do it ourselves. So here is our Perfect TEAM!
column76:
s=41bd40c8bd37efe5fe01c5a7abe28c75"" src=""""/>

We’ve been testing different variants of map for some time, developing and improving map with each version. We know that a lot is yet to come and we have a lot in mind that we can’t done without your help.

We've been working around the world for some time. And here is the result.
column83:
s=737ce282e4e7d5e0c247db438a6ae4c3"" src=""""/>

 

This is our second project on Indiegogo and we are very excited about it. This is all we can think and talk about with our team. 
While no project is without risk we are ready to face them and overcome them. 
As for fulfilling the “rewards”, we have extra part-time staff available to step in for production at any time we need. 
We already have the manufacturer in place and have started making some of our maps. We’ve sent over 2000 “masterpieces” and we are sure we can make more. 
We have a lot of ideas on how to improve our “baby” and how to make the process much faster! That’s why we are here. To make the manufacture faster we need more tools. 
We promise to keep you guys updated 100% of the way. We want to be completely transparent and honest. 
We believe we have mitigated risk factors as much as possible—we just need funding to run the wider production round! 
Please feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions or concerns or leave us a message through Indiegogo.

LEDO (www.ledolight.it) are cool TOUCH lamps with LED technology and diffuser in Solid Surface (Hi-MACS®).

The lamps (MADE IN ITALY) are of high quality and reliability: The diffuser in Solid Surface allows us to express the maximum luminous efficiency of the LED and simultaneously offers a unique and unsurpassed design.
column3:
/>

""Touch me"" is our slogan: just touch our lamps and they will light up gradually.
Adjust the brightness has never been so easy: touch and hold the lamp and it will fade until you moves the hand away, easily regulating the atmosphere of your home.
column4: >We have made two types of lamps:

column1: <li>
Cube - dimension: 15x15x15 cm
<li>
Imperial - dimension: 10x10x20 cm
For this two lamps we have created four models:
• ICE
• SUN
• RAINBOW
• FANTASY

column2: >The models ICE and SUN are brilliant lamp with warm white LED color for
column3:
> SUN and ultra white color for ICE. In this models you can dimmer the LED and turn the lamp on/off with touch sensor.

The
column4:
> models RAINBOW and FANTASY are RGB lamps (colored): With the model FANTASY you can easily choose the color of the lamp by holding the hand on the touch sensor until you has reached the desired color. With the RAINBOW model the color varies continuously and gradually with irresistible effect. You can turn those models on/off with touch sensor.

The models ICE and SUN makes more light than the RAINBOW and FANTASY models, in fact we recommend lamps ICE &
column5: SUN as lighting lamps, and lamps RAINBOW &amp
column6:
FANTASY for furniture. 

ICE and SUN
column7:
> consuming only 7W and produce a brightness comparable to a 40W incandescent lamp. RAINBOW and FANTASY consuming only 4W and produce a brightness comparable to a 20W incandescent lamp.

We have start to developed an app for smartphones that allows you to change the color of lamp or simply turn it on/off, all remotely. It's great to be able to imagine to choose your room's atmosphere even before you get home!

We can produce standard and customized forms with electronic touch adaptable to every you need.

Visit us on www.ledolight.it or on Facebook!

We need your help to open our first company and certify our lamps to sell worldwide.

You are very important to us and to thank you for your contribution we will give you several perks based on your generous donation.

In any case, be sure to use the same account you used for the first contribution(s), so that we'll be able to link them all to you.

With the RAINBOW model the color varies continuously and gradually with irresistible effect. You can turn those models on/off with touch sensor.The models ICE and SUN makes more light than the RAINBOW and FANTASY models, in fact we recommend lamps ICE & SUN as lighting lamps, and lamps RAINBOW & FANTASY for furniture. ICE and SUN consuming only 7W and produce a brightness comparable to a 40W incandescent lamp. RAINBOW and FANTASY consuming only 4W and produce a brightness comparable to a 20W incandescent lamp.We have start to developed an app for smartphones that allows you to change the color of lamp or simply turn it on/off, all remotely. It's great to be able to imagine to choose your room's atmosphere even before you get home!We can produce standard and customized forms with electronic touch adaptable to every you need.Visit us on www.ledolight.it or on Facebook!We need your help to open our first company and certify our lamps to sell worldwide.You are very important to us and to thank you for your contribution we will give you several perks based on your generous donation.
With $1 you get an email of thanks for your help.
With $270 you get ONE favorite LEDO lamp.
With $515 you get TWO favorites LEDO lamps.
With $750 you get THREE favorites LEDO lamps.
With $975 you get FOUR favorites LEDO lamps.
With $2500 you get a customizable form LEDO lamp (contact us for max dimension).

SHIPPING COSTSYou can add the shipping cost to the perk's contribution, or by making a different free contribution.the shipping is not cheap because the lamps have a weight of 2.5 kg (5,5 lb) each.If you are going to choose more perks, you can add the TOTAL postage to one of the contributions.To know the amount of the postage to add for your area, please refer to the table below:this is table for countries/zone:I forgot to add the shipping costs. What to do?You can add the postage for all of your perks with a single free contribution. You can also add the total postage to another perk's contribution, modifying the selected perk's amount.In any case, be sure to use the same account you used for the first contribution(s), so that we'll be able to link them all to you.Thanks for helping us to light up the world :-D",10.0,0,"2 Campaigns

0,"

Turn Any Surface into a Remote Control

Technology should make our lives easier, so why does controlling it feel so complicated? An endless maze of mobile apps, smart switches, and other interfaces create a confusing and fragmented experience.

We believe there's a better way - Knocki offers the simplest, most natural, and accessible way to control the world around you.  You've never seen anything like it!
column2:
>

The Buzz
column5:
>

Knocki is a small wireless device that instantly transforms ordinary surfaces (walls, tables, doors, furniture, countertops, &
column6: more) into powerful yet easy to access remotes for your favorite devices and software.
column7: >
column9:
'/>

The Basics

Using Knocki is easy.  Just tap simple gestures anywhere on a Knocki-enabled surface to automate all kinds of useful actions.  Make your ordinary surroundings do more.
column10:
>

Why reach for a phone, a remote, or a switch to perform your favorite functions? There's another control interface that's always within reach - the world around you, and you can activate it with Knocki.
column11:
>

Can your table turn on a TV or dim the lights?  With Knocki discreetly mounted underneath, the entire surface becomes capable and connected.  Knocki adds magical simplicity wherever you use it.
column12: >
column14:
'/>

A Few of the Many Use Cases
column17:
>

 

Who is Knocki for?

Knocki isn't just for people with smart homes or high-tech offices.  Knocki works well anywhere with a WiFi internet connection.  It allows you to ""tap"" into many powerful functions, even if your only smart device is an iPhone or Android phone.

Knocki is the easiest way to add ""smarts"" to your existing home, without the wiring, installation, complexity and expense of many alternative smart home control systems. 

But if you already have a few smart devices, you can immediately expand what Knocki can do, and transform ""dumb"" surfaces all around your home or office into intelligent interfaces.

Bottom line, if you'd like technology to work for you, instead of the other way around, you'll appreciate the power of Knocki!
column18:
>

 

You can put Knocki on, under, or behind surfaces anywhere!

Attach Knocki on walls, under tables, behind shelves or nightstands, behind your front door, and more!  Knocki can be placed in plain sight, or mounted invisibly under or behind surfaces so only you know its there.
column19:
>

Each Knocki includes a special mount featuring our patent-pending SurfaceLink™ technology to ensure a solid connection to a surface for transmission of gesture signals.  Knocki's mount can be secured using the included 3M removable tape, or with screws (also included).
column21:
>

Setup is Easy!

Setting up your Knocki is easy and just takes a few minutes. Start by connecting Knocki to your WiFi network and use the free Knocki companion app to link all your devices and accounts. 

After Knocki is mounted to a surface,  define the unique gestures to trigger your actions (up to 10 gestures), and you've instantly created a powerful smart surface!  The process is simple, and once it's done, Knocki will keep working (via WiFi) even if your phone is turned off or away!
column22:
>

With Knocki installed on a surface, the surface instantly becomes a powerful and programmable remote control, even many feet away from where Knocki is attached.

Knocki uses non-acoustic sensor technology to detect gentle surface gestures even a distance away, but Knocki also has the intelligence to filter out random vibrations.  Therefore, Knocki works under busy breakfast tables and other ""high-activity"" surfaces.
column23:
>

Gently Tap or Knock

Knocki reliably identifies simple gestures defined by taps or knocks on a surface. Gestures can be defined by a quantity (two, three, four, or more taps), or even by more complex patterns (two taps + three taps) for more secure functions.

For example, a double tap can be set to turn on a light, and a more elaborate sequence (two triple taps followed by a double tap) can be used to unlock a smart lock.

column1: • One Knocki can store up to 10 unique gestures, turning any surface into a remote control with many functions.
• A gesture can trigger a single action (e.g. ""find phone""), or a set of actions (e.g. ""door locked"" + ""lights off"" + ""home security armed"").

Our Patent-Pending Technology

Knocki's performance is made possible by our suite of patent-pending technology and sophisticated software &
• Knocki deciphers deliberate taps and knocks from random vibrations in the environment to minimize false positives.

• Knocki uses non-acoustic sensor technology that is NOT triggered by or affected by sound. Thus, multiple Knockis can coexist in the same room without conflict (as long as they are on separate surfaces).  For example, you can setup one Knocki behind your nightstand, and another behind the nightstand of your partner!
• Advanced power-budgeting delivers over 12 months of battery life using AAA batteries. (Please always use mercury free batteries, or better yet, rechargeable batteries!  We like this planet).

Some of the Platforms Knocki Supports:

We're constantly adding integrations with new smart home platforms, devices, and software. Our commitment is to make Knocki more capable over time, and connected to the leading technology of tomorrow.

Knocki's capabilities will continue to expand as we add new partners, update the mobile app, and even push out OTA hardware updates.
Recently added integrations and functionality:
<ul>
<li>

HTTP Requests: Knocki is already designed to provide incredible capability through cloud integration with many platforms.  By unlocking HTTP Requests, Knocki can do even more.  Some smart home platforms provide direct API access only through LAN. Furthermore, local IP communication between Knocki and other devices allows it work even when your internet connection is down!
<li>
SONOS: This was our #1 request.  After all, who doesn't love SONOS? In a similar fashion to Knocki, SONOS makes your environment simpler and more enjoyable.
<li>
<strong>Gesture Copy &amp
column2: Paste: This feature makes it easy to quickly duplicate your favorite gesture settings between Knockis.

column3:
'/>

What About Voice Control?

Voice control is everywhere. Services like Apple’s Siri and Amazon’s Alexa can simplify tasks, but often don’t work as expected.

Here are a few of the problems:

column1: <li>

Background sounds:  Music or a TV playing in the background can render voice-control useless. Knocki uses non-acoustic sensors so it works just as well if you’re jamming to music, watching the evening news, or if people are talking in the background.
<li>

Can Disturb Others:  Voice control is problematic in quiet environments such as a shared office or in bedrooms where you don’t want to disturb others. Knocki’s advanced accelerometer technology responds to gentle taps that others won’t hear.
<li>

It Often Misunderstands: Did you say “where is rome” or “navigate home?” Voice technology is finicky, especially with kids, elderly, and people with accents who might not enunciate in the required way. Knocki uses simple tap/knock gestures, and our patent-pending technology to perform reliably whether you tap fast, slow, hard, or soft.
<li>

Can’t use multiple voice controllers in the same space: Good luck putting a voice controller on your nightstand, and then another one on your partner’s nightstand. You’ll have both controllers responding simultaneously creating smart home chaos. Knocki recognizes gestures on a specific surface so you can have multiple Knockis in the same room or other space without conflict. Knocki allows you to personalize controls to the surfaces near you.

column2: >
column4:
'/>

What about Smart Switches and Buttons?

Smart buttons and switches can also automate tasks, but they have a few “pressing” problems.

column1: <li>

Don’t blend in: Wall switches and buttons aren’t so pretty to look at. Knocki can be placed under or behind surfaces, so you don’t even have to see it to use it. But if you do mount it within view, it blends beautifully with your surfaces.
<li>

Must be pressed or flipped: Physical buttons and switches must be within physical reach in order to be used. Knocki turns an entire surface into a remote control, so you can trigger actions from anywhere, without needing to visually or physically locate a specific spot. (Also great for kids, physically impaired, and elderly who can’t reach a switch).
<li>

Not as reliable or responsive: Most buttons rely on Bluetooth, so they require a phone to be turned on, paired to the button, and within range in order to function. Unlike smart buttons, Knocki uses WiFi to trigger actions directly, without going through a phone. This allows Knocki to work instantly without the lag of bluetooth, and even if your phone is off.
<li>

Limited functionality: Many smart switches/buttons only perform a single on/off function, or are limited to only a few press patterns. Knocki can provide quick and easy control of a few functions for most users, but power users can go wild with up to 10 gestures per Knocki-enabled surface, allowing their entire tables, walls, furniture and other surfaces to control thousands of devices via IFTTT, SmartThings, Wemo, and more!

column2: >
column6:
>

Here's what you get with each unit ordered:

column1: <li>
Knocki: Made in the USA.
<li>
Surface Mount: Featuring our SurfaceLink™ technology, the mount helps transfer gesture signals from the surface to Knocki.
<li>
3M Tape: Working directly with 3M, we've customized and tested a secure yet removable adhesive to avoid damaging surfaces.
<li>
AAA Duracell Batteries: Mercury-free Duracell alkaline batteries provide over 12 months of battery life.
<li>
<b>Our Free Companion App (iOS &amp
column2: Android): Only necessary for device setup. The app allows you to easily connect Knocki to your WiFi and quickly add up to 10 gestures per Knocki device. You can manage multiple Knockis from one account.  The app also allows you to monitor battery life, connectivity status, and view activity logs.

column1: <li>
Quick Setup Guide: Get up and running in no time!

Black Edition Knocki

We're proud to announce Knocki Black Edition!  While our standard Knocki is designed to look gorgeous on walls and blend well with many other surfaces, Knocki Black Edition offers a stealthier style when mounted underneath tables or behind furniture, and also complements a wide variety of surfaces.  Simply select the Black Edition pledge to get yours!
column2:
>

Making an Impact

Knocki can make a difference in anyone's life. However, it can be truly life-changing for people with mobility or vision impairments who are unable to reach or visually locate a switch, button, or phone. Knocki also improves accessibility for children and the elderly.
column3: >
column6: >
column9:
Ohad have been friends for years, but their ""aha moment"" happened more recently over a family get-together.  They were watching one of their small children stacking up boxes to reach a light switch.  That observation led them to ask a simple question, ""Why not turn walls and other common surfaces into control interfaces?"" 

Building a successful company, growing a talented team, and developing an amazing product is full of hard work and perseverance, and we thank you for supporting us as we bring Knocki to the world!
column10: >
column12:
'/>

We Couldn't Do It Alone

Our growing team has been working hard over the past year to develop Knocki, but we couldn't have done it without the support of others!
column13: >
column15:
'/>

Our Team

Talent, hard work, and a great idea are a recipe for success, and our team has all three.  If there's one thing our team could use a little more of, it's sleep!  Thanks to everyone on our team for the amazing work and dedication.

How to measure the laser power if I don’t have a laser power meter?
A: Turn down the laser
power. Next, print a test sample. Adjust the laser power  higher until the
sample can be print complete and with smooth surface.
Q: Are there parts of the printer that should not be touched, otherwise may  affect my right, like warranty?
A: 3D dream workshop will put
warranty stickers on every place that you should  be avoided. If the sticker is
missing or broken, you will lose the warranty.
2-6 Q: Does your package come with
tools? What tools should I prepare for         assemble the printer and for operate it?
A: DIY product doesn't come with
tool set. However, you do need some tools in order to build the printer. Please
check our web site for the list of tools that you are going to need for
assembling the machine.
<h3>3 Printing supplies, resin pigments,
and resin pans:
3-1 Q: How many different colors of
resin do you have?
A: We only have one color which is
clear resin. However, we sell resin pigments  for you to create your own colors,
and make your product different from  others.
3-2 Q: Can I use resins from other
suppliers? What should I adjust or where should I pay attention?
A: Yes, you can use other resins.
But you may need to adjust the laser power and exposure time.
3-3 Q: Is our resin toxic? Do I need
to wear protection gears?
A: Our resin is not toxic. You can
check MSDS.
3-4 Q: What is the shelf life of our
resin? How to store the resin?
A: The shelf life of our resin is
six months. It should be store in dark place, and  the temperature should be
around 20-30 degree Celsius.
3-5 Q: how to use our resin
Pigments?
A: the instruction is post on our
web site.
3-6 Q Is our pigments toxic. Do I
need to wear protection gears?
A: No, it not toxic. You can check
the MSDS.
3-7 Q: Where can I get resin tray?
A: you can get them from
our web site or from our dealers.
3-8 Q: How should I handle the resin tray?  Are there anything I should be aware of   when
I use the resin tray.
A: Do not scratch the bottom of the tray. Try not to
print at same spot for long  period of time.
3-9 Q: How long can a resin tray last? When should I
change it?
A: it dependent on the object you print and printing
quality.
4: Others:
4-1 Q: where can I get answers of my technical questions?
Or any questions relate  to installation, operating, or printing?
A: you can find the answers from the Q&
our web site. you can     always e- mail to us. We will reply as soon as possible.
4-2 Q: Can I share my experiences of using FunPlay?
A: we welcome to share your experiences. Just e-mail us
your experiences and  the pictures of your works. We will post on our web site
for everyone to see.
4-3 Q: Can you mail a print sample to me?
A: we are sorry that we do not have this service. If you
want to see the works,  please visit our web site.
4-4 Q: Can I become your dealer?
A: We welcome you to become our dealer. Please e-mail us
with your contact information.
4-5 Q: I am a reporter. Can I report your team and your
products?
A: We welcome you to report our products. At same time,
please let us share  your article.
<div style=""text-align: center
","欢迎参访 ""3D梦想点子自造坊""获得更多3D打印机产品信息，或直接电邮 3ds@3dreamworkshop.com========================================================
FunPlay DIY Crystal’s Special feature:
Are You Ready for the Challenge?
3D Dream Workshop will
provide you a whole set of components of a high resolution laser SLA (Stereolithography) 3D printer and step by step instructions to guide you
to build it.
Contents of the product
It has a Main control board and an optical module.
It includes a control module: printing plate motor
control, a resin tray seat motor control, a limited switch, a LCD screen and
few buttons.
The optical module
includes a set of galvanometer and a laser.
A complete printer
structure parts made with clear acrylic and all the nuts and bolts.
One resin tray.
Slicing software.
Accept Multiple Brand of Resins
We unlock the secret of SLA 3D printing. With our ""ALE"" and ""AET"" technologies, you are not restrict to use one particular brand resin.
Adjustable Laser Energy"" & ""adjustable Exposure
Time""
3D Dream Workshop is the first one to develop ""Adjustable
Laser Energy"" & ""Adjustable Exposure Time"" technologies.  Players can change the laser energy (between 0 to 100 mW) and how long the
laser stay at each point (i.e. exposure time, between 5 to 45 µS).  Players are
no longer restrict to purchase resins from original manufacturer.
Adjustable Laser Energy : In order to print with different brand of resins, users
only need to change the laser energy by turning the energy adjustment dial.
Adjustable Exposure Time: You only need to adjust exposure time, to
increase the quality of the print product.
Create Your Own Color, Just Mix it！
Easy to use software
Rotate : rotate the model 360 degree
Scale : enlarge or shrink the model
Mirror : create a mirrored model
Support : open support options menu
Expose Time : Choose how long the laser is on for each point
Gallery
Risk & Challenge
In order to minimize the
cost, and pass the benefit to our customer. FunPlay is produced after each
order. Therefore, we cannot let customer cancel their order. Please think throw
before playing your order.
Our product is well
packaged, however, our customer can get cargo insurance to cover the shipping
damage.
Working with 405nm wave
length laser in a short period of time may damage your eyes. We strongly advice
our customer and any person who works around our printer to wear a safety
glasses at all time.
We can only guarantee the
dais we sell work with fun play's No.1
resin and only if you follow our instruction.
We will provide the detailed, step by step assembly
instruction and video. Moreover, we will answer your email for any assembly or
printing problems. However, we cannot guarantee a success assembly or printing.
We welcome you to send us email, you may also find the answer from the FAQ
section of our web site.
FAQ
1 Orders, Payments, and Shipping:
After playing my order, how long it takes for bank to collect money from my  account?
A: It dependence on your create card
company and its rule. For more    information, please contact your create card
company.
Does your printer price include shipping fee, tax and tariff?
A: No, the price is only for the
printer. Because the shipping costs are very for  different region. Plus, each
country has its own rules for tax and tariff. Please  go to our web site for detail
information about shipping and other trading  regulation.
1-3 Q: Can I not find my country of
shipping?
A: You can mail to us. We will help
you to confirm.
If you received a lot of orders, how are you going to handle them?
A: We have many different suppliers,
who can supply parts to us at same time.
How many boxes are you ship out for one printer? What are the weight of each
box? What are the size of each box?
A: Box Size 50*40*40 cm. Weight about 10KG

A: FunPlay come with 90 days
warranty. Please go to our web site for more detail.

column2: >What is Box JellyCase

column1:
A couple of years ago, I was going to dive the cenotes in Riviera Maya and needed a compact and fully functional housing in order to take my DSLR Underwater. I have been designing hard shell, aluminum housing for still and video cameras with local companies for many years and always needed to bring the unit as transport friendly as possible.

This is where the fun begins. Based on my experience with clear and flexible TPU and hard shell housings, I then tried to combine both to make the most compact yet versatile housing ever. The 1st prototype came along with a double o-ring sealed solid framing to which the flexible material was welded in order to create what is now the BoxJellyCase. 

I then took it down to my cenotes dives and got really impressed with the ease of use of the prototype.
column2: >With some of my friends help we were able to build a couple more units that we used through different conditions to validate the performance of the product.
column3:
>Since then we have been doing craft work in order to build custom units for specific needs. Now, with the new designs we are ready to launch the production of the whole line of Box JellyCase for Compact, Medium and Pro DSLRs. For us to achieve our goal, we need you guys to help us acquire plastic molds, dies and jigs for mass production. With all the tests we ran through we know that your investment is going to be worth every penny. 

http://youtu.be/Bzqb-6ZGLgg
column8:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">


Advantages:

- Lightweight (quite a lot compared to hard shell housings)

- Compact (quite a lot compared to hard shell housings)

- Access to all functions

- Clear material for complete see through

- Modular (Build your setup with multiple lenses and accessories)

- Usable underwater up to 30 feet (9 meters)

- Tough and highly puncture resistant material

- Structural o-ring sealed main frames

- Double latched main frames


Limitations:

- Underwater, passed 30 feet, the flexible material starts to press on the buttons what makes the camera to freeze. (Leaving air inside the BJC and adding weight to the system will help reach greater depths)


What We Need 

Mass production comes with a whole array of setups and equipment. This is where you could make a difference. In order to reach our goal we precisely need:

- Plastic casting molds for our latches

- Machining of main frames

- TPU forming molds and welding

By supporting us, you will participate in completing the design for finer details on the product as well as more uniform welding joints on the TPU material. Latches are to be more ergonomically finished for a better feel on your hand.


What You Get

Note that there are 3 versions of the Box JellyCase, one for small DSLRs, one for Medium DSLRs and one for Large professional DSLRs. 

Box JellyCase is:

- Compact and lightweight housing for DSLR

- 2 shells design with o-ring seal on solid main frames

- Flexible, tough, transparent and ergonomically formed TPU films

- Clip-on interchangeable lens sleeves (Small DSLR)

- Bayonet mount interchangeable lens sleeves (Medium and Pro DSLR)

- Camera built-in flash ready (allowance)

- External flash sleeve adapter ready (Medium and Pro DSLR)

- Choice of Acrylic or Glass flat window

- Warranty covered for 3 months after purchase.


What we offer

Having a completely versatile casing for your DSLR is priceless when your are about to take THIS shot that you have always been dreaming of. Mak
column9: >e it yours by contributing with one or more of the following perks:
column17:
>Compact size Box JellyCases

Will fit the following DSLR cameras:

CANON: T2i, T3, T3i, T4i, T5i, Xs, Xsi

NIKON: D40, D60, D3100, D3200, D3300, D5100, D5200, D5300

SONY: A-33,  A-37, A-57, A-55, A57, A-65, 

PENTAX: K-50, K-500, K-R, K-X, 

OLYMPUS: OM-D-E-M1, E-420, E-450, E-600, E-620

If your DSLR is not listed, please contact us, we may have not validated yet.
column18:
>


Medium size Box JellyCases

Will fit the following DSLR cameras:

CANON: 5D, 5DMK2, 5DMK3, 6D, 7D, 50D, 60D, 70D

NIKON:  D90, D30S, D600, D610, D700, D800, D7000, D7100, Df

SONY: A-850, A900, A77, A-99

PENTAX: K-3, K-5, K-7, K-30

OLYMPUS:  E-5, E-30

Sigma: SD1, SD15

If your DSLR is not listed, please contact us, we may have not validated yet.



Pro Box JellyCases

Will fit the following DSLR cameras:

CANON: 1D, 1Ds, 1Dc, 1Dx

NIKON: D3, D3s, D3x, D4

FUJIFILM: IS Pro, S5 Pro

PENTAX: 645D

If you DSLR is not listed, please contact us, we may have not validated yet.



Packages

This package is an introduction for those who would like to become a re seller. For more details please contact us.


Shipping

All our perks include regular Canada Post domestic or international shipping. Note that it may take up to 3 weeks to receive your item with this option. If you want to receive the product at your doorstep within a few days only, choose one of the following options:


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can’t contribute, but that does not mean you can’t help!
column19: >Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.Talk to your friends, send them e-mails about our campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools for spreading the word  out of this incredible offer. Every referral
column21: >Again, Thank you so much for your support. Feel free to contact us should you have any other questions at info@boxjellycase.com.

column1: camera protected?
Your camera
is protected by a combination of hard material frames and soft films pockets
that are securely welded together for a maximum tear resistance. The flexible
pockets are made of strong, clear and flexible TPU films that are permanently
attached to the frames. These frames are acting as the entry for the camera.
They seal with a silicone o-ring and are securely closed with two locking
latches.
What is the
maximum depth I can go to?
The Box
JellyCase is depth rated to 30 feet (9m). Depending on the camera setup you may
experience some difficulties due to the pressure by the film on the camera
buttons, some functions may be activated by accident. Re-aligning the camera in
the BJC will normally solve the problem.
What are
the care instructions for my product?
As any type
of underwater casing, you will need to rinse your system with clear water in
order to remove sea salt, dust and dirt from your BJC. Lubricating the o-ring every
second use or after a long period of storage is also a good habit so they can
hold their sealing properties for a longer period. Do not leave your BJC under
direct sunlight for a long period of time, this may damage your product.
What type
of warranty do I get with my Box JellyCase ?
Tribor Design is warrant of its
entire product and/or part of it as long as the demand is made from the
original purchaser. Box JellyCase, at its own discretion, will fix the
defective unit with original parts or replace it with an identical unit. In the
case that the product is discontinued, the defective unit will be replaced with
a product of the same value.
This warranty excludes
all requests for indirect losses, consecutive damage and do not apply to
accidental damages, to an abusive usage of the product, to a misusage of the
product as well as all voluntary alteration of the product.
We recommend the user
to have an insurance to protect the photographic material in case of accident.
If I break
my Box JellyCase, How do I fix it?
For small holes in the flexible film, you can
use the Aqua Seal (R) glue that you can buy on our website or in any dive

store, otherwise, contact us for more details on how to fix your Box JellyCase.

Biopod is an app-controlled microhabitat that automatically regulates temperature, light, humidity, ventilation and rainfall. Grow anything from a herb, vegetable or flower garden to a rainforest for your pets. Biopod replicates the ideal environment for your plants, animals or both!
AS SEEN ON
<figure style=""margin: 0px
PERKS
<div>
<figure style=""margin: 0px

To grow a pristine environment for your pets. Current products are poor reflections of natural habitats. They require constant upkeep and maintenance. Biopod is an enclosed ecosystem that requires limited maintenance. The Biopod App makes it easy to set up the perfect conditions for your pet's new home.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

To grow a year-round garden. Biopod combines the benefits of an aquaponics system with the ideal conditions of a greenhouse – right inside your home. Just a few of the many things you can grow include herbs, lettuce, tomatoes, peas, etc… A great source for fresh salad and more! Biopod will care for your garden, measure the soil conditions and tell you when it's ready for harvest. It will optimize growth for maximum production.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

To add a low-maintenance enhancement to your home decor, even in small spaces. Biopod creates a beautiful and relaxing backdrop for your living space. No time to take care of your plants? Biopod's automated, low-maintenance system will take care of everything from lighting to watering, while still offering opportunities to manually mist, seed or prune, if desired. All you have to do is enjoy the pleasure you will receive from your Biopod! A great addition for urban dwellers and seniors.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

To educate minds, young and old alike. Biopod makes a great educational tool and is a fun way for kids (of any age!) to learn about nature and the delicate balance an ecosystem requires. Add a reptile to your Biopod and watch the wonderment and joy it will bring. Biopod helps to build an awareness not only of life inside the 'pod, but also of the sensitive environment all around us.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

To enhance the classroom experience. Biopod makes a great educational tool for visual and hands-on learning in classroom settings. Teachers and students can see different aspects of their environment including soil conditions, gas levels and moisture- all in real time. Classrooms can share their Biopod data with other classrooms from around the world and collaborate on observations and best practices.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

To encourage creativity, productivity, lowered stress and increased well-being in the work environment. Studies show that these are benefits which can be reaped when greenery and nature are included in the work space. Biopod has a sleek and beautiful design, which is compatible with nearly any office size and decor, and the fully-automated system makes it easy to care for.
HOW SIMPLE IS BIOPOD TO USE?
<figure style=""margin: 0px
HOW IT WORKS IN MORE DETAIL
<figure style=""margin: 0px
BUYING COMPONENTS INDIVIDUALLY CAN BE COSTLY
<figure style=""margin: 0px
All Biopod models include all of these components and much more at a fraction of the cost.
Biopod Features
<figure style=""margin: 0px
column2: >

column1: The Biopod Cloud. The Biopod Community.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

Each Biopod has the capacity to connect to The Biopod Cloud. Information from your Biopod can be shared with others around the world and vice versa, should you choose this option. This allows our Biopod community to draw on each other's experiences and wisdom. The data collected from our Biopod community can then be used to create better environments and best practices. Additionally, it will be a great tool for users who are not quite sure what they want to grow. Have a famous green thumb you follow? See what she's growing and tell Biopod to replicate it!
WORKING PROTOTYPES
