<figure style=""margin: 0px
Invented by a biologist, Biopod's original purpose was to mimic the pristine habitat of a rainforest in order to help save endangered frogs from extinction.
WE CAN CHANGE THE WORLD. REALLY.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
Individuals understand that the world is facing dire consequences but beyond conventional means such as recycling and buying locally etc, they feel powerless to do more.
Biopod provides a simple, affordable and low maintenance solution. With Biopod, individuals can now realize the immediate effects of their contribution to the environment.
If the Biopod is used as an animal habitat, how is cleaning handled? Is there water filtration for aquarium applications?

The system is designed to reduce maintenance as it works like a self-contained ecosystem - the regular misting helps wash any waste to the ground and this is absorbed by the plants. The entire back wall acts as a biological filter for all units including the AQUA, harnessing both beneficial bacteria and plant roots to clean the water, similar to a vertically designed aquaponics system.
Does the Filter in the Biopod AQUA ever need to be changed?

The biopod living wall filter does not need changing, as the plant roots penetrate throughout the wall it works like an aquaponics system, essentially filtering water from the aquarium continually. In addition, beneficial bacteria colonize the living wall unit that work in unison with the plants to filter and detoxify the water.
What are the Biopod tanks made from?
Ultra Clear Low-Iron Glass – 5mm to 6mm depending on the unit. This is a high end, high clarity glass that does not have the green tinge of typical terrariums. Helps keep our modern look consistent
What animals are compatible with my Biopod?

The app will give recommendations for animals based on the size of each unit. While there are too any options to be listed on this site, we recommend that you consult published literature on the topic if there are specific animals you are working with or plan to put in your biopod. Keep in mind that our substrate technology allows for a very thin aerated and actively cleaned substrate, so you may not need the height commonly used for traditional terraria, which often have 6 to 8 inches of substrate.
LED lighting specs. How many Watts, what is the spectrum?

We use 3W, high output LED diodes with a colour temperature of 6000K. The diodes are designed specifically to emit a natural light spectrum with peaks at optimal wavelengths to mimic natural sunlight, helping both plant growth and vitamin D production in your pets with output of both UVA and UVB. The basic system is 36W, and up to 90 watts on current larger models such as the biopod GRAND. Total Lumen output ranges from 3600 to 9000 lumens.
My terrarium at home gets too hot, too dry or too wet - how does Biopod cool or humidify without constant misting?

The system is capable of humidifying without misting, and precisely regulates internal humidity without causing the typical overwatering that can occur in some systems. In addition, biopod uses evaporative cooling by mixing dry air with humidified air. This is the result of the integrated BioPUR system which utilizes the action of oxygenating the substrate (with the combined effect of eliminating stagnation and humidifying the air), and a special active ventilation strip. And if you live in a hot climate or require special care for cooler species we have built biopod to accommodate a chiller unit, and this will be an add on at a later date.
What kind of Potting Soil / Substrate can be used in Biopod?

We are programming the app to give detailed instructions on setting up different habitats, as well as substrates that work best with different types of plants. In general, we recommend a base of coconut coir for most applications
What is the Warranty like? What happens if something stops working?

Biopod comes with a 1 year warranty against defect for all parts. All components are accessible from the rear of the unit, and are designed to be easily replaced. If anything goes wrong, tell us and we will send you replacement parts. If anything goes wrong after the warranty has ended, parts will be readily available and inexpensive to replace.
Do I need a WiFi connection to set up Biopod? What happens if my connection is lost? Will biopod stop working?

A WiFi connection is required only for initial setup. After the unit has been programmed, it will continue to run these programmed settings continually. So no need to worry if you lose your WiFi connection!
What are the Differences between the One, the Terra, the Aqua and the Grand?
The Biopod One is the smallest unit with a 14 U.S. gallon tank - 18""x12.5""x14"".

The Terra is a widescreen version of the One - it is 24.5""x14""x14"" and 21 U.S Gallons. Both the One and Terra are suitable for a terrarium style setup and can be used to grow a wide range of herbs and plants, and can be used to house a wide range of amphibians smaller lizards and small tortoises.
The Aqua is a taller version of the Terra 24.5x14x21"" with a volume of 31.5 gallons.
The Grand is currently our largest model at 49""x15""x28"" with a volume of 89 gallons.

Both the Aqua and Grand can be set up as a terrarium only or with a lower aquatic section for keeping fish. The maximum water capacity of the Aqua is 6.5 gallons (up to 5"" deep) and the Grand can hold 19 gallons of water - up to 6"" deep. The Aqua and the Grand are suitable for growing a wider assortment of fresh herbs or food crops, for making a larger natural plant display and are also great for keeping a wider range of different animals including larger sized lizards, snakes etc.

All biopods have the same great core features, including onboard App based climate control, Integrated Misting system, Full spectrum LED lighting optimized for plant growth and animal care, BioPUR air injection system to keep the environment fresh and vibrant, HD video, Remote Lock, and so much more!

","Biopod is an app-controlled microhabitat that automatically regulates temperature, light, humidity, ventilation and rainfall. Grow anything from a herb, vegetable or flower garden to a rainforest for your pets. Biopod replicates the ideal environment for your plants, animals or both!
AS SEEN ON
PERKS
WHAT CAN YOU USE BIOPOD FOR?

To grow a pristine environment for your pets. Current products are poor reflections of natural habitats. They require constant upkeep and maintenance. Biopod is an enclosed ecosystem that requires limited maintenance. The Biopod App makes it easy to set up the perfect conditions for your pet's new home.

To grow a year-round garden. Biopod combines the benefits of an aquaponics system with the ideal conditions of a greenhouse – right inside your home. Just a few of the many things you can grow include herbs, lettuce, tomatoes, peas, etc… A great source for fresh salad and more! Biopod will care for your garden, measure the soil conditions and tell you when it's ready for harvest. It will optimize growth for maximum production.

To add a low-maintenance enhancement to your home decor, even in small spaces. Biopod creates a beautiful and relaxing backdrop for your living space. No time to take care of your plants? Biopod's automated, low-maintenance system will take care of everything from lighting to watering, while still offering opportunities to manually mist, seed or prune, if desired. All you have to do is enjoy the pleasure you will receive from your Biopod! A great addition for urban dwellers and seniors.

To educate minds, young and old alike. Biopod makes a great educational tool and is a fun way for kids (of any age!) to learn about nature and the delicate balance an ecosystem requires. Add a reptile to your Biopod and watch the wonderment and joy it will bring. Biopod helps to build an awareness not only of life inside the 'pod, but also of the sensitive environment all around us.

To enhance the classroom experience. Biopod makes a great educational tool for visual and hands-on learning in classroom settings. Teachers and students can see different aspects of their environment including soil conditions, gas levels and moisture- all in real time. Classrooms can share their Biopod data with other classrooms from around the world and collaborate on observations and best practices.

To encourage creativity, productivity, lowered stress and increased well-being in the work environment. Studies show that these are benefits which can be reaped when greenery and nature are included in the work space. Biopod has a sleek and beautiful design, which is compatible with nearly any office size and decor, and the fully-automated system makes it easy to care for.
HOW SIMPLE IS BIOPOD TO USE?
HOW IT WORKS IN MORE DETAIL
BUYING COMPONENTS INDIVIDUALLY CAN BE COSTLY
All Biopod models include all of these components and much more at a fraction of the cost.
Biopod Features
Biopod aqua
The Biopod Cloud. The Biopod Community.

Each Biopod has the capacity to connect to The Biopod Cloud. Information from your Biopod can be shared with others around the world and vice versa, should you choose this option. This allows our Biopod community to draw on each other's experiences and wisdom. The data collected from our Biopod community can then be used to create better environments and best practices. Additionally, it will be a great tool for users who are not quite sure what they want to grow. Have a famous green thumb you follow? See what she's growing and tell Biopod to replicate it!

column2: >
column6:
/>

Cell One is a self-growing garden that enables you to harvest fresh and tasty superfood right at home.  

Everyone wants to eat better. Most struggle to master their daily nutrition. Designed for a healthy lifestyle and a simple life, with the Cell One we aim to create the most effortless indoor garden solution. Along with a plant-based nutrition guide based on sprouts and microgreens, Cell One will empower you to meet and sustain your nutritional goals.
column7:
>

 

Most indoor gardening systems lack the size and ability to grow a substantial amount of fresh food. We are focusing on sprouts and microgreens since they are rich in nutrients and have a short growth period. That's why when it comes to providing fresh, unprocessed and whole food, our smart garden is the most efficient and sustainable solution on the market for indoor gardening. 

Perfectly designed for your lifestyle and your health

Cell One is more than another shiny appliance into your kitchen. This is the foundation of a lifestyle designed to help you meet and sustain your personal goals: Whether that be weight loss, muscle gain, overall health improvement or even increasing your athletic performance: We want to bring the best food to your life!
column8:
>

How Cell One works

First, fill the water tank and insert the pre-seeded biodegradable seed pod. The Cell One automatically adapts the lighting and watering cycles to ensure your sprouts and microgreens thrive. An intelligent system of irrigation, LED lighting, sensors, and ventilation controls the microclimate for ideal growth and taste.
column9:
>

 

Automate Growing – Effortlessly grow food, and never kill a plant again

column2:
>

Seed Pod

You have a bright verity of pre-seeded and biodegradable pods for microgreens, legumes and grain sprouts.

Air circulation while sprouting is vital, and if the sprouts can’t breathe while growing - they can die. Therefore, it is critical that seeds are at an ideal distance from each other. In the Cell Garden Pod seeds are already placed in the best possible arrangement.

column1: • The growth medium is made of natural, renewable materials, and are biodegradable. After harvesting the Cell Garden Pod can be thrown in compost bins, so Cell One is easy to maintain and keep clean.

• No soil or additional substrates are needed for germination. All of the nutrients at the early microgreen stage come from the seed itself. This ensures each pod is perfectly clean, and ready to snip and eat.
• To assure you the best crop we have selected high quality seeds that are organic, non-GMO and untreated (99% germinable).
• No experience required – Peel the top and pop 'em in!

Save Money! 

Microgreens, up there with gold, saffron, and perfume.
column2:
>

 

What Cell One can grow

On three levels of the Cell One you can soak, germinate and grow various nuts, sprouts and microgreens at the same time. In three trays you can produce 15 different types of natural and sustainable superfoods.

column1: • In the top tray, with daylight and special LED light, you can grow microgreens such as radishes, alfalfa or broccoli.
• The middle tray is particularly suitable for growing sprouts from buckwheat, oats, chickpeas, lentils and mung beans.
• In the lower tray, rice, white beans or nuts can soak.

column2: >

column4: >WHY SOAK NUTS, GRAINS, AND SEEDS?
column8:
> 

Beans and nuts can contain substances that interfere with the body’s ability to absorb nutrients. The process of soaking and sprouting grains, beans, and nuts reduces the anti-nutrient content and makes them more beneficial to the body. Soaking all types of nuts makes them taste fresh like picked from the tree and popped straight into your mouth. Create raw food vegan desserts, that are delicious, nutrient-rich, and give you the best energy.
column9:
>

 

Cell Garden App – monitor your garden health from anywhere

Optimize plant growth, monitor water and light levels and notice when it's time for harvest - with the Cell Garden App you always have everything under control.
column10:
>

 

We have even created a clean, plant-based nutrition concept and an easy-to-use, free mobile Nutrition Assistant, based on sprouts and microgreens – the easiest way to get the nutrients you need.

In your Cell Garden App you get access to the Nutrition Assistant – whole food, plant-based recipes, shopping lists, meal plans and nutrition tips for a healthy lifestyle.

column1: <div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/VCBHcrKobUw?autohide=1&amp

The mobile Nutrition Assistant is everything you need to make nutritious eating delicious and convenient, without any hassle. 

 

Sprouts &
column2:
Microgreens - fast, delicious, and nutritious

Sprouts and microgreens are one of nature’s greatest superfoods. In a plants development, sprouts are the first stage and microgreens are the second.

column1: • The germination period of chickpeas is typically 2–3 days.
• The growth period of broccoli microgreens generally is 4–5 days.
• They are also packed with vitamins and enzymes to keep you healthy.
They are easy to digest, have a high biological value, rich nutrient density and – not to mention – fresh and tasty.
column2:
>

 

With Cell One microgreens thrive two times faster than typical.
column3:
>

Nutrient-Packed: Eat fewer greens, get 10x–260x the nutrients!

Researchers discovered that the microgreens contained four to 260 times more nutrients than their mature mother plant.
column4:
>

So, eating just a handful of microgreens can get you the nutrition of a full salad.
column5:
>

Fuel your body with nourishing eating
column6:
>

 

Our cookbook, The Superfood Assistant, is about enjoying delicious, nutritious food to help people feel their best. With this new book, we want to inspire people to eat more fresh, whole and real foods. You will discover delicious recipes for breakfast, lunch and dinner which are high in antioxidants and full of essential vitamins and minerals.
column8:
>

Timo Hildebrand  Former German professional footballer

column1: <div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/-YRlPazx2rI?autohide=1&amp

column2:
>

Save space – Cell One has the size of a coffee machine  

Sprout up to six different plants in less than a square foot.
column4:
>

Product Design

Cell One has been through hundreds of iterations over 3 years, from sketches and ideas to cardboard mocks-ups, 3-D prints and prototypes, all leading to our fully operational model.  

Cell One symbolizes natural living and health, integrating itself in every room with its unique design. At the same time, Cell One is a silent object with an appearance not loud or overbearing. It's the perfect compliment to every kitchen!

Cell Garden has partnered with Graustich, a pro for twenty years,  and René Goetzenbrugger has been creating products and brands. He was awarded internationally several times, latest in 2018 when he and his team received the “German Innovation Award” – an outstanding achievement in Goetzenbrugger’s career thus far.
column6:
>

Product Engineering 

Cell Garden has partnered with Lemberg Solution Ltd from UK to develop a 3D-printed and fully assembled design prototype.

column1: <div><div><div><div tabindex=""0"">
<div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/Cy9qV-FTEXU?autohide=1&amp
Our Story
column2:
>

 

Cell Garden is the creation of young visionary entrepreneurs who are on the mission to improve people's lives by clean and sustainable food, supported by smart technology to make these once-tedious tasks effortless.

We are three co-founders with different backgrounds and experiences. The passion for a healthy diet and smart, convenient technology drives us.

Marina Zeisler, (B. A. International Business &
column3:
M. A. Business Development) is responsible for Marketing and Sales. She brings deep experience in General Management, Corporate Strategy, Marketing and Sales, Russia and China. After graduating, she worked in Corporate Strategy until she finally followed her passion for healthy and delicious food and founded Cell Garden with her co founders Joe and Alex. She combines the power of diverse perspectives and a broad range of thinking.

Joe Teips, our product engineer, has a Bachelor and Master in Mechanical and Product Engineering. He is the techie geek and has had the dream of a smart self-growing garden about the size of a coffee machine, which is well designed and fits in every lifestyle. He spent many years in manufacturing before he went to university. 

Alex Lier, our nutritionist, has a Master in Mechanical Engineering and has gained few years of experience in construction and project management. Nevertheless, he has a huge passion for nutrition and creating healthy and delicious recipes. He traveled a lot during his studies and collected much food inspiration from different countries. To gain more knowledge in food and nutrition he completed a degree as a nutritionist.

Since starting on our mission over three years ago, we have been supported by business angels, family and friends, the industry, universities, venture capital, and state funds. As an innovative-driven and knowledge-based start-up, we have been supported by the German Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy with the EXIST Business Start-up Grant during the preparation of the innovative technology.

Team
column4:
>

 

We are ready for full production with your support

We have been working on Cell One for over three years to create a connected ecosystem: our hardware, app, seed pod, cloud back-end, plant-based nutrition concept, and cookbook. The indoor garden you see in the video and the ecosystem around it is real, working prototypes. It’s exciting to see how far we’ve come, but now we need your help to start production and to bring Cell One into your kitchen. 

 What's next

column1: • Refine our engineering in a step called ""Design-for-Manufacture Engineering.""
• Create the tools required for mass production with our manufacturing partner
• Set up our first production run
• Run a test production of the alpha units

They are also packed with vitamins and enzymes to keep you healthy.

They are easy to digest, have a high biological value, rich nutrient density and – not to mention – fresh and tasty. With Cell One microgreens thrive two times faster than typical.Nutrient-Packed: Eat fewer greens, get 10x–260x the nutrients!Researchers discovered that the microgreens contained four to 260 times more nutrients than their mature mother plant. So, eating just a handful of microgreens can get you the nutrition of a full salad.Fuel your body with nourishing eating  Our cookbook, The Superfood Assistant, is about enjoying delicious, nutritious food to help people feel their best. With this new book, we want to inspire people to eat more fresh, whole and real foods. You will discover delicious recipes for breakfast, lunch and dinner which are high in antioxidants and full of essential vitamins and minerals.   TestimonialTimo Hildebrand  Former German professional footballer
Cell One Technology

Save space – Cell One has the size of a coffee machine  Sprout up to six different plants in less than a square foot.Product DesignCell One has been through hundreds of iterations over 3 years, from sketches and ideas to cardboard mocks-ups, 3-D prints and prototypes, all leading to our fully operational model.  Cell One symbolizes natural living and health, integrating itself in every room with its unique design. At the same time, Cell One is a silent object with an appearance not loud or overbearing. It's the perfect compliment to every kitchen!Cell Garden has partnered with Graustich, a pro for twenty years,  and René Goetzenbrugger has been creating products and brands. He was awarded internationally several times, latest in 2018 when he and his team received the “German Innovation Award” – an outstanding achievement in Goetzenbrugger’s career thus far.Product Engineering Cell Garden has partnered with Lemberg Solution Ltd from UK to develop a 3D-printed and fully assembled design prototype.

Our Story Cell Garden is the creation of young visionary entrepreneurs who are on the mission to improve people's lives by clean and sustainable food, supported by smart technology to make these once-tedious tasks effortless.We are three co-founders with different backgrounds and experiences. The passion for a healthy diet and smart, convenient technology drives us.Marina Zeisler, (B. A. International Business & M. A. Business Development) is responsible for Marketing and Sales. She brings deep experience in General Management, Corporate Strategy, Marketing and Sales, Russia and China. After graduating, she worked in Corporate Strategy until she finally followed her passion for healthy and delicious food and founded Cell Garden with her co founders Joe and Alex. She combines the power of diverse perspectives and a broad range of thinking.Joe Teips, our product engineer, has a Bachelor and Master in Mechanical and Product Engineering. He is the techie geek and has had the dream of a smart self-growing garden about the size of a coffee machine, which is well designed and fits in every lifestyle. He spent many years in manufacturing before he went to university. Alex Lier, our nutritionist, has a Master in Mechanical Engineering and has gained few years of experience in construction and project management. Nevertheless, he has a huge passion for nutrition and creating healthy and delicious recipes. He traveled a lot during his studies and collected much food inspiration from different countries. To gain more knowledge in food and nutrition he completed a degree as a nutritionist.Since starting on our mission over three years ago, we have been supported by business angels, family and friends, the industry, universities, venture capital, and state funds. As an innovative-driven and knowledge-based start-up, we have been supported by the German Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy with the EXIST Business Start-up Grant during the preparation of the innovative technology.Team We are ready for full production with your supportWe have been working on Cell One for over three years to create a connected ecosystem: our hardware, app, seed pod, cloud back-end, plant-based nutrition concept, and cookbook. The indoor garden you see in the video and the ecosystem around it is real, working prototypes. It’s exciting to see how far we’ve come, but now we need your help to start production and to bring Cell One into your kitchen.  What's next
Refine our engineering in a step called ""Design-for-Manufacture Engineering.""
Create the tools required for mass production with our manufacturing partner
Set up our first production run
Run a test production of the alpha units",26.0,3,"1 Campaign
|","Aalen, Germany",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/your-smart-garden-for-fresh-local-superfoods--2/pica

Rather than swap an old wire for a new one or put another gadget on your desk, we’re telling you to clear off your space and throw out your wires. This is the future of charging. And it's invisible.
<ul>
• Wood
• Plastic
• Glass
• Quartz
• Granite
*Charge through any surface except metal. Wireless charging is blocked by metal, which is why phones with wireless charging have plastic or glass on the back, such as iPhone X.

It doesn't matter if you have a pop-socket or the thickest case on the planet, Archon can wirelessly charge your phone through it. Not only that, but with our ultra long range 35mm version, you can charge your phone wirelessly through a tabletop and a case.
Archon is everything that you love about wireless charging minus the annoying drawbacks. No more table clutter. No more bright lights. No more case compatibility issues.
Here is a short list of phones with integrated wireless charging that are compatible with Archon:

column3:
>Visit our Amazon.com store or at ameuus.com to purchase the ameuus Micro Filters.

 

Love the bold flavours from using metal filters but hate the sludge? The ameuus o2 and o1 10K will help you brew a cleaner cup of coffee using the AeroPress. 

We developed two types of filters to suit different brewing needs.

In addition to being eco friendly, metal filters allow coffee oil to seep through. The oil carries rich &
column4:
bold flavours that are otherwise caught and lost when using paper filters. 

The ameuus o2 provides the optimal filtration using a patent pending dual filtration design. Each of the a&
column5:
b filter is jam-packed with ~50K holes!

With combined average hole size of 30 microns, you have the flexibility of using finer size coffee grounds for your favourite AeroPress recipe. 

It's the small things that count.

The packaging of the o2 doubles as a carrying case. This increases shipping cost, but we thought it's important for you to be able to enjoy your o2 anywhere you go! 

The case has enough room to fit many filters, so you can use it to store all your metal AeroPress filters!

Don't let the simplicity fool you, the ameuus o1 10K is perfect for those looking for a more traditional single filter design. Like the name suggests, it has 10K tiny 100 micron holes. It works great for medium coffee grind size!

The o1 10K is ideal for medium to coarse coffee grind setting.

Whereas the o2 gives you the ultimate flexibility for using different grind size settings. Although the plunge pressure does increase the finer grind size you go, so make sure you use a strong cup if you decide to use espresso grind.

Ever had trouble finding a place to dry your filters? The ameuus Drying Disc is a compact and portable drying stand that you can use to dry any AeroPress metal filters.

 It's designed with 3 slots, so it can hold the o1, and the o2 at the same time! 

The Filter Drying Disc will be included with every o2 Micro Filters.

 

 

We've tested the o2 against some of the most popular filters on the market today. We purchased different filters on Amazon.com and compared the amount of sediments leftover after using the metal filters. 

As you can see on the top, the ameuus filters clearly show less sediments when compared to the other two filters with the smallest hole size on the market today. 

Our comparisons are for non-welded single construction metal filters (non-mesh). 

To use the o2, simply match the ""a"" and ""b"" alignment guides found on the edge of the filters. Don't worry if you can't get a perfect match, a roughly aligned match will still brew a clean cup!

column1: • Push AeroPress all the way down after brew
• Rinse cap with cold water
• Unscrew cap
• Slide the o2 filters out
• Rub the o2 against each other under running water

Graham is the 2018 Toronto Regional AeroPress Competition Champion. We were fortunate enough to have him, and other fellow competitors test out our filters.

Follow him on instagram @instagraham_facebook!

Here's one of Graham's favorite AeroPress recipes using the ameuus o2.
<li>
Grind: On a scale of 1-10: 3.5, size closer to kosher salt than table salt, but not as coarse
<li>
Coffee: 22g
<li>
Water: 200g
<li>
Temp: 92°C/197°F
<li>
Time: 4:00min
<li>
AeroPress: Inverted

For full details on this brew method, please visit ameuus.com/blog/recipe.

It all started over a year ago. Since then we've went through more than 20 variations of filter designs. After many failed prototypes, and hundreds of cups of coffee we launched on Kickstarter in October.

With the success of the Kickstarter campaign and the overwhelming support of the AeroPress community, we're now on the next leg of our journey to continue sharing our creation on Indiegogo!

The ameuus micro filters are designed by Tecford Design from Toronto, Canada. Our team has over 20 years of collective experience designing and manufacturing micro-components. 

AeroPress is a registered trademark of AeroPress, Inc., Palo Alto, CA, USA.  |   ameuus and Tecford Design Inc. is not affiliated with or endorsed by AeroPress, Inc.   |   ameuus is a registered trademark of Tecford Design Inc.

World's Lightest Double Wall Freestanding Tent
by Big Sky International
World's Lightest Double Wall Freestanding Tent includes a ""moon roof"" for no additional cost!
We have been designing tents for a number of years. We keep trying to push our designs to give our customers the most tent for the least weight.

We wanted to create the World's Lightest Double Wall Freestanding tent, but we are not sure if there is enough interest to make it a commercial product so we thought indiegogo would be a good place to find out.
We have already completed the design and made a prototype tent. In fact, it won the prestigious Gold Industry Award at the 2012 OutDoor Asia show this summer.
OutDoor Asia - Gold Industry Award - Big Sky Soul tent
One cool feature that was designed into the tent was the ability to roll back the fly to create ""moon roof"" for viewing the stars at night. (see picture below)
Another cool feature is that gear storage/vestibule area does not require stakes/pegs because it attaches to the ends of the poles (see pictures above and drawings below).
Specifications
Model: Soul tent
Suggested use: lightweight backpacking
Sleeping capacity: 1
Tent and poles: ""World's Lightest"" prototype weight 795g (1lb 12oz) with SuprSil™-UL fabric and ultra-light DuraLite™ poles
External dimensions: 260 x 125 x 62 cm (102 x 49 x 24 in)
Area: 2.7 sq m (28.8 sq ft)
Vestibule area: 0.5 sq m (5.8 sq ft)
Interior dimensions: 215 x 90 x 60 cm (85 x 36 x 24 in)
Internal peak height: 99 cm (39 in)
Packed size: 13 x 45 cm (5 x 18 in)
Pole material: aluminum or DuraLite™ composite
Number of poles: 2
Fly fabric: 40D silicone/PU fabric or SuprSil™ or SuprSil™-UL silicone coated nylon
Interior fabric: no-see-um mesh netting
Floor fabric: 40D PU fabric or SuprSil™ or SuprSil™-UL silicone coated nylon
Doors: 1
Rating: 3-season
Uses: ultra light, backpack, camp, hike, trek, outdoor activities
Note: we will make the Soul tent with different materials/fabrics so there will be a version to fit everyone's budget.
Big Sky fabric comparison table
Big Sky fabrics comparison table
$15 Contribution
Big Sky stake/peg kit: 4pcs Ultra-C™ stakes and 2pc Tube Steaks™ LW pegs plus See-Em™ sack. $15 contribution includes FREE shipping within Continental USA
$35 Contribution

Big Sky DreamSleeper™ Deluxe inflatable pillow. World’s most comfortable light weight inflatable pillow with Deluxe pillow case and pillow includes an attached self storing pouch. Weight: 117g (4.1oz) Colors: creamy beige, sky blue, or spring green. $35 contribution includes FREE shipping within Continental USA
Questions:

How much will the different versions of Big Sky's new Soul tent weigh?
Answer: The less expensive versions of Big Sky's new Soul tent will weigh more than the more expensive versions that use lighter weight, more expensive materials/fabrics. We have not made all the different versions yet so we cannot provide the exact weights yet. We estimate the Cyber Monday Special / Value Priced version will weigh about 1kg (2lb 3oz) for fly, interior, and aluminum poles.
How durable is the Cyber Monday Special / Value Priced version?

Answer: The Cyber Monday Special / Value Priced version is made with more durable fabrics/materials than the more expensive versions.

Money will be used to fund the new molds for this patented new product and produce the initial run of finished product.  We have selected a reputable contract factory in the Ningbo area of China.  Component sourcing has already been finalized with the LED screens coming from Japan and the computer chip from Taiwan.  Plastic housing and final assembly will be done in China.

We will have a high degree of success because the current model has been on the market for the past 4 years and is being successfully sold in national retailers such as Costco.com, HSN, QVC.com, Target.com, Homedepot.com and Lowe's.

However, this current product has a limited market because it only works on the standard toggle switch (flip) type of wall switch.  The all new SwitchGenie™ is designed to work on both the standard toggle (flip) switches and/or the decor (rocker panel) type of wall switches.  Our market research indicates that we are missing a significant portion of the market in the US as well as Canada.

We have also learned from our current customer base that the current AutoChron® unit needs to be smaller in order to fit on multiple switch plates and be able to control all of the switches.

The SwitchGenie will have a replaceable back plate to fit onto either a toggle and/or rocker panel wall switch.  The consumer will have a complete wireless wall switch timer in one package that has an internal computer chip set and software that is simple to program.

Once the correct rear plate has been installed which will only take a minute, the unit is secured to the current wall switch plate with a single screw (included in package) and takes less than 30 seconds to secure to the switch.  Programming is simple and intuitive. 

The SwitchGenie's computer chip can regulate (i.e. turn on/off) the switch up to 9 different times per day on different times for each day of the week.  Not only does this save the homeowner money by reducing unnecessary energy costs, it also provides added security to the home when no one is at home.  Law enforcement experts tell you that the easiest way to prevent burglaries is to make your home look like someone is home.

We need the help from the Indiegogo community to reach our goal of bringing this great product to market as soon as possible!  Please help us launch this product and be one of the first to have this in your home or office.

Short Summary

Every Artist has a list of people who inspire them and educate them. We all have these inspirational artists we look to and wish to meet and work with them. For me, that artist is Lois Greenfield. She is an AMAZING dance photographer in NYC. Her images capture movement and the essence of dance so well that she is the top of the game in my opinion.
<div>
On Sept 29 &
column2: 30 she will be having a workshop in her studios. She will teach us her secrets. Her knowledge of high speed sync lighting that allows to freeze any pose, any jumps is honestly impressive.Your donations will allow me to fly to New York, Study with Lois for the two days and use her gear, her studio and dancers. Her knowledge in the industry will help me become a better photographer and deliver higher quality images for my clients.

column1: Many of my clients know me for my passion and working with dancers. I love my job and love delivering the best results possible for them. By attending this workshop, I can deliver a higher product for choreographers, directors and dancers, but also carry this information over to my other clientelle as well.
<div>
What We Need &
<div>
Lois' workshop is $1550 for the Two Day Workshop. The rest of the funds are for flights and taxi cabs / expenses.
Every donation counts and is greatly appreciated. We have four packages to those who donate higher amounts.
$50 - $150 is our first package. You receive an 8x10 print of your choice from our site.
$150 - $300 is our second package. You receive a 16x20 Framed and Signed Print.
$300 - $500 is our third package. You recieve a 4 hour photoshoot. If you're a dancer, this benefits you A LOT! This workshop will help my skills and you receive DIRECT results during this shoot.

$500 + is our largest package. Your generous donation of $500 or more receives a 4 hour photoshoot. If you're a dancer, this benefits you A LOT! This workshop will help my skills and you receive DIRECT results during this shoot. Upon completion of this shoot, you will receive a 16x20 framed, matted and signed photograph for your donation.
<div>
The Impact

Lois' knowledge of lighitng and the form of movement is unparrelled. She will be teaching us about high speed sync and when to capture the movement. This workshop will teach me lighting and industry secrets that I can then carry into my own photography and workflows. These secrets will be directly used into my shoots with you, my clients. Thus, you receive the rewards of my dream of meeting Lois and attending her workshop.

“We bring the world’s fuel gauge into every
home in America and tell you how much you’re spending on energy every few
seconds.”
The goal of EnergyCite® is to commercialize
and distribute an in-home energy dashboard for people to see how much money
they are spending on energy and reduce their energy expenses. Simply put, we
bring the electric utility power meter inside the home to your fingertips and
we convert those funny numbers on the power meter to dollars and cents and
much, much more.
This video was produced in
our design engineering and manufacturing partner’s facilities in late August,
2013 located in Xiamen &amp
column2: Zhangzhou, China. Tom Tamarkin of EnergyCite®

column1: &amp
column2: Charlie Chen of Lilliput take our backers on a tour of the product

column1: development and manufacturing facility. The products are in late stage design

and test. We plan to produce the products including those offered as Perks, in the Lilliput facility.  All screens shown in product shots are real and indicate working software.  There are no simulations.

Lilliput may be evaluated by clicking
here.
Our vision is to put the world’s energy
dashboard in every home in America. This starts with how much electricity you
are using every hour…every minute of the day, and how much you are paying for
it. In other words we want to provide everyone with a real time electronic
tabulation of their electricity bill. We know that by doing this, people will use
electricity more wisely and save money as a result. And people will feel better
about the fairness of their electric utility company. We will do this on a
portable electronic display, PC, or smart phone and will integrate this
into home energy management systems for people ready to take that step.
We will also provide global fossil fuel and
alternative energy reserve, energy production, and energy use information in
real time. And we will provide science and energy information delivered to
these displays in plain English that everyone can understand. We believe when
we do this, an interest will be developed by people in science and energy and
just how big a task it will be to solve energy for a worldwide population
projected at over 9 billion by mid-century. As we all know our fossil fuel
reserves are finite and when they are gone, there gone. Yet few people truly
realize how close we are to that point and how this will affect the future of
their children and grandchildren.
We believe solving energy is the greatest
challenge our young generation faces and yet hardly anyone is talking about it.
Our vision is to be the catalyst to change that while at the same time giving
people practical tools which allow them to save money by conserving energy in
their homes today.
What led us to this vision/mission?:
As a college physics major in the 1970s I
was taught that energy would be solved by 1995 and that a new virtually
inexhaustible cheap and very green source of power would be developed and put
on line by 2000. Both electricity and synthetic liquid fuels would be produced
for thousands of years to come. However our best scientists' efforts in this

endeavor got bogged down in politics and big business interests. <a href=""http://www.usclcorp.com/conservation/docs/Magnetic_Fusion_Energy_Engineering_Act_1980fulltext.pdf"" rel=""noopener nofollow""><b>Click here to see the Act signed by
President Carter in October 1980 which should have gotten this done.

The scientific projects needed to get this done came to a halt. <a href=""http://www.fusion4freedom.com/pdfs/Who%20Killed%20Fusion%2010-2011.pdf"" rel=""noopener nofollow""><b>Click here for a very authoritative
article we wrote which explains how this happened. So here we are decades later and not much
has happened except that our fossil fuel reserves have gotten lower and more
people around the world in developing countries are demanding a better standard
of living which takes more energy. So I thought it was high time to jump over
the barriers and bring this critically important information directly to the
people. It is such an important issue that we collaborated with Pat Boone and
wrote an 8 article series on the science, and the politics that derailed the
efforts and why we need to get back on track now.  <a href=""http://www.usclcorp.com/news.htm"" rel=""noopener nofollow""><b>Click on this line and then the lower line next to Pat's
picture for a link to the complete set of 8 articles. Next,
and perhaps, foremost we do that by concentrating on what everyone is
concerned about today
column2: their pocket book and their money. And in

column1: the process we will provide some important information and facts.
Why do we need your backing?
As you go through our project
presentation you will see we have been working on this crowd source funding project for
one year. In fact the company due diligence  video section was done
with veteran investigative news reporter, Kristen Simoes, the day before
thanksgiving, 2012. Three or four days later we did the piece with singer and
actor, Pat Boone, in his office. <a href=""http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m8KDpehzHdc"" rel=""noopener nofollow""><b>Click here for the complete and
unedited discussion with Pat in his Hollywood office. Although long, the
YouTube advance button can be used to move through boring sections.  A few days later we were
in Israel working on our Perks package and shooting various video
as linked in this presentation.  And recently we completed the
engineering, product development, and manufacturing video in Xiamen,
China.  All of this could make the average person think we have a big
company and lots of money behind us. We don’t. As the CBS news reporter says in
her story on us, “the man behind this works out of this house…in Carmichael,
CA…and it’s a pretty good idea.” <a href=""http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9jrvXiGp-tU"" rel=""noopener nofollow""><b>Click here for the CBS News
story.
The truth is we are a small
family based company with an extended family of little investors who have
chipped in a few dollars here and a few there. The key is “few.” Now we are in
a critical window to launch our product and we need your help.
Why is our project success critical to
America and our children and grandchildren?
There are two reasons.
The first is that if we do not do this, the
electrical utilities will follow the lead of the big companies who want to get
government approval for new appliances based on their belief that people want
the electric utilities and/or the government to remotely manage their use of
electricity (and later natural gas and water) using remote computers connected
to every home in America….and all the major appliances located inside your
house. Over the years we have learned that this is not what most people want. People
want to know how much energy they are using and what it costs. Then people can
control it without the need for “big brother like” remote control. Today the
big companies have the ear of the U.S. Department of Energy and their “Green
Button” focuses. <a href=""http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IoVq63mCrP0"" rel=""noopener nofollow""><b>Here is our video explaining this
very important issue.
And here is a very short video
clip showing why it is important that we present this to large numbers of
citizens.
The second reason is that if we do not do
this our future generations will suffer greatly. There will be future wars and
energy conflicts as fossil fuels dwindle and developing countries fight to
maintain their citizens’ lives which require energy. <a href=""http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ECFm3Hcp9gA"" rel=""noopener nofollow""><b>Follow this link for a presentation
we prepared on this major issue. If the introduction is too boring, advance to
4 minutes and 25 seconds.
Most people do not understand energy and
science. Therefore there is no interest by the politicians and government to
work on long term projects like “solving energy” for our children and
grandchildren. Over the course of the EMS-2020 product development I have met
some very senior leaders. Harry Reid in the Senate for One. Eric Cantor,
Majority Leader of the House for another. Last summer I flew to the East Coast
to meet Mitt Romney in person who was running for president and I have communicated
with the current White House on this issue as well as the previous White House.
There is one common answer across all political party lines. Mr. Romney put it
bluntly: “I have to answer the person who approaches me and asks what you can
do for me over the next six months?” Or as former California Governor
Schwarzenegger lectured me in his office one time: “My voters are concerned
about the price of gasoline today. Don’t talk to me about something that will
take 20 years to show any practical results.” A very important part of what we
will do is to bring energy and science information into huge numbers of homes
throughout the country and couple it to something everyone is concerned about.
Their pocket book and household expenses. It is for that reason that we have
designed a very special series of perks based on two very
important works in energy we have commissioned.

qualified to get this project done?

energy devices such as smart thermostat, smart power plug

load controller, etc. using the ZigBee SE profile.

• Home Automation Integration: Connects
home automation devices such as lighting, smart power plug, door sensors, smoke

detectors, etc. using the ZigBee HA profile.

and tablets via WiFi-to-gateway or Web portal to facilitate active user

involvement.

to the Internet via Broadband.

the HAN with cloud server allowing two-way information sharing including

downstream control command and upstream data.

Exporting

from anywhere in the world.

• Real-time Indication: Uses lighting bar

to indicate the TOU period and instantaneous power consumption level.

• Energy Data Exporting: Stores energy data
locally in universal format and could be downloaded via Ethernet, wireless

connectivity or USB port.

column1: ZigBee to USB Energy Gateway
The USB Energy gate way
allows your PC to become the EMS-2020. The USB adapter contains the ZigBee
radio transceiver which communicates with your smart meter outside. The
software allows the application to run on your PC under windows. The software
also enables our worldwide energy dash board displays and transfers the
information from your smart meter to the EnergyCite® network and to your smart
phone anywhere in the world. These photos are of the prototype USB Energy
gateway and an early basic software release used in our EnergyCite® trademark
renewal application on file with the United States Patent and Trademark office.
GOALS:
We need tens of thousands – hundreds of
thousands - of people to stand up and say they want their meter data whenever
they want it and in real time. This is no different than going to the gas pump
and paying for fuel. People are entitled to it.
By standing with us and backing us at the
$30.00 level we file your “vote” with your utility company and the proper state
or federal regulators governing your utility. Everyone can afford to do this.
It is too important not to as explained in other sections. If we don’t do this
the utility companies will simply ignore this technology, do a few small pilot
projects in regional locations and forget about it. Then the big guys move in.
Do a Google search on Meter Data Management companies. These are the
companies who will profit based on their belief you do not care about how much
energy you use and how much you pay for it. These are the companies who will
tell the utility companies that they will manage your use by sending you a
consumption report over the Internet a day after you used that power!

a minimum.

development and tooling needed to release the EMS-2020, Smart Plug,
Programmable Communicating Thermostat, Energy Hub and Energy Gateway and all
the mobile apps as well as our reward package based on the very important work
we are doing with Dr. Schroeder and Dr. Eliezer.

The Perks:
Our perks have been very carefully thought out.  We have been working on them for well over a
year.  Our perks are wholly consistent
with the primary objective of our project which is the dissemination of
information on science and energy and the provision to utility customers with
tools to help them conserve energy and save money.  Our goal is to make you a part of building a
new generation of curious young people interested in science and helping the
world become a more rational and inhabitable place for our future generations.
Few people realize that energy will become the most
serious problem the world faces.<span>
Why?  Because most all of our
energy today comes from fossil fuels and when they are depleted the world goes
dark for the majority of people.  Sure
everyone has heard the phrase “just go green,” but how many people know what
that means and to what extent it is possible.
That is why we have developed the EMS-2020 product line and why an
integral portion of it is the delivery of science and energy information. Our
EnergyCite® network has the potential to deliver science and energy information
and media content to every home in America.
Energy is fundamental to transportation, comfortable housing, industrial
output, agriculture, and potable water.
To underscore the importance of conservation and an
understanding of the science of energy, we have designed our EMS-2020 hardware
product line to support “media delivery” including video and electronic books.
On April 28, 2009 we contacted President Obama
regarding the energy situation.<span>  Click
here for our letter to him and note the paragraph highlighted in yellow on page
3. http://www.fusion4freedom.com/pdfs/President%20B%20H%20Obama%20Letter%20TT%20Rev%203.1-1.pdf  Note our call for the energy analysis. It was
never done.  Six months later we hired
well-known and well published scientists to conduct such an energy analysis.  It confirmed what we have always known
alternative energy as we know it today would provide only enough energy to meet
3.7% of 2050 worldwide energy demand.
Click here for that initial report: http://www.fusion4freedom.com/pdfs/Worldwide%20Energy%20Supply%20%26%20Demand%20Study%20USCL%20V1%20Rev%205.pdf
If that analysis peaks your interest please click
here for a free copy of David MacKay’s book <b><i>“Sustainable Energy-Without the
hot air.”  We have posted the
entire book as well as a short ten page synopsis.  http://www.fusion4freedom.com/pdfs/SustainEbook.pdf
The problem we have run into over the years is that
these stubborn facts don’t support “just go green.”<span>  Yes you can run a house on solar cells.  With enough solar cells and batteries the
house can be self-sufficient (except when the air conditioning is turned
on.)  However, did you know that the
average American uses well over 100 times more energy in their car per month
than in their home?  Why?  One horse power =746 Watts.  A car with a 250 horse power engine takes
186,500 Watts or 186 kW at full engine load.
Your home electrical service only provides 24 kW.  Ok, you charge your electric car batteries
over several hours, but how much energy do you really get in terms of how many
miles your electric car can be driven?
And…did you know there is a relationship between energy, power, and
period time?  Needless to say most people
do not think about these things.  And
they would look at the report linked above and find it dry, boring, and
incomprehensible.  That is where we come
in.
We have engaged two Ph.D. physicists’ s and authors
in Israel to write two exciting and thought provoking books for us.<span>  And they will be the beginning of the energy
“reading and learning” material our EMS-2020 will present.
Shalom
&amp
Dr. Shalom Eliezer, formerly of the Plasma Physics
Department, Soreq Nuclear Research Center in Yavne, Israel, and his wife Yaffa,
formerly with the Weizmann Institute of Science in Rehovot, Israel, are writing
a new book for us which will make energy and the science of energy both
accessible and fun for people who have no formal training in science.<span>  Their book will treat the issue of “energy
flux density” and will provide a detailed but plain English case for why the
green alternatives as we know them today are good but totally insufficient to
power the world when fossil fuels are gone. They will conclusively show how
much time we have left.  And they will
explain the only realistic solution to correctly solving energy without nuclear
radioactivity and without greenhouse gases which may contribute to climate
change.  Dr. Eliezer has written nearly a
dozen scholarly graduate level books as well as one work for the scientifically
lay titled <b><i>“The Fourth State of Matter
NASA called a fun and important book.
Click on this link for a free copy of that work as a sample of what is
to come: http://www.fusion4freedom.com/pdfs/FourthState.pdf
And a word about page 104 of that book.  It is very outdated. The curves shown from
Lawrence Livermore National Labs are about 100 years further out than what is
accepted today.  Why?  No one took into consideration the energy
needs of the developing world then.
Remember the U.S. only has 4% of the world population.  Other people have to eat and be comfortable
too.  Our new book will be totally
updated.  And this will be used to get
the word out to lots of people that we really do need to fix energy.  Otherwise future generations will be in
jeopardy.

Risks &
The primary challenge with this project is
not all backers will be living in areas with deployed smart meters. And very few
if any will have the Home Area Network radio transceiver inside their smart
meter activated by their utility. Thus, the primary risk is can we place enough
pressure on your utility to get your smart meter HAN turned on and/or to get
your utility to replace your old fashion meter with a modern smart meter with
the HAN radio transceiver. We mitigate that risk be providing many useful
features including the thermostat, smart plug, and energy monitoring without
the meter connectivity. As importantly the work we are doing with Dr. Schroeder
and Dr. Eliezer will be the basis of a national movement to get energy
correctly solved and that alone is a hugely important effort. That results from
the rewards of our project. And you get the EMS-2020 to read the books on just
like a Kindle …but more.
There is some risk associated with getting
the radio wave ZigBee signal from the power meter inside the home. That relates
to the fact that the power level of the radio transmitter in the power meter is
very low and a significant portion
of the signal gets adsorbed by the home
construction materials because power meters in the United States are located
outdoors. We are aware of the radio propagation issues with ZigBee and Wi-Fi.
It is for that reason that part of our stretch goals include the completion of
technology developed by Yitran, our partner in Beer Sheva, Israel, which takes
the ZigBee radio signal and brings it inside the home over the power wires.
Click here for the two part video with Tom Tamarkin and Yitran in Beer Sheva: http://www.youtube.com/watch…
Click here for part 2: http://www.youtube.com/watch…
This explains how we will get the signal inside the home if and when radio does
not work.
Please click here to see our complete due diligence and business disclosure section.","“We bring the world’s fuel gauge into every
home in America and tell you how much you’re spending on energy every few
seconds.”
The goal of EnergyCite® is to commercialize
and distribute an in-home energy dashboard for people to see how much money
they are spending on energy and reduce their energy expenses. Simply put, we
bring the electric utility power meter inside the home to your fingertips and
we convert those funny numbers on the power meter to dollars and cents and
much, much more.
This video was produced in
our design engineering and manufacturing partner’s facilities in late August,
2013 located in Xiamen & Zhangzhou, China. Tom Tamarkin of EnergyCite®
& Charlie Chen of Lilliput take our backers on a tour of the product
development and manufacturing facility. The products are in late stage design

and test. We plan to produce the products including those offered as Perks, in the Lilliput facility.  All screens shown in product shots are real and indicate working software.  There are no simulations.Lilliput may be evaluated by clicking
here.
Our vision is to put the world’s energy
dashboard in every home in America. This starts with how much electricity you
are using every hour…every minute of the day, and how much you are paying for
it. In other words we want to provide everyone with a real time electronic
tabulation of their electricity bill. We know that by doing this, people will use
electricity more wisely and save money as a result. And people will feel better
about the fairness of their electric utility company. We will do this on a
portable electronic display, PC, or smart phone and will integrate this
into home energy management systems for people ready to take that step.
We will also provide global fossil fuel and
alternative energy reserve, energy production, and energy use information in
real time. And we will provide science and energy information delivered to
these displays in plain English that everyone can understand. We believe when
we do this, an interest will be developed by people in science and energy and
just how big a task it will be to solve energy for a worldwide population
projected at over 9 billion by mid-century. As we all know our fossil fuel
reserves are finite and when they are gone, there gone. Yet few people truly
realize how close we are to that point and how this will affect the future of
their children and grandchildren.
We believe solving energy is the greatest
challenge our young generation faces and yet hardly anyone is talking about it.
Our vision is to be the catalyst to change that while at the same time giving
people practical tools which allow them to save money by conserving energy in
their homes today.
What led us to this vision/mission?:
As a college physics major in the 1970s I
was taught that energy would be solved by 1995 and that a new virtually
inexhaustible cheap and very green source of power would be developed and put
on line by 2000. Both electricity and synthetic liquid fuels would be produced
for thousands of years to come. However our best scientists' efforts in this
endeavor got bogged down in politics and big business interests. Click here to see the Act signed by
President Carter in October 1980 which should have gotten this done.
The scientific projects needed to get this done came to a halt. Click here for a very authoritative
article we wrote which explains how this happened. So here we are decades later and not much
has happened except that our fossil fuel reserves have gotten lower and more
people around the world in developing countries are demanding a better standard
of living which takes more energy. So I thought it was high time to jump over
the barriers and bring this critically important information directly to the
people. It is such an important issue that we collaborated with Pat Boone and
wrote an 8 article series on the science, and the politics that derailed the
efforts and why we need to get back on track now.  Click on this line and then the lower line next to Pat's
picture for a link to the complete set of 8 articles. Next,
and perhaps, foremost we do that by concentrating on what everyone is
concerned about today
column2: their pocket book and their money. And in

column1: the process we will provide some important information and facts.
Why do we need your backing?
As you go through our project
presentation you will see we have been working on this crowd source funding project for
one year. In fact the company due diligence  video section was done
with veteran investigative news reporter, Kristen Simoes, the day before
thanksgiving, 2012. Three or four days later we did the piece with singer and
actor, Pat Boone, in his office. Click here for the complete and
unedited discussion with Pat in his Hollywood office. Although long, the
YouTube advance button can be used to move through boring sections.  A few days later we were
in Israel working on our Perks package and shooting various video
as linked in this presentation.  And recently we completed the
engineering, product development, and manufacturing video in Xiamen,
China.  All of this could make the average person think we have a big
company and lots of money behind us. We don’t. As the CBS news reporter says in
her story on us, “the man behind this works out of this house…in Carmichael,
CA…and it’s a pretty good idea.” Click here for the CBS News
story.
The truth is we are a small
family based company with an extended family of little investors who have
chipped in a few dollars here and a few there. The key is “few.” Now we are in
a critical window to launch our product and we need your help.
Why is our project success critical to
America and our children and grandchildren?
There are two reasons.
The first is that if we do not do this, the
electrical utilities will follow the lead of the big companies who want to get
government approval for new appliances based on their belief that people want
the electric utilities and/or the government to remotely manage their use of
electricity (and later natural gas and water) using remote computers connected
to every home in America….and all the major appliances located inside your
house. Over the years we have learned that this is not what most people want. People
want to know how much energy they are using and what it costs. Then people can
control it without the need for “big brother like” remote control. Today the
big companies have the ear of the U.S. Department of Energy and their “Green
Button” focuses. Here is our video explaining this
very important issue.
And here is a very short video
clip showing why it is important that we present this to large numbers of
citizens.
The second reason is that if we do not do
this our future generations will suffer greatly. There will be future wars and
energy conflicts as fossil fuels dwindle and developing countries fight to
maintain their citizens’ lives which require energy. Follow this link for a presentation
we prepared on this major issue. If the introduction is too boring, advance to
4 minutes and 25 seconds.
Most people do not understand energy and
science. Therefore there is no interest by the politicians and government to
work on long term projects like “solving energy” for our children and
grandchildren. Over the course of the EMS-2020 product development I have met
some very senior leaders. Harry Reid in the Senate for One. Eric Cantor,
Majority Leader of the House for another. Last summer I flew to the East Coast
to meet Mitt Romney in person who was running for president and I have communicated
with the current White House on this issue as well as the previous White House.
There is one common answer across all political party lines. Mr. Romney put it
bluntly: “I have to answer the person who approaches me and asks what you can
do for me over the next six months?” Or as former California Governor
Schwarzenegger lectured me in his office one time: “My voters are concerned
about the price of gasoline today. Don’t talk to me about something that will
take 20 years to show any practical results.” A very important part of what we
will do is to bring energy and science information into huge numbers of homes
throughout the country and couple it to something everyone is concerned about.
Their pocket book and household expenses. It is for that reason that we have
designed a very special series of perks based on two very
important works in energy we have commissioned.
Why we are uniquely
qualified to get this project done?
As I said, we are a small group but we will
grow very quickly. Jeremy mentioned Governor Schwarzenegger’s comment about
“its time to return the power to the people.” That was made in Tel Aviv, Israel
on May 1, 2004 and here is the official State of California photo of the
Governor talking to Jeremy’s mother (my wife) along with the former Prime
Minister of Israel, Ehud Olmert.
And here a few years later is the Governor
lecturing me not to talk about long term things. Note in this picture his eyes
are closed to insure no photo opportunity this time around.
One has to have a lot of patience and thick
skin to take this on. And one also has to know what they are doing, where they
are going and how to get there. Click here and see what we have done without big money and
big company influence.

to the supporting documents. And yes, I was the inventor of the “smart meter.” Click here to see its history and
introduction in 1992 and scroll down and down to the “brochure pages on Peak
Demand and TOU rates and Energy Management System in-home display.

Our Team:
Pat Boone:
Pat has served as our official spokesperson since May 2011. Pat helps us take complicated concepts and put
them into language non-scientists understand.
Pat also helps us with publicity, PR and media. Pat is a
legendary Hollywood icon in the preforming arts who traces his ancestry to the
American pioneer, Daniel Boone.  Pat has
sold over 45 million albums, had 38 top
40 hits, and starred in more than 12 Hollywood motion pictures.  Pat graduated from Columbia University in New
York City, magna cum laude in 1958.  Pat
is well-known for his old-fashioned values, which contributed to his fame and
popularity in the early days of the rock & roll era to the present. Today
he is still active on television and in the motivational speaking circuit. Pat
has spent the last few years writing columns and books and runs his own record
label named Lion & Lamb.  Pat’s first
book, “Twixt Twelve and Twenty,”
Prentice Hall, was a number 1 Best Seller in America.  Pat lives with his wife of 60 years, Shirley,
in Beverly Hills, California.
Charlie Chen:  Charlie received an undergraduate degree in
electrical engineering followed by a MBA from a University in the UK.  Charlie is CEO and President of OWON/Lilliput
and heads its Toronto Canada office as well.
He divides his time between Canada and China.  Because of Charlie’s international experience
and UK education he serves as the principal interface between the R&D group
and factory in China with USCL EnergyCite in the United States.  Charlie’s written and verbal English skills
contribute to the successful integration of the multinational team.  Charlie enjoys international travel and
photography when he is away from his team responsibilities.
Tomer Tamarkin:  Tomer is the founder and president of USCL/EnergyCite® and
team leader.  Tomer has set up a time line
from birth to present on Facebook with all achievements and a detailed
resume.  See February 21, 2011 entry for
the details of our relationship with Pat Boone leading to this project.  https://www.facebook.com/tomer.tamarkin
Gerald Schroeder, Ph.D.:  Dr. Schroder is the principal author of one
of the first books EnergyCite has commissioned for electronic reading format in
its EMS-2020 product. Gerald has over thirty years of
experience in research and teaching. He earned his Bachelor’s, Master’s, and
Doctorate degrees at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. This was followed by five years on the staff
of the MIT physics department prior to moving to Israel, where he joined the
Weizmann Institute of Science and then the Volcani Research Institute, while
also having a laboratory at The Hebrew University. His Doctorate is in two
fields: Earth sciences and physics.
Gerald is the author of four books

ZigBee to USB Energy Gateway
The USB Energy gate way
allows your PC to become the EMS-2020. The USB adapter contains the ZigBee
radio transceiver which communicates with your smart meter outside. The
software allows the application to run on your PC under windows. The software
also enables our worldwide energy dash board displays and transfers the
information from your smart meter to the EnergyCite® network and to your smart
phone anywhere in the world. These photos are of the prototype USB Energy
gateway and an early basic software release used in our EnergyCite® trademark
renewal application on file with the United States Patent and Trademark office.
GOALS:
We need tens of thousands – hundreds of
thousands - of people to stand up and say they want their meter data whenever
they want it and in real time. This is no different than going to the gas pump
and paying for fuel. People are entitled to it.
By standing with us and backing us at the
$30.00 level we file your “vote” with your utility company and the proper state
or federal regulators governing your utility. Everyone can afford to do this.
It is too important not to as explained in other sections. If we don’t do this
the utility companies will simply ignore this technology, do a few small pilot
projects in regional locations and forget about it. Then the big guys move in.
Do a Google search on Meter Data Management companies. These are the
companies who will profit based on their belief you do not care about how much
energy you use and how much you pay for it. These are the companies who will
tell the utility companies that they will manage your use by sending you a
consumption report over the Internet a day after you used that power!
Our financial goal is to raise $540,000 as
a minimum.
$540,000 allows us to complete the software
development and tooling needed to release the EMS-2020, Smart Plug,
Programmable Communicating Thermostat, Energy Hub and Energy Gateway and all
the mobile apps as well as our reward package based on the very important work
we are doing with Dr. Schroeder and Dr. Eliezer.

Click here to see us with ourengineering and manufacturing partner in Xiamen, China. We are inthe late stages of production engineering and commercialization.  Workingpre-release product is shown.   The video shows the R&D engineering,production engineering, injection plastic molding with on site hard steel tooldevelopment and state of the art SMT production with clean room.
We are committed to rolling out all the
hardware products and software to support the PC and mobile apps within four
months of the release of funds to us. As can be seen in the video,
we have the resources in terms of people and equipment to do this.
Because this is a technology development
program we will be posting progress updates as we go. We want to bring our
backers inside the company so to speak to watch as we move forward.
Stretching our goal by a factor of two to
the $1,080,000 level lets us reach more people. It will, among other things
allow us to replace the funny and amateurish “space ship” scene in our very
economically produced video with a new sci-fi like video meant to
go viral to reach our one million Utility “voters” goal. Click here for a family shareholder
with two of our members who are in the sci-fi television production writing and
movie business (Hans Beimler and Eduardo Rossoff.) They just shook
their heads and laughed at our space ship shot. And as everyone can tell we
have no acting experience.
Stretching our goals by a factor of 4 or
more allows us to complete the power line carrier interface needed in some
cases to get the ZigBee radio signal from the meter to the in-home network or
display, and get our Dr. Schroeder and Eliezer content out into audio book
form, and video production begun for our EnergyCite distribution and launch the
EnergyCite® consortium discussed with Pat Boone in the video and moves the
company forward as a “going concern” in keeping with the EnergyCite® Roadmap.
The Perks:
Our perks have been very carefully thought out.  We have been working on them for well over a
year.  Our perks are wholly consistent
with the primary objective of our project which is the dissemination of
information on science and energy and the provision to utility customers with
tools to help them conserve energy and save money.  Our goal is to make you a part of building a
new generation of curious young people interested in science and helping the
world become a more rational and inhabitable place for our future generations.
Few people realize that energy will become the most
serious problem the world faces.
Why?  Because most all of our
energy today comes from fossil fuels and when they are depleted the world goes
dark for the majority of people.  Sure
everyone has heard the phrase “just go green,” but how many people know what
that means and to what extent it is possible.
That is why we have developed the EMS-2020 product line and why an
integral portion of it is the delivery of science and energy information. Our
EnergyCite® network has the potential to deliver science and energy information
and media content to every home in America.
Energy is fundamental to transportation, comfortable housing, industrial
output, agriculture, and potable water.
To underscore the importance of conservation and an
understanding of the science of energy, we have designed our EMS-2020 hardware
product line to support “media delivery” including video and electronic books.
On April 28, 2009 we contacted President Obama
regarding the energy situation.  Click
here for our letter to him and note the paragraph highlighted in yellow on page
3. http://www.fusion4freedom.com/pdfs/President%20B%20H%20Obama%20Letter%20TT%20Rev%203.1-1.pdf  Note our call for the energy analysis. It was
never done.  Six months later we hired
well-known and well published scientists to conduct such an energy analysis.  It confirmed what we have always known
alternative energy as we know it today would provide only enough energy to meet
3.7% of 2050 worldwide energy demand.
Click here for that initial report: http://www.fusion4freedom.com/pdfs/Worldwide%20Energy%20Supply%20%26%20Demand%20Study%20USCL%20V1%20Rev%205.pdf
If that analysis peaks your interest please click
here for a free copy of David MacKay’s book “Sustainable Energy-Without the
hot air.”  We have posted the
entire book as well as a short ten page synopsis.  http://www.fusion4freedom.com/pdfs/SustainEbook.pdf
The problem we have run into over the years is that
these stubborn facts don’t support “just go green.”  Yes you can run a house on solar cells.  With enough solar cells and batteries the
house can be self-sufficient (except when the air conditioning is turned
on.)  However, did you know that the
average American uses well over 100 times more energy in their car per month
than in their home?  Why?  One horse power =746 Watts.  A car with a 250 horse power engine takes
186,500 Watts or 186 kW at full engine load.
Your home electrical service only provides 24 kW.  Ok, you charge your electric car batteries
over several hours, but how much energy do you really get in terms of how many
miles your electric car can be driven?
And…did you know there is a relationship between energy, power, and
period time?  Needless to say most people
do not think about these things.  And
they would look at the report linked above and find it dry, boring, and
incomprehensible.  That is where we come
in.
We have engaged two Ph.D. physicists’ s and authors
in Israel to write two exciting and thought provoking books for us.  And they will be the beginning of the energy
“reading and learning” material our EMS-2020 will present.
Shalom
& Yaffa Eliezer Book Perk:
Dr. Shalom Eliezer, formerly of the Plasma Physics
Department, Soreq Nuclear Research Center in Yavne, Israel, and his wife Yaffa,
formerly with the Weizmann Institute of Science in Rehovot, Israel, are writing
a new book for us which will make energy and the science of energy both
accessible and fun for people who have no formal training in science.  Their book will treat the issue of “energy
flux density” and will provide a detailed but plain English case for why the
green alternatives as we know them today are good but totally insufficient to
power the world when fossil fuels are gone. They will conclusively show how
much time we have left.  And they will
explain the only realistic solution to correctly solving energy without nuclear
radioactivity and without greenhouse gases which may contribute to climate
change.  Dr. Eliezer has written nearly a
dozen scholarly graduate level books as well as one work for the scientifically
lay titled “The Fourth State of Matter
column2: An Introduction to Plasma Science” which

column1: NASA called a fun and important book.
Click on this link for a free copy of that work as a sample of what is
to come: http://www.fusion4freedom.com/pdfs/FourthState.pdf
And a word about page 104 of that book.  It is very outdated. The curves shown from
Lawrence Livermore National Labs are about 100 years further out than what is
accepted today.  Why?  No one took into consideration the energy
needs of the developing world then.
Remember the U.S. only has 4% of the world population.  Other people have to eat and be comfortable
too.  Our new book will be totally
updated.  And this will be used to get
the word out to lots of people that we really do need to fix energy.  Otherwise future generations will be in
jeopardy.
