Gerald
Schroeder Book Perk:
Dr. Gerald Schroeder, a MIT Alumni, past associate
with the United States Atomic Energy Commission, and bestselling non-fiction
author of 4 well known books, is writing a new fifth book for us on the
philosophy of energy and the moral imperative to solve energy correctly for our
children’s and grandchildren’s sake.  Dr.
Schroeder has a rich following around the world with his popular books.  Click here to learn more about Gerald
Schroeder and his background: http://geraldschroeder.com/wordpress/?page_id=2#
Click on this link and scroll down to the two part
video discussion with Dr. Gerald Schroeder and Tom Tamarkin in Jerusalem,
Israel:  http://www.fusion4freedom.com/
Why have we chosen Israeli scholars to do this for
us?  Simply put these issues are too
politically hot to handle for most scientists in the United States.  No one wants to get cross with the people
funding laboratories or universities, whatever that source is.  Israel being a very small country with few
natural energy resources is immune from such influences and at the same time
rich in scientific acumen.  It is for
this reason that we have been working in Israel for many years with groups such
as the Ariel University Center as described in a 2008 company brochure, section
05, Differentiation as has been posted to our team’s Web site for the last 5
years at:  http://www.usclcorp.com/investors/docs/Offering%20Brochure_Rev%209.0-1.pdf  (Remember what we said about the utility
industry moving at the speed of a glacier.)

Patents,
Trademarks, and IP
Tom Tamarkin is the principal inventor of
the United States patent 7,379,791 and 8,306,668 as well as a granted patent in
Israel, China, and the European Union based on the 7,379,791.Tom also has a
significant patent pending with the U.S. patent office as well as Israel and
the EU. The granted patents and pending
patent claim set may be reviewed by clicking here.
The following video was
recorded in Jerusalem where our patent attorney explains the basics of patent
law and what our patents cover for our backers.
We have been granted registered trademark
status on EnergyCite® by the United States Patent and Trademark Office.
We are filling to register EMS-2020™ with
the trademark division of the USPTO as part of this project and
will file the mark application at the close of this offering.
Post
Funding Campaign Going Forward Plan:
We know our
backers want to know that they are backing not only the completion of our
EMS-2020 produce devices for shipment as part of the Perks package but that
we are building a great sustainable company for the long term.  Click here to view our plan. Risks & Challenges:
The primary challenge with this project is
not all backers will be living in areas with deployed smart meters. And very few
if any will have the Home Area Network radio transceiver inside their smart
meter activated by their utility. Thus, the primary risk is can we place enough
pressure on your utility to get your smart meter HAN turned on and/or to get
your utility to replace your old fashion meter with a modern smart meter with
the HAN radio transceiver. We mitigate that risk be providing many useful
features including the thermostat, smart plug, and energy monitoring without
the meter connectivity. As importantly the work we are doing with Dr. Schroeder
and Dr. Eliezer will be the basis of a national movement to get energy
correctly solved and that alone is a hugely important effort. That results from
the rewards of our project. And you get the EMS-2020 to read the books on just
like a Kindle …but more.
There is some risk associated with getting
the radio wave ZigBee signal from the power meter inside the home. That relates
to the fact that the power level of the radio transmitter in the power meter is
very low and a significant portion
of the signal gets adsorbed by the home
construction materials because power meters in the United States are located
outdoors. We are aware of the radio propagation issues with ZigBee and Wi-Fi.
It is for that reason that part of our stretch goals include the completion of
technology developed by Yitran, our partner in Beer Sheva, Israel, which takes
the ZigBee radio signal and brings it inside the home over the power wires.
Click here for the two part video with Tom Tamarkin and Yitran in Beer Sheva: http://www.youtube.com/watch…
Click here for part 2: http://www.youtube.com/watch…
This explains how we will get the signal inside the home if and when radio does
not work.
Please click here to see our complete due diligence and business disclosure section.",26.0,6,"1 Campaign

We live in a very complex day and age. Long gone are the times of hunting, gathering and staring at campfires in caves. Whether this is for good or for bad I will leave in the middle.
Basic survival skills have melded with the ability to eat while watching TV, to read while listening to music and to talk while not really listening. Again, good or bad is left in the middle.
But this is our reality never the less. I, admittedly being a bit chaotic, find myself too often in the following manifestation of that reality:

""I put a few eggs in a pan, add water, put it on the stove and then return to my computer to resume working. Then after about 20 or 30 minutes, my subconscious slaps me in the face and reminds me that those eggs have now transcended into rocks."" - me, way too often.

Well, no more of that! Technology has come to our aid: MONEO, the somewhat smart kitchen timer. It has a nifty infrared sensor that can tell how hot an object is, and infer from that information whether the water has started boiling yet or the eggs are done. A friendly reminder lets you know dinner's ready. Of course this doesn't end with eggs (as life rarely does)
column2: you can use it for soup (don't let it boil, trust me), checking the temperature of your pan, really anything that involves temperature and time. You can even set multiple timers on it! What kitchen timer does that?!

column1: So why should you be confident in me solving this enigma? For starters, I'm very passionate about it, seeing as how it keeps biting me in the ##s. I'm tech-educated as you can see on my LinkedIn profile and I've been building electronics for ages (got my first kit at the age of 7). I have access to a great hackerspace from my old university
column2: 3D printers, laser cutters and knowledge galore! Besides that I have a pretty nice rig myself

column1: If you still have questions as to why this project should even come to life (for example
column2: 'But why not use a regular kitchen timer?'), please refer to the 'but why' section below.

column1: Currently I have gathered a few facts from iterative developing and testing:
• The temperature of an object can be measured by the sensor used, from a safe distance to avoid melting from the heat.
• The temperature of the outside of a pan is adequate to determine the inside temperature. With use of calibration this becomes 100%.
• Even though the ideal diameter of a pan is at least 20cm (7.8''), smaller pans can also be used because the temperature difference between the pan and the room is so significant.
The current setup (M1) uses an Arduino in conjunction with the Seeed Infrared Sensor for rapid development. I developed a C# test application for measuring and testing:

The next iteration (M2) will have the code rewritten to C and have it transferred to a Arduino Nano 3.0 board. A 1.8-inch TFT SPI Serial 128 x 160 will be used so the link with the laptop will be gone and it will become autonomous. At this point I will begin developing the rest of the timer code and make it useable with standard input buttons. Note that if the 1.8-inch screen is deemed 'too much' for final use (don't want MONEO from distracting us from actually using it, which would require a second MONEO to remind us to use the MONEO, which in the end would result in a world filled with infinite MONEOs), a smaller screen will be used.

When M2 is finished and properly tested, I will begin revising the needed items of the Arduino board so I can design and build a custom, cheaper board. This will be M3 and will be the completion of the hardware/software phase. Buyers of the 'Stripped MONEO' perk will receive the custom board + sensor at this stage.
NOTE: If you would like to receive a MONEO with an Arduino Nano board inside so you can easily upgrade/modify it yourself, please contact me and we'll work it out.
Now the case-designing will take place, since at this point we know the measurements of the components. A draft of the model has already been completed:

This is not the final color-scheme but just a rendering. The top part will contain the infrared sensor and should be aimed at the object of measurement. The rest is fairly obvious. The casing will be 3D printed into two parts, which allows adding the components and will then be glued together. Sanding and painting will complete the MONEO.

As noted I will not mass-produce MONEO (at this point in time). I do not yet have the required experience/knowledge, however I am teaming up with people that do so who knows what the future holds. The cool part of the current setup is however that every MONEO will be hand built by me, and only a few of them will exist.
There are perks (something you get in return for donating in this campaign) in different sizes &
column2: shapes - look for them on the right side of this page. I don't actually make money from the MONEOs themselves, so if you feel like supporting me financially for my time &amp
column3: energy invested please consider donating a little extra. You can do so after selecting the perk.

column1: It goes without saying that there should be a t-shirt, and so there is:
They come in all sizes, genders and in black or white, so let me know your wishes when ordering  :)

Please remember to add delivery costs to the amount. You can use the DHL site to determine the amount or contact me on specifics, locations in the EU may be cheaper. The end weight isn't determined yet but it definitely won't be heavy at all
column2: around 500 gr (1.1 lb) to 1 kg (2.2 lb).

column1: <ul>

But why not use a regular kitchen timer?

That does sound like an obvious solution if all you want to measure is time. But since there's no exact curve as to when your water will boil (there are a bunch of variables
column2:
room temperature, number of eggs, size of eggs, amount of water - and this is just for the eggs example), this isn't a fitting solution when more factors are in play. For example: wait until the water boils, then let me know when 4 minutes have passed.

But why not use an egg cooker?

I did try one of those once, they did not work for me at all (picture water overflowing and eggs getting wasted). Most likely I was doing something wrong, or mine was defective, but it wasn't a pleasant experience. Besides that, it's another big appliance for only one use case.

But why are you using an infrared sensor?

I thought of and tried multiple angles, for example this or this or this, but they aren't very practical. You'd have to clean them, they might melt, plastic would get mixed in your food, I'd get sued for negligence - it'd be a mess. Decent infrared sensors are a bit more expensive but worth it in the end.

But why can't you just stay by the kitchen?

Because staring at stuff in the kitchen might be relaxing once but gets boring to do every day. I'm not talking about cooking up large meals of course, but even then MONEO can help - so you can put your focus on not cutting your fingers, or use it to set multiple timers.

But why can't I buy one for 3 bucks like regular timers? Are you getting rich?

I know today's industrialized outsourced industry allows for very cheap mass production, but this gem is completely built by hand and in small quantities. I'm not getting bulk discounts and 3D printing is not cheap. If you're thinking I'm getting rich over this, I'm not. The standard MONEO perk contains absolutely no profit if you account for the time and energy I have to put in making every single one of them. If you leave those factors out, they'd be about 3 to 5 bucks cheaper. That's excluding delivery &
column3:
packaging costs.

So if you do feel generous and want to support me, consider paying a bit more for them. But buying them in the first place is already awesome support for what I'm doing :)

But why are you using an Arduino? OMG overkill!

Yes quite, but it puts the rapid in rapid development while still allowing to add/remove modules (screens, buttons, sensors) on the fly without redoing schematics. Don't worry, it'll get toned down in the final product.

But what if I want to build one myself?

Big fan of open source, so the designs + source code will be free for all in the end. You can just wait it out and build off of that! Link it to your domotica system, make it smarter, make it interact with your smartphone, sky's not even the limit anymore - launch it into space, see how hot it is there
column4:
)

Maybe grab a shirt from the perks to keep you warm while waiting?

But what if you don't make the funding goal? What will become of my money?

That depends on your perk. Because every MONEO is hand built and doesn't require bulk ordering of parts, if you bought one, you'll most likely still get one. If only a few get ordered, it'll get a little rough to buy the parts since indiegogo will keep 9% when the funding goal isn't reached instead of the usual 4%. But I'll get in touch with everyone in that case to determine the best course of action.

You can help avoiding this scenario by letting everyone you know hear about MONEO, be it through social media or at parties!

If you ordered a t-shirt, you get one without delay. If you donated, it'll still be used for developing more projects like MONEO, and will still be appreciated just as much!


Have any more 'but why's? Please let me know, I'll add them!

column1:
No journey is without risks, and this one is not exempt from that rule. Even though the basic science behind the concept has been proven (it'd suck if I'd built the MONEO just to find it won't work), there are still hurdles to overtake.

Battery life

The MONEO will work on AA batteries, stored in the bottom. It will have a hardware on/off switch, and will use no power (not even 'standby' power) when off. Screen estate will be minimal
column2:
nice to use but not Ultra Mega Full HD Extra Plus. Because the hardware will be designed to have any fluff removed, it'll be efficient. Tests will be done and shared. I expect 6 to 12 months battery life, based on experience and depending on the final parts. When they are known I'll publish the math behind it.

Different pans different temperature offsets

Pans are not identical
column3:
some are thicker, some wider, different alloys, etc. This results in different outside temperatures related to inside temperatures. MONEO will use a default, but is also able to be calibrated. Just pour water in a pan, let MONEO know you've begun heating it, then press a button when it's boiling et voila - calibrated. This process will be fine tuned as more tests are being done.

?

When new issues arise, be it in my mind or during development, I'll let you know. If you got issues to report yourself, please do share!

column1: Buying a perk is of course a great way to show your support (and perhaps get something out of it for yourself!). There are however other ways you can help
column2: • Promote MONEO on Facebook/Twitter/Google+/your favorite pub/your local hackerspace/friends/family/you name it! The more support the better :)

column1: • I'm currently doing all the 3D designing myself, and while my skills are proficient and rising, having a pro on board will always result in better builds. So if you feel like you can do a better job designing MONEO, or have experience with converting designs to 3D printable objects, please hop aboard!
• If there's any other aspect you think you can help with, great :) Let me know!

Network Listen~ Once Upon a Time...

What happens when broadcasters love books and want to help the printed word thrive? Network Listen is born! We are a band of skilled professionals, capable and able to redefine radio to meet your enjoyment and literary needs while saving you time and hassle. We are ready to merge the worlds of radio and reading~ are you ready to Listen In?

This campaign will allow us to assemble all the components of equipment, hardware, and software needed to build and launch Network Listen. It's first live phase will be a limited six to eight hour daily broadcast for up to three months to allow us to build the sponsors and partnerships needed to launch officially. All perks are honored throughout both the initial phase and the official launch. 

Network Listen has the potential to wrap the world around a new way of reading that embraces the tradition of storytelling through cutting edge platforms and programs that in turn will create a library that could literally be endless. All without the listener having to turn a single page! The societal impact is huge, the personal ease is tremendous, the process is fun. smooth and surprisingly simple and refreshing. And best of all, your contribution makes it happen!
column20:
bolts of building a Network~

As mentioned above, this campaign is to raise the funds to acquire the equipment needed to bring Network Listen to life. We would happily accept any item listed below if you had an extra hanging around the house. Network Listen has assembled some great perks as incentives to contributing. We would happily translate the value of any goods donated so that you would receive the perk and a generous heartfelt smile!

Oh- those perks, why, they get you on the radio...

Any funds received over the goal will go toward a working budget for production to help Network Listen go live. 

Some of the items we hope to obtain are as follows:

column1: • Broadcaster
• Encoder
• Desktop Computer with windows operating system
• Multi-Channel Mixing/Sound board
• Audio MiDi Interface
• Portable two mic balancer
• Adobe Audtion
• Adobe Premiere
• Headphones
• Microphones
• Stands: desk top, articulating
<li>Filters &amp
<li>Cables &amp

column3:
/>

What will happen if we truly are given the chance to turn every page?

The world will change. There is no other way to put it. Individual lives will be enriched simultaneously and the impact will circle the globe in positive ways. All from the point of view of literary pursuits, which tend to be the first to be left off the daily to do lists in this busy society, yet, are truly starting points or blueprints for heightened well-informed human behavior. Not to mention entertainment, enjoyment, and a very good chance of daily laughter and thought!

Yes, that paragraph is lofty, though we believe we can make that happen. We have come from a world where people rarely believe you can build something out of nothing. Luckily we are trained and have produced results that do just that. We can, and will, corral the airwaves and direct them to you rich with text full of life in manageable enjoyable doses. 

We can do this, because we believe in it. We have the skills to do it, because there was no avoiding possessing them to achieve our vision. Help us and we'll show you how this magic can be real.

Short on cash but not on spirit?

We have all been there, loved an idea and wanted to support it, yet our budget simply is not in line with our generous spirit. Don't worry, there are still many ways you can help Network Listen come to life:

column1: • Help make our Campaign Radio Active by talking about it, sharing it, posting it, linking it- whatever way you can think of to get the word out, we're in! There are even Indiegogo share tools for you to use.
• Know someone with a business or an organization that may want to be part of our trial phase and receive some free advertising? Point them our way!
• Have a great voice and want to get some practice in? Volunteer to read and build our interactive library.
• Are you, or do you know a Copyright Lawyer wanting to help a budding enterprise for free? Send yourself or them our way.

Thank you, truly, your contributions through funds, spirit, and encouragement mean the world to us.

","Network Listen~ Once Upon a Time...What happens when broadcasters love books and want to help the printed word thrive? Network Listen is born! We are a band of skilled professionals, capable and able to redefine radio to meet your enjoyment and literary needs while saving you time and hassle. We are ready to merge the worlds of radio and reading~ are you ready to Listen In?This campaign will allow us to assemble all the components of equipment, hardware, and software needed to build and launch Network Listen. It's first live phase will be a limited six to eight hour daily broadcast for up to three months to allow us to build the sponsors and partnerships needed to launch officially. All perks are honored throughout both the initial phase and the official launch. Network Listen has the potential to wrap the world around a new way of reading that embraces the tradition of storytelling through cutting edge platforms and programs that in turn will create a library that could literally be endless. All without the listener having to turn a single page! The societal impact is huge, the personal ease is tremendous, the process is fun. smooth and surprisingly simple and refreshing. And best of all, your contribution makes it happen!                                      The nuts & bolts of building a Network~As mentioned above, this campaign is to raise the funds to acquire the equipment needed to bring Network Listen to life. column5: A Pinch of Rhyme
column6: > -- a great gift for foodies and literature lovers alike -- is a vegetarian cookbook in haiku and sonnets. Quite possibly, it is the most
column8: > book of poems you will ever encounter. Poet Stephen Cramer invites you to savor the elderberry syrup of The Elixir of Life cocktail or let your mouth water around the vowels of his Truly Unruly Tabouli.  Whether you're looking for breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks, desserts, or drinks, this quick-witted cookbook is for you. Or your best friend. Or your host. Or that hard-to-shop-for person on your holiday list who delights in all things quirky and clever. ","A Little Thyme & A Pinch of Rhyme -- a great gift for foodies and literature lovers alike -- is a vegetarian cookbook in haiku and sonnets. Quite possibly, it is the most delicious book of poems you will ever encounter. Poet Stephen Cramer invites you to savor the elderberry syrup of The Elixir of Life cocktail or let your mouth water around the vowels of his Truly Unruly Tabouli.  Whether you're looking for breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks, desserts, or drinks, this quick-witted cookbook is for you. Or your best friend. Or your host. Or that hard-to-shop-for person on your holiday list who delights in all things quirky and clever. Twelve full-color illustrations by widely-published food photographer Ken Burris make A Little Thyme... a pleasure to peruse.
Please check out the gallery of six images from the book by clicking ""gallery"" above!

Stephen Cramer has written a number of poetry books, including From the Hip: A Concise History of Hip Hop (in sonnets), so he is no stranger to using poetry as a language to explore the sensory world. But A Little Thyme & A Pinch of Rhyme  is a new type of project for him. ""Usually I just have to pay attention to sound and meaning when I write,"" Cramer says. ""But in this book, I've had to pay attention to sound, and meaning, and TASTE."" We think you'll agree that all of Cramer's attentions have paid off -- especially when you try his Cauliflower Bowl with Dragon Sauce or his July 4th Cherry Pie.
Voices of Vermont Publishing Group (VoV) is an
independent, non-profit, literary publishing house
committed to supporting
the literary development of Vermont's established and emergent authors. VoV provides
stewardship and a publishing platform unique to the state’s scale and literary
culture, and it looks to publish material that would often be overlooked by more
mainstream publishers.

Here's what we're doing differently: We're treating publishing like the local foods movement. We're trying to build books AND relationships -- between writers, readers, independent booksellers, book producers, and patrons of the literary arts. We want to keep the human beings front and center in our endeavors. Our goal is to nurture the public benefit associated with a community-supported arts model. To that end, publication of our titles is made possible through seeking underwriting support from community members, patrons of the literary arts, and people like you who believe in the transformative power of a tight-knit, supportive, literature-loving community!
As a contributor to this campaign, you join our team.

We are looking to help cover basic production costs like editing, graphic design, illustration, layout, and uploading fees. Any additional funds raised beyond our goal will go to help market the book in our local area and beyond! Help us reach our goal to produce A Little Thyme & A Pinch of Rhyme this fall!
If you're unable to contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help. You can also help by getting the word out and making noise about the campaign.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Burlington, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/a-little-thyme-a-pinch-of-rhyme/pica

Finally, an easy way to put up a Christmas tree!
A Christmas tree stand has two jobs: keep your tree upright and hold water for the tree to stay fresh.
Why do other Christmas tree stands make it so infuriatingly difficult get those two jobs done?

I embarked on this quest to solve the problem of terrible Christmas tree stands in 2012 after an awful experience that turned out to be the last straw. I had a few simple requirements from the Christmas tree stand I would accept: One-step tree install, a water basin that is easy to check and refill, and fast removal. And, of course, do all this while being safe and without costing a stupid amount of money.
Meet the Eazy Treezy
Christmas Simplified.

During my research, I asked as many people as I could about their least favorite part about Christmas. So many told me it was putting up their Christmas tree. They hated it. Many said they stopped buying real trees just to avoid that hassle. I searched everywhere for a solution and all I could find were different variations of the same concept that didn’t work or something that was pretty good, but very expensive. There had to be a better way. So I decided to develop my own
column2: one that was affordable and did everything I needed it to…easily.

column1: Features
<ul>
• Easy Drop-in Set-up: Lift. Drop. Done. One person, a few seconds, easy as that.
• Easy Check-and-Fill water basin: Simple to see the water level with plenty of room to add more water without spills.
• Easy Push-and-Lift Tree Removal: Push down a few jaws and lift out the tree. Bye-bye.
• Easy Assembly: Drop each jaw into a slot, loop the tension bands around the hooks, and you’re set to go.

• Safe and Stable Base: The large 22 inch diameter base makes for solid foundation to resist falling over and the base includes mounting holes to easily screw it onto a sheet of plywood for extra security.
• Wide range of sizes: Trees from 4 feet to 10 feet tall or more (trunk diameters from 2.5"" to 5.25"") will safely fit and stay upright
• USA Made: From the injection mold tooling to the final product, everything about the Eazy Treezy was designed and manufactured in America.
Here's how and why it works
It’s all in the jaws.

Ditch the screws, we all know they’re awful. They take forever to adjust, you have to lay on the ground, someone else has to hold the tree, and in the end it’s never quite right. The Eazy Treezy is designed so that the weight of the tree opens the jaws effortlessly, but once in, the tension bands and angle of the sliding jaws squeeze the tree on five sides holding it straight up. And because of the large contact patch on each jaw surface, it does this without digging into and weakening the tree.
What about the water?

If you want a green, fresh smelling tree for the entire Christmas season, your tree needs water…lots of it. If it’s so important, then why is it so hard to add water to tree stands? And equally as tough to even know when your water level is low? Our spout is the answer. The water basin juts out to nearly the edge of the base, down low where it’s easy to see the water level and easy to reach and refill. No guessing, no crawling, no spills, and no more dry, smelly trees.
Flexibility

The Eazy Treezy accommodates trees from 4 feet tall to 10+ feet (with trunk diameters from 2.5 inches to 5.5 inches) and it does this automatically. The jaws self-center the trunk and self-adjust to any diameter. Even crooked trunks or branch stumps aren’t a problem because each jaw slides independently.
Drop in, Lift out.
Removal is just as easy as set-up. Just push down on a few of the jaws (it only takes a few pounds of pressure) and lift the tree off the spikes and out. Less hassle, less mess.
Safety and Stability

The Eazy Treezy is designed with a wide 22 inch diameter base with three galvanized steel spikes molded into the bottom. The wide base even features additional screw holes for attachment to a piece of plywood for an even wider foundation. The steel spikes provide three points of contact, not just one, at the bottom of the tree to anchor it to the base and the galvanized coating will keep them from rusting for years on end.
The Approach – Engineered to be easy

I'm Ryan. I’m a mechanical engineer, inventor, and MBA. I’ve designed and developed theme park attractions for some of the happiest places in the world, so I obsess about design quality and attention to detail in the final product. I've launched several products for employers in the past and I'm well prepared to bring this product to market. I’ve built and tested a dozen prototypes of this product, over years of development to create a tree stand that doesn’t just work and is safe, but is the best Christmas tree stand EVER!.
Prototype vs. Production Model

As you can see, the production version of the Eazy Treezy looks a little different from the functional prototype. Let me tell you what changed and why. The prototype was designed to be a functional 3D print, so some of the wall thicknesses had to be beefed up to make it strong enough. The prototype base also had to be made out of six parts (five radial segments and a water basin) in order to be printed. The production model is a single piece, injection molded base and integral water basin. It's stronger and requires less assembly. The function and the design of the proven jaw features and tension bands and how they slide in the base, remains the same. What you’ll get is a stronger, simpler, and even easier Eazy Treezy.
Made in the USA

The Eazy Treezy isn’t manufactured on the other side of the world. It’s made, with pride, here in the United States of America. In fact, our experienced manufacturer is only a few miles from our office in Southern California. This means better oversight and quality control and ultimately a product you can trust and be proud of.
The Right Stuff

The Eazy Treezy was not just designed, but engineered to be as strong and tough as it would need to be, but as low priced as possible. I selected the materials and designed and analyzed the structure with the purpose to be the best combination of low cost, strength, durability, and stability.
<ul>
• Tough, heavy wall, injection molded polypropylene base and jaws
• Durable rubber tension bands
• Galvanized steel spikes
Share the love
Invite your friends to make their Christmas merrier. Because easy = happy. Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, in-person, even use Indiegogo share tools on this page.
Risks and challenges

Thankfully, our manufacturing partners are only a few miles away from our office. Even though we've run into some unforeseen tooling delays, work is still moving forward. Our design has been tested for function and validated for manufacturing. Although the final product is outwardly different than the prototype in the video, the functional details on the inside have remained the same, so there’s no more time in development needed.
Here's the Deal

Launching a product isn't easy...and it's definitely not cheap. Tooling (the largest expense), legal fees, labels, packaging, marketing expenses, first production run, the list goes on. We funded most of the above ourselves, but with this campaign we want to fund out first production run.

column2: >Our funding goal is $5,000, which if reached will fund almost half of our first run. We'll move forward whether or not we reach our goal, but it's the surest way to fast track our production.
>Contributors will get first dibs on the earliest pieces off the line. Plus, for those interested a snazzy original design T-shirt

Short Summary
Mary &
column2: Jarvis has been launched to offer the exciting possibility to relieve you from your hassling household activities. We’ve got your chores, you’ve got your time.

column1: People in urban cities from young singles entering their professional career to families are stuck in a care crisis with time pressure being their major burden. Our hybrid service, taking from the best of human and digital technology answer such need via the regular visit of the same vetted personal home assistant (aka Majar) at the client’s home, executing the pre-ordered to-do chores and errands.
In 3 Clicks, you may order:
<ul>
<li>
Indoor care: we pamper your home - cleaning, ironing, laundry, shoe care
<li>
Essential delivery: we handle short distance pick up/ drop off service - Dry cleaning, Post, Recycling, Shopping
<li>
Holiday Relief: we take care of your home while away.
<li>
Miracle: On top, a handy home conciergerie is available for your spot demand to support you settling your home life and enjoying it.

We currently are 7 persons on this company and are every day growing. We have been selected into the early-stage accelerator program from Sharkr and cannot wait to deliver more value and comfort to our members.
<h3>What We Need &amp
We want via Indigogo to raise 20K€:
<ul>
• Those 20K€ will greatly help us fund the start of our mobile application development.
• We expect to raise 200K€ as a mix of crowdfunding and equity to fuel our growth.

• We have designed for you amazing perks where you can either have a flavor of the service we provide or if further away from the area we cover, items which resonate with our core values: sustainable care box in cooperation with Hydrophil, reducing water consumption kit, fair trade mexican pillows with Umale...
Our Values
Mary &
column2: Jarvis is a modern business and are proud to operate on strong sustainable values:

column1: <ul>
<li>

Ecological: we lean towards designing every our activities to be as impact-free ecologically speaking, either it is through products we use, process we put in place or providers we select. Let's do our fair share to protect mother earth!
<li>

Social: we connect two different worlds at the opposite of the standard of living scale: the persons wishing to alleviate their standard of living and the ones on their path to success but without compromising on functionality and esthetic. Let's put human as it should be, first!
<li>
Economical: we want to bring further businesses to our neighborhood shops, local talents and other initiatives. Let's our cities ever be lively and enjoyable!
That is what we believe, a modern business should do.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
<ul>
• Feel more than free to spread the word out, it can be at your HR department our in social media to relay our message
• Do not forget to use the Indiegogo share tools! :)
Thank you a lot for your support.
French Version, Version Française:
Résumé
Mary &
column2: Jarvis a été créée pour vous offrir la possibilité de vous soulager de vos activités ménagères fastidieuses.

column1: Les citadins, des jeunes célibataires entrant dans leurs carrières professionnelles, aux familles nombreuses, sont en prise avec une vie de plus en plus stressante. Le manque de temps disponible et pour soi est le facteur principal. Notre service se veut hybride et tire parti du meilleur de l’humain et du digital pour répondre à ce besoin. Il offre la visite du même assistant personnel de maison (Majar) chargé d’exécuter chez le client, l’ensemble de tâches ménagères et des courses logistiques pré commandées afin de soulager sa semaine déjà bien trop chargée.
En 3 clics, vous pouvez accéder aux activités de:
<ul>
• Entretien d’Intérieur: nous prenons soin de votre maison - nettoyage, entretien du linge, repassage et soin des chaussures.
• Livraison de vos Essentiels: nous prenons en charge le service de prise en charge et de dépose sur de courtes distances - pressing, poste, recyclage, shopping.
• Pour Soulagées votre retour de Vacances : nous prenons soin de votre maison pendant votre absence (arroser les plantes, nourrir le chat, désencombrer la boite aux lettres...)

• Miracle: En plus, une conciergerie pour service de maison est disponible pour vos demandes ponctuelles (plombier, peintre, montage de meuble, architecte d’intérieur…) afin de vous aider lors de votre installation dans votre nouvelle ville et à profiter de votre vie encore plus sereinement.

Nous sommes aujourd’hui 7 personnes composant cette entreprise et avançons chaque jour un peu plus vers nos objectifs. De plus, l’accélérateur Sharkr nous a sélectionné pour leur programme de développement jeunes pousses et nous avons hâte d'offrir plus d’avantages et de confort à nos membres.
Nos Besoins, Nos Offres pour Vous
Nous souhaitons lever 20K€ via la campagne d'Indiegogo.
<ul>
• Cette somme nous aidera principalement pour le développement de notre application.
• Nous nous attendons à lever 200K€ dans un mix de campagne collaborative et de vente de parts de notre entreprise pour accompagner notre croissance.

• Nous avons créé pour vous des « Offres » ou vous pouvez, soit avoir un avant goût de ce que notre service produit ou si vous résidez dans une région plus lointaine, des offres avec des produits représentant nos valeurs : par exemple notre offre de box responsable en coopération avec Hydrophil, un kit de réduction de la consomation d'eau d'Oopla ou notre offre d’un coussin issue du commerce équitable avec Umale.
Nos Valeurs
Mary &
column2: Jarvis est une entreprise se voulant moderne et est fière de représenter des valeurs responsables:

column1: <ul>

• Environnementale: nous nous attachons à concevoir nos activités de manière à ne pas nuire à l'environnement, que ce soit par le biais des produits que nous utilisons, des processus que nous mettons en place ou des fournisseurs que nous sélectionnons. Faisons notre part, protégeons notre unique planète!

• Sociale: nous connectons deux mondes différents à l'opposé de l'échelle sociale: Les personnes qui souhaitent améliorer leur niveau de vie et celles qui sont sur la voie du succès. toujours avec cette volonté d'offrir un service de qualité, c'est-à-dire sans compromettre son utilité fonctionnel et son sens esthétique. Mettons l'humain à sa place, au centre de l'entreprise!

• Economique: nous souhaitons amener davantage de business à nos entreprises et magasins de quartier, soutenir les talents locaux et autres initiatives. Préservons la diversité de nos centres villes, qu'ils soient toujours aussi vivants et agréables!
C’est ce que nous croyons qu’une entreprise moderne devrait faire.
Les Autres Façons de Nous Soutenir
Certaines personnes peuvent ne pas être capable de contribuer financièrement mais ça ne veut pas dire que vous ne pouvez pas nous soutenir :
<ul>
• N’hésitez pas à partager notre campagne et à parler de notre entreprise que ce soit sur les réseaux sociaux, au département RH de votre entreprise…
• N’oubliez pas d’utiliser les outils de partage d’Indiegogo.
Si vous souhaitez davantage d’information ou avez-des questions, cliquez sur notre FAQ
","Short Summary
Mary & Jarvis has been launched to offer the exciting possibility to relieve you from your hassling household activities. We’ve got your chores, you’ve got your time.

People in urban cities from young singles entering their professional career to families are stuck in a care crisis with time pressure being their major burden. Our hybrid service, taking from the best of human and digital technology answer such need via the regular visit of the same vetted personal home assistant (aka Majar) at the client’s home, executing the pre-ordered to-do chores and errands.
In 3 Clicks, you may order:
Indoor care: we pamper your home - cleaning, ironing, laundry, shoe care
Essential delivery: we handle short distance pick up/ drop off service - Dry cleaning, Post, Recycling, Shopping
Holiday Relief: we take care of your home while away.
Miracle: On top, a handy home conciergerie is available for your spot demand to support you settling your home life and enjoying it.

We currently are 7 persons on this company and are every day growing. We have been selected into the early-stage accelerator program from Sharkr and cannot wait to deliver more value and comfort to our members.
What We Need & What You Get
We want via Indigogo to raise 20K€:
Those 20K€ will greatly help us fund the start of our mobile application development.
We expect to raise 200K€ as a mix of crowdfunding and equity to fuel our growth.

We have designed for you amazing perks where you can either have a flavor of the service we provide or if further away from the area we cover, items which resonate with our core values: sustainable care box in cooperation with Hydrophil, reducing water consumption kit, fair trade mexican pillows with Umale...
Our Values
Mary & Jarvis is a modern business and are proud to operate on strong sustainable values:

Ecological: we lean towards designing every our activities to be as impact-free ecologically speaking, either it is through products we use, process we put in place or providers we select. Let's do our fair share to protect mother earth!

Social: we connect two different worlds at the opposite of the standard of living scale: the persons wishing to alleviate their standard of living and the ones on their path to success but without compromising on functionality and esthetic. Let's put human as it should be, first!
Economical: we want to bring further businesses to our neighborhood shops, local talents and other initiatives. Let's our cities ever be lively and enjoyable!
That is what we believe, a modern business should do.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
Feel more than free to spread the word out, it can be at your HR department our in social media to relay our message
Do not forget to use the Indiegogo share tools! :)
Thank you a lot for your support.

Résumé
Mary & Jarvis a été créée pour vous offrir la possibilité de vous soulager de vos activités ménagères fastidieuses.

Les citadins, des jeunes célibataires entrant dans leurs carrières professionnelles, aux familles nombreuses, sont en prise avec une vie de plus en plus stressante. Le manque de temps disponible et pour soi est le facteur principal. Notre service se veut hybride et tire parti du meilleur de l’humain et du digital pour répondre à ce besoin. Il offre la visite du même assistant personnel de maison (Majar) chargé d’exécuter chez le client, l’ensemble de tâches ménagères et des courses logistiques pré commandées afin de soulager sa semaine déjà bien trop chargée.
En 3 clics, vous pouvez accéder aux activités de:
Entretien d’Intérieur: nous prenons soin de votre maison - nettoyage, entretien du linge, repassage et soin des chaussures.
Livraison de vos Essentiels: nous prenons en charge le service de prise en charge et de dépose sur de courtes distances - pressing, poste, recyclage, shopping.
Pour Soulagées votre retour de Vacances : nous prenons soin de votre maison pendant votre absence (arroser les plantes, nourrir le chat, désencombrer la boite aux lettres...)

Miracle: En plus, une conciergerie pour service de maison est disponible pour vos demandes ponctuelles (plombier, peintre, montage de meuble, architecte d’intérieur…) afin de vous aider lors de votre installation dans votre nouvelle ville et à profiter de votre vie encore plus sereinement.

Nous sommes aujourd’hui 7 personnes composant cette entreprise et avançons chaque jour un peu plus vers nos objectifs. De plus, l’accélérateur Sharkr nous a sélectionné pour leur programme de développement jeunes pousses et nous avons hâte d'offrir plus d’avantages et de confort à nos membres.
Nos Besoins, Nos Offres pour Vous
Nous souhaitons lever 20K€ via la campagne d'Indiegogo.
Cette somme nous aidera principalement pour le développement de notre application.
Nous nous attendons à lever 200K€ dans un mix de campagne collaborative et de vente de parts de notre entreprise pour accompagner notre croissance.

Nous avons créé pour vous des « Offres » ou vous pouvez, soit avoir un avant goût de ce que notre service produit ou si vous résidez dans une région plus lointaine, des offres avec des produits représentant nos valeurs : par exemple notre offre de box responsable en coopération avec Hydrophil, un kit de réduction de la consomation d'eau d'Oopla ou notre offre d’un coussin issue du commerce équitable avec Umale.
Nos Valeurs
Mary & Jarvis est une entreprise se voulant moderne et est fière de représenter des valeurs responsables:

Environnementale: nous nous attachons à concevoir nos activités de manière à ne pas nuire à l'environnement, que ce soit par le biais des produits que nous utilisons, des processus que nous mettons en place ou des fournisseurs que nous sélectionnons. Faisons notre part, protégeons notre unique planète!

Sociale: nous connectons deux mondes différents à l'opposé de l'échelle sociale: Les personnes qui souhaitent améliorer leur niveau de vie et celles qui sont sur la voie du succès. toujours avec cette volonté d'offrir un service de qualité, c'est-à-dire sans compromettre son utilité fonctionnel et son sens esthétique. Mettons l'humain à sa place, au centre de l'entreprise!

Economique: nous souhaitons amener davantage de business à nos entreprises et magasins de quartier, soutenir les talents locaux et autres initiatives. Préservons la diversité de nos centres villes, qu'ils soient toujours aussi vivants et agréables!
C’est ce que nous croyons qu’une entreprise moderne devrait faire.
Les Autres Façons de Nous Soutenir
Certaines personnes peuvent ne pas être capable de contribuer financièrement mais ça ne veut pas dire que vous ne pouvez pas nous soutenir :
N’hésitez pas à partager notre campagne et à parler de notre entreprise que ce soit sur les réseaux sociaux, au département RH de votre entreprise…
N’oubliez pas d’utiliser les outils de partage d’Indiegogo.

column3:
>What you get with
your Wayzn pre-order
column7: >The team behind Wayzn, Inc.
column9:
>

We created Wayzn because we wanted our dogs to have access to the yard when we weren't home, but didn't want the security and installation costs and headaches that come with the traditional dog door. We loved the idea of using a smartphone to control our existing sliding doors because it would give us the flexibility to go anywhere, anytime. Now we simply get notified when our dogs want to go in or out, and after scanning the area we can open the door with a single click. We quickly discovered it could be useful when at home as well and developed an automatic mode so we never have to get off the couch.

Our dogs love it, and so do we!
column20:
>

We ship within the US and Canada. See reward details for shipping costs.
Prices exclude any local duties or sales tax.

 

We plan to ship batch 2 of the product by early December 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first products off the line plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

Here is the Deal!

We ride snowboards, and we love em, Most of us have more than one, and we are tired of changing our bindings to fit diffrent boards everytime we want to pick a deck from our quiver.  We dont have much money and we feel the snowboard industry as a whole is making products that only last one season which wastes money and material on cheap products.  We mainly do backcountry, but when in bounds we would love to use our Split-board bindings on other boards. They are bomber and the stoutest bindings made.
<div>
<h3>What We Need &amp

Right now we need your help! We have gone through the design and pat. process and we need to pre sell our units in order to get a mold made its real expensive but with your help we can chip away at the cost and get us all riding our quiver.  You get to ride the best and lightest snowboard bindings in the world on any board you choose, all while having the option to invest in or ride the same bindings on your split-board. You get the Ticket to Ride Whatever YOU LIKE!
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
Spread the word pass our clip on facebook, send this to a friend or share it in the lift line, or on snowboard and backcountry ski sites, our community is awesome and we would love your help.
All orders will be shipped

Why are we even here?!
Our organization has its roots in the pre-Roe days. In the early days, our
foremothers connected women with abortion services before it was
legal. After legalization, we naturally organized to protect access to abortion and contraception. We are one of radical roots
column2: and we are proud to carry on the legacy. But, really...<i style=""background-color: initial
column3: >Why are we still here?!

column1:
These same women and men (and now generations more) are still doing the work! Still rallying. Still speaking out. Still fighting to break down the barriers and protect access to abortion and contraception. 
And the best part?
We will never stop.
We will keep:
<ul>

• Mobilizing activists and volunteers to increase community awareness, healthcare access, and pro-active legislation
  • Monitoring reproductive choice-related bills and policy and holding our elected officials accountable for their votes and policies
• Exposing crisis pregnancy centers (CPCs or fake 'clinics') and their dangerous and manipulative tactics
Our work is critically important. And we can only do it with broad support from people like you.
<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
column8: > A small staff, dedicated volunteer board members, and community activists make it happen. With your support of this dedicated team we can:

column1: <ul>

• Host speakers, film screenings, discussions, and...of course...rallies!
  • Train community leaders, legislators, and volunteers to engage in the political process and advocate for reproductive justice
• Expose crisis pregnancy centers in Montana and protect women from their harmful tactics
• Change the public discourse on bodies, sexuality, and equality
<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
column8: >You can help in so many ways! And it really does take every one

column1: of us. Donate your time and talents. Share articles. Inform yourself
and your loved ones.
• Share this campaign with all of the people!
• Live in Montana? Volunteer your skills and passion with us!
• Get signed up for our Action Alerts to be up-to-date on all issues related to reproductive justice in Montana, including local events and legislation.
• Read our report The TRUTH Revealed on crisis pregnancy centers in Montana and help spread the word.

Thank you so much for your support and your activism!

Love and Liberty,

The NARAL Pro-Choice Montana Team

We will never stop.
We will keep:

Mobilizing activists and volunteers to increase community awareness, healthcare access, and pro-active legislation Monitoring reproductive choice-related bills and policy and holding our elected officials accountable for their votes and policies
Exposing crisis pregnancy centers (CPCs or fake 'clinics') and their dangerous and manipulative tactics
Our work is critically important. And we can only do it with broad support from people like you.   100% Grassroots
A small staff, dedicated volunteer board members, and community activists make it happen. With your support of this dedicated team we can:
Host speakers, film screenings, discussions, and...of course...rallies! Train community leaders, legislators, and volunteers to engage in the political process and advocate for reproductive justice
Expose crisis pregnancy centers in Montana and protect women from their harmful tactics
Change the public discourse on bodies, sexuality, and equality
But wait...there's more!
You can help in so many ways! And it really does take every one
of us. Donate your time and talents. Share articles. Inform yourself
and your loved ones.
Share this campaign with all of the people!
Live in Montana? Volunteer your skills and passion with us!
Get signed up for our Action Alerts to be up-to-date on all issues related to reproductive justice in Montana, including local events and legislation.
Read our report The TRUTH Revealed on crisis pregnancy centers in Montana and help spread the word.
Thank you so much for your support and your activism!Love and Liberty,The NARAL Pro-Choice Montana Team",1.0,0,"3 Campaigns
|","Helena, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/support-abortion-rights-in-montana/pica

At midnight Friday, a former tenant and career criminal, leaned a mattress soaked in accelerant against my best friend &
column2: godson's apartment building and set it on fire.  He intentionally placed the mattress below the five year old child's bedroom. EVERYONE IS

column1: OK, thanks to Stephanie being a superhero.
She was awake and got not
only her family and dogs out but the rest of the tenants as well. The
picture is of the damage to my godson's room. The fire went up that side of the building and over the roof.  The fact
that everyone is alive and well is a miracle. Being 4 hours away and broke is very
frustrating for  me.  They have been through so much
already before this.
Stephanie is one of the strongest women I know and I
am blessed to have her in my life.
Stephanie has been a sister to me for over 7 years now. There isn't anything I wouldn't do for her.

They need to rebuild a home. Since they are renters struggling to make it paycheck to paycheck like most of us are, their personal items were not insured and a lot of their belongings are gone or damaged. The security deposit will likely be tied up in the landlord's insurance procedures, causing the move to a new place nearly impossible for them. Hayden just started kindergarten, both his parents work, and the trauma of this tragedy is weighing heavily on the family. Her sister and nephew lived in the first floor apartment and are being displaced as well. Stephanie needs help financially in order to move on and rebuild their life. The family is currently at a hotel, and it may take at least 10 days to find a new roof to put over their heads. So, I am calling in all favors.

I'm not asking for crazy donations, but if every person I know donates $1, it would make a huge difference. Also, Hayden is a boy's size 6/7, if you have clothes or toys you'd like to donate, please contact me at denamventrudo@gmail.com.
I also ask that you all send love and positive mojo to them in this
stressful time.
Profoundly grateful,

Dena

column36: >Hi, I am YC, founder of LUBN.  We are enabling AI-driven property management.
column37: >It all began with my own problem. A few years ago, I was working in Microsoft, juggling between the work, being a father of two young kids, and managing my investment property.  As a father of two, I’d like to spend more time with my kids but ended up spending more time on my investment property. I wanted to gain my time back so we built LUBN.
column41: >We know real estate agents use lockboxes to temporarily manage property access.  These properties are often emptied and have no WiFi setup. With the limited technology and connectivity, based on the research, agents spend an average of 30% of their working hours on the chores at the house.
column42: >Our goal is to improve agents' or property managers' efficiency and enable contactless management through LTE/5G IoT, computer vision, and cloud computing.  We recently invited some real estate agents to pilot our solution.  We found that LUBN can potentially save at least 40% of the operation time on managing the rental property. By the above technology, we not only securely enabled remote access control but also brought more realtime data to the managers, such as visitor's photo verification and performance (e.g. delay, no show or overtime) which cannot be easily and securely achieved by the current Bluetooth or WiFi solutions on the market.
column46: >Our team is based in Seattle and Taiwan. We came from Microsoft, MediaTek, HTC, and Compass with deep knowledge in design, technology, and real estate. Our software was accomplished by our female co-founder, Autumn, and Lead Software Engineer, Nick.  The hardware was directed by the Lead Hardware Engineer, Minga.  Last but not the least, the LubnBox was designed by our Chief Design Officer, Ocean who was previously HTC Design Manager.
column47: >This is not an easy journey but we were very lucky to receive lots of help from many people. We are thankful for our manufacture in Taiwan to produce the premium quality LubnBox.  We are also thankful to Qualcomm, WeWork Labs, and mentors from Techstars for offering us great resources, support, network, and advice.
column51:
>We have stress-tested the product and worked extremely hard for full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment. Here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on-site during production.  In addition, we will test each device before we ship it to our fans.
column52: >FULFILLMENT: Sometimes strange thing happens that can’t be planned for. For example, a supplier misses a deadline or a shipment gets lost. These could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.
column54: T network which is one of the largest carriers in the US.  While the cellular network is widely deployed worldwide, there are still areas where signals can be weak or not available.  With weak signals, LubnBox may not be able to send Check-in Photos.  With no signals, LubnBox will enter offline mode and notifications will be turned off.
column57: >We are looking for users who need to remotely manage properties and to be more efficient at running the business.  We are also exploring new use cases that can be benefited by LUBN.  We welcome business owners to directly talk to us about a potential partnership.  We love to connect our APIs with your system so you can leverage the superpower of LubnBox.

column1: 1. Map View: Managers can navigate properties on the map view.2. Check-in Photo: A photo is captured and sent to the Managers as soon as the visitor gets the key or LubnBox has tampered.3. Analytics: Overtime, LUBN collects the data and visualizes them to help Managers identify opportunities for improvement. 4. Property List: All of the properties are listed with the status of the linked LubnBox, including the battery status.5. Timeline View: Both LubnBox and visitors' status can be seen in this view.  Managers can perform remote key releases from here.  The visitors' status includes Checked-in, Checked-out, Delay, Overtime, and No Show.6. Master QR Code: Admin and Managers can use the Master QR Code to release the shackle or Key Mag.  For better security, the Master QR Code is dynamic so screenshots will not work. 7. Adding Delegate Managers: Add delegate managers here so they can help the Admin coordinate the visits.8. Contacts: Keep frequent contacts here to schedule the next visit faster.9. New Visit: Schedule a new visit is so easy.  Just enter the phone numbers and the check-in/out time.  Your visitor will receive an SMS for the Trip Itinerary immediately.  Coming soon: Schedule Visits With Google Calendar / Check-in Photo Face Identification With Profile                                            Award STORYHi, I am YC, founder of LUBN.  We are enabling AI-driven property management.  It all began with my own problem. A few years ago, I was working in Microsoft, juggling between the work, being a father of two young kids, and managing my investment property.  As a father of two, I’d like to spend more time with my kids but ended up spending more time on my investment property. I wanted to gain my time back so we built LUBN. GOALWe know real estate agents use lockboxes to temporarily manage property access.  These properties are often emptied and have no WiFi setup. With the limited technology and connectivity, based on the research, agents spend an average of 30% of their working hours on the chores at the house.Our goal is to improve agents' or property managers' efficiency and enable contactless management through LTE/5G IoT, computer vision, and cloud computing.  We recently invited some real estate agents to pilot our solution.  We found that LUBN can potentially save at least 40% of the operation time on managing the rental property. By the above technology, we not only securely enabled remote access control but also brought more realtime data to the managers, such as visitor's photo verification and performance (e.g. delay, no show or overtime) which cannot be easily and securely achieved by the current Bluetooth or WiFi solutions on the market. TEAMOur team is based in Seattle and Taiwan. We came from Microsoft, MediaTek, HTC, and Compass with deep knowledge in design, technology, and real estate. Our software was accomplished by our female co-founder, Autumn, and Lead Software Engineer, Nick.  The hardware was directed by the Lead Hardware Engineer, Minga.  Last but not the least, the LubnBox was designed by our Chief Design Officer, Ocean who was previously HTC Design Manager. This is not an easy journey but we were very lucky to receive lots of help from many people. We are thankful for our manufacture in Taiwan to produce the premium quality LubnBox.  We are also thankful to Qualcomm, WeWork Labs, and mentors from Techstars for offering us great resources, support, network, and advice.   RISK & CHALLENGESWe have stress-tested the product and worked extremely hard for full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment. Here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on-site during production.  In addition, we will test each device before we ship it to our fans.FULFILLMENT: Sometimes strange thing happens that can’t be planned for. For example, a supplier misses a deadline or a shipment gets lost. These could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.PRODUCT: LubnBox connects to AT&T network which is one of the largest carriers in the US.  While the cellular network is widely deployed worldwide, there are still areas where signals can be weak or not available.  With weak signals, LubnBox may not be able to send Check-in Photos.  With no signals, LubnBox will enter offline mode and notifications will be turned off.  WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FORWe are looking for users who need to remotely manage properties and to be more efficient at running the business.  We are also exploring new use cases that can be benefited by LUBN.  We welcome business owners to directly talk to us about a potential partnership.  We love to connect our APIs with your system so you can leverage the superpower of LubnBox.",67.0,1,"1 Campaign
|","Seattle, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/lubn-manage-rental-remotely-smart-camera-key-box/pica

Ika’s non-fixed seat not only allows kids to move, but encourages constant rocking and bouncing. This has been proven to act calmingly &
column2: help with concentration. Ika is fun, but what’s even more important, it supports kids when they need a little boost or a moment to enjoy some playful fidgeting.
column6: '> fabric seat is fun and charming. It hugs kids and offers mild deep-pressure soothing which boosts serotonin levels and helps with stress. What’s more, if the child feels overwhelmed, he can pull up the cocoon and partly isolate himself, hoodie style.

column1: Children’s interaction with the environment is directly connected to their growth &
column2:
learning. Physical movement and good sensory integration are crucial for kids' development and well being. As real learning always involves patterns of physical activity, sensory rich spaces work as a food for the brain. Why should sitting have to be boring?


 

Learning, thinking, creativity and intelligence are not only processes that take place in the brain, but our entire body. Kids are sensory intelligent when they’re effectively filtering and processing internal and external stimuli.

But, they differ in their ability to do that. One child may have difficulty sitting still during group time, while another may move little during free play outside. They react in different ways because each child integrates the information obtained through their senses differently. (Stacy D. Thompson and Jill M. Raisor) 

Ika &
column3:
Mia chairs are designed to be inclusive and to support sensory intelligence of all children, respecting their differences.


 


Developing the products, we made sure to consider all of
the principles we find important, such as:
 


Using natural &
column4:
hi-tech materials
Solid ash wood, 3D mesh fabric, aluminum

Testing &
column6:
FSC certificates for solid wood
EU tests for strength, durability, safety and stability

Setting up an eco-friendly production
Minimal production waste
Completely recyclable
Made from sustainable materials
Long lasting value

Following contemporary design aesthetics
Precise technology &
column7:
manual finishing of the final product
 


 


 


 




 


 

 

 

We tried to answer all the usual stuff you ask us about. If there's something else you want to know, or you just want to say hello - use the Indiegogo comments for fastest response. Email, Instagram, Facebook and saying it out loud might also work. :)

​1. Are you a manufacturer? 
Officially, yes. But no. Tink Things is a brand owned by our family studio Benussi&
column8: theFish. For the chairs we have a partnership with two great manufacturing companies based in Croatia &amp
column9:
Slovenia.

2. Will I definitely receive the chairs if I purchase on Indiegogo?
Absolutely. The chairs have already been perfectioned with prototyping, tested &
column10:
certified and their production process is all set. It's only a matter of time now (and, cough cough, money). You can check the timeline above. We will keep you updated on your product shipment because precise ship dates may vary.

3. Do I pay anything else other than the shipping?
VAT and GST charges are included in the perk prices for European Union, so if you're here you don't pay anything else. For USA, Canada and the rest of the world, you may be charged customs duties and taxes depending on the country. From what we know, it shouldn't be applicable for the range of the prices of our chairs, but please double check it. 

4. Why are you crowdfunding?
We are a small family business determined to grow the idea of sensory furniture all by ourselves. It is a bit crazy, but there's no turning back now. :) So, we decided to use a crowdfunding platform to accelerate the production of the first batch, so we can continue working on new stuff.

5. Will it be possible to buy the chairs after the Indiegogo campaign and for how much?
Yes. We plan to continue selling them full priced through our webshop and some physical shops too. We will not be able to offer discounts so big anymore, tho.

6. Will there be updates to the chairs in the future? New products?
Yassss! We can't wait to continue working on new stuff. We are planning the desk and one more secret magical glittery product for the first part of 2019. The chairs will also be coming in different series and will probably have some additional items too.

What are the advantages of this patented system?

Why is GAPster a Must?
• Cars become bigger but in contrast, not their garages. It becomes a daily challenge to park the car without scratches or bumping items

• Modern distance sensors at the back and front of the car are unable to differentiate close distances. Within 10 inchs (25 cm) you hear a permanent alarm or see a red signal. A four walled garage can sometimes be overloaded with garden devices, bicycles and other items, its like you’re in blind-flight-modus trying to navigate between obstacles. You’ll also need every inch to open your door without scratch it and to walk out without getting stuck somewhere

• Even almost of the most modern distance sensors don't indicate distances to the left and right side of the car. If they do, then there’s the question of accuracy. Again, you’re in blind-flight-modus but GAPster gives you full control
• The majority of cars don't have distance sensors, in both front and back and the older ones don't have any at all

• Sometimes you think that you have mastered the distance in front but when you want to close the garage door you’ve discovered that the back of the car is sticking out. So you’ll have try it all over again
• GAPster doesn't need batteries and doesn't occupy any usable space in your garage as most available systems do
• GAPster is absolutely easy to install, without having to drill holes and will pilot you for many many years
• You can save costs and nerves for small money!
Parking made easy
column2:
>

So you think this is nothing really new? Yes you are right, we don't want to reinvent the wheel. We made it far more comfortable to install and to adjust to changing space problems in your garage. Additionally we created some really great designs to welcome you home.
column3:

Watch this film to see how GAPster is put together

column17: >GAPster – the System
column18:
/>

Small technical and design changes reserved


Your Perks

How many do you need? For business and/or at home?
We are offering a

column1:
variety of Perks which should cover all your needs. 

Please click here to send us the print file.

Who?

We are a team of creative heads and a good mix of entrepreneur, award winning inventor, designer, 3 D specialist, technician and last but not least our administrative guys. When starting with this campaign our WallCharger campaign at Indiegogo will be successfully finished.

We are bursting with good and innovative ideas and love to begin new and promising products that raise the money needed to bring OutPack to life (see below - Why You Should Back Us). It is also a second pillar to realize new projects/products on Indiegogo on a continuous basis and sell them later via the usual sales channels. Our main goal is to design products that benefit our daily lives.


Why you should back us
We started WallCharger and now GAPster in order to support OutPack, a
Self-Powered Portable Energy Supply for Disaster or Remote Areas and by
design powerful, mobile and a necessity in emergency situations/isolated
areas without access to the power grid. Why did we do this? Our company
name, TSS Solar GmbH indicates that we come from the Green Energy
business. In the last years we had to learn that it could be good to
also have a money generating business besides Green Energy because it

got a plaything of politics.

Where does GAPster come from?

Nothing special. Inventors routine:
Problem - meditating on a solution - approaches on a solution - prototyping - testing in practice - step by step optimizing (usability/technique &

At the beginning the problem was a cramped garage (a typical chaotic family garage) and a big car with a distance control. The distance control wasn't really a help because it started its continuous warning tone already at 12 inches (30 cm) before the first obstacle (bicycles, tires etc..) what isn't a great help if you don't have enough space. Not to mention the right side (..for UK the left:-)  where normally the lawn mower and some other bulky devices have its place. Research in internet wasn’t really successful as it brought up only space consuming and sometimes fragile mechanical devices or cheap electronic scrap. An own solution was required and also found by using a simple method, a ball on a rope. Sounds simple, but is not.

Drilling a hole in the ceiling? Difficult and not advisable for a variety of reasons (material of the ceiling, working over head and especially the effort for getting the damn hole into the ceiling). So the solution could only be something (...very light) you can permanently stick to the ceiling. And it should also reliably stick on the ceiling. Imagine you have sticked a somehow heavier device on the ceiling and it falls down onto your car. A terrible thought!

Adjusting the construction to changing situations? Don't underestimate your family. You will have to live with new spacing, sometimes on a daily basis. So an easy adjustable device is asked which works reliable over many years. Try to find a simple solution for this problem, you will be surprised how difficult this turns out to be. You will have to find a smooth running and thin rope (...quite expensive, also because you will need a long rope - the rope has to run up to the ceiling attachment device and from there back to the rope stopper), an easy to handle and light rope stopper (believe us, it's hard to find such a device and once you found it it will not be cheap) and an hollow rubber ball (why hollow? You have to drill a hole in it in order to fasten the rope). We are using a juggling ball because it ideally meets all the requirements. And again believe us, this ball is not a cheap one. If you should consider to buy a cheap and harder ball you will have to live from now on with an ugly and loud noise when hitting the ball with the windshield. You can't drill a hole into an pressurized ball (obviously) and also not into a softball (ball will come down some day or will be ruptured).

Final conclusion: Don't try to install your own solution. It will be more expensive than a GAPster and you will waste a lot of time and nerves! 


FAQ's
