","What are the advantages of this patented system?Why is GAPster a Must?
Cars become bigger but in contrast, not their garages. It becomes a daily challenge to park the car without scratches or bumping items

Modern distance sensors at the back and front of the car are unable to differentiate close distances. Within 10 inchs (25 cm) you hear a permanent alarm or see a red signal. A four walled garage can sometimes be overloaded with garden devices, bicycles and other items, its like you’re in blind-flight-modus trying to navigate between obstacles. You’ll also need every inch to open your door without scratch it and to walk out without getting stuck somewhere

Even almost of the most modern distance sensors don't indicate distances to the left and right side of the car. If they do, then there’s the question of accuracy. Again, you’re in blind-flight-modus but GAPster gives you full control
The majority of cars don't have distance sensors, in both front and back and the older ones don't have any at all

Sometimes you think that you have mastered the distance in front but when you want to close the garage door you’ve discovered that the back of the car is sticking out. So you’ll have try it all over again
GAPster doesn't need batteries and doesn't occupy any usable space in your garage as most available systems do
GAPster is absolutely easy to install, without having to drill holes and will pilot you for many many years
You can save costs and nerves for small money!

Parking made easySo you think this is nothing really new? Yes you are right, we don't want to reinvent the wheel. We made it far more comfortable to install and to adjust to changing space problems in your garage. Additionally we created some really great designs to welcome you home.How does GAPster work?Watch this film to see how GAPster is put togetherWatch the film to see how GAPster is easily installedWhen GAPster is positioned and installed, aim for the bumper ball by using the provided colored dot …… and you'll always be parked exactly in your desired areaGAPster – the SystemSmall technical and design changes reservedYour PerksHow many do you need? For business and/or at home? We are offering a
variety of Perks which should cover all your needs. Please click here to send us the print file.Who?

We are a team of creative heads and a good mix of entrepreneur, award winning inventor, designer, 3 D specialist, technician and last but not least our administrative guys. When starting with this campaign our WallCharger campaign at Indiegogo will be successfully finished.

We are bursting with good and innovative ideas and love to begin new and promising products that raise the money needed to bring OutPack to life (see below - Why You Should Back Us). It is also a second pillar to realize new projects/products on Indiegogo on a continuous basis and sell them later via the usual sales channels. Our main goal is to design products that benefit our daily lives.Why you should back us
We started WallCharger and now GAPster in order to support OutPack, a
Self-Powered Portable Energy Supply for Disaster or Remote Areas and by
design powerful, mobile and a necessity in emergency situations/isolated
areas without access to the power grid. Why did we do this? Our company
name, TSS Solar GmbH indicates that we come from the Green Energy
business. In the last years we had to learn that it could be good to
also have a money generating business besides Green Energy because it
got a plaything of politics.Where does GAPster come from?Nothing special. Inventors routine:
Problem - meditating on a solution - approaches on a solution - prototyping - testing in practice - step by step optimizing (usability/technique & costs) - final product.

At the beginning the problem was a cramped garage (a typical chaotic family garage) and a big car with a distance control. The distance control wasn't really a help because it started its continuous warning tone already at 12 inches (30 cm) before the first obstacle (bicycles, tires etc..) what isn't a great help if you don't have enough space. Not to mention the right side (..for UK the left:-)  where normally the lawn mower and some other bulky devices have its place. Research in internet wasn’t really successful as it brought up only space consuming and sometimes fragile mechanical devices or cheap electronic scrap. An own solution was required and also found by using a simple method, a ball on a rope. Sounds simple, but is not.

Drilling a hole in the ceiling? Difficult and not advisable for a variety of reasons (material of the ceiling, working over head and especially the effort for getting the damn hole into the ceiling). So the solution could only be something (...very light) you can permanently stick to the ceiling. And it should also reliably stick on the ceiling. Imagine you have sticked a somehow heavier device on the ceiling and it falls down onto your car. A terrible thought!

Adjusting the construction to changing situations? Don't underestimate your family. You will have to live with new spacing, sometimes on a daily basis. So an easy adjustable device is asked which works reliable over many years. Try to find a simple solution for this problem, you will be surprised how difficult this turns out to be. You will have to find a smooth running and thin rope (...quite expensive, also because you will need a long rope - the rope has to run up to the ceiling attachment device and from there back to the rope stopper), an easy to handle and light rope stopper (believe us, it's hard to find such a device and once you found it it will not be cheap) and an hollow rubber ball (why hollow? You have to drill a hole in it in order to fasten the rope). We are using a juggling ball because it ideally meets all the requirements. And again believe us, this ball is not a cheap one. If you should consider to buy a cheap and harder ball you will have to live from now on with an ugly and loud noise when hitting the ball with the windshield. You can't drill a hole into an pressurized ball (obviously) and also not into a softball (ball will come down some day or will be ruptured).
Final conclusion: Don't try to install your own solution. It will be more expensive than a GAPster and you will waste a lot of time and nerves! FAQ's

Because you are reading this, you are likely one of few in the world who understands the joy and connection that happens when pen meets paper. You know that the connection goes beyond what is physical, and extends to your inner thoughts, fears, dreams, and beyond. We are on the same page, which is why Ferris Wheel Press has one simple mission: to help everyone Fall in Love with Writing Again. We are so glad you've chosen to be a part of our mission! 

Following the successful introduction of our Brush Fountain Pen, we are now launching a collection of premium fountain pen inks that are the perfect desktop companion to any aspiring stationery lover. 

Ink deserves to be inspiring, from the moment you receive it, to when you draw it into your pen, it should remind you of the magic of writing.

So we created an inspiring set of fountain pen inks, carefully crafted in 3 distinct colours that will spur excitement, creativity, and a feeling of absolute joy every time you write!

Fall in Love with Writing Again with our suite of stationery products that are uniquely designed to speak to the hand, heart and mind.
column2: >Bluegrass Velvet and Tanzanite Sky
column3: >Collapsible and Re-usable Gift Box
column4:
>The journey from prototype to production

 

Want to do EVEN MORE to support the hand-written lifestyle? Pick up a set of our stationery inspired enamel pins so you can literally wear your heart on your sleeve!

column1:
To select your preferred ink and/or pen colours, you need to first select your backer reward level and complete your payment/contact details. 

When our campaign becomes fully funded (hooray!), we will be reaching out to each one of you at the end of the campaign for your preferred choices through a user-friendly survey. 

Our campaign needs to be fully backed/funded to move forward into production, so be sure to support us and share the news with your stationery loving friends to help us reach our funding goal! Write on!

Disclaimer: All images of ink bottles have been brightened for illustrative purposes only. The finished ink is darker in person.

The Evans Knife and Tool Companion!
<div>
<ul>
• CPM20CV
• 6"" Overall Length
• 2.75"" Cutting Edge
• 2.875"" Tip to Scales
• Handle choices: Black G10, Jade G10, Carbon Fiber
• HaleStorm Custom Kydex sheath in your choice of colors
• Complete with ball chain, ready to wear
• Completely made in the United States!
If you contribute by purchasing a ""perk,"" and the campaign is funded, you will get a knife.  No waiting lists, no maybes, you are guaranteed a knife on this run!
What previous owners are saying about the EK+T Companion:

herisson
....I finally get a necker that combines lightweight and cutting power. The ergonomic and handfilling handle allows for some real cutting work... at a necker weight.....That little big knife is sharper than a razor and so swift, watch them fingers!
slims_88
I always have a gripe about a knife, my biggest one with this, is it wasn't made sooner.
bloody_pawprint
It's a nice EDC because it's lightweight, slim, but every bit as capable as any of the other knives I carry, if not more. I usually carry three knives, and I found this one being my default ""go to"" when I needed to grab one. It's just comfortable, and sharp enough to cut anything I would put in front of it (I'll add I'm not a master sharpener by any means, but I keep my EDC knives pretty darn sharp). Out of the box, this one stands right up next to all the others I use. This knife is a user, and that's the way I like 'em. 
bretlacoe
This is a great knife! The quality is as good or better than what I'd expect from a high end production knife. I couldn't make up my mind so I got the G-10 and the carbon fiber scales - they both look great on the knife so you can't go wrong with either of them. I'm pretty picky when it comes to knife quality but I have nothing bad to say about this one. Get one while you can, you won't be disappointed!
My Warranty:
<div>
If it breaks I will repair or replace it at no cost, for as long as I'm making knives. **No matter what.** The guarantee follows the knife. If it has my signature on the blade, it's covered.

column2:
Challenges

I lost my Chinese manufacturer late last year, but still managed to sell around 200 knives between September and December.  It's not all bad though.  Now we get to make this amazing knife in the United States!  I don't foresee any issues getting these produced.  I have a manufacturer lined up and ready to roll!

column2:
>7 Reasons Decibite is the Simple Choice for Internet Entrepreneurs

1. Direct Support


You can have a good product, but if you have crappy customer service, you won't get far. We offer direct, technical, and proactive client support to solve your problems quickly and efficiently.

We speak your language. Our goal is to explain everything in a simple, non-technical manner.

Quick response time and staff trained to READ your ticket. No skimming for keywords and copy and pasting a ""solution"" from a document, we’ll take the time to listen and fully review your situation.

Glitchy issues on your website? We'll spend the time figuring out where the problem lies, even if it may not be from us. Whether the problem is from glitchy plugin installs or something on our end, we'll do the work for you.

Our goal is to give you the exact care, protection, and well-being, even if that means at times we lose money or have to admit making a mistake. 

We are going to constantly come up with solutions, innovations, improvements, and breakthroughs for you.

We are absolutely committed to enhancing the lives of our clients.

2. Simple

Our control panel is a simple interface, not bogged down with more options than you need.

column1:
Other hosts also assume the user has some knowledge of what they are doing.
Your goal is to create an amazing experience for your audience, not waste time learning to decipher web code from a Stanford engineer. Our goal is to make it so you don’t need to be a software PhD to start bringing what you are passionate about to the world.

We want everything so simple, you can point your mother to our services and she will instantly know what to do. Anything complicated will include ""Explain Like I Am 5"" tutorials, complete with definitions, detailed step-by-step walk-throughs, and beginner-level how-tos.
3. Security
You should expect web hosting that has ZERO hassle and is simple to use. There is NO fee to move or migrate your site.

We handle ALL maintenance, provide timely upgrades, and security fixes for you. No more headaches to worry about or anything to steal precious time away from you bringing your creative genius to the world.
And we take care of everything for you every step of the way, including a complementary site scrub to remove any viruses or malicious malware.
4. Speed

Faster load times mean better conversions. Better conversions means more money in the bank!

The moment your site moves to Decibite, you’ll experience our customized NGINX infrastructure which can handle more than 4x the traffic with a fraction of the resources.


How do we manage this?

We personally optimize every site to be as fast, secure, and reliable as possible. Even our Starter VPS plan can handle loads more effectively than poorly configured dedicated servers from other hosts.
5. Optimized
Whether you are looking to optimize your website for speed or for SEO purposes, we will provide you tips, tools, and guidance directly in your admin panel.
Starting a WordPress blog? You can go live with 7 simple steps.
Running an eCommerce store? We will help you get started in less than 5 minutes.
6. Privacy
Collecting money from a client? Capturing leads by email? Decibite helps prevent any personal information from getting into the wrong hands. Your privacy should NOT be a commodity.
7. Resource Monitoring
You have the freedom to know exactly what is going on and what you are paying for. There is nothing worse than having your site down and trying to get it back up.

If you want to prevent slow speeds or total site shut-down, you need to know about it immediately. Our monitoring tool gives you a clear picture of the resources you are using to know exactly what’s going on.
You will receive any notification when a server needs to reboot to help minimize site downtime. On top of that, you’ll receive email alerts letting as you approach your limit.
This also allows you to know you are getting great service at a very affordable price.
This is how our prices compare to the competition (prices in CAD, meaning US customers are 20% less):
Need room to scale and handle unexpected growth?

Not a problem. If you experience a traffic spike from the Reddit hug of death, the Product Hunt surge, or even a malicious DDoS attack, our monitoring system will alert our tech team to supply you with backup resources free of charge.
Additionally, with every purchase made, you will have a tree planted in your name.
Perhaps you don't really care about your carbon footprint. Our desire to do what is right and responsible, even if our clients may not fully be aware of the consequences.
In fact, every purchase made cleans up the carbon output of our clients and someone else not even using our service yet. We will deliver value to others, even before money has exchanged hands.
What Our Current Clients Are Saying About Us
<ol>
<div>

column7: >Mark Baker, CoFounder of BackerClub.co

column1: Before switching to Decibite, we regularly ran into arbitrary restrictions on our accounts and email systems without warning.
It was very frustrating to be punished for a website that was successful. Communication was poor and getting answers took way too long.
With Decibite, they personally handled our account and gave us exceptional response time and thorough help.
The difference has been night and day.
Peter G, Founder of TheAlterNation.net
As founder of AlterNation, I wanted a hosting company that could provide me a quality platform to build on.
I started with TMD Hosting, but was constantly getting complaints of slow load time on the forums. Customer service said everything was fine. Not even close!
I began looking for a new host and found Decibite.
Everything was migrated by their staff in a matter of minutes and never had another complaint about load time since.
The site is quick, stable, and if I have ideas I don't know how to implement, they figure it out for me.
Decibite is the first company I've ever felt there was a real relationship.
<span><div style=""text-align: center
column4:
/>
And if our services fail to meet your standards, you will receive 100% of your money-back within your first 100 days.

column1: <div>
<b style=""background-color: initial
column2: >Can you tell me more about each web hosting package?

column1: <div>
<div>
The simple answer
If you have a simple website with no intention of selling any products, choose shared web hosting.
If you invest in your site like you do your business or sell products online, we recommend the Starter VPS. As your needs grow, so does your service and security.
Curious to learn more?
Shared hosting would be the equivalent of a hostel.

Optimal for: Casual bloggers, new startups that have not launched, and personal websites with traffic up to 30,000 pageviews per month. Good place to start for most MySQL and PHP-based sites (technical jargon for certain types of websites).
Each resident is given their own place to stay with semi-private rooms.
Staff monitor and maintain common areas and equipment for safety and security.
Some web hosting companies can get greedy by overselling the space provided, especially if they don't account for surges of traffic.
What happens if I receive too many people visiting my site at one time?
Many hosts slow down your site or suspend your account entirely. Sometimes they won't even give you the courtesy of notifying you through email.
In the event you experience an unforeseen traffic spike, Decibite offers traffic surge protection to boost your resources to help you manage the sudden influx.
Should the traffic continue, the support team will work with you to find the best long term solution.
What are potential security concerns in a shared plan?
Guests are prevented from visiting your ""storage"" or ""sleeping areas.""
But malicious individuals can still attempt to con a user into allowing access to these private spaces.
While Decibite makes every effort to keep everything secure and isolated, nothing is a real substitute for a solid wall that you'll find with a VPS.
This is why those that have the budget often upgrade to a Starter VPS.
Not only is a VPS more secure, we can help you tune the settings specifically to your needs and run many of the latest web technologies.
A VPS server would be the equivalent of an apartment.
We created the VPS package for serious bloggers, Internet entrepreneurs, and growing startups in mind.
Serious bloggers and website owners: Up to 100,000 pageviews per month.
eCommerce websites: Up to 80,000 pageviews per month.
Professional bloggers and website owners: Up to 400,000 pageviews per month
eCommerce websites: Up to 320,000 pageviews per month
At this stage, you can expect more control, security, flexibility and greater reliability.
A place to call home. No more shared restrooms and laundry facilities!
You have complete control over anything inside your walls. With our configuration and maintenance included we can customize a system to your needs.
VPS hosts are closely monitored to maintain optimal resource usage so our private cloud is at peek performance.
Having your own system tuned precisely to your needs is a must have for anyone looking to monetize their project.
Every person's resources are fully partitioned out. So what happens in your VPS stays in your VPS.
Security guards don't need to worry as much about who belongs since there is a locking door at the front.
With the ability to add or remove security features at will, you get to choose what is necessary and what is a burden.
Though the ""guards"" are often able to spot who ""belongs"" and who doesn't, it isn't as secure as a VPS cluster or dedicated core processor.
With a cluster of systems, reliability and speed increases dramatically. This is done by leveraging the power of multiple VPS systems, each dedicated to specific tasks.
A VPS Cluster is like a mother-in-law chateau.
A mother-in-law that you both like and love of course :). With insulated floors and padded walls in between owners to keep things nice and quiet.
VPS Cluster traffic capacity
Bloggers and website owners: Up to 2,500,000 pageviews per month
eCommerce websites: Up to 2,000,000 pageviews per month
At this stage, it is very unlikely that you will be affected by anyone, even your neighbour.
By using a group of VPS servers dedicated to specific tasks, traffic congestion is rarely an issue.
At this stage, you would need a MASSIVE amount of people visiting your site at the same time in order to cause a problem. Like the population of a small country visiting at the same time, massive.
A VPS Cluster is great for resource-heavy websites, medium organizations, or owners that know website downtime = lost revenue.
A Dedicated Processor is like a fortified castle.
Dedicated Processor traffic capacity
Bloggers and website owners: Up to 7,500,000+ pageviews per month
eCommerce websites: Up to 6,000,000+ pageviews per month
At this point, you have solid concrete walls between you and your neighbours.
The likelihood of anyone affecting you is virtually nil.
Security at this point is very high. Like visiting royalty high.
If a neighbour were to do everything within their power to flood your system, you might notice lower water pressure.
And even if your neighbours were to be bombed by unethical hackers, you wouldn't even notice it.
A dedicated processor is great for larger organizations or those that desire quarantined security areas.

column5: >But we also believe it best to be fully transparent and accountable.

column1: 1. Expanding internationally - As we seek to serve our users in various parts of the world, we will need to setup servers in new countries.

Our team has been working internationally since 2004 and already have connections in secure countries. Additionally, with the funding we will receive, we will have the ability to scale much more efficiently.
2. Hiring quality technicians to maintain servers - Every company seeks top talent to fill their ranks with and finding those people can be difficult.
Our Chief Technology Officer has over 12 years experience in the field of Information Technology and knows many qualified people to help lead the company forward.

3. Software - There are always potential challenges whenever you are coding your own control system. Our Chief Information Officer has 10 years of programming experience and has connections to other freelance programmers to help double check his work.

","7 Reasons Decibite is the Simple Choice for Internet Entrepreneurs1. Direct SupportYou can have a good product, but if you have crappy customer service, you won't get far. We offer direct, technical, and proactive client support to solve your problems quickly and efficiently.We speak your language. Our goal is to explain everything in a simple, non-technical manner.Quick response time and staff trained to READ your ticket. No skimming for keywords and copy and pasting a ""solution"" from a document, we’ll take the time to listen and fully review your situation.Glitchy issues on your website? We'll spend the time figuring out where the problem lies, even if it may not be from us. Whether the problem is from glitchy plugin installs or something on our end, we'll do the work for you.Our goal is to give you the exact care, protection, and well-being, even if that means at times we lose money or have to admit making a mistake. We are going to constantly come up with solutions, innovations, improvements, and breakthroughs for you.We are absolutely committed to enhancing the lives of our clients.2. SimpleOur control panel is a simple interface, not bogged down with more options than you need.

Other hosts also assume the user has some knowledge of what they are doing.Your goal is to create an amazing experience for your audience, not waste time learning to decipher web code from a Stanford engineer. Our goal is to make it so you don’t need to be a software PhD to start bringing what you are passionate about to the world.We want everything so simple, you can point your mother to our services and she will instantly know what to do. Anything complicated will include ""Explain Like I Am 5"" tutorials, complete with definitions, detailed step-by-step walk-throughs, and beginner-level how-tos.
3. Security
You should expect web hosting that has ZERO hassle and is simple to use. There is NO fee to move or migrate your site.

We handle ALL maintenance, provide timely upgrades, and security fixes for you. No more headaches to worry about or anything to steal precious time away from you bringing your creative genius to the world.
And we take care of everything for you every step of the way, including a complementary site scrub to remove any viruses or malicious malware.
4. Speed

Faster load times mean better conversions. Better conversions means more money in the bank!The moment your site moves to Decibite, you’ll experience our customized NGINX infrastructure which can handle more than 4x the traffic with a fraction of the resources.How do we manage this?

We personally optimize every site to be as fast, secure, and reliable as possible. Even our Starter VPS plan can handle loads more effectively than poorly configured dedicated servers from other hosts.
5. Optimized
Whether you are looking to optimize your website for speed or for SEO purposes, we will provide you tips, tools, and guidance directly in your admin panel.
Starting a WordPress blog? You can go live with 7 simple steps.
Running an eCommerce store? We will help you get started in less than 5 minutes.
6. Privacy
Collecting money from a client? Capturing leads by email? Decibite helps prevent any personal information from getting into the wrong hands. Your privacy should NOT be a commodity.
7. Resource Monitoring
You have the freedom to know exactly what is going on and what you are paying for. There is nothing worse than having your site down and trying to get it back up.

If you want to prevent slow speeds or total site shut-down, you need to know about it immediately. Our monitoring tool gives you a clear picture of the resources you are using to know exactly what’s going on.
You will receive any notification when a server needs to reboot to help minimize site downtime. On top of that, you’ll receive email alerts letting as you approach your limit.
This also allows you to know you are getting great service at a very affordable price.
This is how our prices compare to the competition (prices in CAD, meaning US customers are 20% less):
Need room to scale and handle unexpected growth?

Not a problem. If you experience a traffic spike from the Reddit hug of death, the Product Hunt surge, or even a malicious DDoS attack, our monitoring system will alert our tech team to supply you with backup resources free of charge.
Additionally, with every purchase made, you will have a tree planted in your name.
Perhaps you don't really care about your carbon footprint. Our desire to do what is right and responsible, even if our clients may not fully be aware of the consequences.
In fact, every purchase made cleans up the carbon output of our clients and someone else not even using our service yet. We will deliver value to others, even before money has exchanged hands.
What Our Current Clients Are Saying About Us
Mark Baker, CoFounder of BackerClub.co
Before switching to Decibite, we regularly ran into arbitrary restrictions on our accounts and email systems without warning.
It was very frustrating to be punished for a website that was successful. Communication was poor and getting answers took way too long.
With Decibite, they personally handled our account and gave us exceptional response time and thorough help.
The difference has been night and day.
Peter G, Founder of TheAlterNation.net
As founder of AlterNation, I wanted a hosting company that could provide me a quality platform to build on.
I started with TMD Hosting, but was constantly getting complaints of slow load time on the forums. Customer service said everything was fine. Not even close!
I began looking for a new host and found Decibite.
Everything was migrated by their staff in a matter of minutes and never had another complaint about load time since.
The site is quick, stable, and if I have ideas I don't know how to implement, they figure it out for me.
Decibite is the first company I've ever felt there was a real relationship.
And if our services fail to meet your standards, you will receive 100% of your money-back within your first 100 days.
Can you tell me more about each web hosting package?
The simple answer
If you have a simple website with no intention of selling any products, choose shared web hosting.
If you invest in your site like you do your business or sell products online, we recommend the Starter VPS. As your needs grow, so does your service and security.
Curious to learn more?
Shared hosting would be the equivalent of a hostel.

Optimal for: Casual bloggers, new startups that have not launched, and personal websites with traffic up to 30,000 pageviews per month. Good place to start for most MySQL and PHP-based sites (technical jargon for certain types of websites).
Each resident is given their own place to stay with semi-private rooms.
Staff monitor and maintain common areas and equipment for safety and security.
Some web hosting companies can get greedy by overselling the space provided, especially if they don't account for surges of traffic.
What happens if I receive too many people visiting my site at one time?
Many hosts slow down your site or suspend your account entirely. Sometimes they won't even give you the courtesy of notifying you through email.
In the event you experience an unforeseen traffic spike, Decibite offers traffic surge protection to boost your resources to help you manage the sudden influx.
Should the traffic continue, the support team will work with you to find the best long term solution.
What are potential security concerns in a shared plan?
Guests are prevented from visiting your ""storage"" or ""sleeping areas.""
But malicious individuals can still attempt to con a user into allowing access to these private spaces.
While Decibite makes every effort to keep everything secure and isolated, nothing is a real substitute for a solid wall that you'll find with a VPS.
This is why those that have the budget often upgrade to a Starter VPS.
Not only is a VPS more secure, we can help you tune the settings specifically to your needs and run many of the latest web technologies.
A VPS server would be the equivalent of an apartment.
We created the VPS package for serious bloggers, Internet entrepreneurs, and growing startups in mind.
Starter VPS traffic capacity
Serious bloggers and website owners: Up to 100,000 pageviews per month.
eCommerce websites: Up to 80,000 pageviews per month.
Enhanced VPS traffic capacity
Professional bloggers and website owners: Up to 400,000 pageviews per month
eCommerce websites: Up to 320,000 pageviews per month
At this stage, you can expect more control, security, flexibility and greater reliability.
A place to call home. No more shared restrooms and laundry facilities!
You have complete control over anything inside your walls. With our configuration and maintenance included we can customize a system to your needs.
VPS hosts are closely monitored to maintain optimal resource usage so our private cloud is at peek performance.
Having your own system tuned precisely to your needs is a must have for anyone looking to monetize their project.
Every person's resources are fully partitioned out. So what happens in your VPS stays in your VPS.
Security guards don't need to worry as much about who belongs since there is a locking door at the front.
With the ability to add or remove security features at will, you get to choose what is necessary and what is a burden.
Though the ""guards"" are often able to spot who ""belongs"" and who doesn't, it isn't as secure as a VPS cluster or dedicated core processor.
With a cluster of systems, reliability and speed increases dramatically. This is done by leveraging the power of multiple VPS systems, each dedicated to specific tasks.
A VPS Cluster is like a mother-in-law chateau.
A mother-in-law that you both like and love of course :). With insulated floors and padded walls in between owners to keep things nice and quiet.
VPS Cluster traffic capacity
Bloggers and website owners: Up to 2,500,000 pageviews per month
eCommerce websites: Up to 2,000,000 pageviews per month
At this stage, it is very unlikely that you will be affected by anyone, even your neighbour.
By using a group of VPS servers dedicated to specific tasks, traffic congestion is rarely an issue.
At this stage, you would need a MASSIVE amount of people visiting your site at the same time in order to cause a problem. Like the population of a small country visiting at the same time, massive.
A VPS Cluster is great for resource-heavy websites, medium organizations, or owners that know website downtime = lost revenue.
A Dedicated Processor is like a fortified castle.
Dedicated Processor traffic capacity
Bloggers and website owners: Up to 7,500,000+ pageviews per month
eCommerce websites: Up to 6,000,000+ pageviews per month
At this point, you have solid concrete walls between you and your neighbours.
The likelihood of anyone affecting you is virtually nil.
Security at this point is very high. Like visiting royalty high.
If a neighbour were to do everything within their power to flood your system, you might notice lower water pressure.
And even if your neighbours were to be bombed by unethical hackers, you wouldn't even notice it.
A dedicated processor is great for larger organizations or those that desire quarantined security areas.
Hosting Specs
Shared Hosting
Diskspace: 10GBBandwidth: 200GB/MonthAdditional Diskspace: 1 Credit/500MBAdditional Bandwidth: 1 Credit/50GBResource Price: 20 CreditsMaintenance: 1 Credit/Month
Starter VPS Hosting
CPU: 1 Shared Core (Bursts to 2.6Ghz)Diskspace: 25GB DiskRam: 2GBBandwidth: 500GB/MonthResource Price: 38 CreditsMaintenance: 6 Credits/Month
Cluster VPS Hosting
CPU: 2 Shared Cores (Bursts to 5.2Ghz)Diskspace: 50GB DiskRam: 5GBBandwidth: 1TB/MonthResource Price: 70 CreditsMaintenance: 10 Credits/Month
Dedicated Processor
CPU: 1 Dedicated Core (100% utilization of 2.6 Ghz, or divisible into upto 10 Shared cores)
Diskspace: 150GBRam: 10GBBandwidth: 3TB/Month
Resource Price: 374 CreditsMaintenance: 20 Credits/Month
Additional VPS Resources
Additional CPU Core: 30 Credits/CoreAdditional Diskspace: 1 Credit/GBAdditional Ram: 10 Credits/GBAdditional Bandwidth: 1 Credit/100GB
Risks and challenges
We desire our 100-day, 100% money-back guarantee will alleviate any major concern you may have. But we also believe it best to be fully transparent and accountable.
1. Expanding internationally - As we seek to serve our users in various parts of the world, we will need to setup servers in new countries.

Our team has been working internationally since 2004 and already have connections in secure countries. Additionally, with the funding we will receive, we will have the ability to scale much more efficiently.
2. Hiring quality technicians to maintain servers - Every company seeks top talent to fill their ranks with and finding those people can be difficult.
Our Chief Technology Officer has over 12 years experience in the field of Information Technology and knows many qualified people to help lead the company forward.

3. Software - There are always potential challenges whenever you are coding your own control system. Our Chief Information Officer has 10 years of programming experience and has connections to other freelance programmers to help double check his work.",14.0,0,"1 Campaign

Redesign / Design Campaign:

Presently in a third iteration design phase for my already patented unit which you see pictured on the left and now the New Design pictured on the right which is being built.
See the old design at www.r2h2o.com
Through this process &
• Design a new unit with more features, lighter in weight, better maneuverability.
• Produce a better overall product for accessing water from remote locations.
<li>Be safely used for emergency and volunteer groups during disasters &amp
• Healthier, safer, and better tasting water than long term stored bottle water.
• Supply safe drinking water for camps, EMS training exercises, and outdoor events.
• For using and filtering stored rain water from your barrels.
• For pumping and filtering your well water after an earthquakes and power outages.
• Charging cell phones, powering radios, and running a laptop from the on board 12 volt power receptacle using an AC inverter.
• The unit will also be visually appealing.

Why I need your help

This design process is a full time job.
The drawings for the design and new patent submission need to be
completed as well as some assembly and manufacturing documents.
Now that this complete, you can see the new design which will also
be
pictured on the Postcard perks that all contributors will receive.

A thought about the Early Bird R2H2O Unit perk:

Having one of these units for emergencies, at your home or camp is a great idea but consider donating a unit to an Emergency
Preparedness Group, EMS, Fire Dept, Church, School, or Shelter. You will have

the opportunity at checkout to write in an alternate shipping address. Make sure you include a contact persons name and a phone number.

An invoice for your Early Bird R2H2O Unit will be
created at the time of shipment which can be used for a possible

tax deduction if your donation is going to a non-profit.           

A separate packing slip will accompany the unit to its destination.

A backwoods camping project:
This idea for a portable drinking water &amp
came from a personal back woods camping project with a few people
that required using a small creek to supply our water. The water in
the creek was tested and found to have E-coli present. The camp site
was a mile in from the main road and always bringing in water would
have been more unmanageable. After some thought I built a
crude unit and created my first unit. We had a Water Purification and
Pumping
Station. The water was retested after using our system and no E-coli was
present. Only then did I realize that this unit had some serious

potential and could be used for a larger population.

After showing it to some people, a few units were requested. Others
I spoke to wanted one as well, then another, and another. So I built
10 units out of a marine plastic material and decided on calling it
R2H2O for simplicity. The design was unique and patentable.
From feedback and my own experience, the original design is okay
for some applications but was a little tough moving it to more remote
locations and water sources
column2: down trails and through the woods.

column1: The new design has addressed these issues and some other good ideas

are already emerging.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, there is another way you can help:
• Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
• Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

column3:
>

Aura Air is IoT compatible and connects seamlessly with your other smart devices, so you can ask Alexa, and Google all sorts of questions about your home’s air status. Or tell your A/C to turn on when your home hits a humidity level. Or set your home to shut off the gas if high levels are detected.

column1: <div>

column2:
>

We've integrated BreezoMeter, so you can quickly and easily monitor outdoor air data and pollution levels. You can even get actionable recommendations based on the current pollution level.
column4:
>

Aura Air’s algorithms consider outdoor air quality, your geo-location, recent air patterns, and other variables to provide an accurate representation of your indoor air quality, trusted by scientists worldwide.
column5:
>

Fires and gas leaks have subtle but unique chemical characteristics  that Aura Air scans identifies and notifies you to address imminent dangers before they become a threat.
column7:
>

After detecting and analyzing your air’s properties, Aura Air purifies your air of harmful pollutants and toxins. A thorough in-depth cleaning of every square inch while maintaining the gentle homeostasis of a home’s balanced air.
column10:
>

Some symptoms of a poor air quality environment are so prevalent that we’ve all flocked to cures and treatments instead of addressing the root cause - toxic air environments.
column12:
>

According to the WHO (world health organization) 93% of children under the age of 15 breath dangerously polluted air.  The most dangerous pollutant for children is particular matter smaller than 2.5 µicrons (PM2.5). Indoor air pollution in homes that use polluting fuels for cooking, heating and lighting is especially dangerous to newborns and young children that spend most of there time on the ground where the concentrations of pollutants are the highest. Overall air pollution can causes asthma children cancer and effects cognitive abilities in young children. (1)

This study looked at the affect of wood-heating systems at residents and their affect on indoor air pollution. They found that these systems are a significant cause of indoor air pollution because they release particulate matter to the air (PM2.5 and P.M10)  which can cause asthma and cancer over long periods of exposure. The cleaning process of these systems (ash removal) is the most hazardous and releases the highest concentrations of particulate matter and also high concentrations of Cupper and Mangan. (2)

This study found that mothers that were exposed to air pollution in the month before the conception and afterward- their fetuses were more likely to have a birth defect associated to abdominal malformations. Other risks to fetuses as a result of air pollution include risk of premature birth and low birth weight. (3)

This study, conducted by NASA, looked at the ability of home plants to treated VOC’s (volatile organic compounds) in indoor environment. They found out that there are several plants, like dracaena and bromeliad plant, that can treat up to 12 different VOC’s such as acetone and toluene and improve the air quality inside residents. (4)

This study, conducted by the NIH, is trying to improve indoor air quality by using air purifiers in residents and in schools and by reducing allergies in school using special pest control strategies. The researches believe that improving the indoor air quality can help to students and adults with respiratory problems to feel better and that all students can achieve better grades at school when improving the indoor air quality. (5)

Air duct cleaning is a rising concern in terms of indoor air pollution.  In this article, the EPA recommends to inspect the air ducts for mold and dust, especially if there are people with allergies living in the house. If there is mold on the air ducts or there are people that suffer from allergies, it is recommended to clean the air ducts because they are another source of particulate matter. Otherwise there is no necessity to clean the air ducts.(6)

(1) http://www.naharnet.com/

(2) https://www.treehugger.com/

(3) https://www.treehugger.com/

(4) https://www.treehugger.com/green-home/

(5) https://newsinhealth.nih.gov/

(6) https://www.epa.gov/

Cotton Shower Pillow has a unique 4 in 1 multi-structure design along with organic properties that serves to provide you the optimal level of comfort and support. The front and back have distinct features that can help those who sleep in any position get the best sleep possible. 

Cotton Shower is made up of four separate inner pillows to create one uniform structure. The four inner pillows provide different types of support were designed to allow you to get the sleep you deserve. These separate structures minimize bunching of the pillows fillings after each wash.

The contouring edges, which are part of Cotton Shower Pillow's ergonomic design, gently support the shoulders and neck will help you maintain the most comfortable sleeping position.

With a different design for the front and back side, no matter what sleeping position you have, Cotton Shower Pillow will allow you to sleep deeply. Our pillow helps people who suffer from anxiety, ADHD, insomnia, and back pain.

32mm thin 100% polyester microfiber filler provides soft elasticity and prevents clumping during washing. The microfiber filling provides superior sleep comfort so that you’ll feel like you’re sleeping on a fluffy cloud.   


The best way to keep your pillow clean is to wash it. Pillows that are only cover-washable end up accumulating months or even years worth of sweat, dust, and bacteria. Cotton Shower Pillow is washable in its entirety so that you can always keep it sanitized and fresh. The 4 in 1 structure will prevent the filling from clumping after each wash.

The natural phytoncide oil scent will help you relax as you prepare for a good night’s rest.

99% of the impurities were removed by processing the fabric using white clay, which is also used in skin care products. This fabric, which is the result of years of research, has antibacterial capabilities which can help relieve symptoms of skin rash and atopy.

Open the zipper located on the side of the pillow to remove the microfiber and adjust the height of the pillow. This allows you to customize the height of Cotton Shower Pillow according to your personal preference.

 

 

 

Cotton Shower Pillow was developed after many trials and errors in order to improve the inconvenience of non-washable pillows We have studied various thickness and lengths of types of cotton to be optimized for washing, and tried various shapes and structures. As the development process continued, the developers became absorbed in finding a structural solution to correct incorrect sleeping posture. This is how Cotton Shower Pillow came to life. We will continue to research and develop better ideas so that the world can sleep better.

Risks and challenges

We currently have a mockup in preparation for mass production, and our prototypes have been rigorously tested by our engineering and manufacturing experts in order to create the best final product.

However, we are aware that Cotton Shower Pillow may face additional changes to meet manufacturing requirements. In addition to keeping our backers up to date, we will make sure any changes during production uphold our mission and meet your interests. We will also keep backers continuously informed of any updates or changes.

We truly believe that we will bring Cotton Shower Pillow to the masses, and we have networks and resources in hardware engineering, tooling, manufacturing, distribution, and certification to make this happen.

We are ready for any challenges that we may encounter on the way, and we promise our complete devotion to bringing Cotton Shower Pillow into production and to our backers on time. We promise complete transparency and we will communicate with our backers on a regular basis.

The front and back have distinct features that can help those who sleep in any position get the best sleep possible. Cotton Shower is made up of four separate inner pillows to create one uniform structure. The four inner pillows provide different types of support were designed to allow you to get the sleep you deserve. These separate structures minimize bunching of the pillows fillings after each wash.The contouring edges, which are part of Cotton Shower Pillow's ergonomic design, gently support the shoulders and neck will help you maintain the most comfortable sleeping position.With a different design for the front and back side, no matter what sleeping position you have, Cotton Shower Pillow will allow you to sleep deeply. Our pillow helps people who suffer from anxiety, ADHD, insomnia, and back pain.32mm thin 100% polyester microfiber filler provides soft elasticity and prevents clumping during washing. The microfiber filling provides superior sleep comfort so that you’ll feel like you’re sleeping on a fluffy cloud.   The best way to keep your pillow clean is to wash it. Pillows that are only cover-washable end up accumulating months or even years worth of sweat, dust, and bacteria. Cotton Shower Pillow is washable in its entirety so that you can always keep it sanitized and fresh. The 4 in 1 structure will prevent the filling from clumping after each wash.The natural phytoncide oil scent will help you relax as you prepare for a good night’s rest.99% of the impurities were removed by processing the fabric using white clay, which is also used in skin care products. This fabric, which is the result of years of research, has antibacterial capabilities which can help relieve symptoms of skin rash and atopy.Open the zipper located on the side of the pillow to remove the microfiber and adjust the height of the pillow. This allows you to customize the height of Cotton Shower Pillow according to your personal preference.   Cotton Shower Pillow was developed after many trials and errors in order to improve the inconvenience of non-washable pillows We have studied various thickness and lengths of types of cotton to be optimized for washing, and tried various shapes and structures. As the development process continued, the developers became absorbed in finding a structural solution to correct incorrect sleeping posture. This is how Cotton Shower Pillow came to life. We will continue to research and develop better ideas so that the world can sleep better.Risks and challengesWe currently have a mockup in preparation for mass production, and our prototypes have been rigorously tested by our engineering and manufacturing experts in order to create the best final product.However, we are aware that Cotton Shower Pillow may face additional changes to meet manufacturing requirements. In addition to keeping our backers up to date, we will make sure any changes during production uphold our mission and meet your interests. We will also keep backers continuously informed of any updates or changes.We truly believe that we will bring Cotton Shower Pillow to the masses, and we have networks and resources in hardware engineering, tooling, manufacturing, distribution, and certification to make this happen.We are ready for any challenges that we may encounter on the way, and we promise our complete devotion to bringing Cotton Shower Pillow into production and to our backers on time. We promise complete transparency and we will communicate with our backers on a regular basis.",82.0,0,"4 Campaigns
|","Newport Beach, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/cotton-shower-pillow-time-for-quality-sleep/pica

Hi :)

My name is Nimrod Simba Carmi, I live in Israel and work in IT.
I have always been interested in green energy. Specifically - Solar.
Why Solar? Because I live in a country where sunlight is still free, and we've got a whole lot of it.
In this project, I wish to build, and completely document, a home DIY Solar system, that can power your whole house, and can be built mostly from stuff you have lying around the house.
The guide is completely free, and always will be, and I will also help other people trying to build it personally by email.
The project has already started and you can see it at www.thebigsolarlie.com.
<span style=""letter-spacing: 0.06em

As i'm still broke due to a computer store I opened in my 20's, I can't afford buying some of the needed equipment to complete the project. 

Any donation can help, the cells themselves are cheap but the batteries and inverters needed will be hard to achieve without your help. If by any chance donations will exceed the needed sum, I might use it for creating a hard copy of the guide.
column6:
>Why do you care?

Well, once completed, anyone who reads my guide will be able to reproduce what I did, without a big investment in parts, and utilizing all junk everyone can find or have lying around in their basement.

The project will also allow people in 3rd world countries to build cheap solar systems on remote villages and properties.
column8:
>What else can you do?

If you wish to help, but can't contribute financially, feel free to distribute the URL for this page, and make more people aware of it.

Thanks :)

column4: >Beddi is an alarm clock/Bluetooth speaker for your smartphone that does so much more than just wake you up. We have

column1:
And our smart buttons allows you to quickly control your smart home devices without using multiple apps. Simply put, no other alarm can do what we do.


Now Shipping!

We are now Shipping!  Goods have already arrived our US warehouse!

Beddi works with your case! (Most likely)

We know how annoying it is when your phone doesn't fit the dock because of your phone case. Our 17mm slot will fit most cases, and for sure we're compatible with the Apple branded iPhone cases, as well as cases like Speck, InCase, and others.  Beddi is compatible with iPhone 5S, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s+, as well as Galaxy S4, S6 and other 5.5"" screens.

We can start your coffee machine, turn up/down Nest (for those special days that you need to wake up earlier), or adjust your Philips Hue settings.  You can also use our customizable smart buttons to control your smart devices.
Beddi is fully packed with features and functions to make it one of the most robust and flexible smart alarm clocks in the world.

Hitting The Headlines
Have a read for yourself:
<li>
https://www.theguardian.com/society/2018/mar/28....
• https://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/truth-rubber-ducks_uk_5abb8bb2e4b04a59a3130f18?guccounter=1
• https://news.sky.com/story/rubber-ducks-are-far-from-squeaky-clean-scientists-claim-11305993
• http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-5550001/Beware-rubber-duck-popular-bathroom-companion-riddled-bacteria.html

column3:
>Launch of Quackers 

As Dads ourselves, we are so critical of children’s products. We understand how important it is for parents to feel at ease with the products that their little ones are playing with.

Back in 2016 we were so busy with the growth of business, the first opportunity to play with the children was bath time. I had noticed that there was often mould and mildew growing inside my children’s bath toys, naturally this wasn’t healthy for them and I challenged myself to find a solution. Bath Ducks have been around for years and will continue to be the staple bath toy.

During our Brands infancy, we made some fantastic working relationships with numerous factories in China. Mark and I had discussed some ideas before flying to China but really wanted to take some expertise from our trusted manufacturers. We worked together to develop a duck that had a very small hole in the bottom, it was then sealed up with glue to ensure that water did not enter the duck.

Early in 2017, our order arrived. We were so excited to get them out there. The ducks sold phenomenally well. Any new product brought to market, we proactively ask our customer base for reviews on our products, we started to get feedback that although initially they weren’t taking in water but after a period of time the glue broke down letting some moisture in.

Undeterred and willing to go the extra mile to make this work, we continued our research. We realised that the bath water that could make its way in to the ‘regular’ bath ducks, was giving it the buoyancy, which enabled them to float. We went back to the drawing board.

Meanwhile a report was published by the Swiss federal institute of Aquatic Science and Technology, ETH and the University of Illinois counted microbes swimming inside the bath toys. The murky water that bath toys released when squeezed, contained potentially pathogenic bacteria in 4/5 toys studied. It was all over the media and families everywhere were questioning the staple bath toys that they’d trusted for years.

As a result of this report, these bath toys made the headlines, for all the wrong reasons. Mums across the world, were taking to Twitter and Instagram to share their murky bath ducks.
column5:
>Test Production

Over the last year, we have worked incredibly hard to find the right team in China, who will work with us in ensuring production is completed to the highest standards.

We are so proud to have finally developed the ‘perfect duck’ which is fully sealed with a unique plug and weight system. Not only does it keep water out, it also enables the duck to float upright every time.
column7:
>Why Are We Crowdfunding

We have manufactured some prototypes for testing alongside our current customer base to ensure we bring our consumers a product that’s ready for market. We chose crowdfunding since it provides us the opportunity to work with early adopters first - those that love what we’re creating almost as much as we do.

The money raised with this campaign will go towards funding the mass production of our duck ranges, moulding costs and then bringing them to mass market with targeted marketing campaigns helping launch them into numerous retailers who have already shown a keen interest.

                                           Our Company

JAYMARK Products was co-founded by Jason &
column8:
Mark connected through our passion and drive to build a company whose ethos is designing and manufacturing products with an uncompromising attitude, whether it’s the quality of the item or the end user experience, we pride ourselves on exceptionally made products at affordable pricing.

As a rapidly growing brand we have a desire to constantly renew ourselves. We work so hard to see the world through our customer’s eyes. We have an amazing Customer Experience team who are so dedicated to capturing our customer’s thoughts and feelings and moulding them to enhance the products. Through our products, we aim to be unique and meaningful. We don’t just sell, we are tenacious and will continue developing an idea until we get it right for our customer’s.

 

 

 

 

 

","Hitting The Headlines

column4:
>Short Summary

GameLynx.net is a platform for gamers to engage in an active community where they can meet and interact with other gamers through our easy-to-use multifunctional website. User can:

column1: <li><span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column2: >Matchmake against opponents through LynxQueue, 1v1, 2v2, 5v5 and more

column1: <li><span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column2: >Earn virtual currency (LynxCoin) for redeemable services and merchandise

column1: <li><span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column2: >Trade virtual items between games in our marketplace

column1: <li><span style=""line-height: 1.45em
<li>
<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
<li>
<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
<li>
<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
<li><span style=""line-height: 1.45em

As League of Legends fans and long time supporters of eSports, we at GameLynx want to support gamers in pursuing their dreams of competing on a competitive stage. We understand that climbing to the top takes a lot of time and effort. Our goal is to reward gamers for their time and effort through LynxCoin, provide players the opportunity to compete against the best opponents for prizes, and showcase talented and passionate individuals through our comprehensive stats and streaming platform. Join us at GameLynx and maybe you could be the next star gamer!

What We Need

We have the dream, the team, and the drive, but there are still a few things we need:

Marketing: GameLynx is an incredible platform, but it’s nothing without users like you.

A large portion of our funding will be spent on spreading the word and bringing more gamers together!
More people using GameLynx means we will have a more active virtual market, full queues for matchmaking, a stronger community, bigger tournaments, and an overall greater experience for all gamers!

Development:
column2:
>After months of hard work, GameLynx’s core features are ready and our beta testing has begun!

We have so many great ideas for the future of GameLynx and some very exciting new features in the works. Now we need you to take action and help turn these plans into a reality! Our team is ready to go, but we need funds to continue development and get the ball rolling. If we meet or exceed our goal of raising $25,000 we will be able to expand our matchmaking system globally + add 2v2/5v5 matches, refine our virtual currency (GameLynx Coins) platform, improve our stat aggregation system, and so much more.

Expansion: Just 6 months ago, GameLynx was simply an idea. Fast forwarding to today, it’s amazing to see how far we’ve come - let’s see how far we can go!

We have a world-class League of Legends matchmaking and rewards system, game stat tracking, live streaming system, a community platform, and best of all, a highly skilled dedicated team who’s one and only goal is to make your gaming experience the best it can be! Today, we only have the resources to serve the North American market. This has to change! We wish to expand our reach and support all gamers worldwide and support more games. We have the know-how and the manpower - all we need is the funding. Become a pioneer of the eSports movement and help GameLynx.net by joining us on our mission.
column3: >What You Get
column8:
>The Impact

GameLynx aims to provide a social and rewarding atmosphere for gamers, bolstering the value and perception of gaming as a whole. Esports is well on its way to becoming a serious contender in professional entertainment. We want to accelerate that growth by showcasing the skills and talents of those who have the drive and determination to become the best! Our mission is to provide a stage for players to achieve recognition on a global scale.

For players looking place to connect and socialize with other like minded gamers, GameLynx is here for you too! We have designed a way for gamers automatically catalogue and share your gaming achievements with the world. On Top of that, we offer an integrated chat system so you can communicate with your friends in real time, regardless of which games you play. GameLynx will be the one stop shop for all gamers of all genres and all regions!

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some of you simply cannot afford to support us financially. That’s okay! More than anything, we want to improve gamers’ experience. You can help Liking and Sharing us on Facebook, Following us on Twitter, and of course, sharing this campaign and GameLynx.net with anyone you know who plays games.

Also, if you are a web developer or know someone who may be interested in volunteering their expertise to help develop GameLynx, please don’t hesitate to get in touch with us.
column9: >Please press the Indiegogo share tools below to help spread the word about GameLynx.net!

column1: ","Short SummaryGameLynx.net is a platform for gamers to engage in an active community where they can meet and interact with other gamers through our easy-to-use multifunctional website. User can:
Matchmake against opponents through LynxQueue, 1v1, 2v2, 5v5 and more
Earn virtual currency (LynxCoin) for redeemable services and merchandise
Trade virtual items between games in our marketplace
Add friends and chat between users
Compete in tournaments
Watch videos and streams
Enter contests
Track stats

As League of Legends fans and long time supporters of eSports, we at GameLynx want to support gamers in pursuing their dreams of competing on a competitive stage. We understand that climbing to the top takes a lot of time and effort. Our goal is to reward gamers for their time and effort through LynxCoin, provide players the opportunity to compete against the best opponents for prizes, and showcase talented and passionate individuals through our comprehensive stats and streaming platform. Join us at GameLynx and maybe you could be the next star gamer!What We NeedWe have the dream, the team, and the drive, but there are still a few things we need:Marketing: GameLynx is an incredible platform, but it’s nothing without users like you.A large portion of our funding will be spent on spreading the word and bringing more gamers together!More people using GameLynx means we will have a more active virtual market, full queues for matchmaking, a stronger community, bigger tournaments, and an overall greater experience for all gamers!Development: After months of hard work, GameLynx’s core features are ready and our beta testing has begun!We have so many great ideas for the future of GameLynx and some very exciting new features in the works. Now we need you to take action and help turn these plans into a reality! Our team is ready to go, but we need funds to continue development and get the ball rolling. If we meet or exceed our goal of raising $25,000 we will be able to expand our matchmaking system globally + add 2v2/5v5 matches, refine our virtual currency (GameLynx Coins) platform, improve our stat aggregation system, and so much more.Expansion: Just 6 months ago, GameLynx was simply an idea. Fast forwarding to today, it’s amazing to see how far we’ve come - let’s see how far we can go!We have a world-class League of Legends matchmaking and rewards system, game stat tracking, live streaming system, a community platform, and best of all, a highly skilled dedicated team who’s one and only goal is to make your gaming experience the best it can be! Today, we only have the resources to serve the North American market. This has to change! We wish to expand our reach and support all gamers worldwide and support more games. We have the know-how and the manpower - all we need is the funding. Become a pioneer of the eSports movement and help GameLynx.net by joining us on our mission.What You GetThe ImpactGameLynx aims to provide a social and rewarding atmosphere for gamers, bolstering the value and perception of gaming as a whole. Esports is well on its way to becoming a serious contender in professional entertainment. We want to accelerate that growth by showcasing the skills and talents of those who have the drive and determination to become the best! Our mission is to provide a stage for players to achieve recognition on a global scale.For players looking place to connect and socialize with other like minded gamers, GameLynx is here for you too! We have designed a way for gamers automatically catalogue and share your gaming achievements with the world. On Top of that, we offer an integrated chat system so you can communicate with your friends in real time, regardless of which games you play. GameLynx will be the one stop shop for all gamers of all genres and all regions!Other Ways You Can HelpWe know that some of you simply cannot afford to support us financially. That’s okay! More than anything, we want to improve gamers’ experience. You can help Liking and Sharing us on Facebook, Following us on Twitter, and of course, sharing this campaign and GameLynx.net with anyone you know who plays games.Also, if you are a web developer or know someone who may be interested in volunteering their expertise to help develop GameLynx, please don’t hesitate to get in touch with us.Please press the Indiegogo share tools below to help spread the word about GameLynx.net!",8.0,0,"1 Campaign

<h3>What We Need &amp
For our locks to go into production, they need to be California Department of Justice (DOJ) approved.  The money we are asking for will help start the ball rolling.

We need to 3D scan existing firearms to make our lock fit as many manufacturers as possible.  We can then finalize the design and build the first parts needed to attain DOJ approval. That's about it.  Once DOJ has approved it, we will be able to make sales and fill orders.

We believe in this product and will not quit until it is available.  We feel that not everyone who contributes would want a firearm lock.  Therefore, we are offering other incentives to help us raise as much capital as possible.
","Our Story - Check out our website: www.thefmsl.com

Hello and thanks for looking. Our names are Ryan Schaefer and Robert Steuer.  Ryan is an avid shooter who found a flaw with the gun locks currently available.  He patented his idea but didn't know what to do next.  Together we built prototypes to prove that our lock is the best solution to lock and unlock a firearm quickly, efficiently and in a timely manner.

Our slogan, ""Lock it like you load it,"" refers to the ease of use of this firearm safety device.  Its form, fit, and function is exactly the same as the firearms original magazine.  Gun locks are required in some states in the United States.  Firearm locks are excellent in any home with children or when traveling.  We're not looking to take away anyone's 2nd amendment rights
column2: we would just like unused firearms to be safer.

column1: Gun locks can save a child's life.
The Impact
The Firearm Magazine Safety Lock completely renders a firearm inoperable, it cannot be loaded or fired.
Our firearm safety device is completely designed in the United States, and that is where it will be manufactured.
Unintentional shootings cause 20 percent of all firearm-related
deaths among children ages 14 and under.

There are currently over 6,000,000 pistols in circulation.  From 1998 through 2010, there were nearly 30,000,000 applications submitted for pistol ownership.  Needless to say, the need for an excellent firearm lock exists.
Our lock is virtually impossible to
overcome without damaging the firearm, there isn't another lock
available that can make that claim.
If YOUR child was at another house, wouldn't you feel better knowing that their firearms were unusable?
What We Need & What You Get
For our locks to go into production, they need to be California Department of Justice (DOJ) approved.  The money we are asking for will help start the ball rolling.

We need to 3D scan existing firearms to make our lock fit as many manufacturers as possible.  We can then finalize the design and build the first parts needed to attain DOJ approval. That's about it.  Once DOJ has approved it, we will be able to make sales and fill orders.

We believe in this product and will not quit until it is available.  We feel that not everyone who contributes would want a firearm lock.  Therefore, we are offering other incentives to help us raise as much capital as possible.",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns
|","Los Angeles, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/a-new-gun-lock-the-firearm-magazine-safety-lock/pica

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><h3 style=""text-align: center

FAQ

How do I claim a perk?​
Review the list of perks on the right-hand side of the campaign page. When you see a particular perk that you're interested in, click to select the perk and proceed with the checkout process.

When can I get my Socialbox?
The first few boxes have been produced and we are 100% ready to produce more. Please see the estimated shipping date on each perk for an indication of how soon you are likely to receive your order.

Where do you ship the Socialbox to?
Perks on this page are available for shipping to the Netherlands and other EU countries. In the future we will ship worldwide. 

Can my backed product be shipped to different addresses?
All orders on the same account will be shipped to a single address. To send to multiple addresses, multiple orders (under different accounts) are needed. You can save money by sending them to one shipping location. If you wish to do this with multiple orders, please contact us.

What comes in the box?
You’ll receive your Socialbox with a base, a cover, 2 candles, 2 shutters and 8 illustrated postcards. Note: We did not yet produce a Walnut or a Kintsugi version. The image may differ from the reality. 

How many phones fit in the Socialbox?
The space for your phone(s) is 35 mm high, 105 mm wide and 190 mm long.

Can I upgrade my Socialbox so there will be room for more phones?
We are working on a simple height upgrade that you can fit between the base and the cover. You can buy 2 or more Socialboxes!

Can I charge my phone when I use the Socialbox?
No. Our product strength is that there is no cable attached to it.

What is the burning time of the candles?
The candles delivered in the box burn for approx. 3 hours. 

To which famous talk of Simon Sinek are you referring?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hER0Qp6QJNU

 

TERMS &
column2:
CONDITIONS

The Socialbox's Terms and Conditions  and the disclaimer apply to the purchase of all perks, in conjunction with and concurrently with the Indiegogo Terms of Use.

 

CUSTOMER SUPPORT:

How do I reach out to your team?
We have a team of dedicated support staff available to answer questions about our product. Please contact us via our website.

I'm trying to back but I'm having trouble. What should I do?
Please contact Indiegogo at: support@indiegogo.com

I backed but now want a refund. How do I do this?
If you have made your purchase within the last 10 days, please contact IGG to obtain a refund.

Please contact us via our website if you have any questions for us.

Do you have a difficult time splitting wood? We have a solution for you. Splitting wood has always been a hard nut to crack and dangerous as well. That's why we invented a product which will make such a task go smoothly.
<div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/I-39rBaq_f4?autohide=1&amp

We have combined cutting-edge technology and traditional metalworking to produce a superior designer tool. Shavlog is made of iron and that gives it virtual indestructibility and strength.

 

A larger part of it is made by hand, using the old, tried and tested procedures. Despite that, we have also made it light enough, so anyone can use it. Shavlog will also beautifully decorate your patio, workshop or even a space in the house next to the fireplace, where it will garner envious glances from the neighbors.

The blade is a very special story in and of itself: it is our innovation. It is cut by a machine to give a kind of a curve that gives the best results. We took the shape of the blade from the axe and its strength was further increased with tempering as used for the best kind of blades in the world.

Working with Shavlog is as easy as 1, 2, 3. We open the safety, set on a step, and press to make the kindling fly. It is also very fast because you don’t have to lean constantly to collect the cut pieces and put them back on the block. 

We added an oak handle to the iron blade, which is very useful at work and gives the Shavlog a unique appearance. We coated the handle with different kinds of natural lacquer to make it perfect.
column7:
s=8a0fbbdbef1138c66f6f11c75853b59c"" src=""""/>

30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the Shavlog community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or colleague who needs to enjoy life and

share our campaign!


You can use it anytime you want – whether you want to burn through the supply of wood or perhaps make fire and make a delicious meal for your family and friends.

Using Shavlog is not limited by seasons. You can use it everywhere and anytime. During the summer, you can use it to split wood for a delicious barbecue party, or for an open fire while you enjoy with your friends talking about future and life experiences under the stars. Moreover, it is indispensable in winter because you can use wood, which you split with Shavlog, to start a fire and get warm.

We are a team of young people who are passionate about finding different solutions or improving the existent designs. With our bodies and souls, we are devoted to what we do.
This project is our very first one, but definitely not the last. We are full of ideas that are going to be brought to life to make your life happier and easier.

The funding we will gather during this project are going to be used for finishing and delivering Shavlogs to all backers and to purchase some indispensable tools we need for realization of new ideas, which will render you speechless.
column9:
showinfo=0"">

 

Your whole family will thank you for the effortless work because you will soon be able to reap the results of Shavlog, which will make your life easier and help you save on time, which you could spend with your loved ones.

Shavlog can also be a very ingenious gift, which will never be left useless. It won't take much of your space.

One of the biggest advantages Shavlog offers is that it is far safer from either knife or axe. What is even better is that no quick movements need to be made while using it and that's what gives our product a great advantage. You simply cannot make imprecise movements with it.
