The Smart Home Scent Box
column2:
>""OK Google, make it smell like Summer Rain in here""

Moodo is the first smart device that gives you complete control over the way your environment smells and feels. Made for the home or office, Moodo enables you to change the ambiance instantly using a simple smartphone app.

Smell is the strongest of our senses. It’s arguably the sense most influential on your mood. It's also the next logical step in an increasingly personalized world. Your environment is what you make it- your ideal lighting, favorite decor and your music - now you can control the elusive dimension of fragrance. 

So go on, take a deep breath, imagine your favorite scent and read on. If we sound excited it's because we are. We've been creating aroma products for decades, but this is hands down the coolest thing we've even done.

column1: In the Press

What is Moodo?

Moodo is the world's smartest fragrance diffusion machine. Play with the app's dials to control the intensity of each of the four capsules and explore the possibilities. Set it so you wake up to a citrus filled kitchen on weekend mornings, or take over as scent-DJ and switch up the mood in seconds. Then save your custom scents to the app. Or share them with your friends. And don't forget to set it to get romantic when the kids go to sleep. It's all up to you. And your nose.

 

It's an entirely new take on personalizing your environment. It's not just a step up or an extra feature - Moodo is an entire smart system that introduces a new way to understand, interact with and think of smell.

A Revolution of Smell

As primarily visual &
column2: auditory thinkers, we don't ordinarily imagine scent as a spectrum, the way we view the colors of a color-wheel or palette of a rainbow. But smell is actually one of the widest spectrum in nature, and it hasn’t found its place in the modern home. That’s why we created Moodo. More than the ability to mix fragrance-capsules, Moodo introduces a world of friendly scent-flavors, an entire platform for experimenting with the world of scents, right on your phone. Browse through the crowd-pleasing presets or invent your own shade of citrus and share it with a friend. The choice is yours.

column1: Features
How Do You Moodo?
Meet The Moodo App
Experience the Spectrum of Scent
Create and Share Your Own Scent

Specs

Inside the device, each fragrance-capsule pocket has its own electronically-controlled fan system that circulates air through it and out into the room. This patented design enables Moodo to diffuse a tremendous number of combinations, exploring new fragrances with every turn of the dial.

 

Moodo also has a rechargeable battery and connections for WiFi and Bluetooth.
Rewards

Choose Your Scent Families

Scent families are 4 packs of our fragrance capsules that have been grouped together for optimal blends.  The more capsules, the wider your scent spectrum.  What’s your Moodo?

Timeline

We have been working on Moodo for over a year. What we've done has been called impossible: we built a lean, innovative company inside an aroma distributor company to produce an innovative industry shocking device. The product design is ready, testing is complete, and the agreement with manufacturers is done. Now we need funds to produce Moodo and spread the word.
Meet the Team
column2: >Design and Engineering: Trim Industrial Design
column4:
/>

Tross is a technology driven crowdfunding powerhouse, where data is a religion and creative is a way of life.

 

Q: Is Moodo battery operated?

A: Yes, Moodo comes with rechargeable batteries that hold a charge-life of 7 hours.

 

Q: How long do Moodo capsules last for?

A: A Scent Family, which contains 4 capsules, lasts about two months taking into consideration normal daily use.

 

A: Does the Moodo app work with both Android and iOS?

A: Absolutely.

 

Q: How does Moodo app work?

A: To start your Moodo experience, download the Moodo app by using the QR Code printed on the package, or via the App Store/Google Play. Follow the quick steps for initial setup. Load your perfume capsules into the Moodo device as shown in the owner's manual. Now, you are ready to create your own unique ambiance! Mix and Match Moodo's unique scents by adjusting the equalizer on the ""Lab"" screen according to your own personal mood. To control the fragrance intensity, simply adjust the volume and set the frequency to your liking.

 

Q: What's the size big is each Moodo device?

A: The Moodo device measures  4.8""x 4.8"" x 4"" and 4.8"" x 4.8"" x 3.84"".

 

Q: Is the Moodo effective to use in all room sizes?

A: Moodo can be used in all room sizes by simply adjusting the volume to match the size of the room and the strength of smell you want. 

Q: Is it possible to operate Moodo manually, without a smartphone app?

A: Yes, it's possible to utilize the buttons on the device's interface to operate Moodo. 

 

Q: Is Moodo safe?

A: Absolutely! Moodo fragrances are just like any other perfume you already use. Moodo uses the finest ingredients that are can be found in premium perfumes and cosmetic products.  

 

Q: Is it safe to keep Moodo plugged in?

A: It is perfectly safe to keep your Moodo device plugged in at all times.

 

Q: Will I be able to get new scent capsules after the campaign ends?

A: Absolutely, scent capsules will be on sale when the campaign s over. 

 

Q: Can several people be in control of the same device through the app?

A: Yes, one device can be controlled by multiple smartphones, each using its own Moodo app. Specifically, there is a feature on the app which enables the owner of the system to grant free access to anyone who is within Bluetooth range without requiring further permissions.  Additionally this feature prevents others from communicating or interfering with the system. In the latter case, the owner can selectively “invite” additional specific users to control the Moodo system, for example family members, guests and co-workers. The invitee will receive an email promptly which will lead to the specific Moodo at hand.

","The Smart Home Scent Box""OK Google, make it smell like Summer Rain in here""Moodo is the first smart device that gives you complete control over the way your environment smells and feels. Made for the home or office, Moodo enables you to change the ambiance instantly using a simple smartphone app.Smell is the strongest of our senses. It’s arguably the sense most influential on your mood. It's also the next logical step in an increasingly personalized world. Your environment is what you make it- your ideal lighting, favorite decor and your music - now you can control the elusive dimension of fragrance. So go on, take a deep breath, imagine your favorite scent and read on. If we sound excited it's because we are. We've been creating aroma products for decades, but this is hands down the coolest thing we've even done.

column1: In the Press

What is Moodo?Moodo is the world's smartest fragrance diffusion machine. Play with the app's dials to control the intensity of each of the four capsules and explore the possibilities. Set it so you wake up to a citrus filled kitchen on weekend mornings, or take over as scent-DJ and switch up the mood in seconds. Then save your custom scents to the app. Or share them with your friends. And don't forget to set it to get romantic when the kids go to sleep. It's all up to you. And your nose. It's an entirely new take on personalizing your environment. It's not just a step up or an extra feature - Moodo is an entire smart system that introduces a new way to understand, interact with and think of smell.

A Revolution of SmellAs primarily visual & auditory thinkers, we don't ordinarily imagine scent as a spectrum, the way we view the colors of a color-wheel or palette of a rainbow. But smell is actually one of the widest spectrum in nature, and it hasn’t found its place in the modern home. That’s why we created Moodo. More than the ability to mix fragrance-capsules, Moodo introduces a world of friendly scent-flavors, an entire platform for experimenting with the world of scents, right on your phone. Browse through the crowd-pleasing presets or invent your own shade of citrus and share it with a friend. The choice is yours.
Features
How Do You Moodo?
Meet The Moodo App
Experience the Spectrum of Scent
Create and Share Your Own Scent

SpecsInside the device, each fragrance-capsule pocket has its own electronically-controlled fan system that circulates air through it and out into the room. This patented design enables Moodo to diffuse a tremendous number of combinations, exploring new fragrances with every turn of the dial. Moodo also has a rechargeable battery and connections for WiFi and Bluetooth.
Rewards

Choose Your Scent FamiliesScent families are 4 packs of our fragrance capsules that have been grouped together for optimal blends.  The more capsules, the wider your scent spectrum.  What’s your Moodo?

TimelineWe have been working on Moodo for over a year. What we've done has been called impossible: we built a lean, innovative company inside an aroma distributor company to produce an innovative industry shocking device. The product design is ready, testing is complete, and the agreement with manufacturers is done. Now we need funds to produce Moodo and spread the word.

Meet the TeamDesign and Engineering: Trim Industrial DesignTross is a technology driven crowdfunding powerhouse, where data is a religion and creative is a way of life. Q: Is Moodo battery operated?A: Yes, Moodo comes with rechargeable batteries that hold a charge-life of 7 hours. Q: How long do Moodo capsules last for?A: A Scent Family, which contains 4 capsules, lasts about two months taking into consideration normal daily use. A: Does the Moodo app work with both Android and iOS?A: Absolutely. Q: How does Moodo app work?A: To start your Moodo experience, download the Moodo app by using the QR Code printed on the package, or via the App Store/Google Play. Follow the quick steps for initial setup. Load your perfume capsules into the Moodo device as shown in the owner's manual. Now, you are ready to create your own unique ambiance! Mix and Match Moodo's unique scents by adjusting the equalizer on the ""Lab"" screen according to your own personal mood. To control the fragrance intensity, simply adjust the volume and set the frequency to your liking. Q: What's the size big is each Moodo device?A: The Moodo device measures  4.8""x 4.8"" x 4"" and 4.8"" x 4.8"" x 3.84"". Q: Is the Moodo effective to use in all room sizes?A: Moodo can be used in all room sizes by simply adjusting the volume to match the size of the room and the strength of smell you want. Q: Is it possible to operate Moodo manually, without a smartphone app?A: Yes, it's possible to utilize the buttons on the device's interface to operate Moodo.  Q: Is Moodo safe?A: Absolutely! Moodo fragrances are just like any other perfume you already use. Moodo uses the finest ingredients that are can be found in premium perfumes and cosmetic products.   Q: Is it safe to keep Moodo plugged in?A: It is perfectly safe to keep your Moodo device plugged in at all times. Q: Will I be able to get new scent capsules after the campaign ends?A: Absolutely, scent capsules will be on sale when the campaign s over.  Q: Can several people be in control of the same device through the app?A: Yes, one device can be controlled by multiple smartphones, each using its own Moodo app. Specifically, there is a feature on the app which enables the owner of the system to grant free access to anyone who is within Bluetooth range without requiring further permissions.  Additionally this feature prevents others from communicating or interfering with the system. In the latter case, the owner can selectively “invite” additional specific users to control the Moodo system, for example family members, guests and co-workers. The invitee will receive an email promptly which will lead to the specific Moodo at hand.",51.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","New York, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/moodo-the-smart-home-fragrance-box--2/pica

column1: ","Yoswit is a small, portable smart home accessory that enables you to enjoy the smart home experience, even when you are living away from home.

Yoswit Turns Your ‘Homes’ Smart once You Put It DownNo matter where life takes you, you can use Yoswit to bring your smart home setting to the new ‘home’. When you step into another ‘home’, just simply put your Yoswit down, like a table or chair. Yoswit will then setup your favorite temperature, turn on the a/c, TV, stb for you. We have over 100K IR Commands in our IR library which covers 90% brands in the world. If you still cannot get the right one, we can cover it by our learning mode. We also provide you the learning mode:Yoswit can recognize nearly every code from all your device’s remotes and you can simply use your smart phone to control the device with an app.

Your Energy In Day & Night with an Inbuilt ThermostatWith an inbuilt thermostat, Yoswit can keep the room at your most comfortable temperature. It will know your habit in couple days and start the settings on its own. In another word, Yoswit knows the best timing to turn off your devices for saving energy.Make Your Home Comfortable before Your ArrivalWherever you are, nothing can sweeter than a home well-prepared to greet you. With Yoswit and our mob-mob patented technology, you can preset the most comfortable room temperature on the way home. Enjoy once you open the front door!Extending the Signal Range through Building the NetworkYoswit uses its proprietary technology to build the mesh-like network. We are the first company who announce to use TI chips to build the mesh-like network. It’s stable and fast and we get total control of our solution. The more device you have, the longer range can be extended. We support maximum 64 devices within the network.Create 5 shortcut buttons of your choice​Yoswit has 5 programmable buttons which allows you to create your personalize shortcuts for multiple home devices.Find your lost phone with just a click​With a click of its button, your phone will ring with your favourite ringtone and you can find your phone easily.Support anti-theft alarm for your luggage​Sometimes you are just too tired to keep an eye on your back-pack all the day. Yoswit will alert you with a loud beep sound when someone try to steal from you.Remind you about luggage arrival​It’s always too long to wait for your luggage. Yoswit can send you an alert when your luggage arrives.

Function as a portable phone chargerSometimes, we are not lucky enough to have a power supply nearby or a portable mobile charger on hand. Yoswit can function as a 3A battery mobile charger for emergency uses. Recharge your 3A batteries​Yoswit can replace a $30 battery cell charger for emergency use. Save your precious time in finding a shop by recharging your batteries.

Yoswit can bridge the gap between your Bluetooth emitting smart phones or tablets and your IR controlled air-conditioners, audio/ video equipment. It detects signal through walls or cabinets and supports almost every popular brand.
We have developed Yoswit for over a year. We need your support to bring the idea to real live and take Yoswit to mass production!
Frequently Asked Questions
How long is the warranty?
Each Yoswit comes with 2 year limited warranty. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment.
What is Yoswit's battery lifespan?
Yoswit can last up to 6 months with two AAA batteries. You can also use USB to supply power.
How long does it take to get a full battery charge?
The full charge time for battery base on the mAh.
Which devices are compatible with Yoswit?
Almost all Infrared Remote Control Appliances.
What is the bluetooth range?
Yoswit Bluetooth range is 20~50m, depending on your surrounding environment.
When I can receive my order?
We are set to ship the product in March 2017 and will keep you updated on our progress and your order's expected delivery date for any changes.
Where does Air by crazybaby ship?
Yoswit is available for shipping worldwide.
Why order now?

We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Backers who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their Yoswit from our very first production batches that have been fully tested and prepared for mass production.We are offering incredible discounts on all pre-orders of Yoswit’s in return for your support. You will never find Yoswit at these low prices again!
What is your refund policy?
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis

","Visit eightsleep.com to purchase

Eight is the world's first mattress cover that makes any bed smart. Slip it onto your mattress and watch as your regular bed turns into a smart bed that can intelligently manage the temperature of your bed, track your sleep, and integrate with your smart home.
Comfort, convenience, and security for a better night's sleep.
Click here to read customer reviews
Watch this behind the scenes video of the 'Making of Eight':

Place Eight onto any mattress and let it play its magic. Fits onto Full, Queen and King size mattresses, up to 21 inches tall. Just slip it under your bed sheets, pair it with the Eight mobile app, and start enjoying better nights.
The sizes we currently offer are:
-Full: 54in x 75in (137cm x 191cm)
-Queen: 60in × 80in (152 cm × 203 cm)
-King: 76in × 80in (193 cm × 203 cm)
-California King: 72 x 84 (183 cm x 213 cm)
If you have any questions about sizing please contact support@eightsleep.com.
Goodbye, wearables. Eight learns on its own, makes recommendations, and takes action without requiring any input.
AUTO-SCHEDULE
Eight learns and programs itself to create a personalized schedule for bed temperature adjustments, and continues to adapt to your changing life.
SMARTPHONE REMOTE CONTROL
When needed, control Eight from your smartphone or tablet from wherever you are. Imagine warming up your bed on a cold night while you are on your way home.
SECURE AND PRIVATE
Eight is completely secure and uses public key cryptography. Its security features include HTTPS, SSL, and 128-bit encryption.

Convenience and security while you sleep. Out of the box, Eight can integrate with other devices, such as smart thermostats, door locks, light bulbs, and more. Our network of custom integrations is ever-expanding. It currently includes a variety of products to bring modern convenience and comfort to your home.
We are a team of dreamers who believe that better sleep leads to a better life. We are passionate about utilizing technology to dream more and live better.
Matteo Franceschetti | Co-Founder and CEO

Left the life of lawyers to change the world through successful business ventures in renewable energy and tech. During the past seven years as an entrepreneur, he has lost approximately 900 hours of sleep due primarily to restless legs syndrome.
Massimo Andreasi Bassi | Co-Founder and CTO

Entrepreneur, experienced maker, software engineer and hacker.  A college dropout turned entrepreneur, he dreams of improving the lives of more than a billion people through better sleep, one at a time.
Andrea Ballarini | Co-Founder and COO

Management executive with international experience in operations and growth, he is inspired by the belief that a great team and a great technology can change the way people live. His big passions are sailing and playing the piano.
Alexandra Zatarain | Co-Founder and CMO

Mexican entrepreneur with a passion for communicating great products and ideas to the world. Hopes to change the way people relate with their beds: from helping those who have one to providing one to those who don’t.
Eight is a StartX Company (Stanford's Startup Accelerator program)
*Designed in partnership with Moreless (moreless.com)
*Powered by Spark
Visit our support center at eightsleep.com/support",30.0,1,"1 Campaign

Effortless space saving solution

Vertical bike parking is no news - bike hooks and similar solutions have been here for ages. But effortless vertical bike parking is. Some people are tough and strong, but some are not. It is really hard to lift a bike just to hang it on a hook. PARKIS is great because it can be used by almost everyone - including teenagers, elderly, pregnant women.
<div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/uypHkCsOZ1Y?autohide=1&amp
Rewards
Accessories - multiple bikes storage

Stylish solution

You can choose from two options:

Original PARKIS (yellow)

Luxury PARKIS (metallic) *

* To make Luxury PARKIS the special surface treatment technique is being used, this process requires an extra special care during manufacturing.

PARKIS team believes that bike parking should not only be comfortable and easy but also it should have the looks. The product speaks for itself.

Balcony

Maybe you are dreaming about making a little terrace in your balcony or a cozy chill zone or... well who knows what is in your creative mind, but the thing is you need more space! Well let's be honest, balcony became the ""bicycle garage"". With PARKIS you can keep bicycles in the balcony and save min. 40% more of the floor space. 

Office

Oh, the famous ""line of bikes"" rested at the wall or even worse - multiple bikes rested at each other. So if you came first to the work, good luck trying to leave - you have to move everyone else's bicycles first, get yours and then put the rest bicycles as they were. Effort and time that is needed to do that should be rewarded by extra wage! PARKIS solves this messy situation. We believe bike parking should be simple, quick and effortless.

Garage

Most garages are quite cluttered. Countless various tools and the stuff that ""you might need someday"" - one could easily lose their head. Well don't let your bicycle to be a part of this clutter. As simple as that - just park your bike with PARKIS after a ride. No need to worry about the ways to keep your bike in the garage so it is stable.

Wherever you need to save space occupied by your bike or bikes - PARKIS is a solution.

Specifications

This vertical bicycle lift is designed so that it can be used with the most popular bikes. Only these criteria apply:

*tire width from 38 mm (1,5″) to 51 mm (2,0″)

*wheel diameter 61 cm (24″) or more

*weight on front axis up to 15 kg (33 lb)

*mud flaps ends must be above the wheel axis. This can be checked by leaning the bike’s rear wheel against the wall. If the wheel (not a mudguard) touches the wall – Parkis is suitable for your bike’s mud flaps. Matching scheme.

Elements

Join the PARKIS community on social media

*

*

 

Featured on

Risks and challenges

Please be aware that additional customs or other taxes may be applied for consignees outside the EU upon receipt of the reward.

column2: >It is way more than just a commodity for everyday use in kicthen
column3: >The knife manufacturer Maxez has set itself the task of reviving old values with traditional craftsmanship and, at the same time, to meet the highest demands regarding sharpness, blade geometry and aesthetics. As a result, the Maxez SYCAMORE is an unparalleled chef’s and kitchen knife of superlative style and quality. Like all sycamore knives, it is based on the basic form of a 3,500 year old knife type. Drawing on many years of studies and comparative analytical tests, highly skilled precision craftsmanship and the uncompromised aim to reach the optimum in sum, Sycamore has fully perfected the knife. About four dozen individual steps are required for the production of the maxez Sycamore in a process that involves passion and ideals: from forge welding and forging, Tempering and annealing, to the wet grinding of the double-sided hollow ground blade and the mounting of the handle. Heated up in glowing fire at a temperature of more than 1,000 degrees, the red glowing blade blank is forged on the anvil, formed by targeted, elemental hammer blows. From 67 layers of Damascus steel and a cutting edge in finest stainless steel, which can be seen under the wild Damascus pattern, a fine blade is crafted with outstanding hardness of 61 – 62 Rockwell (HRC) and long-term edge retention.
column13: >Using traditional wet manual cutting technology, V-shaped sharpening technology, the cutting angle is 15 degrees on each side, so that the blade obtains long-lasting edge retention, strong and durable.
column14: >With excellent sharpness, you can easily cut meat and vegetables into thin slices.Even with regular use every day, the razor-like sharp edges can be maintained for a long time.
column16: >Sharp Out Of The Box
column17: >The product has testing to ensure that the weight between the handle and the blade is balanced to achieve a perfect match between control and durability.
column18: >The back of the knife is manually grind and polishing, which can reduce the pressure of the fingers, even if you use it for a long time, it will not make you feel tired.

Professional Damascus Steel Chef Knife

Damascus steel kitchen knives have higher sharpness, hardness, and rust resistance. It is a perfect kitchen knife required in every kitchen. It is suitable for slicing and dicing any fruit, vegetable and meat. Chopped and sliced.

","It is way more than just a commodity for everyday use in kicthenThe knife manufacturer Maxez has set itself the task of reviving old values with traditional craftsmanship and, at the same time, to meet the highest demands regarding sharpness, blade geometry and aesthetics. As a result, the Maxez SYCAMORE is an unparalleled chef’s and kitchen knife of superlative style and quality. Like all sycamore knives, it is based on the basic form of a 3,500 year old knife type. Drawing on many years of studies and comparative analytical tests, highly skilled precision craftsmanship and the uncompromised aim to reach the optimum in sum, Sycamore has fully perfected the knife. About four dozen individual steps are required for the production of the maxez Sycamore in a process that involves passion and ideals: from forge welding and forging, Tempering and annealing, to the wet grinding of the double-sided hollow ground blade and the mounting of the handle. Heated up in glowing fire at a temperature of more than 1,000 degrees, the red glowing blade blank is forged on the anvil, formed by targeted, elemental hammer blows. From 67 layers of Damascus steel and a cutting edge in finest stainless steel, which can be seen under the wild Damascus pattern, a fine blade is crafted with outstanding hardness of 61 – 62 Rockwell (HRC) and long-term edge retention.Perfect Sharp BladeUsing traditional wet manual cutting technology, V-shaped sharpening technology, the cutting angle is 15 degrees on each side, so that the blade obtains long-lasting edge retention, strong and durable.With excellent sharpness, you can easily cut meat and vegetables into thin slices.Even with regular use every day, the razor-like sharp edges can be maintained for a long time.Sharp Out Of The BoxThe product has testing to ensure that the weight between the handle and the blade is balanced to achieve a perfect match between control and durability.The back of the knife is manually grind and polishing, which can reduce the pressure of the fingers, even if you use it for a long time, it will not make you feel tired.Professional Damascus Steel Chef KnifeDamascus steel kitchen knives have higher sharpness, hardness, and rust resistance. It is a perfect kitchen knife required in every kitchen. It is suitable for slicing and dicing any fruit, vegetable and meat. Chopped and sliced.",19.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
Tuck is dozens of other comfort products in one simple, fluffy package, and it does way too much to be called a ""blanket.""
In pocket-blanket mode...it's ideal for snuggles, binge marathons, and foot tucking.
In pillow mode...it's perfect for daytime naps, storage, and on-the-go comfort.
And in cloak mode - it has your back through work-filled mornings, game-filled nights, and those times when your partner decides it is you who gets up for snacks.
Dimensions: In Pillow Mode - 18.5in x 15in
In Blanket Mode - 60in x 70in
The Patent-Pending tri-pocket design of Tuck makes it so there are so many different ways to use it.
You can stick your feet in one of the safe-pockets to keep them warm or keep your snuggle partner from pulling it away...like usual.
You can fold it up into Pillow-Mode and use it as a combination pillow/sleep mask for a daytime nap, comfy car ride, or relaxing flight.

Or you can flip it upside down and put your hands through the pouches. The side openings and added thumbholes give you extra freedom when wearing the Tuck, and it has a big cozy hood for some comfy solitude.
No matter how you use it...Tuck is the perfect uniform for binge sessions, lazy days, and movie marathons. ""Netflix and Chill"" is much warmer with a pocket to play footsie!

The Tuck is designed to adapt to your comfort...so you can use it however makes you comfortable! Here our some of our favorite starter poses to get you started, and show you how we've used the Tuck so far.
Non-Biological Reason: It is the most versatile comfort object ever invented, and it's extremely comfortable.

Biological Reason: Studies show that the majority of people are very particular about their feet when they sleep, and that addressing their preference leads to better sleep quality. This is because your body temperature plays a key role in both falling and staying asleep, and your feet are an important variable there.
You can do it in a box...you can do it with a fox!
Ok but seriously, we have taken the Tuck everywhere with us, and it has proven time and time again how adaptable it is.
You can sleep soundly in typically uncomfortable places like cars and ever-shrinking plane seats.
You can wear the Tuck like a cloak when you want to use your hands to play games or tell Netflix that you are still watching.
You can pick-a-pocket and share the Tuck for your next movie night or lazy day. You can even fit three sets of feet in one Tuck if you want to have a big cuddle puddle...trust us, we know.
The Tuck adapts to fit you. And we can't wait to see all the ways you use it that we haven't even thought of.
TO USE ADD ONS, GIVE A TUCK, ETC.

Simply take the cost of your package at checkout (say its 37 dollars, our Tuck x1 tier), and add to it the amount of your desired tier (if you want to give a Tuck and get a carry bag, it's 5 dollars,) then your final pledge amount should be 42 dollars. You will manually adjust that at checkout, Giving as many Tucks as you'd like. To finalize purchases we will send a survey to clarify all your selections!
Around 700 homeless people in the US die of hypothermia during the winter months every year. Our goal is to lower that number and by supporting this campaign...you can help.

While developing Tuck, we actually had an experience with a woman who had died of hypothermia (in San Diego, nonetheless). At the time we were calling this idea “Tuck - The Only Blanket You’ll Ever Need” and upon seeing the small memorial that her husband created for her in their usual spot, the idea clicked to prove our claim, and improve the world in the process.

We believe in karmic response and the idea of contributing to societal well-being. So, starting this company, we knew we wanted to provide amazing products to our customers while also giving them the opportunity to make a difference in our home country, the United States.

By adding 5 dollars to your pledge you’ll show that you Give a Tuck, and we’ll send you this Tuck carry bag to show how much we appreciate your compassion. We’ll also let you know where your Tuck ends up so that you see what kind of difference you made.

Blankets for the Homeless: Blankets for the Homeless (VA) was started by Mariah Smith when she was just 15 years old. Now, 6 years later, she has given out 110,000 blankets and lunches to the homeless community. She lives this cause, and we couldn't think of anyone more fit to help us all Give a Tuck.

Northern Children's Services: Northern Children's Services (PHL) provides residential and behavioral health services for children from 8-21 years old. At the end of the day, we all would benefit from some comfort. That goes even more for these kids. Send some their way by adding five dollars to your pledge to Give a Tuck.

The Bowery Mission: The Bowery Mission (NYC) has been providing food, medical services and employment assistance to homeless men women and children since 1879. They astoundingly shelter some 60,000 people in New York City on a given night, and are always in need of assistance.

Khloe Kares: Early on in this project, there was a lot of sewing going on and often the TV would be playing aimlessly in the background. One day, I overheard people talking about sewing beautiful bags and filling them with toiletries for the homeless, and looked on the TV to see 8-year-old Khloe Thompson. She said that walking to school, she would pass by dozens of people struggling to get by, and asked her mom what they could do to help. Since then, Khloe, her mom Alisha, and her Grandma have handed out dozens of Kare bags and organized Toy Drives for the sake of a better community. She's 8, folks. What was I doing at 8 years old??? Sneaking Mortal Kombat games in when my parents weren't watching and eating Mac n' Cheese...that's what. This girl inspired us from the beginning to want to do more....and hopefully she'll be president some day.

The Tuck was a collaborative effort between a close circle of creatives, all contributing toward a vision of a better blanket and a comfier future. While PocketChange only has one full-timer right now, nobody accomplishes anything alone. That is certainly the case here, as there were many passionate hands working on the Tuck throughout the course of its development.
Some were paid in pizza and beer....others in love, admiration, and confidence in greater things to come. Every one of them put everything they had into what they did.

These amazing folks did a lot of work on this project, and there were many others that provided a ton of time giving feedback to this project and boosting morale during some of the more stressful times. Lois Lewis, Hank Lewis Sr., Robby Spekhardt, Ryan Sullivan, Roland Hulme, Connie Henderson, Vanessa McGill, Mark Levit, and Meryl Blau...none of this would have happened without you. You are all so considerate, loving, and brilliant...and your support throughout this idea's conception is what made it all possible.

This product is on here because we absolutely love it, and we think you all will too. With our first prototype we realized how many of our discomforts the Tuck addressed, and how many more we didn't even think about. We are so thrilled with how far it has come. The blanket is such an integral part of our every day lives, so it is only fitting that it endures a long overdue redesign. With this product it seems every day we figure out a fun new way to use it, and we are SO excited to see how this idea evolves with the Indiegogo community. We thank you so much for reading this far, and checking out our product. We really hope that you Give a Tuck!
<h3>Risks &amp

We have sent samples back and forth with the same dedicated manufacturer since our third prototype was created back in March, and the experience has been incredible thus far. Quality is wonderful, the shipping is fast and reliable, and the overall experience from our end has been beyond our wildest expectations.

While production and fulfillment on a larger scale can mean larger problems, we have been assured that our manufacturing team is up to the task, and we can promise you that they haven't led us astray. We have also created different fulfillment plans based on the campaign success, so that we aren't thrown off balance by any variation in numbers.

The invention is relatively simple on the manufacturing end. At PocketChange we seek simple, ""why didn't I think of that"" innovation so that we can develop amazing products without production inefficiency. We don't need molds or complicated tech, and all of our components have been sourced long before pressing the ""Launch"" button.

As life teaches us all, you don't truly know what risks and challenges await until they are smacking you in the face. That being said, we are feeling well prepared for the task at hand and promise to keep you updated every step of the way.

This is a comfort product and I want you, as an integral part of this campaign, to feel totally comfortable. So shoot us a message or post a comment and we'll try to get back to you as soon as we see it! We really Give a Tuck about what you have to say.

0,"

 

 

We believe that you should be able to grow what you want, when you want, and where you want. However, as we move into smaller living spaces and become busier, growing is getting harder for the average person. 

Many of us who do have time and space to grow, have tried. Some fell in love with it and more gave up. There are a lot of challenges: watering, lighting, pests, temperature, fertilizers. You want harvests to be abundant and efforts rewarding but, do you find a solution to all of these problems?  

That’s where Mary comes in. Technology takes care of the trivial part, and you take care of the rewarding part. Mary is a compact hydroponic farm that may only be considered as a baby step. But, aren’t all big changes made of baby steps?

 

Temperature, humidity, water level, brightness, nutrients, and many other factors are important to your plant’s health and happiness. Traditional growing means expertly tailoring growing conditions to your particular plant. Mary has numerous sensors that do the monitoring for you and keep your plant in optimal condition.

Through artificial intelligence, Mary learns how to produce a larger harvest in less time each time you grow.

 

Modern city lights disturb plants’ growth, affecting root system and CO2 collection. Plants that are entering flowering or fruition stage require better day/night cycles. Mary uses electrochromic glass so that you can turn the glass clear to show off your plant during the day, and opaque during dark times to allow your plant to sleep peacefully. Proper day and night, just how nature intended.

 

Nearly all indoor gardens provide top down lighting. However, if your plant has multiple layers or branches, the bottom will never get enough light to grow healthily. That’s why we designed Hololights: a multi-directional surround lighting system that gives abundant light to every surface of your plant. In addition to the light panel on top, there is an 80 cm tall LED panel on the internal back, and another assisting panel in the internal front.

In partnership with our light manufacturer we have created a sunlight-mimicking LED spectrum. The result is a more efficient lighting system that provides proper nourishment to promote healthy growth.

 

 

We think lights are not just to give plants life, but your living room as well. That’s why Mary has external lights that have over 16 million colour options which you can easily set in the app. Customize the look of your Mary to suit your environment. 

 

There’s also a diffused night light on the back of the device, giving you a beautifully smooth glow in the dark.

 

In the design process, we made sure everything was realistic to produce and would pass safety and durability tests. Therefore, everything you saw in the video (including the “arrow” lights from the first few seconds) came from our working prototype and iOS app.

Our team come from hardware startup and manufacturing backgrounds. Having a longtime relationship with one of the largest manufacturers in China, we ensure Mary is of quality and durability. Each part of the system will go through rigorous stress tests, such as high humidity, low/high temperature, drop, fire retardancy.

 

Please support us and spread the word! A few clicks would make a huge difference for us. By doing that, you are not only trying out a new lifestyle, you are also one of the pioneers in independence from industrialized food production, and in self sufficiency in food.

And YOU ARE AWESOME for making it to the end!
column3:
title=Check%20out%20Mary%2C%20the%20automated%20growing%20system%20with%20uncompromising%20design"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>
My Vision
I am Tom Beck, the CEO of SHEC Energy Corporation.
My vision for the future is:
1) A clean and sustainable renwable energy future that is cost affective
2) Transition to electric and hybrid electric vehicles to reduce the requirement of fossil fuels
3) Reduction of green house gases
4) Abundant renewable energy to stop proliferation of nuclear materials that can be used to make nuclear weapons
An Example for the World
North America

In North America, the United States is heavily dependent on fossil fuels, much of which it imports from areas of the world that are subject to disruption from countries that are politically hostile to the United States.

North America can become energy independent with the broad adoption of SHEC Energy's low cost 24/7 base-load solar power.  This would require the adoption of electric vehicles on a large scale as well.

Interestingly enough, electric vehicles require less power than it costs to make gasoline to operate a gas car.  This means we would not require a large build-out of new power infrastructure, but instead SHEC Energy's technology is well suited to retrofitting existing fossil fuel and nuclear steam power plants.  This solution means the investments in existing power generation infrastructure is preserved while allowing the much faster deployment of renewable power using SHEC Energy's technology.

Even If the Unites States eliminates the importation of overseas oil and gas, it will still be required for operating trucks, aircraft and ships. The reduced usage can be totally supplied by Canada, who's reserves are larger than Saudi Arabia.

Reciprocally, The United States has better solar conditions than Canada and therefore could be a net exporter of solar energy to Canada.  This offers a balance of energy trade to North America closest neighbors.
Europe
Likewise, Europe and other geographically close trading counties can adopt the same principle. North Africa for example is an ideal location for solar power generation in close proximity to Europe.
Iran
Iran would not have to build a nuclear capability and could rely upon the abundance of solar energy available in the region.  There would be no excuse to go nuclear.

Nuclear is not an option.  After the useful life of a nuclear power plant of about 30 years, it has to be decommissioned at about the same cost it took to build it.  Then there is the radioactive waste issue that will be around for 250,000 years.  Who will pay for that?  I am sure it is not the power utilities and nuclear companies that will long have gone out of business, but the legacy of our offspring.  How selfish for this generation to live at the expense of generations to come.  It is no longer necessary with SHEC Energy's technology.
Vision Summary
Humanity can go two ways.
1) A clean sustainable energy future or
2) A scorched Earth policy.
We have the technology to achieve vision 1.
Planetary Emergency

There is a Planetary Emergency as the polar icecap is melting at an accelerated rate and will be gone in 8 years. There is fear that methane under the icecap will be released and greatly accelerate global warming. (see the news article on www.shecenergy.com/donate )

When I started this company 16 years ago, my motivation was clean air, as air pollution in large cities impacted my health.  Now we are faced with a global emergency with the polar ice cap predicted to melt before 2020.  This could have dire consequences to humanity.  This may cause the release of methane trapped in the permafrost to be released. Methane is 25 times more potent as a greenhouse gas than carbon dioxide.  The polar ice cap is also reflective and redirects sunlight back out into space. With that gone, the oceans could absorb more heat and cause the further acceleration of global warming to the point of no recovery.

Human settlement, agricultural food production and fisheries have been established based on long term weather patterns spanning centuries.  These can suddenly change, dramatically affecting climate and food production.

I feel a very urgent need to as quickly as possible transition off of polluting energy sources.  There is a huge disconnect with the publics unawareness of this emergency. I hope with this campaign to broaden the publics awareness, whether they contribute or not to our renewable energy initiative to get society off of polluting energy sources.
SHEC Energy’s Technology

SHEC Energy Corporation has developed a Concentrating Solar Power (CSP) and thermal energy storage technology that can produce power 24 hours a day from sunlight while doing so at low cost (grid parity) that can compete against polluting fossil and nuclear power. Grid parity means government subsidies are no longer required to make solar projects economically viable as other solar technologies require.
The following YouTube video describes how the technology works:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5lKGS-XZjVQ

Although traditional solar panels that produce electricity from the sun are becoming more economical, they only produce power when the sun shines.  Batteries can be used for backup. 24 hour a day base-load solar power plants using batteries for storage become prohibitively expensive.  This is not the case with Concentrating Solar Power (CSP) plants.  This is because you have to store electricity for solar panels which is very expensive.  For CSP plants, you do not store electricity, but heat instead.  This is very economical.

The other consideration not taken into account is the intermittency of day-light only power plants.  A conventional power plant must be on hot standby with its turbine spinning to fill in the energy gaps that exist in solar power plants without energy storage.  This requires a doubling of infrastructure, something that is not needed in a properly designed CSP plant.

A good example of this is a study that was conducted of the effectiveness of Norway’s wind farm with 6,000 wind turbines. it was supposed to supply the country with 19% of its power.  In actuality in only provided 3% due to the conventional power plants having to spin near capacity to fill in the power dips from the wind.  The same goes for solar.

The interesting thing is that society in general consumes 60% of power when the sun is not shining.  SHEC Energy's 24/7 base-load power plants can deliver this at far less cost than solar panels with battery storage and at a cost close to, or at grid parity.
SHEC Energy’s technology innovations include a solar concentrator that reduces cost by about 75% over convention technologies and a thermal energy system that reduces cost by about 50%.
Why this is Important

This campaign is important to us because it will allow us to complete a full scale demonstration model of our technology, not only to economically collect solar energy, but to store it as well for 24 hour power generation. (note: further funds will be required to establish the energy storage portion of our proposed pilot plant)  This is very important for the world for energy independence and for a clean and renewable energy future and to reverse global warming.

We have a small group of investors who have supported our efforts for the last 16 years and now have to expand our capital base to achieve our goals.  Our operating budget has been very low compared to other organizations.  We have out-developed major organizations and even national government laboratories.  We need just $750,000 to complete our demonstration plant.  We have prospective customers all over the world that would like to see the demonstration plant before committing to orders.  This is a game changing technology that can move us off of polluting fossil and nuclear fuels to a clean and sustainable energy future and make a big impact in reversing global warming.

We are legitimate and as evidence of that have been awarded and received a grant of $200,000 from The Canadian Industrial Research Assistance Program. We were awarded a grant for $2 million from Sustainable Development Technology Canada but due to being unable to provide the 2 to 1 matching funds required to receive the grant, had to give up the funds. We have also been awarded a 25 million Euro grant from a government in Germany, but again require matching funds from the private sector to obtain funds from the grant. In the process of being awarded these significant grants, a team is sent out to review our technology and operations in depth. The governments issuing these grants are responsible for the public purse and want to make sure public funds are invested wisely. Governments however will not flip the entire bill and require participation from the private sector.  The fact that we had received these grant awards shows the credibility of our technology.

We have further had our technology evaluated by a government lab with a positive report.  We have further been sponsored by both the Canadian Government and the US Department of Energy on international trade missions.
<div>
<h3>What We Need &amp
We require $750,000 to complete a demonstration plant.  Funds will be used to purchase material and pay for personnel to complete the construction of the pilot plant.

We are the only company in the world as far as we know that will be able to produce what is called Base-Load solar power in a price range of 6.5 to 10 cents per kWh.  Base-Load means power 24 hours a day.  This is very important since society consumes 60% of their power when the sun is not shining.  This is a price that will not require government subsidies to implement and will greatly help the economy by eliminating the costs associated with the import and defense of foreign oil. This is a technology that can save trillions of dollars of tax payer money over time in the importation and defense of limited supplies of oil and gas.  In contrast there is enough solar energy hitting the planet to power society 8,000 times over.
Funds will be applied to the project as we go.  If we do not reach our goal, we are seeking other funding sources in parallel to help us achieve this goal.

We will issue you a Hero of the Planet certificate and other items based on donation levels in recognition of your contribution in helping us change the energy landscape of the future from polluting and limited energy sources to a clean and sustainable energy future.  What you really get in return is contributing to humanities clean energy future, and that is good for everyone including our children and grandchildren.
<div>
The Impact
We the people have the power to change the future to a bright, clean, sustainable and energy self sufficient future.

Global climate change is happening at a far faster rate than previously predicted. The real threat of war in the Middle east could cause global energy disruption and topple world economies. The work we are doing at SHEC is of vital importance to the future of the world in providing a clean energy source and for energy independence and energy security of the world.

The reason this resource has had limited entry into the market is because it has traditionally been very expensive, requiring subsidies and does not work when the sun does not shine.  We have now, after 16 long years of development with the singular focus of producing a 24 hour base-load solution to be low cost, have now achieved that goal.  We have built numerous prototypes and field tested much of the technology with great success.  These last developments bring our cost down to the point of being competitive with fossil fuels.  This was our mandate.

In fact, out numerical models for the new technology show that in mass production, we could achieve a solar concentrator cost of $35 per square meter (square yard).  That is half the cost of that the Department of Energy (DOE) has targeted for 2020.  Not only have we halved the cost, but have done so 8 years ahead of the DOE target date.
To see our press coverage go to: www.shecenergy.com/press
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
<div>
If you can't make a donation, there are other ways you can help:
Help us educate your neighbors, friends and colleges by telling them there is now an clean, renewable and economical alternative to polluting fossil and nuclear fuels.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to tell others!
Download a brochure to share with others at: www.shecenergy.com/donate
Thank you for your contribution towards making a better planet for us, our children and grandchildren.

","My Vision
I am Tom Beck, the CEO of SHEC Energy Corporation.
My vision for the future is:
1) A clean and sustainable renwable energy future that is cost affective
2) Transition to electric and hybrid electric vehicles to reduce the requirement of fossil fuels
3) Reduction of green house gases
4) Abundant renewable energy to stop proliferation of nuclear materials that can be used to make nuclear weapons
An Example for the World
North America

In North America, the United States is heavily dependent on fossil fuels, much of which it imports from areas of the world that are subject to disruption from countries that are politically hostile to the United States.

North America can become energy independent with the broad adoption of SHEC Energy's low cost 24/7 base-load solar power.  This would require the adoption of electric vehicles on a large scale as well.

Interestingly enough, electric vehicles require less power than it costs to make gasoline to operate a gas car.  This means we would not require a large build-out of new power infrastructure, but instead SHEC Energy's technology is well suited to retrofitting existing fossil fuel and nuclear steam power plants.  This solution means the investments in existing power generation infrastructure is preserved while allowing the much faster deployment of renewable power using SHEC Energy's technology.

Even If the Unites States eliminates the importation of overseas oil and gas, it will still be required for operating trucks, aircraft and ships. The reduced usage can be totally supplied by Canada, who's reserves are larger than Saudi Arabia.

Reciprocally, The United States has better solar conditions than Canada and therefore could be a net exporter of solar energy to Canada.  This offers a balance of energy trade to North America closest neighbors.
Europe
Likewise, Europe and other geographically close trading counties can adopt the same principle. North Africa for example is an ideal location for solar power generation in close proximity to Europe.
Iran
Iran would not have to build a nuclear capability and could rely upon the abundance of solar energy available in the region.  There would be no excuse to go nuclear.

Nuclear is not an option.  After the useful life of a nuclear power plant of about 30 years, it has to be decommissioned at about the same cost it took to build it.  Then there is the radioactive waste issue that will be around for 250,000 years.  Who will pay for that?  I am sure it is not the power utilities and nuclear companies that will long have gone out of business, but the legacy of our offspring.  How selfish for this generation to live at the expense of generations to come.  It is no longer necessary with SHEC Energy's technology.
Vision Summary
Humanity can go two ways.
1) A clean sustainable energy future or
2) A scorched Earth policy.
We have the technology to achieve vision 1.
Planetary Emergency

There is a Planetary Emergency as the polar icecap is melting at an accelerated rate and will be gone in 8 years. There is fear that methane under the icecap will be released and greatly accelerate global warming. (see the news article on www.shecenergy.com/donate )

When I started this company 16 years ago, my motivation was clean air, as air pollution in large cities impacted my health.  Now we are faced with a global emergency with the polar ice cap predicted to melt before 2020.  This could have dire consequences to humanity.  This may cause the release of methane trapped in the permafrost to be released. Methane is 25 times more potent as a greenhouse gas than carbon dioxide.  The polar ice cap is also reflective and redirects sunlight back out into space. With that gone, the oceans could absorb more heat and cause the further acceleration of global warming to the point of no recovery.

Human settlement, agricultural food production and fisheries have been established based on long term weather patterns spanning centuries.  These can suddenly change, dramatically affecting climate and food production.

I feel a very urgent need to as quickly as possible transition off of polluting energy sources.  There is a huge disconnect with the publics unawareness of this emergency. I hope with this campaign to broaden the publics awareness, whether they contribute or not to our renewable energy initiative to get society off of polluting energy sources.

Short Summary

I'm Nalani, along with my husband Colin and our daughters, Inoa and Caoimhe, we have become a surrogate family to our nanny Josie (Diosyvel G. Morales). Josie was there for us when Caoimhe was born, helps us with our daughters and keeping everything in perfect working order.

Josie has spent the past 10 years working diligently away from her three children to provide them with schooling, housing and a life she couldn't provide for them if she were working in the Philippines. One of her biggest joys was finally finishing her house. It was put up in pieces over those four years and she had just had the last tiles put down in the small two room house. Then disaster struck and her house as well as the houses of all of her family were swept away. Thankfully, no one was injured, but her house was destroyed and now her children and other family members are living and sleeping outdoors until she can come up with a plan for rebuilding. Every little bit will help her get her family's safety and dreams back on track!
<h3>What We Need &amp

All of the funds will go to Josie to rebuild her house. These funds will help her build the first room of the house for her children and extended family to live in. Anything else will help in adding the second room and kitchen.
The perks of funding are a handwritten thank you note from Josie and our family as well as email updates and pictures of the progress of the house build.
If we don't reach our goal all of the money will still go to Josie to help her get started in building her new house.
The Impact
This will have a huge transformative impact on Josie, help her see what amazing things people can do and take a lot of the weight off of her shoulders as a mother living far away from her children.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot donate then please share this campaign with anyone and everyone you know.
http://edition.cnn.com/2013/10/14/world/asia/philippines-earthquake/

http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/11/12/philippines-typhoon-death-toll-_n_4258049.html

Hello guys my name is Searinoxx and i'm a passionate furry lover, ive been a furry for 9 years and would love to express my love for the furdom. My project here today is to try create a network of furries that can hang out and meet new furries easily, your contributions would allow me to get the software i need to create the website much better than what i am currently using ((notepad))
<h3>What We Need &amp
My funding goal is £750 and it will all be going towards the software for the website and the server costs and domain costs, i have a few rewards set up for funding me, they are as follows,

at £5 i will send out a badge with the furrycn logo on it
£10: early access to the site, also official beta testing priviledges so you can find bugs and report back to us, also access to a special forum area
at £25: oppotunity to become a mod of the forums to help us make sure there isnt any trouble makers, also a furrycc website t-shirt
and at £50 live chat with the creators of the website where you can give us suggestions during development
if i dont reach my funding goal the money will go towards buying the server and domain and ill still try and bring the website online just as fast as if i had the software
The Impact

the furry communication network will be a massive site with different sections, including artwork, stories, and a live chat made with AJAX, i think my site could be a needed site as there isnt many furry network sites around, its been my wish to create this site for 5 years, and you guys can help make it happen
Other Ways You Can Help

if you arent able to donate or maybe even if you are could you please get the word around about my campaign, help it get more viewers it would mean alot to me, dont forget indiegogo has share tools to help you

Cory Shultz came home one day to find that his house has been robbed. Everything that the thief’s could get their hands on they took. Electronics, computers, recording devices, and even his clothes.

The police told him that if he has serial numbers to his stuff, (which he had) there was a chance he could get his stuff back. He found every serial number for his possessions, and when he tried to take it in to the police station, they informed him the case had already been closed and will not receive further investigation. After less than 24 hours of the case being opened.

Cory had disaster insurance on his home, but could not afford to have his electronics insured due to the high cost of the policy. Cory had an alarm installed when he moved in, but the robbers somehow got past it and ripped the keypad off the wall.

Cory works as a self employed gaming journalist. It has been his dream since he was 13 to become a journalist, and he has been going to school to make that dream come true. He created a website about 5 years ago, and while has seen some success, the life of a gaming journalist doesn’t pay that well.
Cory lost everything he needs to keep working. His computer, TV, gaming systems, over 200 games, video capture hardware and software. All of these items are not cheap.

If you can donate any money at all to help Cory gets back on his feet that would be amazing. He is currently trying to replace some of his possessions like his clothes, but he will need help with the rest of the costs. Cory has been working extremely hard for almost 5 years to become a gaming journalist. If you would like to check out some of his work you can visit his website at http://www.4logpc.com

America is in trouble - our economy is in ruins, our government is bankrupt, and people are broke! Our goal is to fill an important need to help the people on the bottom out - through affordable housing. Using the best of green technology, we can build low income housing that will provide a cheaper and safer alternative for people of meager means, by lowering energy requirements, insurance costs, and upkeep/maintenance expenses.
Did you know?
41% of renters earn less than 20,000 per year, which is less than 325 per week

The experts tell us that not more than 30% of an individual's gross income should go for housing, including utilities. That means the worker earning $8.32/hour cannot pay more than $100-$125 per week for his or her shelter.
(Note: Figures are based on the 2005 dollar.)
Only 16% of available housing are under 450 per month, while many people are just barely scraping by right now.

We've all noticed the economic hardships and we know things are only going to get worse, thats why we need to pave the way for lower housing costs now, this is a small but significant way we can begin to help people, by building these rental units, we can begin to change the scene across America for renters everywhere! Examples of these are already starting to spring up across the US (See www.Domeliving.com for more information) and people are waiting in line to get into these.

My goal is simple - I want to build as many of these things as I can, in every state (starting with North Carolina) and help as many people as possible.

Some of the benefits of these rental cabins.

50% cheaper to heat/cool, due to the insulation and design.
Much cheaper to insure - Fema classifies these buildings as virtually indestructable. Natural disasters don't hurt them, they are fireproof, can withstand tornadoes and hurricanes safely.
Much cheaper to repair/maintain - due to the design and materials, they simply do not break easily or often, the durability further helps to lower the final cost of the rent.
<div>
What We Need
This is where you come in -

We are attempting to raise $250,000 to begin building 7 of these cabins at the Living Well Community in Franklinville NC - (see http://www.walksoftlyontheearth.com/our-green-communities/the-living-well-community.aspx ) Cost includes the price of the land lots to begin building.

Each unit costs about $30,000 to build. Lots are going to be $40,000 unless we can buy 2 and then it will be $30,000 per lot. We currently have 10,000 to put into this project - we need $250,000 to make it work.
Once the first 7 are built, which should take less than 6 months. We will move on the next 7 as quickly as possible.

This project is not going to happen without your help! If we fall short of the total goal, thats ok! we can get started on this project for as low as 70,000 (the first dome) although this is not very efficient, we really wanna see these things grow and grow and spread across the US in various shapes and sizes until we can replace costly traditional housing with all of its costly upkeep and energy in-efficiency.
<div>
The Impact

The Living Well Community is the first of many projects (we hope!) and will begin to show people that there is a better way to live, by being more efficient with our designs and learning to appreciate and respect nature, we can be an example to other communities, and inspire people to start taking care of the world, as she takes care of us.
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this with others, get the word out and lets start a movement together.

All those who contribute 100 or more will receive a custom 1oz copper coin to show that you helped us make this a reality.
A note from the Builder -
I want to thank everyone for reading, sharing and contributing to this project, its YOUR help that makes this possible, thank you so much!

If this project interests you, but you would prefer to LOAN the money or part of it to build some of these domes, please contact me - we have no problem paying the money back on these projects with or without interest (up to you!) We just want to get as many of these units built and filled as we can to spread this idea across our state/the USA.
","America is in trouble - our economy is in ruins, our government is bankrupt, and people are broke! Our goal is to fill an important need to help the people on the bottom out - through affordable housing. Using the best of green technology, we can build low income housing that will provide a cheaper and safer alternative for people of meager means, by lowering energy requirements, insurance costs, and upkeep/maintenance expenses.
Did you know?
41% of renters earn less than 20,000 per year, which is less than 325 per week

The experts tell us that not more than 30% of an individual's gross income should go for housing, including utilities. That means the worker earning $8.32/hour cannot pay more than $100-$125 per week for his or her shelter.
(Note: Figures are based on the 2005 dollar.)
Only 16% of available housing are under 450 per month, while many people are just barely scraping by right now.

We've all noticed the economic hardships and we know things are only going to get worse, thats why we need to pave the way for lower housing costs now, this is a small but significant way we can begin to help people, by building these rental units, we can begin to change the scene across America for renters everywhere! Examples of these are already starting to spring up across the US (See www.Domeliving.com for more information) and people are waiting in line to get into these.

My goal is simple - I want to build as many of these things as I can, in every state (starting with North Carolina) and help as many people as possible.Some of the benefits of these rental cabins.50% cheaper to heat/cool, due to the insulation and design.

Cutting crown molding has never been easier. 

Have you ever tried to improve your home with crown molding, but absolutely lost your mind when trying to get it right? Guess what? It’s your lucky day! Let us introduce: Onecut.

Onecut is the world’s first truly universal stand-alone tool that provides you with the miter angle for cutting crown molding. It's patented, saves you time and cuts costs. Once you try it – you can’t be without it.
column2:
> 

 

What's in it for me?

column1: • Efficiently measures and provides you with the correct angle for cutting.
• Simple design that enables you to be more productive.
• Stores correct angle reliably, which minimizes the risk of having to take new measurements.
• Keeps accurate angle even if the saw blade is put close to the CA-block.
• Reduces risk of cutting at the wrong angle, which saves you both time and money.
• Ensures a reliable result and minimizes the risk of damages because of its robust construction.

column2:
wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">

How does it work?

Onecut helps you find the miter angle for cutting crown molding, see Figure 1. It provides and stores the miter angle, which is the corner angle, divided in half. The cutting angle block (CA-block), shown in Figure 1 with the white arrow, provides this miter angle. The product can then, without adjustments or calculations, be directly transferred onto the cutting device. The user puts Onecut on the cutting device and adjusts the saw blade after the CA-block, which can be seen in Figure 2.
column3:
>

 

Who’s it for?

It’s for anyone, both amateurs and professionals, who’s looking for a seamless way to take on crown molding installations, along with other molding projects such as base molding, all kinds of frames and many other woodwork projects.

You can even adjust it to suit your needs. It makes no difference whether it’s an outer angle or an inner angle you have to measure. In addition you can keep Onecut up against the saw for a precise cut. It will save you time and money through less scrap and guesswork. No calculations and no complicated settings of the saw. No more trial and error and no more ugly gaps in crown molding joints. Yay!
column4:
>

 

What are others saying about Onecut?

""The time saving is the biggest advantage of Onecut. It could replace the machinist square and be carried in your dungarees instead!"" - Rickard Eriksson, CEO of Vittjärvshus.
column5: >
column6:
>

 What saw can I use with Onecut?
column7:
>

 

Background

The initial idea behind Onecut was originated by the Swedish inventor and amateur carpenter Peter Vallerström. Peter has a passion for quality woodwork and back in the 80’s (true story) he decided to build his own house in Jokkmokk, in the north of Sweden. It all went really well but when he was to put base molding and crown molding around the house (as the finishing touch) he had problems finding a tool that could provide him with the correct miter angle.

He identified a gap on the market and thought about this problem year after year. At last, five years ago now, through his vision to find a way to make all the hard work with crown molding much easier he came up with the idea to Onecut.

From that moment the tool has evolved as a prototype. Peter has teamed up with the rest of us and together we’ve been putting our hearts and souls into perfecting Onecut´s form and function. Now we have a international patent and are ready to launch. Onecut is designed to find and store the correct angle for cutting and it does this as a stand-alone product. It has a simple design, which allows both DIY amateur and professional carpenters to use it.
column8:
>

 

The team
column9:
>

Why InDemand?

Truth be told, we’ve been blown away by the Indiegogo community´s incredible support we’ve seen on other projects. And we simply can’t do this without your support. Starting manufacturing is a huge deal that costs a lot of money. So please help us on our mission to find a way to make crown molding installations easier, cheaper and less time consuming. We can’t launch this new and unique product without you.
column10:
>

 

Material

Onecut will be made of a ABS plastic that withstand rough environments (plus that it will be able to be folded into a protecting shell). ABS plastic has many good qualities such as low weight, good strength and dimensional stability. The material is characterized by good impact strength, surface hardness and surface finish. It’s recyclable, resistant to acids, alkaline solutions, alcohol, grease, oil, salt solutions and saturated hydrocarbons.

ABS stands for “Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene”. The acrylonitrile improves strength, chemical resistance and provides less risk of stress cracking compared to polystyrene (PS). The impact strength is very good even at lower temperatures. We will also add a UV stabilizer to improve Onecut´s UV resistance.
column11:
> 

 

Specifications
column12:
>

What's next?

We want you to have your Onecut as soon as possible. Here’s our plan to achieve that:

January/February: Make lots of new Kickstarter/Indiegogo friends, execute manufacturing agreements/standards.
March/April: Finalize the engineering and prototype iterations and place the tooling orders.
May: Tooling build-out and procurement of raw materials and components.
June: Part qualification and pre-production builds, pilot production, quality assurance and product validation.
July/Aug: Begin manufacturing for the injection molded and blow-molded parts. Finalize the assembly and shipment process and begin fulfillment.

Thank you

Thank you all for your support - it means the world to us. / The Onecut team

We also want to give a special thank you to a bunch of people who have helped us in different ways with our Kickstarter/Indiegogo: Olle Enqvist, Ludwig Sterner, Christoffer Persson, Johan Nordström, Fatime Nedzipovska, Moses Shenge, Rehanna Svedin, Fredrik Gullberg, Jay Mitchinga Sseruwagi, Björn Grundström, Elias Liedholm, Amina Kesraoui, Hannes Hemme and Göran Sterner.
and for the creator of our video music: Funny Song - Bensound.com
and the footage from the beautiful home: Videezy.com 

Thank you.

Media inquiries: press@onecut.io — Press Kit
Phone: +4672 173 03 52
Skype: karolina.friberg
column14:
>

The Briarwood pool has been a community gathering place for decades. A safe place for kids to meet and cool off, for parents to relax and talk with other neighbors as well as the Dolphins home pool for swim meets.  The YMCA needs $43,000 by March 1 in order to open the pool this spring.  Losing the pool is something we'd all like to avoid but we need your help.  With over 1000 hits on our Facebook page in a very short time we now need your show of support on this site.  Please give what you can.  If the Y opens the pool, funds raised from this site will go to support that effort.  If they don't open the pool, funds will be returned to those who donated through this site, less Idiegogo's handling fees.

You Never Really Clean Your Dishes

What is the germiest thing in the house? Surprisingly it's not your toilet. That wet stinky smelly thing in your kitchen, a natural and fertile breeding ground for bacteria, might be the dirtiest thing you touch everyday. It's actually a bacterial-growing incubator rather than a cleaning device. Well, this is a bit gross... But think about doing dishes with a regular kitchen sponge with almost 54 billion bugs crawling around. (Scientific Reports, Article number: 5791, 2017) Don't even bother cleaning it. Microwave or dishwasher does not seem to help a lot as these devices turn the bacteria towards other disease causing species. And most sponges just can't survive those machines and they fall apart finally.
There Has to be a Better Sponge for You and for the Planet

Surprised? Shocked? We are supposed and suggested to throw them away immediately and get a new one... Then replace them week by week rather than month by month. Seems not to be a big matter. They are cheap. They are cheap plastics actually. We get healthier and safer but the planet gets dirtier and sicker. Why are we so wasteful and forgetful when it comes to sponges? We feel that there has to be a better way.

We use food-grade silicone and permitted firming agents to make a new type of long-lasting reusable kitchen sponge to replace your traditional month-to-month or week-to-week one and make an effort to be a little more green and a lot less wasteful.
Cleanest Kitchen Product Ever Made
Ultimately soft and non-slippery, this guy is serious and harsh enough to do heavy-duty cleaning with good scrubbing power and tiny fine bubbles. No bacteria, no stress, no mess.
Get Your Dishes to Sparkle without Any Scratch
Use it forcefully and forgivingly. Whether it's your plastic container or fine china teapot, this sponge is gentle on your hands as well as effective on grease and stuck-on food.
These Sponges Really Dry

Looking just like the traditional sponge, it actually has an oddly different and comfortable texture with much bigger holes. It's not porous or absorbent, so it doesn't hold bacteria or water the same way as the traditional sponge does.  Silicone is impervious to water and water can't penetrate it. This helps you a lot in your effort to reduce bacteria on dishes as bacteria cannot set up camp easily. Because of its physical structure and makeup, it gets a whole lot less gross. Simply squeeze or twist it dry and then hang it on the wall.
<h2>Just Very Reusable &amp
Ultra indestructible and stretchy, silicone does not lose its flexibility or break down over time.
After 3 months of use...
When Dull is Good for the Planet

When it comes to the environment, silicone is endlessly recyclable and chemically inactive. There are as yet no known health hazards of silicone. When plastic is burned, it releases highly dangerous and toxic chemicals. Unlike plastics, silicone does not give off any toxic material and therefore would not cause pollution or animal deaths.
These Babies Can Take the Heat and the Cold
Silicone is non-reactive, stable and resistant to extremely high and low temperatures. You can send the sponge to dishwasher or microwave, you don't really need to though.
SGS/RoHS/FDA Certified

Incorporate these sponges into your daily or weekly cleaning routine in kitchen, bedroom, living room, bathroom or virtually anywhere for revolutionarily easy and healthy cleaning. Each pack includes 2 sponges, one in red and one in yellow.
Risks and challenges

We can guarantee that first shipment will go out no later than Feb 2019 if we successfully get funded. We are committed to meet your expectations without any possible delay in production or delivery. We rate the risk of unexpected delay as being very low.
