Tired of messy, beat-up sponges? Replace them with Kali - the antibacterial dishcloth that contains bamboo kun - it’ll make it much easier to keep your house clean! The Kali absorbs a lot of liquid, washes any surfaces to perfection, and can be easily self-washed under a running tap. Want to make caring after your home easy and comfortable? The Kali is your choice!

We’re using sponges to keep our dishes and the area around kitchen sink clean… But in doing so, we’re turning these sponges into dirtiest objects in our homes - a paradox! It’s a fact long proven by the British scientists, and it’s often discussed in the media:

Yes, when a sponge is visibly dirty and starts to emit foul odor, we throw it out, but does it solve the problem? Not at all - bacteria infest the sponge since day 1, and are not affected by dishwashing liquids. Some can even survive microwaves:

Get rid of the bacteria breeding ground in your own kitchen, switch your sponge for The Kali!

The Kali is a special antibacterial dishcloth. Thanks to its unique bristles, it cleans any surface perfectly…

...and is easily self-cleaned with tap water

The Kali will help you wash your dishes easily, and keep your kitchen clean!

The Kali is made of super-porous material - bamboo fiber, which absorbs three times more liquid than ordinary cotton

The bamboo fibers which compose The Kali’s material contain natural antiseptic - the bamboo kun. This substance destroys up to 70% of bacteria and prevents them from multiplying

The Kali allows you to keep any surface clean, not only dishes - from tabletops and shelves to home appliances. The Kali removes all stains, leaving no traces or stains.

Wear-resistant, sturdy and dense, The Kali will serve you 20-30 times longer than ordinary sponges, fully keeping its properties along the way. Ultimately, when you consider its service time, The Kali turns out to be cheaper than the obsolete solutions

How I came up with The Kali?

It all started pretty simple - I caught a cold. Nothing too serious, pretty common in Fall, but a week later my ear was aching pretty badly. I was looked at by the doctors, and they said the reason was the Moraxella Catarrhails bacteria, which often resides on dishes. This was the final drop. I’ve long been fed up with these pieces of foam - they keep tearing up, are hard to clean, take a while to dry. It’s really uncomfortable when there’s dirt in your kitchen, more so when this “dirt” can give you an infection.

I’ve decided to use rags instead - they’re dense, are quicker to dry, and more convenient. But the regular cloth didn’t fit - it was bad at dishwashing, and wasn’t much better at self-cleaning than sponges were.

I needed a special kind of rag, with piles and antiseptic and ecological material. Half a year of research later and it became clear - I needed a dishcloth out of bamboo fiber.

In early 2019 it was clear to me that such dishcloth could potentially replace sponges entirely, ridding us of these concentrations of dirt. I traveled to China to visit a factory that could fulfill an order based on my project. The prototype had proved itself perfect - the dishcloth is amazing at its job and washes all surfaces easily and effectively while serving for a long time.

So here I am, offering The Kali to you. Let’s get rid of bacteria!

The Kali is your choice!We’re using sponges to keep our dishes and the area around kitchen sink clean… But in doing so, we’re turning these sponges into dirtiest objects in our homes - a paradox! It’s a fact long proven by the British scientists, and it’s often discussed in the media:Yes, when a sponge is visibly dirty and starts to emit foul odor, we throw it out, but does it solve the problem? Not at all - bacteria infest the sponge since day 1, and are not affected by dishwashing liquids. Some can even survive microwaves:Get rid of the bacteria breeding ground in your own kitchen, switch your sponge for The Kali!The Kali is a special antibacterial dishcloth. Thanks to its unique bristles, it cleans any surface perfectly…...and is easily self-cleaned with tap waterThe Kali will help you wash your dishes easily, and keep your kitchen clean!The Kali is made of super-porous material - bamboo fiber, which absorbs three times more liquid than ordinary cottonThe bamboo fibers which compose The Kali’s material contain natural antiseptic - the bamboo kun. This substance destroys up to 70% of bacteria and prevents them from multiplyingThe Kali allows you to keep any surface clean, not only dishes - from tabletops and shelves to home appliances. The Kali removes all stains, leaving no traces or stains.Wear-resistant, sturdy and dense, The Kali will serve you 20-30 times longer than ordinary sponges, fully keeping its properties along the way. Ultimately, when you consider its service time, The Kali turns out to be cheaper than the obsolete solutionsHow I came up with The Kali?It all started pretty simple - I caught a cold. Nothing too serious, pretty common in Fall, but a week later my ear was aching pretty badly. I was looked at by the doctors, and they said the reason was the Moraxella Catarrhails bacteria, which often resides on dishes. This was the final drop. I’ve long been fed up with these pieces of foam - they keep tearing up, are hard to clean, take a while to dry. It’s really uncomfortable when there’s dirt in your kitchen, more so when this “dirt” can give you an infection.I’ve decided to use rags instead - they’re dense, are quicker to dry, and more convenient. But the regular cloth didn’t fit - it was bad at dishwashing, and wasn’t much better at self-cleaning than sponges were.I needed a special kind of rag, with piles and antiseptic and ecological material. Half a year of research later and it became clear - I needed a dishcloth out of bamboo fiber.In early 2019 it was clear to me that such dishcloth could potentially replace sponges entirely, ridding us of these concentrations of dirt. I traveled to China to visit a factory that could fulfill an order based on my project. The prototype had proved itself perfect - the dishcloth is amazing at its job and washes all surfaces easily and effectively while serving for a long time.So here I am, offering The Kali to you. Let’s get rid of bacteria!",22.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","New York, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/kali-is-your-everlasting-antibacterial-dishcloth/pica
0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div> <h3>
<span style=""font-size: 16px
column5: >Throughout New York City, thousands of citizens are engaged in a classic ""David and Goliath"" fight.
column9: >“Goliath” is New York City and the Department of Housing Development and Preservation (HPD). When these these New Yorkers entered into one of HPD's affordable housing programs they all believed that they had finally attained the American dream of homeownership, only to find that the homes that HPD sold them turned out to be the “American Nightmare.” The problems these residents face in their homes range from serious structural problems, such as leaky roofs, faulty wiring and plumbing, lack of insulation, raw sewage backup, to windows and doors that literally fall off the building. And when these homeowners try to get some relief from the City and HPD they get nothing but excuses, more lies, and a bureaucratic run around that is nothing short of criminal. HPD denies responsibility, the contractors vanish or even worse, continue to be awarded work funded by our tax dollars!

column1: <h3><span style=""font-size: 16px
column5:
>

Homeowners do not have the resources to take on a battle with large developers or the City. To add insult to injury when the homeowners turn to their elected officials for help, they are accused of defaming the contractors. Recently one of the most prolific and powerful developers of HPD housing slapped three homeowners with a $4.25 million defamation lawsuit, claiming that they damaged his reputation when they wrote letters to their elected officials asking for help in getting their homes repaired. Thankfully the judge assigned to the case saw this action for what it was, an attempt to silence these New Yorkers, and dismissed the case.

column1: But the damage is done. Homeowners are scared to come forward. They are scared that if they bring their concerns to their elected officials, lawsuits meant to intimidate and silence them will be filed. All these people want is for HPD and their City to live up to their commitments. They cannot fight this battle alone. They need our help.
<h3><span style=""font-size: 16px
column5: >New York City's well meaning but poorly executed plan to develop hundreds of thousands of units of affordable housing has left hundreds of homeowners with lemons. Unscrupulous contractors are not being held accountable by the city agency HPD and the homeowners have no where to turn for help.

column1: We need to raise money for legal fees to try and help homeowners get the repairs they need and recover funds they've already sunk into these poorly constructed homes.

","Throughout New York City, thousands of citizens are engaged in a classic ""David and Goliath"" fight. “Goliath” is New York City and the Department of Housing Development and Preservation (HPD). When these these New Yorkers entered into one of HPD's affordable housing programs they all believed that they had finally attained the American dream of homeownership, only to find that the homes that HPD sold them turned out to be the “American Nightmare.” The problems these residents face in their homes range from serious structural problems, such as leaky roofs, faulty wiring and plumbing, lack of insulation, raw sewage backup, to windows and doors that literally fall off the building. And when these homeowners try to get some relief from the City and HPD they get nothing but excuses, more lies, and a bureaucratic run around that is nothing short of criminal. HPD denies responsibility, the contractors vanish or even worse, continue to be awarded work funded by our tax dollars!

Homeowners do not have the resources to take on a battle with large developers or the City. To add insult to injury when the homeowners turn to their elected officials for help, they are accused of defaming the contractors. Recently one of the most prolific and powerful developers of HPD housing slapped three homeowners with a $4.25 million defamation lawsuit, claiming that they damaged his reputation when they wrote letters to their elected officials asking for help in getting their homes repaired. Thankfully the judge assigned to the case saw this action for what it was, an attempt to silence these New Yorkers, and dismissed the case.

But the damage is done. Homeowners are scared to come forward. They are scared that if they bring their concerns to their elected officials, lawsuits meant to intimidate and silence them will be filed. All these people want is for HPD and their City to live up to their commitments. They cannot fight this battle alone. They need our help.

New York City's well meaning but poorly executed plan to develop hundreds of thousands of units of affordable housing has left hundreds of homeowners with lemons. Unscrupulous contractors are not being held accountable by the city agency HPD and the homeowners have no where to turn for help.
We need to raise money for legal fees to try and help homeowners get the repairs they need and recover funds they've already sunk into these poorly constructed homes.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div data-id=""12928913""><figure style=""margin: 0px
column3:
>

　

Bagel is the only tape measure you will ever need. With three different measuring modes, Bagel lets you measure just about anything.

It can also save measurements, record voice memos, and send data to its mobile app, where you can easily organize and analyze your measurements. That’s why we call Bagel a smart tape measure.

한국어
column4:
>

　

We all measure size in our daily lives. Whether it’s for a DIY home improvement project or for measuring body size, everyone uses a tape measure. 

Despite the various uses for a tape measure, the way we measure size has remained the same for more than a century. It’s about time that we stop trying so hard to read tiny numbers and markings on tape measures.
column5: >
column6: >It's time to innovate the way we measure size.
column7:
>

   

Bagel is easy to use. Select one mode from three different measuring modes, take a measurement, then click the save button to save your data.

You can also choose to add a voice memo that describes what you measured. As soon as you connect Bagel to its mobile app, this voice recording will be automatically converted into text and tagged to your measurement.
column8: >
column9: >How to use Bagel in 4 steps
column11:
>

　

You can use Bagel's string mode to measure length like you would with a traditional tape measure. Its flexible yet strong string allows you to easily measure curved objects and surfaces, various body types, and- needless to say- flat surfaces. Bagel's string mode can measure up to about 10 feet (3 meters).
column14: >
column18:
>

　

Wheel mode is great when you don’t have both hands available to measure length or distance. Just switch to Bagel's wheel mode and roll its wheel. Wheel mode is perfect for measuring distance on curved surfaces and can measure up to about 33 feet (10 meters).
column21: >
column25:
>

　

When you want to measure the distance to areas that are far away or hard to reach, use Bagel’s remote mode. Simply point the ultrasonic sensor at objects, walls, or ceilings and Bagel will tell you how far away they are. The remote mode automatically activates a laser that points at your target spot to indicate where you are measuring. You can measure up to 16 feet 4 inches (5 meters) in remote mode.
column28: >
column32:
Voice Memos

After taking your measurement, save the data with just a click of a button. You can also choose to record a voice memo that describes what you just measured. Never experience the hassle of going back and forth between your notepad and tape measure!
column33:
>

 

Bluetooth Connectivity

We wouldn’t call Bagel smart if that was all. You can connect Bagel to your smartphone via Bluetooth and transfer all of your measurements to Bagel’s mobile app.
column34:
>

　

Mobile App

Use Bagel’s app and never lose measurements again. You can browse through your measurements, all of which are tagged with a voice memo. Additionally, take advantage of the app's ability to export your data as CSV to use on your computer.

If you want to track your body size, simply open up a graph that will display how your measurements have changed over time. 

Both iOS and Android versions of the mobile app will be available for free.
column35:
>

　

Internal Memory

You don't have to connect Bagel to your smartphone every time you want to take a look at past measurements. Bagel has internal memory that can save up to 100 measurements and voice memos. You can easily bring up all of your logs on its digital display.
column36:
>

　

Battery

There’s no need to worry about replacing the batteries. Bagel is built with a lithium polymer battery that lasts up to 24 hours and averages 8 hours with constant use. Any micro USB cable lying around the house is fit to charge Bagel.
column37:
>

　

Selectable Units

Bagel is for everyone. Whether you use inches, centimeters, or millimeters to measure size, Bagel will adapt to meet your needs. On Bagel's mobile app, you can even choose to display your measurements in feet or meters.
column38:
>

 

Accuracy

We’ve experimented with various types of sensors, but decided to develop our own. Bagel’s sensor is backed by six patents and we couldn’t be more excited to share its abilities with you.
column39:
>

　

The error for all three modes should be within 0.5% under room temperature conditions. We are working hard on our firmware to lower the error margin and will provide all updates on any accuracy improvements.
 

Durability

Bagel's casing is made of polycarbonate, which is known to have very high impact resistance. Watch how Bagel can withstand being run over by a car and a drop from 12ft (3.7m) in the video below.
column42:
>

 

Indiegogo Special Gifts

Our Kickstarter campaign that ran from June 29th to August 2nd reached its stretch goals and unlocked these accessories that will help you use Bagel. These are the two add-ons to Bagel that will be provided without extra charge.

 

1. The leveling tool is an accessory that you can attach to Bagel and easily remove depending on your preference. It will help you measure horizontal and vertical distances more accurately when you’re using Bagel’s remote mode.

2. The silicon case is designed protect Bagel from external shocks or scratches. Also, we added a belt clip and a strap to suit various needs.
column44: >

column1: We believe in the power of design. We’ve gone through numerous prototypes to make Bagel sleek and easy to hold. Take a look below to see how Bagel has evolved from its first design to its current and final design.
column2: >

column1:
We’ve come a long way since last June when we first came up with the idea to create a smart tape measure. 

Although size measurements are one of the most important ways to describe an object, measuring length or distances have been left to old, traditional tools such as a tape measure. 

We believed there was so much room to improve how we measure objects. Through digitizing size, our lives can be easier, better, and more efficient. 

With these beliefs in mind, our team spent countless nights designing, prototyping, testing, programming, and traveling across the globe to pitch our idea and receive feedback on Bagel.
column2: >

column1: We are a small, tight-knit team made strong by our members who are experienced professionals in various fields. Although we have different backgrounds in engineering, design, finance, and marketing, we all share one common goal: to innovate the way people measure size.
column3:
>

 

Tax Free Worldwide

Taxes and customs duties will be paid by Bagel Labs before Bagels are shipped out from our distribution centers in the US, the Netherlands, and South Korea.

 

Press Kit

If you are a member of the press and need more resources, please download our press kit or reach us at bagellabs@pmbcgroup.com

　

Images &
column4:
Video Downloads

Please feel free to share any of our Indiegogo page materials on social media. You can download more product images and videos from the links below.

column1: • Indiegogo Campaign Images
• Video Clips
• High Resolution Photos of Bagel

and tested through practice, is based on accumulating mind silence in real

stay in existence “Here and Now”, block the flow of thoughts, and heighten
awareness. The device is tailored for both first-timers and experienced
meditators.

<blockquote>
","Mediator is
a training simulator that is aimed at disengaging self-talk. Its work, tried
and tested through practice, is based on accumulating mind silence in real
time. As a result, you manage to terminate self-talk, accumulate the ability to
stay in existence “Here and Now”, block the flow of thoughts, and heighten
awareness. The device is tailored for both first-timers and experienced
meditators.
A

thought-free mind can be in two states, either in deep sleep or meditation. If your thoughts disappear and you are self-unaware, it is deep sleep. If thoughts disappear and you are self-aware, it is meditation.The best
way to disengage mind self-talk is, perhaps, meditation. But we can have
difficulty finding an appropriate place and time, or lack patience or simply
get bored. But with Mediator, used as a training simulator, it is real fun. In
initial stages it resembles a game: you forget you are being involved in the
process of awareness, but Mediator
insistently reminds you of your existence “Here” and seems to be
hoisting you out of your illusions into the moment of “Now”. What is more, the
longer you do it, the more interesting it gets. In due course the process of
terminating self-talk becomes automatic. At first it hardly lasts a second,
then seconds expand into minutes and awareness becomes unfathomed. If you have
ever flown in a dream and experienced the overwhelming happiness of the moment,
you can imagine this – tinged by nothing except for the great happiness “I am”
– existence “Here”. At a certain moment you begin to feel that the difference
between walking, working and sitting in silence is gone, totally gone.
Mediator teaches how to breathe correctly during a meditation practice.
The Zazen
breathing differs from all others. To start with, it aims at creating a slow,
natural and power-filled rhythm. If you can concentrate on a soft, long and
deep exhale, as well as on your posture, the inhale will be perfectly natural.
Mediator’s algorithm is designed with the view of gradually increasing
amplitude: with the help of the device the
intervals between inhales and exhales will eventually reach 8 minutes.
The air will be being breathed out quietly and slowly, thanks to which your
concentration on the meditation will be enhanced and your mind will be brought
to harmony. With the help of Mediator your mind will be in tune with your
being, all thanks to the Zazen breathing system. For a Zazen practice there are
earphones needed.
No other
practice can beat this one when striving to achieve personal freedom in
everyday life. Nurturing your unruffled inner silence through every day deep
meditation is surprisingly effective. This practice alone can immensely broaden
your life experience and fill with inexhaustible happiness and creative
vitality.
The deep meditation training mode combines the
functions of the breathing metronome, Theta waves and Ultrasonic vibrations. At
first Mediator will bring your breathing to order, then – together with
Ultrasonic vibration –terminate self-talk and gradually stabilise your brain in
tune with Theta waves. Mediator will not let you fall asleep or reengage your
self-talk during the whole meditation due to
its tailor-made programme algorithm.
While
meditating, one needs a quiet and calm mind, with no flow of thoughts switched
on.How can you
switch it off, if from dawn to dusk it is filled with incessant white noise?
Are you sure you can bring it to a halt at your own will only?
If you
enter a dining-room and they tell you good bye, if later you go there again and
hear the same answer, eventually you’ll take it there’s no food for you. That’s
how Mediator works. It trains the mind to gradually accumulate moments of
silence. Seconds amount to minutes and minutes to hours.  Thus, if during a meditation practice they
come to you for “food”, you’ll be able to say “Good bye, not now”. It doesn’t
mean you fight off your intelligence, no, you do accept it, as it is your own,
but now it is “brought up”, it is “well-bred”, it can wait and keep silent
while you’re busy with something else, i.e. meditating for the moment.
If you want
to examine something thoroughly, you should be attentive. Attention cannot be
forced without interest.  Mediator helps
one to feel what mind silence is, and the longer such a minute lasts, the
greater interest ensues. As a result, attention dominates everything and leads
to maximum concentration. And the moment something takes over, nothing can
either hamper or hinder it!

A  ""Samatha OM"" mediator has a

contains step by step instructions on how to use the Mediator and all its modes in meditation sessions. The designers retain the right to introduce any changes that have no impact on the

Overworked? Can’t sleep? Got the caffeine jitters? The Reviv blanket was developed by a bunch of stressed out visionaries and scientists to help you chillllll like a panda.

Reviv is made from 100% eco-friendly bamboo with the latest Lyocell Nanotechnology and is perfectly weighted to bring out your inner yogi. It's even thermoregulated and hypoallergenic—because who doesn’t want to feel awesome year-round? 

Get ready for the best sleep of your life.
column2:
>

 

At about 10% of your body weight, the Reviv blanket helps to relax your central nervous system by simulating the feeling of being hugged. This increases serotonin and melatonin, while decreasing the stress hormone cortisol—making you feel, well, pretty good.

Oh, and you know when your blanket is so soft and silky you kinda want to pet it and tell it it’s been a good boy? Well, that’s how you’ll feel about Reviv. It’s made with quilted stitching and bamboo fabric for a luxurious texture that’ll give you the feels. 



A blanket in the summer, who wants that? You’re trying to get to sleep, not build-your-own sweat lodge. But hold that thought...Because you want THIS blanket in the summer. No, seriously—you really do.

Reviv’s advanced Lyocell Bamboo fabric is your BFF year-round because it’s thermoregulated (that means it keeps you cool in the summer and warm in the winter). No more sweating under a heavy, sticky blanket on those humid August nights. You’ll be sleeping like a panda beneath the silky, cooling, calming weight of Reviv.

”
column3: wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">
column7:
>
 

Reviv is the very first blanket of its kind to be made with Lyocell Nanotechnology, and that gives it a ton of amazing properties. It’s thermoregulated, antibacterial, hypoallergenic, rich in color, and (most importantly) eco-friendly.

The scientific benefits of using a weighted blanket have been measurably proven to increase relaxation and decrease blood pressure. Other benefits include:
column8:
>
 

To make all that awesome stuff even better, we’ve weighted the Reviv blanket with smooth glass beads to improve the weight distribution, feel, and durability. Every blanket additionally comes with a removable machine washable cover and your choice of five super cool colors.
column9:
>
 

 We didn’t just set out to create a weighted blanket, we set out to create the BEST weighted blanket. That meant doing a ton of market research, sleeping under a different blanket every night, and testing, testing, and testing again. Here are some of our best features:
column12:
>
 

We’ve been throwing around the term “Bamboo Lyocell” a lot, but what does that actually mean? Well, Bamboo Lyocell is a natural fibre made with wood pulp from sustainable bamboo farms. Textiles made with Bamboo Lyocell are created through the use of nanotechnology that recovers or decomposes all solvents and emissions. 

Basically, Bamboo Lyocell is like the Batman of the fabrics world. It’s:

column1: • 100% biodegradable
• High-quality
• Eco-friendly
• Thermoregulated
• Antibacterial
• Smooth and silky
• Hypoallergenic
• Durable

column2:
>
 

 We source the raw wood pulp material used to create the Lycoell Bamboo fabric from the only company that holds the patent for the Lyocell process in China. See Patent  >
column10:
>
 

Weighted blankets are traditionally filled with plastic poly pellets. Although these complete the function of adding weight to the blanket, they can result in problems like rough texture, uneven weight distribution, and decreased blanket lifespan. 

We don’t want any of that, which is why we’ve used high-quality glass beads in the Reviv blanket instead. This gives our blankets:

column1: • Increased durability
• Even weight distribution
• A smooth, seamless texture
• Optimal comfort

column3:
>
 

Want to know the best way to ruin a feel-good, chilling out, relaxing moment? You throw your favorite blanket over your shoulders and get a whiff of something unpleasant. Maybe it’s stale Cheetos, or maybe it’s gone-off milk. But either way, it’s killing the vibe.

That’s why we’ve designed the Reviv blanket with a protective cover that’s easy to remove and wash. Because the Reviv blanket is crafted from 100% Lyocell Bamboo, it’s also guaranteed to stay fresh for longer. Bamboo fabrics are naturally antibacterial, antifungal, and odor resistant due to a bio-agent called “bamboo kun”  found in living bamboo fiber.
column4:
>
 

Every Reviv blanket cover is:

column1: • Made from eco-friendly Lyocell Bamboo (Say goodbye to itchy fabric and allergens!)
• Thermoregulated for breathability in summer, warmth in winter
• Made with 12 internal ties to ensure your blanket stays in place and tangle free

column3:
>
 

The Reviv blanket is now available in FIVE amazing colors. Choose from:
column6:
>
 

The Reviv blanket is for anyone who has ever felt stressed out, hyperactive, overworked, or had a bad night’s sleep. Weighted blankets can also be helpful to people with conditions such as:

column1: • ADHD
• Autism
• Post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD)
• Sleep disorders
• Nervous system disorders
Weighted blankets may additionally benefit:
• People who drink too much caffeine
• People who stay up too late watching Netflix
• Dudes who miss their mothers
• Work addicts

column2:
>

 

 We started with what was available in the market, researched ways that we could improve it, and then began designing and testing. The result of this process is the Reviv weighted Blanket that you see before you today. Witness our design process and some of our original sketches below.
column3: >
column4: >
column5: >
column6:
>
 

Reviv was pioneered by a team of entrepreneurs searching for a better way to relax. We tried and tested many different types of weighted blankets, but nothing really felt right. 

Being the kind of people who don’t settle for less than the best, we decided to make our own blanket instead. To achieve this, we combined our extensive experience in designing and manufacturing with the most cutting edge textile nanotechnology and the latest sleep-based research. The result was the Reviv blanket, and we think you’ll agree that it’s pretty special.

We’re thrilled to be bringing Reviv to life for you, and we can’t thank you enough for being a part of our journey. You’re awesome!
column7:
>

More on our Team:

Nicholas Bennett

Nick previously worked for Asher Fabric Concept for 5 years where he handled client relations and supplied high end fabric for designers and clothing manufacturers in the Los Angeles area. Through these experiences he gained contacts in the industry, and with the inspiration from his nephew with autism who benefited from weighted blankets, he decided to venture on his own to create the highest quality weighted blanket on the market: Reviv. 

Ken Nguyen

Ken is the manager of a freight forwarding company that specializes in the European, Asian, and US market to manage delivery from freight to door to door fulfillment to make expansion easier. Having worked together while at Asher, Nick brought Ken onto the team for his 15 years of industry expertise. 

Alice Chau

Alice has worked in sleep industry with companies like Brookstone and Sleep Number for about 10 years, and specializes in the manufacturing of sleep and therapeutic products. She manages quality control for the Reviv Blanket, making sure that what you see is in the pictures is what you get in your box! 

Shawn Wang

Shawn is our all-star intern who helps us with all things digital. 

Krysten Gomez

Krysten is a social media marketing guru and also happens to be Nick's best friend!
column8: >
column12: >
column13: contributed ~$25,000 in total funding via Facebook ads."" data-id=""23414154""><figure style=""margin: 0px

After recovering from a fire set to the same apartment building on September 19th, someone broke in, looted the first floor apartment (which only had water damage) and set it on fire AGAIN! Kristen and her 7 year old son Deacon, who lived in that apartment, have lost absolutely everything. This fire was started in the back of their apartment. They were set to move into a new place on Friday...now all they have to move in are the clothes Kristen had taken to be cleaned before the second fire, some linens and photos. That's it.

We need:

*Bathroom items
*Kitchen appliances
*Kitchen utensils
*Dining room table
*Furniture
Her son is 7, HE DOES NOT NEED CLOTHES, but he does need bedroom
furniture, toys (he's very advanced for his age, but he likes Star Wars,

wrestling and video games).Please help! Kristen needs to replace everything! Your generosity is truly appreciated!!

Picolor is a small cube with five different pigment colors which include Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Black and White. It uses special mechanisms, which reproduce the desired color. This cube is an art-tech gadget that will make life easier for all those who intend to mix colors and find their own unique shades.





Choose your color in the mobile app and send it to Picolor using Bluetooth connection. It's so simple! Just send, mix, fill and paint.


This gadget is useful for people who enjoy creating. With the help of this tool wasting time on mixing colors or trying to figure out the right amount of shades will vanish into thin air. Now, in order to create a cool picture, you don't need dozens of markers or paints on your palette, all you need is Picolor. It will become a creative assistant for both professionals and amateurs and help develop children’s painting and drawing skills. If you are fond of drawing or painting, if you are an artist, designer or just a creative person, Picolor is an ideal solution for you!
column13:
s=f33d781ac2f016ea4956f52eca65816b"" src=""""/>





We also plan to work with pigments with higher density. It should be noted that some paints have a higher density and drying speed, which can cause incorrect operation of the device. However, at this moment you can add the finished pigment, a result of mixing with the cube, to the higher density bases, thus getting the desired Acrylic, Nail Polishes etc. color tone.



* These capabilities of mixing colors should undergo numerous tests and trials before being implemented into release version. After the testing some mixing capabilities can be unavailable.




 

  We offer two colors of the product:




 

The application will be available for IOS and Android
column25:
s=97554e3f70b2bf76033231e9dafcfbd2"" src=""""/>































We need help to refine our product. That is why we are launching a crowdfunding campaign and expect your support. The next stage will be the development of the industrial design of the product, the testing of additional functions, the preparation for production and finally the production itself.
column29:
showinfo=0"">
 

The testing will cover the mixing capabilities for a wider range of use: varnish paints for manicure and pedicure, oil paints for painting, paints for removing scratches on cars, etc. 
At this stage, we humbly ask for your support for which you will be offered Picolor. Thank you for support! 

Keep pace with new technologies. Choose Picolor.


 

We have a working prototype that mixes the colors. Also Picolor is completely connected with the application, and it is already functional. 
Despite the fact that we already have a multifunctional prototype, we want to avoid any chance of misleading you in respect of final terms of delivery. But problems with the vendor mistakes or part shortages could cause delays. 
If any unforeseen issues arise, we promise to be timely and transparent communicating any delays.

column1: Con esta bandeja para descongelar al instante. Ponga a un lado el microondas, como usted sabe, no es tan saludable y cocina el producto en el proceso de descongelación.
¡Esta mesa es muy fácil de usar! Para hacer esto, solo tienes que poner la carne o los productos a un descongelar en el tablero y verás cómo un descongelarse mágicamente.
Además, esta mesa de descongelación es totalmente ecológica, no usa batería ni electricidad. Puedes lavarlo a mano o en el lavavajillas.

Descubrir la carne y los alimentos de forma completamente segura, fácil y rápida. Dependiendo del grosor, puede tener sus chuletas de cerdo, cordero descongelado entre 30 minutos. Los alimentos más pequeños como hamburguesas, pescados ... en menos tiempo aún.¿Cómo es posible?

La estructura patentada del calibrador térmico de la aviación, la derivación del modelo de la disipación del motor de la aeronave, una conductividad térmica más científica, más rápida que la placa de descongelación general.
Hecho de aleación de alta densidad HDF de la aviación, la precisión del tratamiento de la superficie hasta nano nivel, excelente conductividad térmica.

El proceso de galvanoplastia superficial con la capa de nano-plata, y el recubrimiento no se caerá después de ser utilizado durante un tiempo largo. No destruir la estructura nutricional de los alimentos, la seguridad y la salud.Súper fácil de usar sacar la comida congelada, ponerla en la bandeja y ...En unos minutos ya estás listo para cocinar !!!Diseño elegante, diseñado para ti.Tecnología y diseño patentado.El secreto del chef está listo y se vende a la luz para ti.Pure physical defrosting, without water consumption, without energy consumption, fast defrosting, taking into account low energy consumption, the material can be recycled, safe and environmentally friendly.The real high-tech products, fast defrosting plate, the maximum defrosting rate is 20 times more than the natural defrosting speed.Due to the different ingredients, the defrosting speed is slightly different. After the actual test, the speed of thawed meat is 6 to 8 times the thawing speed at room temperature.Probado y certificado.El equipo.Su apoyo es la clave para permitirle compartir este buen producto con personas de todo el mundo. ¡Apreciamos mucho tu ayuda!¡Gracias!Recompensas Riesgo y desafío No es la primera vez que desarrollamos un producto de cocina, en tres años de intenso trabajo, diseñamos, patentamos y desarrollamos los primeros prototipos funcionales, y están listos para su distribución. Estamos muy emocionados y necesitamos el último impulso con todos ustedes para alcanzar la meta final.Solo tenemos que dominar el departamento de logística y, si es necesario, contratar a las personas necesarias para cumplir con la entrega del producto.Gracias",20.0,2,"2 Campaigns

Well Folks, 


I'm sending out this request only to people I know. I'm hoping you can contribute to my campaign. The deadline is fairly short as I have to order and pay for posters and leaflets etc. before my campaign launch on O'Neill's on the 16th of March...... Then the Craic starts....

What You Get

There are a number of perks for anyone that contributes:
• All are LIMITED EDITION items!!!!!
• Many could well become collectors items in years to come.....
• And you'll get that fuzzy feeling in your stomach that you've helped a mate... Now that's PRICELESS
Here they are:

","Thank you very much for your support and pledges!
VitElectra website: http://vitelectra.com/
DeRadiateTM

VitElectra's newest all inclusive product, DeRadiate, is a nutritious superfood cleanse and meal replacement formulated for maximum nourishment and detoxification of radiation, heavy metals,  and chemicals from your mind and body.

DeRadiate uses the planet's finest earth and sea greens, herbs, and minerals, blended in limited batches for optimal potency and nutritional value. It's proprietary blend provides an abundance of protein, vitamins, amino acids, electrolytes, antioxidants and free radical scavengers.DeRadiate is all natural, vegan and non GMO, with no added sugar, no gluten, wheat, dairy, soy, nuts, eggs, binders, fillers or artificial ingredients. We have very stringent Quality Control standards and we will not blend or package with high volume manufacturers. nor will we sell through mass retailers.
Testimonials
Our Funding Goal

By contributing to our DeRadiate crowd funding campaign, you will be honored as a founding supporter of VitElectra. You will receive product discounts and perks, and be given priority status for our next 3 revolutionary super food products to be released through the end of 2015.
We achieved over 10%! Thank you very much for your help and contribution!

Our funding goal is approximately $50,500 which will be raised by the sale of 355 units of DeRadiate. Our costs (to source and blend ingredients, then package and ship DeRadiate) are approximately 55% of sales.  These costs are high due to the 77 expensive ingredients in our proprietary formulation and due to the low volumes we blend. Our flexible funding campaign allows us to blend and ship what we sell.
ChildrensNatureInstitute website: http://childrensnatureinstitute.org/
Perks
Crowdfund Timeline

Our campaign and products are guaranteed to change your life and the world we live in. We are a young and creative company that has already launched four successful products. We are hard working entrepreneurs with a passion for helping others and for making our world a healthier and happier one.
Please Share Our Story
We need your support and kindly ask that you to get the word out about our campaign. In addition to pledging, sharing our story on social media is very valuable as well!",17.0,0,"1 Campaign

Short Summary

Jude Powell is the founder and managing director of Tazla Energy Ltd.  He is a chartered engineer and business graduate (MBA Cranfield) with over 30 years business experience. His experience ranges from the design, development and project management of software products and services to the management of the Eurpoean operations of an American software company. He has developed new business opportunities in South East Asia and Europe. He therefore has the skills and experience to ensure that this project is successful.

Tazla Energy was launched 10 years ago to develop products powevered by high voltage pulsing technology inspired by the work of Nikola Tesla. BeCoola is the first product to be developed using this technology. This cooling device is much more efficent that traditional air conditioning and uses just 2W of electricity to cool a room.

There are still many climate change deniers but it is certain than man made carbon emissions is causing the climate to become more extreme. There is a need for mankind to reduce current carbon emissions by 50%. Unforunately, population increases and rising stadards of living mean that energy consumption and hence carbon emissions are likely to double if we continue using current technologies. This means that average energy consumption will need to be reduced by 75% to avoid damaging climate change!!

BeCoola uses less than 1% of the energy used by conventional air conditioning to cool a room. Supporting this project will help bring an innovative product to the market which will significantly reduce carbon emissions but allow living standards to rise. Together we can reduce global warming.

When I started developing BeCoola, I was alone. Within a few months, I started to get some help and support from other people. Over time more people have joined the group working with me. If you join this campaign your support will help us improve the lives of all who live on the Earth.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

The project has 2 distinct phases. The first 3 months will be spent making the BeCoola units at our contract manufacturing plant in Letchworth. In the second phase, the units will the be distributed to people involved in the trial. The 3 month trial will be supervising by Professor Jo Darkwa. Director of the Centre for Sustainable Energy Technologies, University of Nottingham Ningbo, China. A report will be published at the end of the trial.

We are offering 2 perks:

column1: <li>If you pledge more than £10 you will be able to purchase a BeCoola unit for £200, excluding delivery charges after June 2014
• Pledge more than £200 and you will be given a BeCoola unit to be part of the trial.
We are seeking to raise £150,000. This will be spent in the following way:
<li>£20k: Fund raising fees and set up costs
<li>£30k: Supervision of trial and production of report by Professor Jo Darkwa
<li>£50k: Production of 500 BeCoola units
• £25k: Packaging and courier costs: and
• £25k: Project mangement costs.

We are fully committed to conducting this trial. If we do not receive the full amount that we have asked for, we will still conduct a trial but its scope and scale may be reduced.

The Impact

The development of BeCoola has not been easy.
New electronic mechanisms were developed.  Special components were required as
standard components were too weak. The product is now stable and reliable and
can be produced in a highly automated fashion.

Climate change is making the weather more extreme hence the need for tis technology is becoming more urgent. If you support this campaign, you will be able to answer the following question in the future: ""What did you do to help stop climate change?""

Other Ways You Can Help

We welcome all support. If you cannot support us financially, please support our campaign on social media and let your friends and family know about us.

Some may think, ""Why bother?"", but we leave you with 2 questions.

If not us, who?

If not now, when?

Queens Cottage Shelter

Is proud to launch our second campaign on Indiegogo. To all of our supporters that turned out in masses and made our first Indiegogo campaign late this spring such a resounding success, we say thank you and we need your help again!
<div>
Our modest goal of $5000 was almost tripled due to your overwhelming support. Your generosity has warmed our hearts and strengthened our resolve to make trans* housing now a reality!

No longer is it just a dream or wishful thinking, but the voices of so many of you who spoke out on this long overdue issue have made it clear: no longer is it acceptable for trans* individuals, who are already at the greatest risk for prejudice and abuse, to be allowed to suffer in silence. No more will we allow trans women, especially those trans women of color to be forced to live on the streets and/or resort to the street economy to survive.
<div>
Housing First - we CAN and we MUST put an end to this cycle now and with your help, we will! Please donate above!
About Us:

To those of you who may just be learning of us for the first time, Queens Cottage Shelter is a partnership with Trans House, the Bay Area's first trans housing and advocacy program.  QCS was the brainchild of our founder, Breezy Golden Farr, who found herself homeless after a series of personal setbacks sent her spiraling into the homeless system that is unsafe for trans people. (Meet Breezy in the video above.)

To her shock and dismay, she quickly discovered there was NO place to go exclusively for trans* individuals if you are homeless in the Bay Area. The shelter simply did not know what do with her and she was stuck in limbo and forced to live on the park, Then and there, Ms. Farr vowed that she would never let this happen to another trans person again.

Today she is partnering with Trans House founder and trans advocate Clair Farley to make this dream a reality. Together with the community Clair and Breezy have raised over $14,000 raised from our first campaign.  Although, we still have much more to do. That is where we need your help!

Like any other start up, we dream of the day when our angel investor (Oprah, are you listening?) writes out the 7 figure check to buy us our first permanent home. But until then, we will keep our cause going by raising funds through fundraisers such as this one. We have set the goal in this campaign at $25,000 and while we still need a 6 figure amount to open and run Queens Cottage Shelter for a full year, every little bit helps us get closer.
So please, take a moment and give whatever you can.  From $10 on up, we appreciate it all as you help the Queens Without Castles become sheltered once again! Plus we have great perks!
With Love,
<div>QCS &amp

column3:
> 

I.U Wake Up sheets, by Perú Pima, are high quality, 100% Peruvian pima cotton sheets that will make you feel like you’re in a luxury hotel bed without the high-quality price tag. A direct-to-consumer model ensures that you’re getting the best price possible, without worrying about gimmicks or false claims.

I.U Wake Up is not only committed to the well-being of its customers, it’s committed the well-being of humanity.

column1: For every bed sheet purchased, a recycled-fiber blanket will be donated to communities in the Peruvian Andes to save lives of thousands of people.
column5: >
column9: >
column10: >
column14:
> 

Perú Pima is a family owned business, founded over 26 years ago in Lima, Peru, that manufactures luxury bedding collections and a wide range of towels and bathrobes. Over the years, the company's technological innovation, and vertical integration that includes its own spinning, weaving, finishing and garment plant, has made it possible for Perú Pima to ensure top notch quality controls in each and every one of their production processes to
column16: '> create high-quality fabrics for their customers. Check out what some of our customers have said about our sheets...
column17:
>

 

In Peru Pima we take the purity of Peruvian Pima Cotton in the production of high quality fabrics for making products that guarantee an experience of wellness, luxury and comfort that will last a lifetime.
column21:
>Pima cotton, which originated in Peru, is one of the most luxurious types of cotton in the world. Because of its naturally long fibers, pima cotton feels smooth,
yet it is durable, so your sheets won’t pill or lint in the wash.
column25:
>Percale is a plain style weave, meaning that the warp and the weft threads cross
over and under each other, one at a time. This tight type of weave gives your sheets that
crisp, cool, and breathable feel that you find in hotel linens.
Percale is also extra durable, making it easy to care for and long-lasting.
column29: >Don’t let the ‘higher is better’ myth fool you
column30: oftentimes other manufacturers will use two-ply yarns in order to double the thread count with low-quality materials as a tactic to market their sheets. I.U Wake Up’s use of a 300 thread count, in combination with high-quality threads, actually make for a <strong>more comfortable, more durable sheet
column35: >I.U Wake Up has partnered with Kusimayo, a Peruvian NGO, so that for every sheet set purchased, a recycled-fiber blanket will be donated to communities in the Peruvian Andes, where about 500 people die every year due to extremely cold weather conditions (temperatures reach just 10° Farenheit). These blankets are going to save lives!
column41:
> 

Shopping for sheets has turned into a maze of options. What used to be a simple, straight-forward buying process is no longer, thanks to the endless options that linen manufacturers are now able to offer.
column42: >Don’t know the difference between 300 and 1,000 thread count? Aren’t sure what percale even means? Rest easy, we’re here to help with our handy sheet guide.
column63:
>

Kusimayo is a non-profit, Peruvian organization that strives to make a difference in the lives of children, the elderly, and families around the rural Peruvian communities of the Puno region. While the region is known for its culture, diversity, and breathtaking landscapes, its residents also struggle with its harsh geography, well below freezing temperatures, malnutrition, poverty and social inequality.  

Since Kusimayo began in 2008, they have developed four separate programs all aiding different needs of the area. I.U Wake Up has set out to join Kusimayo in one of their program’s efforts to help improve the living conditions in Puno. For every purchase you make through I.U Wake Up, a blanket will go to someone in need.
column65:
>


We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make I.U Wake Up sheets a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase I.U Wake Up sheets, if you’re a supporter of I.U Wake Up, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!
column66: >

While the region is known for its culture, diversity, and breathtaking landscapes, its residents also struggle with its harsh geography, well below freezing temperatures, malnutrition, poverty and social inequality.  Since Kusimayo began in 2008, they have developed four separate programs all aiding different needs of the area. I.U Wake Up has set out to join Kusimayo in one of their program’s efforts to help improve the living conditions in Puno. For every purchase you make through I.U Wake Up, a blanket will go to someone in need. We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make I.U Wake Up sheets a reality.We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase I.U Wake Up sheets, if you’re a supporter of I.U Wake Up, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!",38.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2:
>

Aumi is the smartest Night Light you'll ever own. It's a Bluetooth enabled, rechargeable, multi-colored nightlight that you control with your smart phone or tablet. 

 

What can I do with Aumi?  

Turn the light on or off, choose from over 16 million color options, set it to activate when it detects motion, set timers to dim,turn off, turn on or change colors. Use the aluminum bezel or the app to adjust the brightness, get notifications such as texts or calls, have Aumi stay on when the power goes out, unplug and use it as accent lighting.

column1: This beautiful brushed aluminum bezel brings a touch of modern elegance while also providing a unique function not found in other night lights.

<figure style=""text-align: center

column4: >With motion detection active you can set it to turn on to any light intensity and any color. You also have the ability to set a time length from our list of options.

column1: <figure style=""margin: 0px

column2:
>Smart Timers
Set up to 8 timers per aumi device. With the timer function you can set it to turn off, dim, turn on or brighten at any specific time. You can also set it to change colors at any time of day. The timers will remain logged in to your app every day until you decide to delete them.
column5:

Aumi is simple to set-up. Simply plug in your Aumi to any outlet, download and install our free app and you're all set

 

How much does it cost to operate Aumi? 

The Aumi nightlight costs only pennies a years.

Who ?

Based in Switzerland, Wicked Robot specializes in the manufacture of decorative lamps made by 3D printing. Our workshop is starting to make a name for itself after only a few months of activity.  In four months, Wicked Robot has sold nearly 500 lamps, most of them shaped like skulls.
column2:
>

What ?

The lamp we launch today thanks to Kickstarter is in the shape of a Mexican skull. ""It's an allegory of death and time that fascinates since the beginning of time"". 

""La Petite Mort""
column3:
>

The lamps are equipped with a LED candle designed in our workshop, and a battery rechargeable by USB port with the autonomy of twelve hours. Remote control allows you to choose between sixteen different colors for the light source. We decided to print our objects in white to play with the structure of the material. Our lamps have cutouts which allow to project graphic shadows, this Calavera skull cast hearts on walls and ceiling.
column4:
>

The product offered by Wicked Robot is made out of PLA, a biodegradable polymer based on polylactic acid, derived from corn starch. It's 100% biodegradable and compostable.

Printed layer by layer, this material has the same properties as plastic.
column6:
>

Why ?

The design of the products is done by Alain Schlup (CH). Product ideas do not come from us, but from our customers. 3D printing makes people's imagination run wild.
column8:
>

That's why we want to be present on Kickstarter, we want to produce new lamp models for and with the backer community.
column9:
>

How ?

Our workshop has eleven 3D printers, which can work simultaneously. Our current production capacity is 300 skulls a month, and it is constantly increasing with the addition of new robots. We affectionately named our machines, giving them the name of science fiction robots heroes. For connoisseurs, there is Ava, Jarvis, Data, Amee or Sonny. The production of a three-dimensional actual size skull takes approximatively 24  hours.
column10:
>

Wicked Robot is expected to rapidly expand its fleet of machines and soon have about fifty 3D printers.

 

Key Chain and T-Shirts
column11:
>

You can also support us by pledging for the Key Chains and T-Shirts
column12:
>

Help us by sharing ""La Petite Mort"" with your friends!

Know someone who would be just as stoked as you are about ""La Petite Mort""? Share our campaign with them through the ""Share this project"" button at the top. Sharing is caring!
column14:
> 

Rewards

The full retail price for ""La Petite Mort"" will be $99, so you're getting a deal by supporting us on Kickstarter. We will not be selling ""La Petite Mort"" in retail until all Kickstarter rewards have been shipped. 

International Backers

We will ship ""La Petite Mort"" worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. 

Estimated Delivery

Each reward tier may have a different estimated shipment month. While we do not expect these to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift. At anytime up until your skull has shipped, you may request a full refund by emailing support@wickedrobot.ch

Warranty

We stand firmly behind our products. Each ""La Petite Mort"" includes with a minimum 1 year limited warranty.

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at support@wickedrobot.ch

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Tired of tripping over things in the dark at night?

Need a light that doesn't blind your eyes for your nighttime bathroom trips?

Want a clear view whenever you open a cabinet in the dark?

Say hello to M-Light 4, a miniature light that lights up automatically when it detects body motion in the dark.

The 4th generation of M-Light
column2:
>M-Light 4

M-Light 4 is the 4th generation of M-Light which was originally created in 2016, with the 3 times version up, we have made M-Light 4 much more powerful, user-friendly, and with more features.

Small and lightweight 

M-Light 4 is small, only a little larger than a quarter, with a size of 1.37 x 1.37 x 0.55 (inch) or 35 x 35 x 14 (mm). It's only 0.76 inch (19.5 mm) thick if include the Fresnel lens. M-Light 4 is lightweight, only 0.6 oz (17 g) including the rechargeable battery.

Motion and light activated

M-Light 4 will light up when it detects motion in a dark environment, which is activated by its PIR (Pyroelectric Infrared Radial) sensor and light sensor. The PIR sensor detects the body motion in front of it within a 110° scope, and has an effective range of around 13 feet (4 meters). The light sensor detects the darkness of its surroundings. Only when both sensors are activated will the LED lights be turned on. The lights will be automatically turned off if no other motion is detected for the specified delay time.
column3:
>Automatically turns on and off when waving hand before M-Light 4 in the dark

M-Light 4 uses the newest 3rd generation PIR component which integrates its control circuit and PIR sensor in one electromagnetic shielding. Though much more expensive, it provides more accurate control, higher anti-interference capability, and uses less power. 

Light color selection

M-Light 4 has 2 types for the light color: warm white or cool white. You could make your color selection for each M-Light 4 you pledged in the survey after the campaign is successfully ended.
column5:
cool white color

Always-on mode 

Besides the normal Auto Sensing mode, where the lights are turned on and off automatically based on the PIR body motion sensor and the environment darkness sensor, there is light Always-on mode, where the lights are turned on by pushing the power button shortly, and kept on until it is turned off manually by pushing the power button again.

With the Always-on mode, M-Light 4 could be used as a flash light, a dinner table candle, a camp light, etc.  

Brightness adjustable

The brightness of the LED lights is adjustable to match your needs. That is necessary especially for your nighttime bathroom trips so it will not blind your eyes.
column6:
>Light brightness could be easily selected by a button press

Delay time adjustable 

This controls the delay time for how long the lights will be kept on after no body action is detected, from 2.5 seconds to 5 minutes. The default delay time is 15 seconds.

Within the delay time, if there is any body motion detected, the delay timer will be reset to the specified value.   

Easy push button operation

M-Light 4 introduced 3 big color push buttons to make the operation much more user-friendly.

Long press the power button to power on/off

To power on or off, hold the red power button for 3 seconds until the blue LED indicator flashes 1 or 2 times respectively.

Short press the power button to change modes

Push the red power button shortly to toggle the Auto Sensing mode and Always-on mode.

Change brightness

Push and hold the yellow brightness button, the light brightness will slowly change from low to high, then high to low repeatedly. Release that button when the desired brightness is reached

Change delay time

Push the blue delay time button once, the blue LED indicator will light on. When the desired delay time is reached, press that button again to turn it off. The passed time within the 2 presses is recorded as the delay time. 

To cancel the delay time change before the 2nd press (when the blue LED indicator is still on), press the red power button twice.

Long battery life

M-Light 4 is powered with a 200 mAh lithium-ion polymer rechargeable battery which can be recharged with a normal Micro USB cable. Each battery has a protection circuit to provide the overcharge, over-discharge, and over-current protections.

A full charge takes about 2.5 hours and could last 3~6 months depending on how often the light is turned on and how bright it is set to.
column7:
>The red LED turns on when charging and turns off after it is fully charged

Low battery indicator 

When the battery is low, the blue LED will slowly blink to remind you to recharge the battery. To save the battery life, it only blinks when body motion is detected, whether the environment is bright or dark, so it will remind you even in daytime.
column8:
>Low battery indicator

Magnet attachment

M-Light 4 has a magnet on its back. A small metal plate attached with 3M double sided tape on its back is provided for each M-Light. You stick that metal plate to the needed place, then attach M-Light to the metal plate by its magnet. This way you can easily take M-Light off for recharging its battery.
column9:
>Attach M-Light 4 magnetically to the provided metal plate stuck to a cabinet door

Stick anywhere 

M-Light 4 can be used in any environment where you need some light in the dark, without any hassle of turning it on or off.

Besides you can easily put it anywhere such as on the nightstand or desk, you can attach it to the wall of hallway or stairway, or behind the main door so you never have difficult to find the light switch, or put it inside bathroom for your night trips, or inside closet and cabinet to find your stuff at a glance, or even in your handbag so you have no trouble finding anything at night.

Specifications

Perks

* Sales tax, GST, VAT, custom fees, if applicable, are not included.

* Every perk is provided with a free micro USB recharging cable, except 6-unit perk with 2 cables, and 10-unit perk with 3 cables.

Timeline

Referral bonus

Get one free M-Light 4 unit for every $100 contribution your referrals bring in.

For more details, please check Update #1.

Risks and challenges

M-Light 4 is the 4th version of M-Light. We have been working on the M-Light 4 for several months and have just finished a small patch of production for our Kickstarter backers. So it is ready for production for the current campaign. With our experience in the successful fulfillment of previous M-Light Kickstarter projects, we are confident in this campaign as well. That to be said, there is always the possibility of delays due to things beyond our control at the manufacturer’s facility. We will keep you closely updated with the progress and work hard to deliver your M-Light 4 on schedule.

Only when both sensors are activated will the LED lights be turned on. The lights will be automatically turned off if no other motion is detected for the specified delay time.Automatically turns on and off when waving hand before M-Light 4 in the darkM-Light 4 uses the newest 3rd generation PIR component which integrates its control circuit and PIR sensor in one electromagnetic shielding. Though much more expensive, it provides more accurate control, higher anti-interference capability, and uses less power. Light color selectionM-Light 4 has 2 types for the light color: warm white or cool white. You could make your color selection for each M-Light 4 you pledged in the survey after the campaign is successfully ended.warm white color & cool white colorAlways-on mode Besides the normal Auto Sensing mode, where the lights are turned on and off automatically based on the PIR body motion sensor and the environment darkness sensor, there is light Always-on mode, where the lights are turned on by pushing the power button shortly, and kept on until it is turned off manually by pushing the power button again.With the Always-on mode, M-Light 4 could be used as a flash light, a dinner table candle, a camp light, etc.  Brightness adjustableThe brightness of the LED lights is adjustable to match your needs. That is necessary especially for your nighttime bathroom trips so it will not blind your eyes.Light brightness could be easily selected by a button pressDelay time adjustable This controls the delay time for how long the lights will be kept on after no body action is detected, from 2.5 seconds to 5 minutes. The default delay time is 15 seconds.Within the delay time, if there is any body motion detected, the delay timer will be reset to the specified value.   Easy push button operationM-Light 4 introduced 3 big color push buttons to make the operation much more user-friendly.Long press the power button to power on/offTo power on or off, hold the red power button for 3 seconds until the blue LED indicator flashes 1 or 2 times respectively.Short press the power button to change modesPush the red power button shortly to toggle the Auto Sensing mode and Always-on mode.Change brightnessPush and hold the yellow brightness button, the light brightness will slowly change from low to high, then high to low repeatedly. Release that button when the desired brightness is reachedChange delay timePush the blue delay time button once, the blue LED indicator will light on. When the desired delay time is reached, press that button again to turn it off. The passed time within the 2 presses is recorded as the delay time. To cancel the delay time change before the 2nd press (when the blue LED indicator is still on), press the red power button twice.Long battery lifeM-Light 4 is powered with a 200 mAh lithium-ion polymer rechargeable battery which can be recharged with a normal Micro USB cable. Each battery has a protection circuit to provide the overcharge, over-discharge, and over-current protections.A full charge takes about 2.5 hours and could last 3~6 months depending on how often the light is turned on and how bright it is set to.The red LED turns on when charging and turns off after it is fully chargedLow battery indicator When the battery is low, the blue LED will slowly blink to remind you to recharge the battery. To save the battery life, it only blinks when body motion is detected, whether the environment is bright or dark, so it will remind you even in daytime.Low battery indicatorMagnet attachmentM-Light 4 has a magnet on its back. A small metal plate attached with 3M double sided tape on its back is provided for each M-Light. You stick that metal plate to the needed place, then attach M-Light to the metal plate by its magnet. This way you can easily take M-Light off for recharging its battery.Attach M-Light 4 magnetically to the provided metal plate stuck to a cabinet doorStick anywhere M-Light 4 can be used in any environment where you need some light in the dark, without any hassle of turning it on or off.Besides you can easily put it anywhere such as on the nightstand or desk, you can attach it to the wall of hallway or stairway, or behind the main door so you never have difficult to find the light switch, or put it inside bathroom for your night trips, or inside closet and cabinet to find your stuff at a glance, or even in your handbag so you have no trouble finding anything at night.SpecificationsPerks* Sales tax, GST, VAT, custom fees, if applicable, are not included.* Every perk is provided with a free micro USB recharging cable, except 6-unit perk with 2 cables, and 10-unit perk with 3 cables.TimelineReferral bonusGet one free M-Light 4 unit for every $100 contribution your referrals bring in.For more details, please check Update #1.Risks and challengesM-Light 4 is the 4th version of M-Light. We have been working on the M-Light 4 for several months and have just finished a small patch of production for our Kickstarter backers. So it is ready for production for the current campaign. With our experience in the successful fulfillment of previous M-Light Kickstarter projects, we are confident in this campaign as well. That to be said, there is always the possibility of delays due to things beyond our control at the manufacturer’s facility. We will keep you closely updated with the progress and work hard to deliver your M-Light 4 on schedule.",15.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column1: |","Las Vegas, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/m-light-4-the-smallest-motion-sensor-night-light/pica

The project
Mission
Our mission is to provide the highest quality, easiest to install, SlimLight LEDcordless lamp replacement for area lighting.

A new LED light Lamp that is the most energy efficient on the planet, the SlimLight takes energy efficient lighting to the next level with only 0.18 Watts of electric power and with a thickness of only 5 mm.
Combining technology with design to bring you eco efficient, ultra slim light lamps. LED lighting that can go anywhere in your home.
Starting a successful small business from the ground up is no easy task, but we've already begun!
We have created the prototype, filed our patent, sourced manufacturing for our SlimLight LED cordless lamp, and sold most of our first initial run.
Customer response has been great, we are getting great PR, and we are now excited to announce our new styles and improved functionality coming early this summer. That is where we need your help!
Allow me to introduce Modern SlimLight LED - Cordless Lighting Solutions SLL is the smartest slim light bulb you've ever experienced.
What is SLL - SlimLight LED?

SLL is a slim LED lamp that consist of stainless steel, glass and plastic bodies, without wires , with magnetic coupling to wall or other house furniture, it’s an Eco-efficient that uses a fraction of the electricity , only 0.18 watt, with a lifespan of 40,000+ hours while providing your environment with a nice, warm ambient light.
Sets up in Seconds
SLL is incredibly easy to set-up. Simply replace your existing bulbs with SLL bulbs and you're good to go.
How does this thing work?

How do you operate these super slim, super efficient, and super cool lamps? Just replace your home ambient bulbs with SLL and your electricity cost goes down. Our lamp is connected directly to 12 volts and for wall we provide a small power supply that fits directly in the outlet wall.
Manufacturing Plan
The electronic components used within the SLL will be procured from distributors that stock well known brands of electronic components.
The LED chip (die) is manufactured in Korea. Electronic components are mounted onto the PCB (Printed Circuit Board) using mostly SMT (Surface Mount Technology).
First, the board goes through the pick and place machine where a robot places individual components in predefined positions.

Second, the populated circuit board goes through an oven that melts the solder paste and permanently secures the components. An intermediate testing stage and quality control step is done at this point to ensure that the circuit functions correctly and that no visual defects are found.
The final step is to assemble the circuit board into the shape of a SLL.
After final assembly, each SLL light bulb is put through functional testing.
Testing will be separated into two phases
column2: one to ensure circuit functionality and the other to ensure brightness / power consumption. Quality control is the most critical part of our manufacturing process as it is our way of ensuring that we deliver a high quality product.

column1: These pictures show out first SLL with wire, and now we work on a SLL without wire, so for that we need your help.
We are looking for funding for an injection molded metal base and injection molded ABS to house the SLL.
This new injection molding will be a huge improvement from a functional and durability standpoint and allow us to get our product ready for more industrial applications in the hospitality industry.

We already have the funds for new designs that are currently in development and a new small production run, just looking for your help with improving our product for our customers and getting the line ready for wholesale and hospitality markets so we can grow this family owned and operated business.
Our goal is to take our small business to the next level! So we need your help! and in return you receive our newest line offering first and at a great value!
We need the mold for SLL housing -4000 euros
The mold for plastic pieces that hold the magnets, piece that is in the wall - 2000 euros.
Risks and challenges
With a technology start up, there are always risks.
Does the product work? Is it reliable? How and where will it be made? What is the demand for the product?
Our company has spent the past two years designing solutions that address a real lighting industry gap and have had to overcome numerous performance hurdles.

They told us that it could not be done! But with the right ingenuity, leadership, strategic partnerships and persistence it is possible to deliver an inexpensive, light weight, fully self contained and environmentally friendly LED lamp replacement for area lights.

SLL product development and manufacturing methodology is designed to catch and correct possible manufacturing risks early. The company is always working on cost reduction opportunities to increase profit margins and keep costs low.
The company's contract manufacturers share its vision and the assembly line is fully functional and UL certified to develop the next production lot of SLL lamps.

The company is in the initial stages of production, and with the mass production of a new product there are inherent challenges that need to be overcome. Our company will use a number of custom components that we will need to have fabricated and produced.

This is something we are very familiar with, but there are potential unforeseen delays or revisions that can arise when producing a new product. If for some chance revisions are needed, we will work through them quickly and inform our supporters of the issues and progress weekly.

After the project has finished we will be sending out surveys to all backers asking which type of the above SLL smart bulb casing you want. You will be able to mix and match bulbs styles in any combination.

We are preparing more details on the above casings and other options that will be available in the next few weeks including dimensions and more. The more pledges we receive the more options will be available.

Please direct message us if you have a preference for casing style/type that is not on the above list.
