column11: >The world's first solar-powered connected bike lock.
column12: >Skylock is a connected bike lock that uses multi-sensor technology to provide remote monitoring and crash alerts to keep you and your bike safe. Elevate your riding experience with the magic of keyless entry and solar charging.

column2:
>

Controlled entirely from your iPhone or Android device, Skylock alerts you when it senses anything out of the ordinary — If your bike is being tampered with, Skylock will feel it and will instantly send you a notification.  Skylock is the smartest way to stay secure.
column4:
>

Riding with Skylock gives you peace of mind. If you're ever unfortunate enough to be in an accident, Skylock will reach out and notify your family, friends, or even alert the authorities - help is always on the way.
column7: >Skylock in the press
column8: >""Skylock is the Bike Lock of the Future, and It's Awesome"" –
column9:
>Gizmodo

""Meet Skylock, The Solar-Powered Smart Bike Lock From Velo Labs"" –TechCrunch

""This Bluetooth U-Lock Brings Keyless Entry to Your Bike"" –Wired

""This Innovative Lock Aims To Create The 'Airbnb Of Bikes'""– Business Insider

""Skylock Bike Lock Alerts You When Someone Tries to Steal Your Bike"" –Mashable

""Meet Skylock, the smart bike lock that can save you after a crash"" –Engadget

""This smart lock will protect your bike and alert a friend if you've had an accident""– VentureBeat

""Create Your Own ""bike Airbnb"" With This New Networked Lock"" –
column10:
>Fast Company

_________________________________________________________________________
column12: >A design-driven productSkylock has a combination of solar recharging and an ultra low power design, which means it's a virtually charge-less device. You'll have enough battery power for months. If you are ever running low, just plug in the USB charger and Skylock will be ready to guard you and your bike again.
column13: >
column14: >Skylock also has a built-in capacitive panel. Just type in a key code combination to unlock Skylock if your phone ever runs out of battery.  Never worry about getting your bike stuck outside.

column1: <span style=""font-weight: normal

column2:
>Skylock makes bike sharing easy

Skylock lets you share the location and access to your bike with anyone in your trusted network. With Skylock, you can create and set-up your own bike share system.
column5:
>About our projectWe've been through a long creative process, from early concepts and sketches to 3D wireframes and a variety of 3D prints.  It's all led us to the beautiful Skylock prototype that you see throughout this page.

_________________________________________________________________________
column6:
>The TeamVelo Labs Inc. is a San Francisco based startup comprised of Aerospace, electrical, and software engineers. A passion for creating simple yet elegant products is what brought together the team behind Skylock. Our vision is to transform the way people interact with each other and their environment through beautifully designed products and services. Learn more about the team.

Velo Labs is hiring! Full stack software engineers, mechanical engineers, electronic engineers, designers, and operations: come join our core team!   View our current openings or email us at jobs@skylock.cc.

_________________________________________________________________________
column7:
>Why we need your support

We have been working on Skylock for over a year and we've come a long way. We partnered with Indiegogo because we want to build a strong community around Skylock. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing faster so we can make Skylock available to you and the millions of people who want to bring their biking experience to the 21st century. Let's make our communities safer, our biking experience smarter, and our lives more connected — together.

_________________________________________________________________________
column8:
>Shipping in early 2015

_________________________________________________________________________
column9:
>FAQ

Q. Why is your goal so low?

We already hit our first batch goal of $50k in less than a day but we've decided to open up another batch as a special offer to Indiegogo's community.


Q. What about shipping costs/sales &
column10:
VAT tax?

We will send you an email post campaign to do this payment. We'll keep track.

Q. What happens if Skylock runs out of battery?

Short answer is it will not be able to unlock. However, this situation will rarely, if ever, happen.  A rule of thumb to keep in mind: a fully charged battery has enough charge to run the lock for about a month with absolutely no light exposure. Should the battery still fully drain, these are your options to unlock:

column1: • Expose the lock to sunlight and recharge it
• Use a micro-USB cable and a power source and recharge it externally

As a safeguard, Skylock will refuse to lock if the battery is in a critical state of charge. Simply recharge it to resume normal operation.

Q. What happens if my phone runs out of battery?

You can unlock your Skylock using the capacitive buttons. Simply input the combination you provided during the initial setup.

Q. How will I connect Skylock to a Wi-Fi network?

During the on-boarding process of the app you will setup a Wi-Fi profile. You can add as many profiles you want, and then just sync your phone to your lock for the changes to take effect.

Q. How do theft alerts work?

Skylock is equipped with a triaxial accelerometer to detect tampering conditions. If a potential tamper condition exists, the lock will send an alert to our cloud servers which in turn will let the owner know.

Q. How do crash alerts work?

If you happen to crash your bike or if you are hit by a car, your phone will notify your preferred contacts about the accident automatically. All you need for this feature to work is your Skylock and your phone.


More FAQs can be found at https://skylock.cc/faq/

At The Bright Angle we are morning people and night owls all in one shop. That means with a studio of hybrid designers and makers we drink a lot of coffee at all hours of the day and lets face it, not everyone is on the same coffee regimen and not all coffee is made equal. To us the ritual of making the ideal cup is often a solo venture, if not a meditative process and sometimes needs to happen on the fly.

With this in mind we merged technology with high end handmade production processes to create our Solo Pour Over Set. This set is designed for minimalist aesthetics with an amazingly comfortable touch and intuitive function for making the perfect individual cup of coffee. 

Every Solo Pour Over Set comes with:
• Our Best Selling Monday Mug ($42.00 retail)
• Drip Tray ($15.00 retail)
• The Pour Over Funnel ($20.00 retail)
• The Solo Pour Over Riser ($20.00 retail)
• A Reusable Filter

This matters to us because as practitioners of simple living, we find value and satisfaction in knowing where our things comes from and how they are made. We believe in combating throw away culture and buying small batched goods, made by hard working craftspeople and only using what we need.

By ordering your Solo Pour Over Set you will be helping to fund the production of this unique take on pour over brewing tools while joining the movement of people around the world who are actively simplifying their lives and building the economy of small run products with high integrity. 

Are you passionate about upping your quality of life? Lets start one cup at a time. 

We are seeking $2500.00 to get the Solo Pour Over into production. This includes setup cost, mold making, and assembly... And coffee for long nights of production, of course!  

At The Bright Angle we offer nearly thirty handmade products derived from artist/designer collaborations and it always starts with an idea - we initially get this idea out by sketching or sculpting. In order to ensure that we are able to see the smartest design come to fruition, we transfer the sketch to a computer-aided modeling system. With this program we are able to send the design to the 3D printer to see the first model come to life.

We collaborate with our neighbors in the Asheville Makers’ Space at the Refinery Creator Space in Asheville. Working with engineers and inventors has allowed us to realize ideas that utilize technology in a way we wouldn’t have considered as craftspeople.

Once we have a model we are satisfied with, we scale it up to account for the shrinkage of the porcelain. Next, we pour plaster around the model to create a mold. This mold is filled with liquid porcelain to recreate the object.

We refine the porcelain object using hand tools. The pots are covered in our soft satin glaze and fired in a kiln to 2200F. Once they are fired we sand the bottoms smooth and begin to source the other materials for each design. For the first collection all mediums outside of porcelain are sourced from friends in Asheville. We are working with Hayden Wilson Glass, In Blue Handmade, Waxon Studios and The Asheville Makers. 

Our home is Asheville, a notable epicenter of American craft that rests in the mountains of Western North Carolina. The skilled craftsmanship ranges from beer to bread, from glass to ceramic - this region is alive with skilled hands making amazing things. This is why we are starting here in Asheville, surrounded by masters of their materials.

Next, we pour plaster around the model to create a mold. This mold is filled with liquid porcelain to recreate the object.We refine the porcelain object using hand tools. The pots are covered in our soft satin glaze and fired in a kiln to 2200F. Once they are fired we sand the bottoms smooth and begin to source the other materials for each design. For the first collection all mediums outside of porcelain are sourced from friends in Asheville. We are working with Hayden Wilson Glass, In Blue Handmade, Waxon Studios and The Asheville Makers. Our home is Asheville, a notable epicenter of American craft that rests in the mountains of Western North Carolina. The skilled craftsmanship ranges from beer to bread, from glass to ceramic - this region is alive with skilled hands making amazing things. This is why we are starting here in Asheville, surrounded by masters of their materials.",16.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Asheville, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-bright-angle-pour-over-coffee-redefined/pica

Hello! Meet our Giant Unicorn Lamp! At the heart of Smoko we are all about bringing fun into everyday items. Our hope is that our designs will make you smile and make even the most mundane tasks a bit more fun. Our Giant Unicorn Lamp embodies the silhouette of our favorite magical icon, the unicorn. We think its modern clean-line design will look great in your space. Giant Unicorn glows a soft-light in the dark and has a kick-ass multicolor mode.

LIGHT MODES This 20 x 12"" (51cmx30cm) multi-color changing LED lamp comes with a remote that can control different speed modes including:

column1: • Flash Mode
• Strobe Mode
• Fade Mode
• Smooth Mode
• 16-Color Solid Mode

column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

It also has adjustable settings for speed and brightness, but whether it's turned on or off, Giant Unicorn makes a great visual impact perfect for your home!


DESIGN PROCESS

After the production of our popular Mini Uni Light we decided to create an extra-large version that would be sure to make a visual statement. In addition to the increased scale we also added multicolor options. The extra large size and endless color combinations make for a magical experience!

Here's the Deal...

blueEnergy delivers energy, water, and sanitation to some of the world’s most isolated, marginalized communities, providing a foundation for health, education and economic opportunity in a climate change reality.  

We are focused on transforming lives on the Caribbean Coast of Nicaragua, the poorest region of the second poorest country in the Western Hemisphere, where nearly 80% of the population does not have access to energy and clean water.  With your support, our work is turning a corner in this region, where we have served over 12,000 people and you can feel the momentum shift on the ground!  This year we introduced initiatives in solid waste management and climate change adaptation which are already having a tremendous impact.

We're celebrating out 10th anniversary this year and we need your support now to bring opportunity to more people on the Caribbean Coast. You can feel confident that your investment will go a long way as we leverage our field work beyond Nicaragua through on-the-ground learning, training of future leaders and sharing through strategic partnerships.

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

We need to raise $10,000 through this campaign to serve the people on the Caribbean Coast of Nicaragua that are depending on us.  We could send you trinkets and knickknacks to thank you but that takes time and money and we're pretty sure you'd rather have us focus our attention and resources on changing lives in Nicaragua.

The Impact

column1: Founded in 2004, blueEnergy
works with isolated communities in Nicaragua to develop solutions that can be
applied worldwide.  We
have been extensively recognized for our innovative work by CNN Heroes, Larry

King Live, the Tech Awards, the Energy Globe Awards, and the Ashoka Fellowship.

We have served over 12,000 people in Nicaragua and invite all of our supporters to come visit us in the field to see our impact firsthand.

You can read about our impact on the blueNews: http://bluenews.blueenergygroup.org/

Other Ways You Can Help,

You can help us spread the word by posting our campaign on your Facebook page and liking ours: https://www.facebook.com/like.blueEnergy.  If you want to follow our work, you can also subscribe to our newsletter, the blueNews: http://bluenews.blueenergygroup.org

If you like these pictures and want to see more from Will Martinez, please check him out at: http://willmzapata.com/

If you like the music and want to hear more from Mango Ghost and the Bluefields Sound System, please check them out at: http://bluefieldsound.bandcamp.com/
column4:
>Please note that the specific impacts listed with each donation amount are for illustrative purposes only and that every gift to blueEnergy represents a gift to our total mission of improving health, capacity and economic development opportunities for the isolated poor.

Introducing Easy Wash, the washing machine for simple, fast and thorough wash!

You keep spending lots of time and money to use laundries and wash your clothes. When you've got no time for laundries, you've got no washing machine, or you need to wash just a couple things, you'll spend a lot of effort on this problem. 

Washing with Easy Wash takes three steps. First, you need to put your clothes into the drum and fill it with water, then spin the handle. Then you simply switch the handle and switch the device into a spinning mode. And finally, you drain the water and your clothes are clean! 

Washing with Easy Wash takes only 15 minutes, which I'm sure you'll agree is a lot quicker than going to the laundry.

Easy Wash is created not just for a convenient, but a thorough wash as well. Thanks to the special drum geometry and whirlpool, the Easy Wash washes even the most persistent stains. 

Special attachment technology allows you to use minimum effort to spin the handle. 

Easy Wash is compact and is easy to use not just at home, but also in the suburbs, or when camping. 

Sketches

CAD model in SolidWorks

Our team has presented the product at the Canton Fair, and received only positive feedback!

Records are fundamentally for listening to. They offer a unique listening experience, with unparalleled analogue sound but that’s not all. Each vinyl comes with a protective sleeve with often meticulously designed album art to compliment the sound. We can’t really appreciate the artwork when the record is stored in a traditional record crate so we’ve designed a product which enables you to display your vinyl collection on your wall. Record Roots is a patent pending, expandable frame for your vinyl.

Parallel straps sewn onto canvas hold the top and bottom edges of each record against the wall so unlike normal frames, you can quickly access your records when you want to play them. The product is attached to the wall using damage-free self-adhesive velcro or alternatively, if your wall surface is brick work, you can attach using screws.
One piece displays 8 records but you can zip them together to display as many as you want.
Is the self-adhesive hook and loop tape strong enough?
Yes! The tape has been tested on various different walls for over 6 months and it's not moving.
Will the self-adhesive tape damage my wall when removed?

This tape was designed for mounting onto the wall. It can be carefully removed without taking off any paintwork. It's not recommended on walls with wallpaper although in many instances it won't even damage these walls.
How should I mount it on walls with wallpaper?

In many instances, it will be fine however we can't recommend using the hook and loop tape as in some instances it could cause damage. You can mount it using screws through the eyelets positioned along the top edge of the product.
How should I mount it if my wall is exposed brickwork?
For textured surfaces like brickwork which the hook and loop tape won't stick to we recommend mounting with screws through the o-rings on the top edge.
How can they be joined together?
Open-ended zips are positioned on each vertical edge, which will join onto the next piece.
Can I rotate the frame?
No, the frame must be displayed vertically.
What if I want to buy more than 8 pieces?
Please get in touch!
Where do you ship to?
We'll be shipping worldwide!
Are you going to offer Record Roots for 7""?
If we're successfully funded, we may consider it in the future!
I've got another question. What can I do?
Please send us a message and we'll aim to get back to you as soon as possible.
Thank you very much for supporting my project. I can't do it without you.
I would like as many people to know about my project as possible so I would be really grateful if you were to share my campaign with other vinyl enthusiasts. I really appreciate your support.
If you have any questions, please send me a message.
Thanks,
Felix Kenchington
Please send a message if you can't find what you need or would like to chat.

End the struggle of carrying two bottles... Instead carry hot and cold liquids together in one with DUO!
Get rid of the struggle of two bottles, take DUO with you anywhere, for all your favourite drinks combinations!
THE LID
NEAT &

There are just 4 elements to the bottle (lid, straw and two bottles), making it easy to keep everything together. DUO not only ends the struggle of two bottles, but also has the ability to be split into two and used independently, if you so desire!
BALANCE
Having the inner and outer bottle sharing the same centre of gravity ensures greater stability. It allows for one bottle to be empty while the other is full and not cause the bottle to topple over.
HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIALS
RECYCLED PLASTIC (rPET)

The outer 1L bottle of DUO is made from rPET (recycled polyethylene terephthalate). This means we use recovered plastic (that would have otherwise reside in a landfill or worse, our oceans). We could have chosen to use virgin plastic, which is cheaper and far easier to source, but we believe we owe it to future generations to do everything within our means to preserve our planet.
STAINLESS STEEL

The inner 350ml stainless steel bottle is double wall vacuum insulated meaning there is no transfer of heat from the hot liquids to the liquid in the outer bottle. It will keep your hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold. Stainless steel is also reusable and can be easily recycled.
BPA FREE &
From the lid to the straw and to the outer and inner bottles, DUO is 100% BPA free and of course, totally leak proof!
ONE BOTTLE TO RULE THEM ALL!

We carefully considered the best features of bottles available and aimed to improve on them, when we designed what we believe to be the best possible drinking experience. Thats why we came up with the rotating straw nozzle for quick hydration and raised neck design to safely sip hot drinks.
We’re Sarah and Ed, and this is the story of how we came up with DUO.

The idea was born from our own frustrations. With the plastic epidemic having become increasingly evident, we made the decision to live more sustainably. The starting point for us was to cut out single-use plastics in the form of water bottles and coffee cups, replacing these with reusable bottles. However, doing this wasn’t as easy as we first thought. Being big coffee drinkers, it was common for us to stop by the local cafe en-route to work for our morning coffee fix. This meant, to follow our sustainable living mission, we would need to start carrying a second bottle for our coffee, alongside the bottle we already had for water to keep us healthy and hydrated. We soon found that having two bottles was bulky and required a large amount of space in our bags

We needed an easy solution that would help us carry our coffee and water in a space saving, easy and convenient way. After hours of searching we found such an invention did not exist, so we decided to create our own!
Risks and challenges

Sometimes unintended things happen which can cause delays and so in an effort to be totally open and honest, we have listed below what we believe to be the key risks in bringing your DUO to you within the timeline.

Product testing:
Before we create the final moulds to be used in DUO’s production, we will carry out final prototype testing. While we have a prototype that we think rocks, we won’t begin production until everything is perfect.

Manufacturing:
Our manufacturer is ready and raring to go and in possession of all the information needed. We don't foresee any difficulties, but if moulds need re-constructing this could mean delays. However, we have allowed for such eventualities in our timeline, so without such delays, we should be able to get your DUO to you sooner than November!

Fulfilment:
Rest assured, we have a crack team in charge of getting your DUO to you, this being an experienced global logistics company who have a long relationship with our manufacturer. Parcels can go missing or get damaged in transit and if they do, we will send you a replacement.

We will be sure to update you with any such issues and of course keep you informed as to when you can expect to receive your DUO. Neither of us want this to be a campaign that drags on (we have big plans!) and we promise we will devote ourselves to bringing you your DUO as soon as possible.

This Campaign has been successfully funded and you can order directly on the ettitude website now!

 

Sleep Smarter and Healthier with Bamboo Coffee Bedding

Nothing beats the feeling of wrapping yourself in fresh, clean, feathery soft bed sheets every night. However, the process of frequently washing and drying your bedding takes up valuable time
column2:
taking you away from doing the things that you love. Ettitude has created a range of new high-performance, sustainable bedding that absorbs odor and drys faster than any other bedding in the world to avoid the growth of bacteria - saving you time, water and electricity.

Introducing Bamboo Coffee Sheets - a blend of our signature Bamboo Lyocell fabric and reclaimed coffee grounds.

Coffee grounds may seem like an unlikely sleep partner but we can assure you it will give you the best sleep of your life. By harnessing coffee’s natural ability to block odors, these sheets have excellent odor neutralizing and moisture wicking abilities, so your sheets can stay fresh for longer. No more musty-smelling sheets ever!

column1: Ettitude As Seen In Press

column2:
>

 

Why You Want to Sleep With Bamboo Coffee
column3:
>

 

Why Use Coffee Grounds?

Coffee makes the world go round, with over 2.25 billion cups of coffee are consumed in the world every day! The average cup of coffee, however, only utilises a minuscule 0.2% of the coffee with the remaining 99.8% becoming coffee grounds thrown into the trash. By using S.Cafe® technology, we are able to recycle this previously wasted 99.8%, to transform coffee grounds into a yarn which can be used in bedding. 

Coffee grounds also have excellent ability to remove foul smells, even one of the worst smells around -- sewer gas! Scientists at The City College of New York (CCNY) found that used coffee grounds can sop up hydrogen sulfide gas, the chemical that makes raw sewage stinky. That's how powerful used coffee ground as a deodorizer!
column4:
>

 

Odour Neutralising

Many people experience night sweat during their sleep. This can cause a rough night’s sleep and will mean your sheets need to be washed sooner. 

When sweat and odor pass through the fabric, it is absorbed into the micropores of the coffee yarn fibers, virtually eliminating it, allowing you to stay fresh all night and your sheets to remain cleaner for longer.
column5:
>

 

Fast Drying

S.Cafe® coffee yarn is also used by some of the biggest athletic and adventure wear companies due to its fast drying ability. We are the first in the world to use the S.Cafe® technology in bedding.

This unique bamboo coffee fabric can move moisture away from the skin to the outer surface of the fabric for a faster drying process. Imagine the structure sort of like a sponge, lots of surface area to spread, absorb and dry faster. This function is permanent and will never wash out. So bacterias don't get the chance to breed and grow on your sheets and create that unpleasant musty smell!
column6:
>

 

How Do Coffee Grounds Turn Into Yarn

Firstly, only coffee beans which have been roasted and ground can be used to produce coffee yarn. This is because during roasting, the beans swell and the hot water removes materials clogging the space, meaning the inside of the bean expands, allowing for odor absorption and fast drying functions. After the coffee beans are ground, used in coffee making and discarded, they are reclaimed to be used to make coffee yarn. The coffee grounds are embedded onto a yarn fiber, using a low temperature, high-pressure and energy saving process.

During this process, the filaments of the fiber change and lock and embed the coffee grounds into the yarn. The yarn fiber used is made from recycled plastic water bottles, another high-tech and sustainable material. The oils in the grounds, which produce the coffee scent are also removed through a pharmaceutical process so you won’t be kept awake all night.

 

Bamboo Lyocell Yarn

Bamboo Lyocell is a fabric that consists of fiber made from dissolving organic bamboo pulp. We are the FIRST company in the world to make 100% Bamboo Lyocell bedding. This fabric is superior to any other bamboo products on the market right now which use the traditional viscose/rayon process. Lyocell fabrication process is the most sustainable fabrication process, using a closed-loop system. 99% of the organic solvent and water in the process is recycled and reused up to 200 times. This process has minimal environmental impact, with economical use of both energy and water. Bamboo Lyocell fabric is incredibly soft, silky and super breathable.

 

S.Cafe® Coffee Yarn + Bamboo Lyocell

The S.Cafe® coffee yarn (35%) is woven together with Bamboo Lyocell yarn (65%) in the fabrication process to create these odor control and fast drying sheets that bring you the freshest sleep environment.
column7:
>

 

This Is How Your New Favourite Bedding Looks
column9:
Sizing

We offer modern and neutral colours that will work in any home. Please choose the perk which lists your bed size. We have grouped similar sizes together so don’t be confused by other sizes in your perk. We will email you after the campaign is completed to finalize your size and colour selections. We are offering exclusive bundles of items that we will not sell together on our website once the project is complete. These are special Indiegogo offers at great prices!
column13: >A close up of the Latte colour fabric
column17: >A close up of Flat White colour fabric
column21: > Close up of the Mocha colour fabric
column25: >A close up The Strawberry Frappe colour fabric.
column30:
>

 

Care Instructions 

Bamboo coffee lyocell bedding is super easy to care for. Just machine wash cold separately and line dry or tumble dry low and you are all set to enjoy them and the long lasting freshness for years to come! We do not recommend using bleaches, as they are usually packed with toxic chemicals. Fabric softener is also not necessary with bamboo sheets – they are already super soft and will stay that way wash after wash.

 

Perks (all prices are in USD)

 

 

The Most Sustainable Bedding Fabric to Date

These two unique yarns both hold numerous eco-friendly and quality certifications.

Organic Bamboo Lyocell is a cruelty-free, vegan-friendly fabric that has all the softness and smoothness of silk or high count Egyptian cotton. Made with FSC-certified organic bamboo, it is also more sustainable and eco-friendly than any other new types of functional textiles. 

S.Cafe® Coffee Yarn holds bluesignⓇ, Cradle to Cradle and GRS (Global Recycle Standard) certifications. 

Both yarns and the final product pass the Oeko-Tex Standard 100 test to make sure no harmful substances remained in the products at the end of the manufacturing process.

We also work closely with our manufacturing partners to make sure all our products are ethically made. Our factory is certified by Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production (WRAP), which is awarded based upon both internationally and nationally accepted humane workplace standards, safety, and ethical manufacturing regulations.
column45:
> 

 

Add-ons and Adjusting Your Pledge

If you’d like to upgrade, edit, change or select multiple perks you can do so by following the steps in the link below:

How do I claim a Perk? 

 

Stretch Goals     

As a small startup brand, we can't afford to buy minimum order quantities if our customers aren't excited about them. This unique bamboo coffee lyocell fabric requires a minimum financial commitment of $30,000 to be custom-made. We have already reached our initial funding goal and started mass production for the first two colors: Flat White and Latte.

We have two more stretch goals, each requiring an additional $20,000 to cover the expenses of an expanded option. For each stretch goal we achieve, we open an additional colour to all of our backers.

 

Project Timeline

We manufacture with our long-term manufacturing partners. Our partners helped make the production of our existing product line with thousands of raving customer reviews. We're in safe hands, and confident of a timely delivery. We have everything lined up––the prototypes have proved successful, our warehouse staff is trained and ready.

column1: <li>
July  Pre-order on IndieGoGo Indemand
<li>
November All rewards delivered

What Our Customers Say About Our Original Bamboo Sheets

Whether you sleep solo or with your partner you can enjoy the most comfortable night's sleep with our organic bamboo sheets. Here's what our customers think about our existing products.

You can read more reviews here.
Why Ettitude

Ettitude is an Australian bedding startup offering high quality, modern, minimalistic bedding at accessible prices with a focus on innovative fabric technology. Ettitude is created on the belief that bedding should be healthy, good quality and affordable as we spend 1/3 of our lives in bed. A healthy and comfortable sleep environment is so critical to sleep quality and life quality. We constantly research and develop new sustainable bedding materials that can provide additional health benefits because it's our mission to help everyone have the best night's sleep possible. 

A Special Thank You to the People Who Made This Possible

Actor: Joseph J Lai

Director: Lewis Eyers-Stott

Producer: Emmet Aldred

Editor and Narration: Zac Millner-Cretney

Video produced by Videoteam Team www.videoteam.com.au.

Our favourite local cafe De Clieu - 187 Getrude Street, Fitzroy, Melbourne.

 

Risks and challenges

The good news is that this Bamboo Coffee Bedding Collection is the result of a collaboration between us, our long-term manufacturer and fabric suppliers. They've participated at every stage of the development process and have produced many prototypes leading to the final ones you see in our video and on this page. 

This is our second Kickstarter and Indiegogo project we are embarking on. Our first one, Bamboo Charcoal Bedding has reached more than three times the target amount and most backers are extremely happy about the quality of our bed sheets after they received their perks.

We anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 12-16 weeks. But we’d love our backers to surprise us by blowing our target out of the water. If order volumes exceed our wildest expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill orders.

We partnered with the right people, completed all sampling, and sourced the best fabrics, so we're confident to ship the “perfect” sheets that will exceed all your expectations. We believe in transparency and communication, so our backers will be the first to know about any first-hand news regarding production and delivery.

","This Campaign has been successfully funded and you can order directly on the ettitude website now! Sleep Smarter and Healthier with Bamboo Coffee BeddingNothing beats the feeling of wrapping yourself in fresh, clean, feathery soft bed sheets every night. However, the process of frequently washing and drying your bedding takes up valuable time
column2: taking you away from doing the things that you love. Ettitude has created a range of new high-performance, sustainable bedding that absorbs odor and drys faster than any other bedding in the world to avoid the growth of bacteria - saving you time, water and electricity.Introducing Bamboo Coffee Sheets - a blend of our signature Bamboo Lyocell fabric and reclaimed coffee grounds.Coffee grounds may seem like an unlikely sleep partner but we can assure you it will give you the best sleep of your life. By harnessing coffee’s natural ability to block odors, these sheets have excellent odor neutralizing and moisture wicking abilities, so your sheets can stay fresh for longer. No more musty-smelling sheets ever!

column1: Ettitude As Seen In Press

Why You Want to Sleep With Bamboo Coffee   Why Use Coffee Grounds?Coffee makes the world go round, with over 2.25 billion cups of coffee are consumed in the world every day! The average cup of coffee, however, only utilises a minuscule 0.2% of the coffee with the remaining 99.8% becoming coffee grounds thrown into the trash. By using S.Cafe® technology, we are able to recycle this previously wasted 99.8%, to transform coffee grounds into a yarn which can be used in bedding. Coffee grounds also have excellent ability to remove foul smells, even one of the worst smells around -- sewer gas! Scientists at The City College of New York (CCNY) found that used coffee grounds can sop up hydrogen sulfide gas, the chemical that makes raw sewage stinky. That's how powerful used coffee ground as a deodorizer! Odour NeutralisingMany people experience night sweat during their sleep. This can cause a rough night’s sleep and will mean your sheets need to be washed sooner. When sweat and odor pass through the fabric, it is absorbed into the micropores of the coffee yarn fibers, virtually eliminating it, allowing you to stay fresh all night and your sheets to remain cleaner for longer. Fast DryingS.Cafe® coffee yarn is also used by some of the biggest athletic and adventure wear companies due to its fast drying ability. We are the first in the world to use the S.Cafe® technology in bedding.This unique bamboo coffee fabric can move moisture away from the skin to the outer surface of the fabric for a faster drying process. Imagine the structure sort of like a sponge, lots of surface area to spread, absorb and dry faster. This function is permanent and will never wash out. So bacterias don't get the chance to breed and grow on your sheets and create that unpleasant musty smell! How Do Coffee Grounds Turn Into YarnFirstly, only coffee beans which have been roasted and ground can be used to produce coffee yarn. AvoSeedo - Grow your own Avocado Tree with ease!

AvoSeedo was originally developed to facilitate the germination process. Now, with new and improved Avoseedo Nü, growing your own avocado tree is easier than ever!

Avocados are one of nature’s superfruits
column2:
they’re full of valuable nutrients like unsaturated fatty acids and vitamins. Avocados are native to subtropical regions, but with a little ingenuity and the right tools, they can be grown in colder parts of the world too. The key is the seed has to be kept wet all through the germination process. AvoSeedo Nü has been developed to facilitate the germination process even more effectively than the original. It has never been easier to grow your own avocado trees!​

The avocado: Usage and cultivation

Avocados have been grown as a crop plant since ancient times. Originating from Latin America, the enormous nutritive value of the “ahuacatl” was well known amongst the indigenous populations. However, it was only a century ago that the avocado found a new home in (southern) Europe. Nowadays, the pear-shaped, alligator-skinned fruits are a common sight in pretty much every supermarket – and on our tables. Outright tasty when consumed fresh and raw, they can also be refined with spices (resulting in the popular guacamole) or stuffed with any filling that pleases your pallet. Needless to say, avocados make a perfect addition to any diet.

Although avocado trees like it warm and cozy, they can handle lower temperatures (as in central Europe, the US, or Canada) quite well. Basically, the seed of every “common supermarket avocado” can germinate and grow to full size (up to 15 meters!). However, simply putting the seed in the ground won’t work. Rather, the “pointy” end should be facing the sun (without being exposed to permanent, direct sunlight). At the same time, the flattened end should be kept wet at all times.

There are two common methods to make an avocado seed germinate. One method is to place the seed inside a biodegradable pot and leave it at a bright, warm place. After one to two months, the first small roots will begin to show.

A more sophisticated, second alternative is the so-called “toothpick method.” Three or four toothpicks are inserted into the outer layer of the avocado seed. They prevent the seed from sinking when it is placed on a glass of water. As a result, the seed’s bottom will be kept wet as required, while the “pointy” end can receive the proper amount of sunlight. This germination method will also take between one and two months.

In both cases, however, a great deal of attention has to be paid to guarantee permanent water supply for the “flat” end. This is the main challenge when growing an avocado
column3:
if the seed is left high and dry at any time, there’s a chance that the germination process will permanently cease. This is where AvoSeedo comes into play.

Our small, elaborate tool builds on the idea behind the toothpick method. AvoSeedo is a small plastic bowl that features an indentation with a hole in it. A single avocado seed can be inserted with the “flat” end facing down. Afterward, AvoSeedo can be placed in a sufficiently large, water-filled pot. Due to its low weight and high displacement, AvoSeedo will remain at the surface all the time
column4:
as the water level lowers, AvoSeedo will sink accordingly. 

AvoSeedo Nü’s closed-top construction makes it even easier to germinate your avocado seed. This feature prevents the AvoSeedo from becoming water-logged and potentially sinking to the bottom. It also enables you to use your AvoSeedo outside if you so choose.

 

As long as some water remains in the pot, there is little chance that the seed will dry out – thanks to the “ground hole”. It also allows the developing roots to grow and to expand freely. By the way, the hole is not simply round but has the shape of a blossom instead. While this may as well add to the aesthetical appearance of AvoSeedo, it is also a functional feature. It makes sure that the avocado seed will be held firmly in its cradle
column5:
even if the seed cracks open during the germination process, it won’t sink.

With AvoSeedo, you can significantly increase the success rate when it comes to avocado germination. Without any risk, you can decrease the watering intervals drastically. From time to time, you will have to check the water level of the pot containing the AvoSeedo and avocado seed. Compared to the original toothpick method, there’s another advantage: the avocado seed doesn’t need to be perforated, reducing the risk of damage (and thus, failed germination efforts).

 

And finally, AvoSeedo features a mounting that can be used to attach small flags. These can be inscribed with the date when germination started, with strain names or with additional information. Thus, you can easily keep track, even when germinating several avocado seeds at the same time.

All in all, AvoSeedo is the perfect tool for you to grow avocado trees at home. The demanding germination period can now be mastered with virtually no effort, giving your new trees an edge right from the beginning!

The Slim TWO is designed to bring a new level of quality, comfort, and cleanliness to your bathroom at an affordable price.  Offering high-end features such as heated seats, heated water, stainless steel construction, and a night light, the Slim TWO will redefine your bathroom experience.

All Bio Bidet products are designed to be D.I.Y. and parts for installation are included. They also come with an owner's manual and installation guide. Best of all, our professional customer service representatives can assist you over the phone in real time. BioBidet products do not require major plumbing work. Unlike conventional bidets, our seats and attachments work with your existing plumbing.  

The Slim TWO Smart Toilet Seat will come with a 4' power cord to connect to an existing outlet.

 At Bio Bidet, we pride ourselves on quality products and exceptional service. We have a tight-knit team fully dedicated to spreading the idea that Water Does It Better. Our expert customer service representatives can handle any questions you may have, and our shipping department works around the clock to make sure your orders arrive on time. We stand by our products and our customers, and look forward to helping you start a cleaner, healthier lifestyle.

column33:

 The FLOW Single Handle Pull-Down faucet with hands-free motion sensing technology is the next essential upgrade in kitchen technology. The simple and easy installation does not require any hard wiring, but features a quick insertion method installation. Since it is not hardwired, it will be able to function normally even during a power outage. The FLOW faucet features a 2-function spray head, durable ceramic cartridge, metallic waterway, and an easy wipe clean finish. Available in Brushed Nickel, Chrome, or Oil Rubbed Bronze. Easily swap between hands-free motion sensing mode or the option to use it as a traditional manual faucet. Pull down the faucet head to automatically spray, and release to instantly turn the water off as the head retracts back into place.

 Our representatives are standing by to answer any and all questions you may have. Give us a call at 847-458-2334 and see why we pride ourselves on quality customer service.

Short Summary

Our Journey to parenthood.
We are Josh and Cherie MacLean, and here is our story...well so far.

We met at work in 2000 and, after being friends for a few months, we started dating. Josh was kind, loving, intelligent, thoughtful, and my best friend. We dated for two years, then got married. We decided to start a family which was not as easy for us as it is for most. We went to a doctor after a year of trying and he said everything is fine just keep trying... After a while we went to another doctor, then another, and yet another they couldn't figure out what was wrong.

We recently found the cause of our difficulties in getting pregnant. Our journey has been long. We have been to 9 doctors in about the same number of years, and endured endless drugs and treatments. We finally found out our inability to conceive is a result of a car accident I had when I was 18 years old. The resulting surgeries, and internal bleeding left adhesions on my tubes. So to have a baby we have to do Invitro. It is good to finally know what has caused all this. When they told me, it was really hard to hear that something that happened so long ago, that took a long time to recover from, had been causing all this sorrow and heartache. I do feel blessed every day to be alive!!!
The Cost

But, now we have to come up with the money. We have gone through many thousands of dollars to get to this point. Our savings has been exhausted. So, we are with a nervous, but optimistic heart, seeking out help from our loved ones and caring strangers. We hope this charity site will help us to start our family.

Invitro is about $ 14,000 and our clinic offers a discounted plan that if you pay for three rounds up front, then you get a discount. So it comes out to about $28,000, that includes three treatments. If you don’t end up with a baby after three treatments you get 70% of your money back, and we would then use that to adopt.

We put our goal at $14,000 because that would give us at least one chance but we would love to be able to make it to the ultimate goal of $28,000 so we would have three tries and if it didn’t work we would have the money to adopt.

We would appreciate it if you would send it out to as many people as you can, to see if you can help make our dreams of having a family come true. This has been one of the hardest things we have had to go through.  We know many others have trials that are hard and seem never ending. This has been ours. It has been a hard decision to put our private struggle out on display, but we need your help.

We want to thank our family and friends who have been supportive through the tears and heartache. Who have been our cheerleaders when we couldn't be our own. Who have brought baskets of love to our doors and spent hours upon hours listening to, and loving us. We cannot say how much it has meant to us to have such wonderful people in our lives we are truly blessed to be so loved by so many.

Invitro or Bust... After 9 Years

Much Love,
Josh &

","This is the start of the SUMPOD second campaign.The SUMPOD is
the first 3D Printer and Mini CNC machine designed specifically for home
and school use. It has taken the advances from the home 3d Printer and

CNC communities and put them in a home friendly form. It is constructed from precision cnc machined MDF parts and quality components to produce a strong and accurate machine. Each machine will also include a professionally engineered and machined 0.4mm nozzle.The build area is 150mmx150x100. It is shipped ready for 1.75mm PLA filament but can be adapted easily for 3mm PLA.
Also we have finalised a website, SUMPOD.COM, that not only will be
informative about all things SUMPOD but has been designed to have a
community feel.
After the next week, more will be added to this campaign and to the website to further explain the benefits of owning a SUMPOD.
PERKS

$450 MDF KIT WITHOUT ELECTRONICS

$650 MDF KIT WITH FULLY SOLDERED ELECTRONICS

The postage and packaging cost will be the same and should NOT be added to the contribution: A paypal invoice will be sent on the completion of the campaign.
UK                     $60
Rest of World    $120All machines will be sent a maximum 4 weeks after the
completion of this 38 day campaign, the beginning of October.
The MDF parts will be made as and
when machines are ordered but the components will be ordered at the end.

parts should take approximately 3-4 weeks to arrive.
I have already ordered some parts with a longer lead time , for example the professionally engineered nozzles, in advance of this campaign.
After the shipping of the orders from the first campaign are underway there will be a lot more content uploaded to the website.
SUMPODs will again be shipped in the order received.
Thanks

Introducing the ""be loved pillow"" !

We are ready and excited to go full force in reaching out to ALL (military families, foster kids, anyone in the grief and loss process, college students, children of divorce, toddlers in daycare...everyone and anyone that appreciates a good cuddle) of our potential customers.
We want these pillows in the arms of millions and you can help us do that:
Tell people about our campaign by sending our link to all your facebook friends, your family and email contacts.
And, of course, by making a direct donation to our campaign - your money will turn into something wonderful to hold !

If we get funded beyond our set funding goal, which we are hoping to do since we have only asked for the minimum to get us going, we will ramp up our advertising and order more  pillows and sell them to more people !
My husband (Scot) and I (Katey) , both artists living in Santa Fe NM, designed a unique and much needed pillow we named the ""be loved pillow"".

Orignally I made the ""be loved pillow"" for children attending a grief and loss workshop. I presented the pillow to the kids as a place to put memorabilia and keepsakes from the one they lost and as a place they could put their own drawings, journals, letters etc. that express how they feel at the moment. The pillow was meant to help them  process their grief, a place where ALL of their emotions could be safely expressed and offer them comfort all at once.The children LOVED them and immediately started to talk about what they were going to put inside and why. The drawings and collages they made that day went directly inside the pillow, which they carried with them snug in their arms. Because of the way the children responded I decided to make more. I made the next bunch of pillows for children and teens in a foster program and they loved them too ! For the foster kids it became a safe and warm place to put their most cherished items during their frequent times of transition.

The ""be loved pillow"" is a pillow with a deep and soft interior - an interior made for your special treasures.  When you put your most cherished things inside this pillow you transform them into cuddle-able comfort.  Originally the ""be loved pillow"" was designed for those of us who miss someone, but the fact is, we ALL need some comfort, we ALL need the ""be loved pillow"" !
The ""be loved pillow"" is made from 100% cotton blue denim (on the outside) and soft brushed 100% cotton flannel (on the inside) and filled with 100% cotton batting, it is washable, synthetic free !
Our funding goal of $15,000 will pay for :  1st manufactured prototype, the first 1,000 pillows to be made, shipping costs and our initial few months of power marketing/advertising.
<div>
